dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Two Brothers Brewing Company Prairie Path Ale

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Summer Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Blue Point Brewing Company Blue Point Summer Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:The delicious, refreshing taste of Summer Ale comes from a substantial portion of wheat malt added to a traditional barley malt mix which gives this delicious brew a unique tartness not found in many light ales these days. No surprise – this light, thirst-quenching brew is best enjoyed on hot summer days.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Aud Blonde
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Russian River Brewing Company Aud Blonde

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Gossamer Golden Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Half Acre Beer Company Gossamer Golden Ale

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Heavy Seas - Gold Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Heavy Seas Beer Heavy Seas - Gold Ale

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Sum'r Summer Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Uinta Brewing Company Sum'R
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Citrusy and thirst-quenching, this refreshing golden ale is highlighted by the use of unique hops.17 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Summer Honey Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Big Sky Brewing Company Summer Honey Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:When the days get longer and the air gets warmer, we get outside quite a bit. And we build a big thirst. Summer Honey helps us shake off the winter and slakes our thirst for a refreshing brew. Summer Honey is a full-flavored summer seasonal ale. Brewed with a unique, balanced blend of spices, Northwest Hops, and Montana honey. Summer Honey is brewed during the early days of spring and released around the first of May each year. Light colored, light bodied, and very drinkable, Summer Honey sacrifices nothing to create a flavorful beer that can be enjoyed during the height of the Summer.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Ballantine XXX Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Pabst Brewing Company Ballantine XXX Ale

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Molson Export
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Molson Coors Canada Molson Export
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:With over 100 years of brewing tradition behind it, Molson Export continues to grow in lore. Its history, however, could never be as rich without the original, high-quality ingredients that have come to distinguish it from other brands.We brew Molson Export with two-row barley, an exclusive strain of ale yeast that goes back to the origins of Molson Breweries, hand-selected Golding and Oregon hops and water.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Lonely Blonde
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Fulton Beer Lonely Blonde
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:The Lonely Blonde wears a delicate fragrance of German noble hops, and slips a touch of white wheat between American pale and crystal malts for a smooth, sensuous body, fair complexion, and a pleasantly lacy white head. Crisp carbonation slinks the Lonely Blonde quickly away, and you’re left with nothing but a slight lingering sweetness as you contemplate how The Lonely Blonde can be so beautiful on so many levels.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Summer Blonde Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: River Horse Brewing Co. River Horse Summer Blonde
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:A light, refreshing Ale that is easy to drink yet complex. Perfect for the warmer months.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Knockout Blonde
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Lawson's Finest Liquids Knockout Blonde
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Our blonde ale packs a zippy punch of hop aroma! This brew features a flavorful blend of North American malts and is fully loaded with Cascade and Centennial hops.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Blonde Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Thomas Hooker Brewing Company Thomas Hooker Blonde Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Smooth flavor with a subtle malt sweetness accented with the delicate aroma of Czech hops. This brilliant gold ale is a mellow but flavorful microbrew.11 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Bare Ass Blonde Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: DuClaw Brewing Company Bare Ass Blonde Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Our smoothly drinkable little blonde bombshell will turn your head with its smooth, light malt flavor, mild hop character, 5% ABV, and crisp, refreshing, fruity finish.Style: Blonde AleColor: GoldenHop Variety: Fuggle, GoldingsGrains: Pale Malt, Wheat Malt, Carapils MaltPlato: 12.5IBU: 19\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: NOLA Blonde AleNew Orleans Lager & Ale Brewing Company (NOLA)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Brewery: New Orleans Lager & Ale Brewing Company (NOLA)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: New Orleans Lager & Ale Brewing Company (NOLA) NOLA Blonde Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:A great introductory craft beer, NOLA Blonde is a medium-bodied traditional American blonde ale - golden in color with floral and citrus hop aromas.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Alamo Golden Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Alamo Beer Co. Alamo Golden Ale

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Golden Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Mayflower Brewing Company Mayflower Golden Ale

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Leffe Blonde
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Abbaye de Leffe S.A. Leffe Blonde

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Affligem Blond
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brouwerij De Smedt / Brouwerij Affligem Affligem Blond
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Affligem beers originate from the Belgian abbey founded in 1074. The citrus and tropical fruit notes followed by a malty softness and hoppy character combine to make Affligem Blonde a beautifully smooth beer with a lightly bitter finish.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Trappist Westvleteren BlondBrouwerij Westvleteren (Sint-Sixtusabdij van Westvleteren)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brouwerij Westvleteren (Sint-Sixtusabdij van Westvleteren) Trappist Westvleteren Blonde
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:(Green Cap)\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Devotion
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: The Lost Abbey Devotion Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Belgian Style dry hopped Blonde Ale. It’s an unassuming road leading to the priory. Here, off the corner of two intersecting roads, dedicated monks have been making beer for over 150 years. It’s always been a simple life — the kind that requires they brew only enough to sustain the activities of their monastery. In the silence of passing seasons, they pray, they brew and retire in solitary existence behind the sheltering walls. They live a most interesting life. Most likely one we couldn't sustain.Nearby, each summer, the trellised fields spring to life as rows of resinous green cones are trained toward the heavens. Rumor is some monks love these hops and being surrounded by budding yellow aromas and the leafy pungent fields inspired them. Since we aren't sensible enough to locate our brewery near hop fields, we can only offer this blond ale in celebration of our Abbey brethren and their steadfast Devotion.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Grimbergen Blonde
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brouwerij Alken-Maes Grimbergen Blonde
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:The high quality raw materials make up the richness of this top-fermented beer, which is characterized by its ocher blonde color.Grimbergen Blonde is light fruity and balanced sweet-bitter. Due to its rounded flavor, this beer is highly appreciated.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Maredsous 6 - Blonde
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brouwerij Duvel Moortgat NV Maredsous 6 - Blonde

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Saxo
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brasserie Caracole Saxo

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: La Trappe Blond (Koningshoeven / Dominus)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Bierbrouwerij De Koningshoeven B.V. La Trappe Blond (Koningshoeven / Dominus)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:This scintillating golden ale boasts a rich, fruity, and fresh aroma. And a light malty and sweet taste. It has a soft bitterness with a friendly aftertaste. A well-balanced blend of complexity and simplicity. La Trappe Blond continues to ferment in the bottle.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Augustijn Blond
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brouwerij Van Steenberge N.V. Augustijn Blond

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Kasteel Blond
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brouwerij Van Honsebrouck N.V. Kasteel Blond

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Blond
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brasserie de l'Abbaye du Val-Dieu Val-Dieu Blond

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: St. Feuillien Blonde
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brasserie St. Feuillien St. Feuillien Blonde

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Bink Blond
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brouwerij Kerkom Bink Blond

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Blond
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brouwerij Hof Ten Dormaal Blond

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Tongerlo Blond
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brouwerij Haacht NV Tongerlo 6 Dubbel Blond
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Formerly known as Tongerlo 6 Dubbel Blond\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Southside Blonde
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Perennial Artisan Ales Southside Blonde
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Southside Blonde is a sessionable Belgian-Style Blonde Ale that is light-bodied and dry with a hint of fruitiness from the yeast. Southside is a friendly pairing with a variety of foods and an approachable choice for all types of beer drinkers.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Belgian Blonde
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: BottleTree Beer Co. BottleTree Belgian Blonde

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: La Binchoise Blonde TraditionBrasserie La Binchoise (Malterie des Remparts)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brasserie La Binchoise (Malterie des Remparts) La Binchoise Blonde Tradition

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Brunehaut Blonde
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brasserie De Brunehaut Brunehaut Blonde

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Steenbrugge Blond
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brouwerij Palm NV Steenbrugge Blond

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Abbaye De Floreffe Blonde
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brasserie Lefèbvre SA Abbaye De Floreffe Blonde

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: La Gauloise Blonde
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brasserie Du Bocq La Gauloise Blonde

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Valeir Blond
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brouwerij Contreras Valeir Blond

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Celestial Blonde Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Old Forge Brewing Company Celestial Blond Ale

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: 't Smisje Blond
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brouwerij Smisje 't Smisje Blond

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: De Koninck Blond
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brouwerij De Koninck NV De Koninck Blond

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Wendelinus Blonde
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brasserie Meteor Wendelinus
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Another idea from the abbey...Brewed in the tradition of the monks of Wissembourg, who had their beer made on the current site of the brewery, Wendelinus is the result of a centuries-old know-how. Beneath its amber colour and creamy head is an abbey beer with a range of flavours that mature on the palate with every mouthful. Strong, with a pleasant touch of bitterness, this is a beer to be savoured for its persistent mellowness and caramelized fruity flavours. Take your time with it!\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Ename Blond
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brouwerij Roman N.V. Ename Blond

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: St. Idesbald Blond
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brouwerij Huyghe St. Idesbald Blond

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Abbaye D'Aulne Blonde Des Pères (Sur Lie) 6°
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brasserie Val De Sambre Abbaye D'Aulne Blonde Des Pères (Sur Lie) 6°

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Viven Blond
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brouwerij Van Viven Viven Blond

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Summer Belgian-Style Blonde Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Choc Beer Co. / Pete's Place Belgian-Style Blonde Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:26 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Pater Lieven Blond
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brouwerij Van den Bossche Pater Lieven Blond

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Troegenator
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Tröegs Brewing Company Troegenator Double Bock
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Monks had fasting figured out. No food? No problem. Just drink a Double Bock. Thick and chewy with intense notes of caramel, chocolate and dried stone fruit, ‘Nator (as we call him) serves as a tribute to this liquid bread style.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Spaten Optimator
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Spaten-Franziskaner-Bräu Spaten Optimator

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Salvator
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Paulaner Brauerei GmbH & Co. KG Salvator Doppel Bock
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:This unfiltered bottom fermented double bock beer has been brewed for over 375 years--always adhering to the original recipe. The taste is unmistakable, with its smooth chocolate flavor, robust dark caramel maltiness and a light note of hops--providing a nice intensity on the palate.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Korbinian
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Bayerische Staatsbrauerei Weihenstephan Weihenstephaner Korbinian
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Our Korbinian, the full-bodied, dark Doppelbock with light brown foam, wins beer-lovers over with a balance of fruity hints of plums and figs, a dark malt aroma - reminiscent of toffee, nuts and chocolate. Its roasted flavour goes well with smoked meat and fish as well as venison and poultry. Brewed according to our centuries-old brewing tradition on the Weihenstephan hill.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Samichlaus Classic Bier
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brauerei Schloss Eggenberg Samichlaus Bier
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:The once strongest beer in the world is back! Brewed only once a year on December 6. Samichlaus is aged for 10 months before bottling. This beer is perhaps the rarest in the world. Samichlaus may be aged for many years to come. Older vintages become more complex with a creamy warming finish. Serve with hardy robust dishes and desserts, particulary with chocolates, or as an after dinner drink by itself. Brewed under the exclusive licence of Feldschlösschen-Hürlimann-Holding, Switzerland.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Samuel Adams Double Bock (Imperial Series)Boston Beer Company (Samuel Adams)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Boston Beer Company (Samuel Adams) Samuel Adams Double Bock (Imperial Series)

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Andechser Doppelbock Dunkel
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Klosterbrauerei Andechs Andechser Doppelbock Dunkel
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:This world famous bock from Bavaria’s Holy Mountain is not meant to be rushed, but savoured slowly. As solid as a rock, Andechser Doppelbock Dunkel presides over the evening meal with a colour reminiscent of dark copper with nuances of fiery red. Its clear gleaming look harmonises with its firm, fine pored head.Also the aroma delights the connoisseur: soft roasted accents and a nuance of dried fruit carrying a vein of caramel. This Doppelbock Dunkel from Bavaria’s Holy Mountain presents a pleasant effervescence. And then there’s the unmistakable flavour: mouthcoating and velvety, strong and yet pleasantly malty – a powerful, robust body. At the same time, it develops an easily recognisable sweetness, embraced in roasted cocoa and a light, bitter hoppiness.Concluding with a powerful punch, this Doppelbock departs with a lingering aftertaste of quality plain chocolate. A strong Doppelbock that embodies the centuries old Benedictine brewing tradition, sip by delicious sip.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Perkulator Coffee Dopplebock
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Dark Horse Brewing Company Dark Horse Perkulator Coffee Dopplebock

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: EKU 28
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Kulmbacher Brauerei AG EKU 28
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:A super-strong Bock, but not an Eisbock.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Liberator Doppelbock
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Thomas Hooker Brewing Company Thomas Hooker Liberator Doppelbock
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Hopped with German and Czech hops and fermented with Bavarian lager yeast, this traditional doppelbock blends an extensive amount of select dark malts to achieve its rich and creamy character. Rich and filling, this brew is a malt lovers dream.24 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Smuttynose S'muttonator (Heritage Series)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Smuttynose Brewing Company Smuttynose S'muttonator (Big Beer Series)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Formerly Smuttynose S'muttonator (Big Beer Series)S’Muttonator Double Bock displays the characteristically full malt flavor that can only come from using the best German specialty malts, and a traditional decoction mashing technique. The extra effort also adds a lot of extra time to each batch, but that’s the only way to get the nuttiness, toffee notes and smooth character beer drinkers expect from a double bock. 2007 - 9.8%2008 - 8.8%2010 - 9.5%\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Butthead Doppelbock
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Tommyknocker Brewery Butthead Doppelbock

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Autumnal Fire
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Capital Brewery Autumnal Fire
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:With a deep copper hue and rich malty flavor this renowned doppelbock warms like burning embers of a mid-autumn fire as the nights grow cooler. You may be tempted to share, but keep this Fire for yourself. It’s that good!\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Weltenburger Kloster Asam-Bock
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Klosterbrauerei Weltenburg Weltenburger Kloster Asam-Bock
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:The Weltenburger Asam Bock owes its name to the ingenious, baroque painter and master builder Cosmas Damian Asam. The malt-stressed goat exudes light roasted aromas that give a hint of coffee. Friends and connoisseurs appreciate it especially for its strong-sweet, very aromatic and persistent taste until the finish. With its 6.9% alcohol content, it is the strongest beer from the Weltenburger family.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Wasatch The Devastator Double Bock
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Utah Brewers Cooperative Wasatch Devastator Double Bock
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:If you're going to sin, sin big. With 8% alc/vol and a creamy richness, this brew has developed a serious cult following. Imagine that - a cult following in Utah?!\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: St. Victorious
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Victory Brewing Company St. Victorious
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Limited seasonal draft only release. Doppelbock brewed w/ smoked 2-row German malt from Bamberg.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Urbock 23°
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brauerei Schloss Eggenberg Urbock 23°

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Voodoovator
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Atwater Block Brewery Atwater Voodoovator

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Saxonator Dunkles Doppelbock
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Jack's Abby Brewing Saxonator Dunkles Doppelbock
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:A dark strong interpretation of a double bock. Full bodied with a raisiny, dark fruit, slightly roasted and chewy malt character. Lagered for two months, a smooth malt character balances the high ABV of this strong beer.25 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Doppel-Hirsch
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Der HirschBrau/Privatbrauerei Höss Doppel-Hirsch

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Josephs Brau Winter Brew
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Trader Joe's Brewing Company Josephs Brau Winterfest
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Also known as Josephs Brau Winterfest\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Duck-Rabbator
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: The Duck-Rabbit Craft Brewery Duck-Rabbit Duck-Rabbator
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:The Duck-Rabbator Dopplebock is a powerfully malty German-style lager. The malty / grainy flavors so dominate this beer, it's like a whole loaf of bread in every glass! Is it a beverage or is it a meal? It's both.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Ettaler Curator Dunkler Doppelbock (US Import Version)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Klosterbrauerei Ettal / Ettaler Klosterbetriebe GmbH Ettaler Curator Doppelbock (US Import Version)

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Blonde Doppelbock
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Capital Brewery Blonde Doppelbock

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Doppelbock Dunkel
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brauerei Schloss Eggenberg Doppelbock Dunkel

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Tucher Bajuvator Doppelbock
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brauerei Tucher Brau Tucher Bajuvator Doppelbock

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Dark Heathen Triple Bock
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Kuhnhenn Brewing Company Kuhnhenn Dark Heathen Triple Bock
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:This Triple Bock is dark brown with ruby highlights. It is extremely rich and complex, with flavors of raisin, plum. There is a slight heat from alcohol and has low carbonation. It is full bodied, malty and sweet– you big beer lovers should try this beer.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Winter Bock
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Gordon Biersch Brewery Restaurant Gordon Biersch Winter Bock
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:In the 11th century, Belgian monks sustained themselves during winter fasts with beers made from strong, dark flavored malts. These creamy books ensured that the monks would fast frequently.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Deep Water Dopplebock
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Thomas Creek Brewery Deep Water Dopplebock
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:30 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Doppelbock Grande Cuvée Printemps
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Les Trois Mousquetaires Doppelbock Grande Cuvée Printemps
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Full-bodied, Bavarian-style lager with a complex malt character suggesting flavors of fresh-baked bread, molasses, chocolate, plums, and oranges. This style was originally created by monks for Lenten fasting and called "liquid bread".\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Lobotomy Bock
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Indian Wells Brewing Company Lobotomy Bock
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:This is a classic German Dopple Bock. Like all of our beers it is made in strict accordance to the German Reinheitsgebot Purity Law of Brewing, which is water, malt, hops and yeast only! Lobotomy Bock is made from five types of specialty malted barley including Munich, black patent and other premium malts. And finished with two types of hops, Sterling and Perle added at the boil and again at the finish for the perfect flavor balance. Lobotomy Bock is brewed with pure artesian spring water from the historic Indian Wells Spring. Lobotomy Bock is lagered for several weeks then finished to exacting standards.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Primátor Double Bock Beer
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Pivovar Náchod a.s. Primátor Double Bock Beer

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Icelandic DoppelbockEinstök Ölgerð (Einstök Beer Company)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Einstök Ölgerð Icelandic Doppelbock
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:The 2015 version of this limited-edition seasonal is only available through the holiday season, but this winter celebration brew is worth the wait. Malted barley and chocolate tones define the traditional style, while the robust aroma and long, mellow finish make this the perfect companion for holiday adventures. Get it while you can.Munich malt, pilsner malt, crystal malt, chocolate malt, bavarian hops.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Dopple Bock
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Sprecher Brewing Company Dopple Bock

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: St. Nikolaus Bock Bier - Brewer's Reserve
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Pennsylvania Brewing Company St. Nikolaus Bock Bier - Brewer's Reserve

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Emancipator Doppelbock
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Christian Moerlein Brewing Company Christian Moerlein Doppelbock
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Christian Moerlein Doppelbock is brewed in accordance with Germany's Reinheitsgebot Purity Law of 1516. What makes Doppelbock most enjoyable is its rich, full body, which is superbly balanced for smoothness. It will be appreciated for its robust malt and carmel characteristics. Enjoy its smooth, velvety taste and you will agree that it is Quite Simply a Better Doppelbock.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Winter-Bock
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Einbecker Brauhaus AG Einbecker Winter-Bock
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:When it's cool outside, it's time for the dark Einbecker Winter-Bock inside. Selected malts, the finest hops and a special beer yeast provide a true winter treat. With 18.2%, Einbecker Winter-Bock has the highest original wort of all Einbecker beers.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Granitbock
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Brewery: Brauerei Hofstetten Krammer GmbH & Co. KG
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brauerei Hofstetten Krammer GmbH & Co. KG Granitbock

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Double Vision Doppelbock
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Grand Teton Brewing Co. Double Vision Doppelbock
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Our Double Vision Doppelbock is brewed with Idaho 2-Row Pale and German Munich, CaraAroma, CaraMunich and de-husked Carafa malts to an original gravity of 24 Plato (1.096 SG). The malts provide a dark leather color with ruby notes, a luxurious tan head, and a bready aroma with a hint of smoke. It is lightly spiced with Liberty hops, an American version of the noble German Hallertau Mittelfruh, and fermented with lager yeast from a monastery brewery near Munich. In the traditional manner, Double Vision is fermented cold (48 F) and lagered a full 10 weeks for smoothness. At over 8% alcohol by volume, it is a deceptively drinkable springtime warmer.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Fireman's Brew Brunette Beer
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Fireman's Brew, Inc. Fireman's Brew Brewnette Beer

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Schneider Aventinus Eisbock
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Brewery: Weisses Bräuhaus G. Schneider & Sohn GmbH
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Weisses Bräuhaus G. Schneider & Sohn GmbH Schneider Aventinus Weizen-Eisbock
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Aventinus has been known to be the most intense and complex Wheat-Doppelbock in the world. This was the case in the past, but not anymore... Recently, Hans Peter Drexler, Brewmaster at G. Schneider & Sohn, heard some stories about some extra special Aventinus resulting from some partial freezing during a cold winter transport in the 1930's. He decided to recreate this classic "mistake" to further concentrate Aventinus in a modern, controlled facility. Thus, the Aventinus Eisbock was reborn. Prost!Georg Schneider VI, 6th Generation Brewer\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Raspberry Eisbock
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Kuhnhenn Brewing Company Kuhnhenn Eisbock

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Winter Wonder Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Kuhnhenn Brewing Company Kuhnhenn Winter Wonder Lager

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Ramstein Winter Wheat Eisbock
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: High Point Brewing Company Ramstein Winter Wheat Eisbock

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Granitbock Ice
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Brewery: Brauerei Hofstetten Krammer GmbH & Co. KG
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brauerei Hofstetten Krammer GmbH & Co. KG Granitbock Ice

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Double Ice Bock
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Southampton Publick House Double Ice Bock
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Southampton Double Ice Bock is based off of a traditional German-style Bock beer. This German lager beer is rich and malty and brewed to an alcohol strength of 6-7%. “Ice Bock” is produced when a Bock beer is partially frozen in order to increase it’s alcohol content. In this process, some of the water content turns to ice, effectively strengthening the flavor and alcohol of the beer. We take this process one step further. After the initial freezing, the beer is decanted off the ice and frozen a second time. The resulting beer is a deceptively smooth and amazingly strong lager.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Eisbock (Congelator)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Micro-Brasserie L'Alchimiste Eisbock (Congelator)

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Schorschbock Ice 13
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Schorschbräu Schorschbock Ice 13

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Schorschbock 31%
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Schorschbräu Schorschbock 31%

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: La Félix
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Le Bilboquet, Brasseur Artisan La Félix

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Schorschbock 57%
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Schorschbräu Schorschbock 57%

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Eisbock
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Lodi Beer Company Eisbock

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Eis Instigator
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Sly Fox Brewing Company Eis Instigator

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Black Ice
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Aarhus Bryghus Black Ice

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Dead Guy Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Rogue Ales Dead Guy Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:An ale inspired by the style of a German Maibock, brewed using our proprietary Pacman yeast, Dead Guy Ale is deep honey in color with a malty aroma, rich hearty flavor and a well balanced finish.9 Ingredients: 2-Row, C15, Munich, Rogue Farms Dare™, Risk™ Malts; Rogue Farms Revolution™ & Independent™ Hops; Free Range Coastal Water & Pacman Yeast.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Andygator
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Abita Brewing Co. Andygator
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Andygator, a creature of the swamp, is a unique high-gravity brew made with pale malt, German lager yeast, and German Perle hops. Unlike other high-gravity brews, Andygator is fermented to a dry finish with a slightly sweet flavor and subtle fruit aroma. Reaching an alcohol strength of 8% by volume, it is a Helles Dopplebock.25 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Mardi Gras Bock
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Abita Brewing Co. Mardi Gras Bock
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Abita Bock is brewed with pale, pilsner, and caramel malts and German Perle hops. Our bock is similar to German maibocks with its rich malt flavor and full body. A perfect choice during Carnival season in New Orleans.25 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Hofbräu Maibock (Urbock)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Hofbräuhaus München Hofbräu Maibock (Urbock)

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Cabin Fever
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: New Glarus Brewing Company Cabin Fever
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Cool days draw us close to the warmth of home fires. This is the season to sip away the chill and embrace quiet evenings with friends and family. You hold a Wisconsin Style Honey Bock, easy going and more approachable than its traditional dark German cousin. Bock beers have existed in Wisconsin for over 150 years. This pale bock is brewed with an exclusive blend of Wisconsin two row barley that balances seamlessly with our special European hops. Naturally sweet Clover Honey was added in the kettle accenting warm flavor notes on your tongue. Whether you reminisce the passing summer sun or thrill to squeaky steps through drifting snow one thing is certain about winter in Wisconsin - this too shall pass.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: John John Dead Guy Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Rogue Ales John John Dead Guy Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:"Dead Guy Ale aged in Dead Guy Whiskey Barrels"Malts: Carastan, Rogue Micro-Barley Farm Dare & Risk malts.Hops: Saaz, Willamette, Rogue Micro-Farm Hop Yard Revolution hops.Yeast & Water: Pacman Yeast & Free Range Coastal Water.16º PLATO40 IBU78 AA16º Lovibond\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Dundee Pale Bock Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Brewery: Genesee Brewing Co. / Dundee Brewing Co.
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Genesee Brewing Co. / Dundee Brewing Co. Dundee Pale Bock Lager

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Maibock
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Summit Brewing Company Summit Maibock
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:This traditional German style earned the nickname “liquid bread” because it was brewed by Paulaner monks in Bavaria to help them get through Lenten fasting. Moravian 37 malts and Czech Saaz hops give it a toasted sweetness with a little spice in the finish. Available in 12-oz. cans and bottles in the Spring.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Mai-Ur-Bock
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Einbecker Brauhaus AG Einbecker Mai-Ur-Bock
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:“Ready for May?” In spring, the Einbecker brew-masters brew a particular special beer, the Einbecker Mai-Ur-Bock. This pleasantly-bitter refreshment is only available in the spring – as long as supplies last.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Samichlaus Bier Helles
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brauerei Schloss Eggenberg Samichlaus Bier Helles

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Blonde Bock
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Gordon Biersch Brewery Restaurant Gordon Biersch Blonde Bock
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:A traditional "Helles" or pale bock beer, Blonde Bock is a medium hopped beer with a rich, malty flavor. Made popular in the early 1600s, bock beers were originally brewed by monks to minimize hunger pangs during fasting periods. Most bock beers are dark in color. Our Gordon Biersch Blonde Bock is golden with a creamy head.23 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Boss Tom's Golden Bock
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Boulevard Brewing Co. Boss Tom's Golden Bock
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Boss Tom’s Golden Bock is our seasonal offering for late spring. The smooth, soft maltiness of this traditional lager is complemented by a noticeable but restrained hop presence. The beer finishes with a lingering dryness and just a hint of caramel. The word “bock” also means “billy goat,” and images of goats are often used as a symbol of the style.22 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Maibock
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Capital Brewery Maibock
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Our spring seasonal is a deep golden lager with a flavorful but smooth presence. When you see our Maibock hit the shelves you know things are about to get better… including the weather!HOPS: Liberty, HallertauMALTS: Brewers, Honey\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Narragansett Bock
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Narragansett Brewing Co. Narragansett Bock
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Brewed with Light and Dark Munich malts, Pilsner Malt, and Malted Wheat. It is hopped with Northern Brewers and Hallertau hops. Northern Brewers is a clean bittering hop and Hallertau is a classic German aroma hop associated with Bavarian style lager beers.32 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Berkshire Maibock Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Berkshire Brewing Company Inc. Berkshire Maibock Lager

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Blonde Double MaiBock
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Stoudts Brewing Co. Stoudt's Blonde Double MaiBock

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Mai Bock
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Sprecher Brewing Company Mai Bock
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:2004 and 1988 Bronze Medal Winner in the Bock category at the Great American Beer Festival (GABF).\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Maibock
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Gordon Biersch Brewery Restaurant Gordon Biersch Maibock

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Hacker-Pschorr Hubertus Bock
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Hacker-Pschorr Bräu GmbH Hacker-Pschorr Hubertus Bock

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Bucking Bock
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Rahr & Sons Brewing Company Bucking Bock

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: The Gift (WinterBock Lager)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Starr Hill Brewery The Gift (WinterBock Lager)

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Primátor Maibock
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Pivovar Náchod a.s. Primátor Maibock

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Andechser Bergbock Hell
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Klosterbrauerei Andechs Andechser Bergbock Hell
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:With its firm, fine pored head, luminous gold and clear gleaming look, it cannot fail to awaken expectations of pure pleasure.Strong malty nuances and floral hoppiness are imbued with accents of slight fruitiness. Despite its strength, Bergbock is pleasantly mouthcoating, with a powerful, but unobtrusive body. A highly discrete, finely bitter hoppiness transforms into a slight honey sweetness to conclude on a soft, harmonious aftertaste.A harmonious light bock of character that cannot be put down after the first drink.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Spaten Maibock / Premium Bock
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Spaten-Franziskaner-Bräu Spaten Maibock / Premium Bock

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Maibock
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Atwater Block Brewery Atwater Maibock

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Serie Signature Maibock
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Les Trois Mousquetaires Serie Signature Maibock

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: PENNdemonium
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Pennsylvania Brewing Company PENNdemonium

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Southampton May Bock
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Southampton Publick House Southampton May Bock

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Früh Bock
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: The Olde Mecklenburg Brewery Fruehbock (Früh Bock)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:From the Brewery website: Fruehbock (pron. "Froo Bock") - Literally "Early" Bock, Frueh is also short for Fruehling which is the German word for Spring. Try our Spring Bock as the cold winter fades and the warm spring winds begin to blow. This deep golden, slightly malty bock beer comes in at 6% ABV, which you'll find hard to believe because it's so smooth and refreshing. Don't wait to try it...because like springtime in Charlotte, this seasonal will come and go quickly.Note: Früh = Frueh\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Bock-Bier
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Mahrs-Bräu Mahr's Bock-Bier

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Brinkley's Maibock
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Free State Brewing Co. Brinkley's Maibock
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:This beer has a very full and complex flavor that is best enjoyed slowly, allowing the different flavors time to develop on your tongue. You will find that it changes as you progress from the first taste to the lingering finish. The malty sweetness is well balanced and blended with hop bitterness, giving a full, rich blend of flavors. A generous quantity of pilsner malt is joined with a little bit of caravienne for color and some carapils for body, along with plenty of Munich malt for flavor and aroma. This beer is lightly hopped with Yakima Perle and German Hallertau.The traditional symbol for bock beers of all varieties is the billy goat. This is the reason that Free State named this Maibock after Dr. John R. Brinkley, a.k.a. "The Goat Gland Doctor." In 1920s Kansas, Brinkley gained notoriety for his alleged cure for infertility that involved the surgical implantation of goat glands in the affected individuals. Some farmers are even said to have brought along there own goats because they felt them to have superior sexual prowess.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Heller Bock Saphir
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Brewery: Brauerei Hofstetten Krammer GmbH & Co. KG
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brauerei Hofstetten Krammer GmbH & Co. KG Saphir Bock
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:We dry-hopped this beer with full-cone saphire hops from the Mühlviertel to produce the fine, clean hop aromas of mild tropical fruits you’ll find in the glass.Behind the dry-hopping and new name lurks the ever-beloved Hofstetten Christmas Bock.Along with the heathy additions of Magnum, Aurora, and Select in the boil, this bock was also dry-hopped in our lager keller. This means we stuffed as many full-cone hops – fresh from the fields – as we could into a lager tank and filled the rest of the space with our bock beer. The beer was then left to mature for two months before it was once again enriched with hop oils.To preserve all the wonderful flavors developed during the process, this beer goes directly into bottles without filtration.Light-golden in color with a mild cloudiness, our Saphir-Bock shimmers tantalizingly in the glass. The floral hop aromas harmonize perfectly with the warm ester notes. When taken to the nose, you may make out hints of mandarin, lychee, and ripe pears. On the tongue, you'll immediately be struck by the full-bodiedness. As it moves back across the palate, the hop notes open up, revealing themselves in all their glory in the finish. The pleasant fruity-bitterness travels up the throat, across the palate, and into the nose, where it is greeted, once again, by the sweet ester notes of the yeast.This constant play between full-bodied maltiness and floral hoppiness ensures an unforgettable drinking experience.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Gruffmeister 8
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Foothills Brewing Company Gruffmeister 8

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Ramstein Maibock
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: High Point Brewing Company Ramstein Maibock
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Rich Amber bock beer brewed with imported Munich and Pilsner Malts and fermented with a rare lager yeast. This beer has a deep malt character and body with a hint of toffee in the aroma. The Noble hops balance the richness of the malts and provide a complex profile that hides the 7% abv.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Dump Truck
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Bayern Brewing, Inc. Dump Truck
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:The recipe for this light, unfiltered, lager bock beer uses German sauermalt, organic Montana “Spitz malt”, Pilsener malt, plus three hoppings using Hallertauer Perle and the rare Tettnang aroma hops (both imported from Germany).\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Samuel Adams Winter LagerBoston Beer Company (Samuel Adams)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Boston Beer Company (Samuel Adams) Samuel Adams Winter Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Festive Bock with Spices.Winter Lager's rich malt notes and accents of cinnamon, ginger, and orange peel are just the right companion for decking the halls, your holiday table, your fridge, your hand... You get the picture, no matter what or how you celebrate, do it with a Winter Lager.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Shiner Bock
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Spoetzl Brewery Shiner Bock
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Tip back a bock. Brewed with rich roasted barley malt and German specialty hops, this lightly hopped American-styled dark lager always goes down easy. Originally a seasonal beer, fans have demanded it year-round since 1973.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Samuel Adams Chocolate BockBoston Beer Company (Samuel Adams)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Boston Beer Company (Samuel Adams) Samuel Adams Chocolate Bock
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Rich & DecadentThis rich, decadent bock has a big, malty character with the added sweetness of chocolate. Extended aging on a bed of cocoa nibs imparts a smooth, complex flavor and velvety finish.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Michelob AmberBock
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Anheuser-Busch Michelob Amber Bock
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Michelob AmberBock is brewed using 100% malt including dark-roasted black and caramel malts and all-imported hops.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Samuel Adams Cherry Chocolate BockBoston Beer Company (Samuel Adams)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Boston Beer Company (Samuel Adams) Samuel Adams Chocolate Cherry Bock

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Uff-da
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: New Glarus Brewing Company Uff-da

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: The Vixen Chocolate Chili BockBoston Beer Company (Samuel Adams)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Boston Beer Company (Samuel Adams) Samuel Adams Chocolate Chili Bock

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: St. Nikolaus Bock Bier
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Pennsylvania Brewing Company St. Nikolaus Bock Bier
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Munich and various roasted malts give it a very malty, rich flavor with a hint of burnt flavor. 100% imported Hallertau hops, moderate bitterness and aroma.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Spring Bock
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Saint Arnold Brewing Company Saint Arnold Spring Bock
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:An authentic, copper colored, German-style Bock, celebrating the coming of spring. This big, deeply flavored lager has been aged to create a smooth, malty taste with a hint of sweetness. A light addition of German hops balances the malt flavor.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Pandora's Bock
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Breckenridge Brewery Pandora's Bock

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Genesee Spring Bock
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Brewery: Genesee Brewing Co. / Dundee Brewing Co.
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Genesee Brewing Co. / Dundee Brewing Co. Genesee Bock
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Formerly Genesee Bock BeerOur take on the 16th century German legend has turned out to be a legend in its own right. For every spring since 1951, our brewery has carefully crafted and lagered Genesee Bock Beer. The result is an exceptionally hearty, full-flavored beer with a slight malty finish—and a perfect way to celebrate the snow melt.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Ur-Bock Dunkel
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Einbecker Brauhaus AG Einbecker Ur-Bock Dunkel
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:At the first sip it is smooth and full-bodied, at the second sip the true rich, strong roasted malt aroma of Einbecker Ur-Bock unfolds. The dark barley-malt brewed refreshment from the Einbecker original recipe.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: La Trappe Bockbier
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Bierbrouwerij De Koningshoeven B.V. La Trappe Bockbier
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:This unique seasonal product is the world’s only Trappist bock ale. Brewed exclusively with natural ingredients, this ale post-ferments slightly in its bottle. It has a deep red colour, an intensely rich taste, and a malty aroma. Aromatic hop varieties and types of burnt malt render this ale its delicate bitterness that blends surprisingly well with its slightly sweet undertone.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Christmas Bock
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Mahrs-Bräu Mahr's Christmas Bock

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Noche Buena
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Brewery: Cervecería Cuauhtémoc Moctezuma, S.A. de C.V.
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Cervecería Cuauhtémoc Moctezuma, S.A. de C.V. Noche Buena

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Schell's Bock
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: August Schell Brewing Company Schell's Bock
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Each year the promise of spring was confirmed as the first keg of Schell's Bock rolled onto waiting delivery wagons. And since 1860, Schell's Bock has continued in the true German tradition. Completely reformulated for 2009, Schell's Bock has replaced Caramel Bock as our late winter seasonal. Brewed with a harmonious blend of 10 different types of malt and noble hops, Schell's Bock is fermented slowly, and then lagered for an extended period of time to ensure a smooth finish. Perfect for passing even the coldest winter day.This dark amber colored beer sports a robust malt character.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Schokolade Bock
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Millstream Brewing Company Millstream Schokolade Bock
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Just in time for the holidays is our special treat. A dark and chewy bock beer. Around November you'll find 'chocolate bock' on tap down at the brewery.No other beer has a more pure and intense malt character as a true Bock. Many large breweries in the U.S. have diluted the original strength of this beer, but we make the real thing. The body of this beer is rich, making it a good beer to warm up to during those "special" Iowa winters. The blackened malt that we use in it gives the brew a slight hint of chocolate. Its a smooth brew, having been lagered for over a month in our cellars, in true bock style.46 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Saranac Chocolate Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Matt Brewing Company Saranac Chocolate Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Saranac Chocolate Lager is a sinfully delicious deep amber lager made with certified organic cacao from Belize. Our brewers looked far and wide for the highest quality cacao to create a smooth chocolaty taste that only comes from the most exclusive cacao plants. We used the roasted seeds of these decadent plants and perfectly paired them with caramel malt and German Hallertau hops to create a malty chocolate sweet flavor. You'll love savoring this beer with your favorite holiday foods or on its own for a delicious treat!15 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Brother Benedict's Bock
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Granite City Food & Brewery Brother Benedict's Bock
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:A German style lager, our Bock carries a brownish color, a medium body, and a mouthwatering smoothness from the wonderful malt flavor.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Winterbock
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Atwater Block Brewery Atwater Winter Bock

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Creemore Springs UrBock
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Creemore Springs Brewery Limited Creemore Springs UrBock
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Bock beers gained notoriety in Munich back in 1612. All the Bavarian nobles were drinking fashionable northern ales known as Einbeck Bier. So Duke Maximillian I of Munich hired his own northern brewmaster, who created a lager similar in character but superior in taste. It won back the local aristocrats. Inspired by his entrepreneurial spirit we started brewing our own urBock – rich, ruby-hued beer with subtle, dark roasted flavours. It’s an aristocratic beer but rest assured, you needn’t be a Duke to enjoy it.28 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Mountain Holidays In Vermont
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Rock Art Brewery Mountain Holidays In Vermont Rich Creamy Bock Lager

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Huber Bock Beer
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Minhas Craft Brewery Huber Bock Beer

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Kozlak
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Browar Amber Kozlak

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Nero's 1st Century Double Dark Malt Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Amarcord Birra Artigianale Italiana Nero's 1st Century Double Dark Malt Ale

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Bokbier
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Jopen Bier BV Haarlem Jopen Bokbier

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Mönchshof Bockbier
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Kulmbacher Brauerei AG Mönchshof Bockbier

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Battlefield Bock
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Red Oak Brewery Battlefield Bock
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:From the brewery: Battlefield Bock is a smooth and creamy Bavarian Style Bock Lager. It is brewed with our proprietary blend of Bavarian Dark Roasted Malts giving it a distinct taste with hints of coffee and chocolate. We add Noble Czech Saaz Hops to balance the flavor of this rich full bodied lager. Battlefield Bock is slow cold aged for a minimum of 8 weeks.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Chouffe-Bok 6666
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brasserie d'Achouffe Chouffe-Bok
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:CHOUFFE BOK 6666 is a seasonal beer brewed especially for the Netherlands. The "Bok" beers traditionally appear on the Dutch market at the end of September. CHOUFFE BOK 6666 stands out thanks to its coppery robe, its fresh, fruity nose and a pleasant roundness in the mouth, ending with a hint of bitterness.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Christoffel Bokbier
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Bierbrouwerij Sint Christoffel B.V Christoffel Bokbier
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Also known as Christoffel Bock\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Aass Bock
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Aass Brewery Aass Bock

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Stegmaier Brewhouse Bock
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Lion Brewery, Inc. Stegmaier Brewhouse Bock

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Bock De Joliette
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Micro-Brasserie L'Alchimiste Bock De Joliette

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Dreher Bak
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Dreher Brewery Dreher Bak

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Schneider Weisse Tap 6 Unser Aventinus
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Brewery: Weisses Bräuhaus G. Schneider & Sohn GmbH
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Weisses Bräuhaus G. Schneider & Sohn GmbH Schneider Aventinus
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Formerly Schneider Aventinus.A day's rewardFor golden moments by the fireplace: "Mein Aventinus" - the wholehearted, dark ruby coloured wheat beer, intensive and fiery, warming, well-balanced and tender. Bavaria's oldest wheat "Doppelbock" - brewed since 1907! Its sturdy body in combination with its sweet malty aroma is an invitation to profound indulgence - an ingenious blend with a strong body. Perfectly matches rustic dishes, dark roasts and sweet desserts.Hallertauer Herkuleswheat malt, barley maltopen fermentation, genuine bottle fermentationnon-filtrated, non-pasteurized16 IBU7 g/l carbon dioxide18,5 % original gravity\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Vitus
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Bayerische Staatsbrauerei Weihenstephan Weihenstephaner Vitus
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Our light-coloured, spicy single-bock, “Vitus” is saturated with fine yeast and a creamy foam. It is a specialty with a round character based on the extra long storage time. The fruity smell of dried apricots joins aromas of citrus, cloves and hints of banana. Full-bodied and sparkling with an effervescent mouthfeel. Thus, the Vitus does not taste like a typical Bock beer but more like a noble, fruity wheat beer. Perfect with red meat, strong cheese and also able to guide desserts. Brewed according to our centuries-old brewing tradition on the Weihenstephan hill.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Moonglow Weizenbock
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Victory Brewing Company Moonglow Weizenbock

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Bavarian-Styled Doppel Weizen
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Lagunitas Brewing Company Bavarian-Styled Doppel Weizen
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:This special brew was designed with the help of our Freistaat Bayern brothers who also built the brewhouse upon which we brewed it. It's a new twist on an old tradition!\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Erdinger Weissbier Pikantus
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Erdinger Weissbräu Erdinger Weissbier Pikantus
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:ERDINGER Pikantus is already a legend during the “strong beer season”. But with its complex symphony of aromas, it also stimulates the taste buds – making it a perfect aperitif.With an ABV of 7.3% and an original wort of 16.7°P, this bock beer is ERDINGER Weissbräu’s strongest contender.For a true Bavarian aperitif, divide a bottle of ERDINGER Pikantus between two connoisseur glasses – with its dark color and smooth creamy head, Pikantus is already a feast for the eyes. The flavor that develops on the palate is well-rounded and malty with a hint of nutmeg and fine nougat. The sparkling nature of ERDINGER Pikantus harmonizes perfectly with its slightly sweet character, as well as its soft and delicate finish.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Ramstein Winter Wheat
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: High Point Brewing Company Ramstein Winter Wheat
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Rich creamy head with bouquet of Wheat malt, black current, clove, and apple. Deep full flavors of caramel and chocolate malt balance with hops for a smooth warming character. Smooth malt leads to a subtle alcohol and dark caramel finish. The wonderful balance of this beer provides a complex profile hiding the 9.5% alcohol content. The perfect companion for a cold winter night.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Schneider Weisse Tap X Mein Nelson Sauvin
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Brewery: Weisses Bräuhaus G. Schneider & Sohn GmbH
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Weisses Bräuhaus G. Schneider & Sohn GmbH Schneider Weisse Tap X Mein Nelson Sauvin

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Primus Weizenbock
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Live Oak Brewing Company Live Oak Primus Weizenbock

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Der Weisse Bock
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Mahrs-Bräu Der Weisse Bock

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Plank Bavarian Heller Weizenbock
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brauerei Michael Plank Plank Bavarian Heller Weizenbock
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Original Gravity 18.9 PlatoBitterness (IBU) 15Color: 17 EBCAwarded with7 WORLD BEER CUP MEDALS.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Plank Bavarian Dunkler Weizenbock
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brauerei Michael Plank Plank Bavarian Dunkler Weizenbock

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: La Shawinigan Handshake
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Le Trou Du Diable La Shawinigan Handshake

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Weizenbock Grande Cuvée
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Les Trois Mousquetaires Weizenbock Grande Cuvée
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:A dark wheat beer, hearty and top-fermented, inspired by the style traditionally brewed in Munich, Germany. This Weizenbock will seduce you with its lush flavors reminiscent of candied fruits, banana, and maple syrup.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Eisenbahn Vigorosa (Weizenbock)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Cervejaria Sudbrack Ltda Eisenbahn Vigorosa (Weizenbock)

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Alpen Glow
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Fat Heads Brewery & Saloon Alpen Glow Weizenbock
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:If you look closely, you can imagine the magic of the dusk light on the mountains reflected in the amazing color of this brew. Unfiltered with a foggy appearance and light aromas of wheat, bubblegum, clove and spice. Finishes silky smooth. Take a sip and set your mind aglow.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Weiss Principal Imperial Hefe
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Peak Organic Brewing Company Peak Organic Weiss Principal
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Weiss Principal is the international love child of a German Hefe-Weisse and an American Double IPA. This unfiltered wheat beer employs a traditional German Weiss yeast, providing engaging banana and clove flavors. A stern dry-hopping of a pungent American hops provides pronounced citrus, pine & fruit notes.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Teufel Bock
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Atwater Block Brewery Teufel Bock
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Our Weizen Dopplebock is dominated with 60% wheat that imparts a nutty-bisquit flavour. It is complimented with Perle and Hersbrucker hops.20 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Face Plant
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Bayern Brewing, Inc. Face Plant Doppelweizen
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Since we brew beer in the Bavarian tradition at Bayern (which means Bavaria in German) our list of beer styles would not be complete without our most recent addition: Face Plant Doppelweizen. This top-fermented, unfiltered Wheat Bock beer is the counterpart to Bayern’s famous Doppelbock Lager and is decoction-brewed, a technique used often in Bavaria but seldom in the US. The recipe uses five types of malt (Wheat, Pilsener, Carmel, Munich and Chocolate), and has an o.g. of > 17 % Plato, producing a stout 7.5 % Alc. by Vol. As with all Bayern wheat beers, Face Plant surprises with its complex flavor. German Hallertauer Perle hops give this hearty Bock beer a perfectly balanced sweetness.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Hopf Weisser Bock
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Weissbierbrauerei Hopf Hopf Weisser Bock

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Angry Goat
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Rahr & Sons Brewing Company Angry Goat

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Weizenbock
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Pennsylvania Brewing Company Weizenbock

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Volks Weizenbock
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Appalachian Brewing Company Volks Weizenbock

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Weizen Bock
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Scuttlebutt Brewing Company Weizen Bock

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Heineken Tarwebok
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Heineken Nederland B.V. Heineken Tarwebok

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Weizenbock
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Olde Hickory Brewery Weizenbock

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Yule Tide (2015+)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Heavy Seas Beer Heavy Seas - Yule Tide
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Aged in Jamaican rum barrels, this year’s Gingerbread Weizen Doppelbock offers spicy clove-like notes from German weizen yeast. The hops blend harmoniously with heavy doses of Caramel and Aromatic malts. Actual gingerbread was used during the brewing process to give this special offering a subtle holiday-infused taste.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: St. Blasius Weizenbock
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Aktien-Brauerei Kaufbeuren AG St. Blasius Weizenbock

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Summer Haze Pale Weizenbock
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Blue Mountain Brewery Summer Haze Pale Weizenbock

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Maximilian
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Urban Chestnut Brewing Company Maximilian

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Weizenbock
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Mill Street Brew Pub Mill Street Weizenbock

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Portsmouth Weizenbock
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Portsmouth Brewery Portsmouth Weizenbock
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:A dark wheat bock beer. The addition of NH maple syrup in the fermenting beer creates a complexity unknown in most beers.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: DumDuminator
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Les Brasseurs Du Temps DumDuminator

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Braggot
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Kuhnhenn Brewing Company Kuhnhenn Braggot
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Braggot is mead and beer combined, this batch won the Bronze medal at 2012 GABF, one of only three medals given to Michigan breweries in the state This batch was made with Michigan Wildflower mead and Scottish Ale. Frank and Eric collaborated to make this award winning mead.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Baklava Braggot
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Jackie O's Pub & Brewery Baklava Braggot

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Slippery Slope
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: The People's Pint Slippery Slope
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:A special blend of 1/2 cider, 1/4 malt and 1/4 honey then delicately spiced with ginger.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Old Danish Braggot
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Dansk Mjød A/S Old Danish Braggot

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Portsmouth Killer B
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Portsmouth Brewery Portsmouth Killer Bee
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Our braggot, a medieval ale style, is brewed with 120 pounds of honey which imparts a unique sweetness. A golden, full-bodied, robust ale with just enough hops to balance its sweet side.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Biere De Miele
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Rabbit's Foot Meadery Biere De Miele
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Styled after a traditional Kolsch, this is an interpretation of a medieval Braggot, an ale fermented with honey.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Mjød
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Valkyrie Brewing Mjød

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Premium Oak Brackett
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: White Winter Winery, Inc. Premium Oak Brackett

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Hummingbird
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Mountain Sun Pub & Brewery Hummingbird

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Braggot
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Crabtree Brewing Company Braggot
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:A unique ale brewed with Colorado grown hops. We blended an Imperial Stout, English Mild and infused an overwhelming amount of honey for your enjoyment!\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: White Winter Brackett
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: White Winter Winery, Inc. White Winter Brackett

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Honey, I Can Explain
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: South Street Brewery Honey, I Can Explain

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Saku Mõdu
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Saku Brewery LTD Saku Mõdu

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Spring Braggot
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Craftsman Brewing Co. Craftsman Spring Braggot

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Sanctification
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Russian River Brewing Company Sanctification
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Who’s afraid of the "big bad BRETT?" We’ll tell you who: winemakers! Because of our close proximity to several hundred wineries, we often get winemakers visiting our brewery. (After all, it takes a lot of great beer to make great wine!) Because we use 100% Brettanomyces yeast to ferment Sanctification, most winemakers will only smell the glass, and only a very few will venture to taste the beer. They think the Brettanomyces will attach to their clothing and end up in their winery. A simple solution was offered: keep a smudge pot burning at the door of our brewery so they can burn their clothes when exiting, but even that was not enough. After giving it more thought, we concluded that winemakers think Brettanomyces might scar their taste buds and possible even permeate their skin? Either way, Sanctification is one of the most unique beers you will ever taste! It was fermented with 100% Brettanomyces, rather than the traditional Saccharomyces.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Wild Devil
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Victory Brewing Company Wild Devil
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:It’s arguable that our menacingly delicious HopDevil has always been wild. With bold German malts and whole flower American hops, this India Pale Ale is anything but prim. But add a touch of brettanomyces, the unruly beast responsible for the sharp tang and deep funk found in many Belgian ales, and our WildDevil emerges completely untamed. Floral, aromatic hops still leap from this amber ale, as a host of new fermentation flavor kicks up notes of citrus and pine. Pour yourself a glass today—if you dare.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Defenestration
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Russian River Brewing Company Defenestration

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Indian Brown Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Dogfish Head Brewery Indian Brown Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Also known as Indian Brown Dark IPAForget about the car companies, this is the original hybrid. A cross between a Scotch Ale, an India Pale Ale and an American Brown, Indian Brown Ale is well-hopped and malty at the same time (It's magical!).The beer has characteristics of each style that inspired it: the color of an American Brown, the caramel notes of a Scotch Ale, and the hopping regiment of an India Pale Ale. We dry-hop the Indian Brown Ale in a similar fashion to our 60 Minute IPA and 90 Minute IPA. This beer is brewed with Aromatic barley and organic brown sugar.50 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Palo Santo Marron
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Dogfish Head Brewery Palo Santo Marron
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:An unfiltered, unfettered, unprecedented brown ale aged in handmade wooden brewing vessels. The caramel and vanilla complexity unique to this beer comes from the exotic Paraguayan Palo Santo wood from which these tanks were crafted. Palo Santo means "holy tree," and its wood has been used in South American wine-making communities.50 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Hazelnut Brown Nectar
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Rogue Ales Hazelnut Brown Nectar
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:13 Ingredients:Malts: Harrington, Klages, Munich, Hugh Baird Brown, Carastan 13-17, Crystal 70-80, Crystal 135-165 & Beeston Chocolate.Hops: Perle and Sterling.Specialty: Hazelnut Nectar.Yeast & Water: Rogue's Pacman Yeast & Free Range Coastal Water.14 Plato33 IBU73.6 AA36 L\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Moose Drool Brown Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Big Sky Brewing Company Moose Drool Brown Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:It's chocolate brown in color with a creamy texture. A malty beer with just enough hop presence to keep it from being too sweet. The aroma mostly comes from the malt with a hint of spice added by the hops. Moose Drool is brewed with pale, caramel, chocolate, and whole black malts; and Kent Goldings, Liberty, and Willamette hops.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Old Brown Dog
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Smuttynose Brewing Company Smuttynose Old Brown Dog Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Old Brown Dog has been cited as a classic example of the “American Brown Ale” style of beer. Compared to a typical English Brown Ale, Old Brown Dog is fuller-bodied and more strongly hopped.18 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Coffee Bender
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Surly Brewing Company Coffee Bender
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Bender steeped cold for 24 hours in coarsely ground coffee beans from the Vinca Vista Hermosa plantation in Guatemala.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Wilco Tango Foxtrot
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Lagunitas Brewing Company Wilco Tango Foxtrot
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Rich, smooth, dangerous, and chocolatey. It's a big ol' hoppy Imperial Brown Ale to help you with your slippery slide on into the heat of the night.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Brown Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brooklyn Brewery Brooklyn Brown Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:This is the award-winning original American brown ale, first brewed as a holiday specialty, and now one of our most popular beers year-round. Northern English brown ales tend to be strong and dry, while southern English brown ales are milder and sweeter. Brooklyn Brown Ale combines the best of those classic styles and then adds an American accent in the form of a firm hop character and roasty palate. A blend of six malts, some of them roasted, give this beer its deep russet-brown color and complex malt flavor, fruity, smooth and rich, with a caramel, chocolate and coffee background. Generous late hopping brings forward a nice hop aroma to complete the picture. Brooklyn Brown Ale is full-flavored but retains a smoothness and easy drinkability that has made it one of the most popular dark beers in the Northeast.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Ellie's Brown Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Avery Brewing Company Ellie's Brown Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Chocolate malt gives this beer a brown sugar maltiness with hints of vanilla and nuts, while subtle hopping gives it an overall drinkability that’s second to none.IBUs: 17\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Bender
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Surly Brewing Company Bender
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Here's what happens when substance meets smooth. This oatmeal brown ale defies traditional categories. Bender begins crisp and lightly hoppy, complemented by the velvety sleekness oats deliver. Belgian and British malts usher in cascades of cocoa, coffee, carmel and hints of vanilla and cream. An easy-drinking ale with many layers of satisfaction.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Sumatra Mountain Brown
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Founders Brewing Company Founders Sumatra Mountain Brown
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:This bold, imperial brown ale gets its body from a team of malts including Caramel malt for sweetness, flaked barley for dense foam, a bit of Chocolate malt for its deep color and Aromatic and Munich malts to add even more depth. German and Perle hops add a touch of bitterness to balance the malty sweetness. The addition of rich Sumatra coffee takes this perfectly balanced imperial brown ale to a decadent level.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Koko Brown
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Kona Brewing Co. Koko Brown
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Koko Brown's distinctive, nutty aroma and flavor comes from real, toasted coconut blended into each brew. One sip of this smooth, mahogany colored ale and you'll feel like you're on a warm, sun drenched beach in Hawaii. Crack one open!\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Pecan Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Abita Brewing Co. Pecan Harvest Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Formerly Pecan Harvest AlePecan Harvest Ale is made with real Louisiana pecans that have been toasted to perfection. That makes it something really special, because most beers with a nutty flavor or aroma aren’t made with real nuts. The natural oils from the Louisiana pecans give the ale a light pecan finish and aroma.20 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Maple Nut Brown Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Tommyknocker Brewery Maple Nut Brown Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:A touch of Maple Syrup is added to each barrel of our award winning Maple Nut Brown Ale to impart a roasted sweetness. This addition balances the nut flavor produced by Munich, caramel and chocolate malts used in the brewhouse, producing a drinkable brown ale.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Rocky's Revenge Bourbon Brown
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Tyranena Brewing Company Rocky's Revenge Bourbon Brown
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Deep in the darkest depths of Rock Lake dwells a great saurian known today as Rocky. The legend of Rocky is old. The ancient inhabitants of Aztalan warned of the beast by building a giant serpent mound at the lake's edge. The early residents of Lake Mills were forewarned of a guardian placed in its lake to protect its sacred stone tepees. And history tells of numerous encounters with Rocky, who became a source of great worry and fear. Although not seen for over a century, divers still experience a feeling of dread and being watched.
