Enjoy Rocky's Revenge, our offering to this legendary protector of Tyranena.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Brekle's Brown
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Anchor Brewing Company Brekle's Brown
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Single hopped with Citra.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Bellaire Brown Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Short's Brewing Company Short's Bellaire Brown Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Bellaire Brown is our flagship Brown Ale. Full-flavored with notes of sweet caramel, chocolate, and toasted malt, Bellaire Brown is balanced with a mild and earthy hop quality. This ale is dark and rich with a medium body. It’s hardly classifiable as a brown, but is certainly considered a delicious masterpiece.Bellaire Brown was originally created to appeal to people who enjoyed drinking coffee, and to beer drinkers who are not interested in hoppy options. When Joe Short was creating the Bellaire Brown recipe, he desired a beer that was meatier and burlier than most browns. Bellaire Brown is a great gate-way beer for drinkers to be introduced to darker beer varieties.19 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: George
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Hill Farmstead Brewery George
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:George was our grandfather’s brother, and Hill Farmstead Brewery rests upon the land that was once home to him and his 13 siblings.George is our American Brown Ale. Hopped, rightfully so, with Centennial, Cascade, and a touch of Columbus…\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Brown Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: The Duck-Rabbit Craft Brewery Duck-Rabbit Brown Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:The Duck-Rabbit Brown Ale is an American brown brewed with loads of hops from start to finish (it's hoppy and beautifully bitter). Amarillo boil hops provide a spicy citrusy bitterness. Saaz dry hops offer a refined flowery aroma. These hops are supported by seven varieties of malt. The Duck-Rabbit Brown Ale is a great choice for anyone who appreciates assertive hops and nutty toasted malt flavors – oh yeah!\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Dos Perros
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Yazoo Brewing Company Dos Perros
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Many Mexican beer styles today are descendants of old Austrian styles, from when Austria ruled Mexico in the late 19th century. Our Dos Perros is made with German Munich malt, English Pale malt, and Chocolate malt, and hopped with Perle and Saaz hops. To lighten the body, as many Mexican brewers do, we add a small portion of flaked maize. The result is a wonderfully bready malt aroma, balanced with some maize sweetness and a noble hop finish.21 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Imperial Nut Brown Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Tommyknocker Brewery Imperial Nut Brown Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Commemorating the 10th anniversary of Tommyknocker Brewery, this special brew is meticulously crafted with pure maple syrup, the highest quality chocolate and crystal malts and is accented with the finest blend of European and American hops. Imperial Nut Brown Ale, at 9.8% alcohol by volume, is a bigger, bolder version of their Maple Nut Brown.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Peter Brown Tribute Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Bear Republic Brewing Co. Pete's Brown (Tribute Ale)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Peter Brown Tribute Ale is malty American Brown Ale, brewed with molasses, brown sugar, and hopped with Cascade and Centennial. It's just the way Pete would have wanted it.2009 California State Fair - GOLD2009 North American Brewers Association – GOLD2006 Great American Beer Festival® Brown Porter – BRONZE2004 Great American Beer Festival® Brown Porter – GOLD\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Good Humans Ale (Dry Hopped Double Brown Ale)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Short's Brewing Company Good Humans
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Good Humans was originally created to showcase one of Briess Malting Company’s new malt varieties. Originally planned as a one-off beer, it quickly became a favorite brew. Good Humans is a Double Brown Ale made with Carabrown Malt and dry hopped with Simcoe and Golding hops. The brew has sweet malty esters that are met by huge toasted caramel and toffee flavors. The finish is dry with a bouquet of hops.40 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Sweet Josie Brown Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Lonerider Brewing Sweet Josie Brown Ale

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Bravo 2017
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Firestone Walker Brewing Co. Bravo Brown
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Imperial Brown Ale - This beer is then aged for up to a year in used Heaven Hill bourbon barrels.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Flashback Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Boulder Beer / Wilderness Pub Flashback Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Originally brewed for Boulder Beer's 30th Anniversary. An India Brown Ale. 65 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Madtown Nutbrown
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Ale Asylum Mad Town Nut Brown
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:A blend of seven unique malts give this brown ale an earthy aroma and a flavor reminiscent of caramel with a slightly creamy finish.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Over Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Half Acre Beer Company Over Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Originally brewed as an ESB, but is now brewed as an American Brown Ale.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Leffe Brune / Brown
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Abbaye de Leffe S.A. Leffe Brune / Brown
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Savor the Mystery of the agesThe authentic Belgian Abbey ale: Enjoy this delicious malt forward ale, accentuated with subtle caramel and roasted notes from dark malts\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Noire De Chambly / Chambly Noire
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Unibroue Noire De Chambly / Chambly Noire
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Name changed from Chambly Noire to Noire de Chambly in Aug. 2009.This dark ale was created in honour of the brave soldiers of the Carignan-Salières Regiment, with their famous black musketeer hats. In 1665, King Louis XIV sent the regiment to New France to defend against the Iroquois. He had a number of strategic forts, including Fort Chambly, built along the Richelieu River, ensuring peace and prosperity for the colony. Many French Canadians are the direct descendants of these intrepid forebears.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Belgian Freeze Belgian Style Winter Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: River Horse Brewing Co. River Horse Belgian Freeze Belgian Style Winter Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Our warming winter Ale is amber in color, malty and full bodied. Belgian yeast provides a variety of delicate characteristics in the nose and on the palate.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Cold Front
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Ithaca Beer Company Cold Front

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Grottenbier
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brouwerij St. Bernardus NV Grottenbier
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:From Pierre Celis, brewed at Brouwerij St. Bernardus.No longer available in the US.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Rejection
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Russian River Brewing Company Rejection

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: La Rullés Cuvée Meilleurs Voeux (Bière De Gaume)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brasserie Artisanale De Rullés SPRL La Rullés Cuvée Meilleurs Voeux (Bière De Gaume)

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Werewolf
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Rinkuškiai Alaus Darykloje Werewolf
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Lithuania’s world-famous beer-making traditions take their roots in antiquity. Lithuanians know their beer and truly appreciate this remarkable potation. Today many old families possess unique beer recipes passed down to them from generation to generation.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Tempelier
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brouwerij Corsendonk Tempelier

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Bink Bruin
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brouwerij Kerkom Bink Bruin

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Biscotti
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Lift Bridge Brewery Biscotti

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Fullsuit Belgian-Style Brown Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Karl Strauss Brewing Company Fullsuit Belgian-Style Brown Ale

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: D’Tango Unchained
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Weyerbacher Brewing Co. Tango
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:D’Tango Unchained is a Belgian-Style Dark Ale brewed with cherries (AKA Tango), which we then aged in oak barrels with Brettanomyces. The result is a 9.6% ABV deep amber brew with ruby highlights. Aroma has subtle hints of banana, along with tart cherry, soft vanilla and oak. Not overly sweet, tasting yields a nice, tart cherry and lingering malty flavors that finish dry.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Winter Koninck
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brouwerij De Koninck NV Winter Koninck

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Tongerlo 6 Dubbel Bruin
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brouwerij Haacht NV Tongerlo 6 Dubbel Bruin

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Bière De Noël
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brasserie Thiriez Bière De Noël

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Abbey Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Cathedral Square Brewery Belgian-Style Abbey Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:This traditional Belgian-style ale is brewed using five malts, two hop varieties and authentic Trappist Belgian yeast.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Leffe De Noël
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Abbaye de Leffe S.A. Leffe De Noël

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Proletary Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: The Brewer's Art Brewer's Art Proletary Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:After much demand for a seriously dark beer, we came up with this delicacy. Black, smooth and easy to drink, this is our beer for the people!5%abv\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Black Jack (Bourbon Barrel Aged)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: North by Northwest Restaurant & Brewery Black Jack (Bourbon Barrel Aged)

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: La Rullés Brune (Bière De Gaume)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brasserie Artisanale De Rullés SPRL La Rullés Brune (Bière De Gaume)

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: La Petite Mort
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Black Raven Brewing Co. La Petite Mort

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Leffe Rossa
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Abbaye de Leffe S.A. Leffe Rossa
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Also known as Leffe Bière De Printemps

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: North By Northwest Okanogan Black Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: North by Northwest Restaurant & Brewery North By Northwest Okanogan Black Ale

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Valeir Donker
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brouwerij Contreras Valeir Donker

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Blind Ambition
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Ladyface Ale Companie Blind Ambition
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:A Belgian style Amber ale with good malt structure, faint undertones of chocolate and a beautiful copper amber hue. This new batch will clock in with moderately strong alcohol and low bitterness levels.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Nut Brown AleSamuel Smith Old Brewery (Tadcaster)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Samuel Smith Old Brewery (Tadcaster) Samuel Smith's Nut Brown Ale

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Maduro Brown Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Cigar City Brewing Maduro Oatmeal Brown Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Formerly Maduro Oatmeal Brown AleMaduro is a Northern English-style Brown Ale with some American affectations. Higher in alcohol than the common English Brown Ale, the beer features flaked oats in the malt bill which imparts a silky body and works to mesh its roasted, toasted and chocolate components together. The end result is a remarkably full-flavored yet approachable Brown Ale that pairs well with mild to medium cigars.25 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Turbodog
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Abita Brewing Co. Turbodog
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Turbodog is a dark brown ale brewed with Willamette hops and a combination of pale, crystal and chocolate malts. This combination gives Turbodog its rich body and color and a sweet chocolate toffee-like flavor. Turbodog began as a specialty ale but has gained a huge loyal following and has become one of our flagship brews.28 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Southern Pecan
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Lazy Magnolia Brewing Company Southern Pecan
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Southern Pecan Nut Brown Ale is the first beer in the world, to our knowledge, made with whole roasted pecans. The pecans are used just like grain and provide a nutty characteristic and a delightful depth to the flavor profile. This beer is very lightly hopped to allow the malty, caramel, and nutty flavors shine through. The color is dark mahogany. Southern Pecan won a Bronze Medal in the 2006 World Beer Cup in the Specialty Beer category.19 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Fat Squirrel Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: New Glarus Brewing Company Fat Squirrel Ale

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Cubano-Style Espresso Brown Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Cigar City Brewing Maduro Oatmeal Brown Ale - Cubano-Style Espresso
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:This rich brown ale is redolent with Cuban-style roasted espresso beans, sweet caramel and toffee and hints of dry nuttiness. Cuban Espresso is a popular drink in the Cigar City of Tampa owing to its many Sicilian and Cuban immigrants. The beans for Cubano-Style Espresso Brown Ale are roasted locally by Mazzaro's Italian Market and Deli in St. Petersburg to our exact specifications.25 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Nut Brown Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: AleSmith Brewing Company AleSmith Nautical Nut Brown Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Formerly known as Nautical Nut Brown Ale.AleSmith Nut Brown is a tribute to one of our favorite British styles. Deep mahogany in color, its rich, malt forward flavor profile balances notes of biscuit, mild cocoa and earthy hops. A creamy mouthfeel and full body enhances its drinkability, making Nut Brown an extremely sessionable, ale that embodies our commitment to quality.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Downtown Brown
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Lost Coast Brewery and Cafe Downtown Brown

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Winter Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Weyerbacher Brewing Co. Winter Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:This beer is not spiced.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Georgia Brown
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: SweetWater Brewing Company Sweetwater Georgia Brown
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:The malt bill gives a subtle nutty & toasty flavors and the chocolate malt provides a rich cocoa flavor with aromas that range from roasted coffee to chocolate-covered dark fruits. The hops used provides excellent bitterness in relation to the chocolate notes of the malt. The flavor and aroma provide clean floral, fruity and herbal notes. A light dose of hops brings balance to all.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Harvest
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Long Trail Brewing Co. Harvest
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:The culmination of a long growing season, the autumn harvest comes once a year. We mark the end of summer with the release our seasonal brown ale, Harvest. Vermont maple syrup added during the brewing process yields a lasting sweetness on the palate that's guaranteed to warm your soul.Raise a glass and enjoy the spirit of the season. Pairs well with wood-splitting, leaf-raking and pumpkin carving.In celebration of the autumn harvest we’ve brewed this brown ale with locally harvested Vermont ingredients... a truly unique Taste of Vermont!13 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Boffo Brown Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Dark Horse Brewing Company Dark Horse Boffo Brown Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:The Boffo Brown ale is a beer that we brewed years ago and then put it in semi retirement for a couple years while we focused on other brands at the brewery. We have recently put it back onto active duty and are brewing it all year. The beer itself is delicious and is a favorite to many of us here at the brewery. Just as most of our beers it's on the "full body" scale pushing the envelope of what an American Brown Ale is to most people. The beer is a very deep/dark color of brown with a nice creamy tan head. The mouthfeel of the beer is very soft and is very drinkable. Flavors of malt, caramel, toffee, and a mild earthy nutty finish allow this beer to be paired with hearty food and sips of bourbon.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Oatmeal Raisin Cookie Brown Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Cigar City Brewing Maduro Oatmeal Brown Ale - Oatmeal Raisin Cookie
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:The genesis of the beer you're holding in your hand was pretty simple. We asked ourselves, "What if a beer tasted like an oatmeal raisin cookie?" The answer to our rhetorical question was to add raisins, lactose and cinnamon to Maduro, our English-style Brown Ale, a beer that showcases flavors of caramel, toffee and chocolate. The combination of the base beer and the additional ingredients resulted in a beer that tastes like it was baked in Grandma's oven.25 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Rugged Trail Nut Brown Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Tröegs Brewing Company Tröegs Rugged Trail Nut Brown Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Rugged Trail Nut Brown Ale is back on tap in our Tasting Room for a limited time. Originally released as “Nut Brown Ale,” Rugged Trail was eventually given a makeover and became one of our first year-round beers. Rugged Trail boasts a deep bronze hue, rocky head, and subtle hop aroma. Toasted Amber and Chocolate malts impart a rich nutty character and creamy texture, making Rugged Trail an obvious quaffing delight! 5.0% ABV and 33 IBU. 2014 Availability: draft and growler fills only.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Black Toad Dark Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Black Toad Brewing Co. Black Toad Dark Ale

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Brown Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Legend Brewing Co. Brown Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Our most popular beer, Legend's is a full bodied version of a British Brown Ale. Expect a rich, malt-forward brew with a beautiful mahogany tone. Generous amounts of specialty malts bring flavors of sweet caramel, toasted nuts, coffee, and molasses, all perfectly balanced by a steady but cautious hop dryness. Fruity undertones provided by our house yeast strain bring the final flavor element to round out this world class ale.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Brewhouse Brown Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Real Ale Brewing Company Brewhouse Brown Ale

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Nut Brown Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Ithaca Beer Company Nut Brown Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:The rich mahogany hue of the Nut Brown is the first thing you will notice. You’ll find subtle hints of both chocolate & coffee. We delicately blend chocolate & caramel malts with four others to make this flavorful, easy drinking beer. The malt character will appeal to those looking for a moderate dark ale, but the smoothness is what will surprise all.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Pig's Ear Brown Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Woodstock Inn Brewery Pig's Ear Brown Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Medium bodied with a balance of roasted and crystal malts creating a hearty nutty flavor. Medium bitterness with a slightly sweet finish.25 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Chomolungma
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Jackie O's Pub & Brewery Chomolungma

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Nut Brown Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Peak Organic Brewing Company Peak Organic Nut Brown Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Our Nut Brown Ale starts out very smooth, like an English-style Brown Ale. The use of Chocolate Malt, Munich Malt, and Hallartau Hops give this beer a crisp, nutty finish. Peak Nut Brown is a delectable beer loaded with complex, differentiated flavors that don’t overwhelm the palate, making it a perfect dark beer for food pairing.21 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Woodmaster
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Short's Brewing Company Short's The Woodmaster
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Woodmaster is a high gravity, American Brown Ale fermented with Northern Michigan maple syrup and toasted pecans. This dark brown, full bodied ale is rich with sweet malt and syrup flavors. These flavors are complemented by the presence of hop aromas and a faint nuttiness.24 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Bad Penny
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Big Boss Brewing Bad Penny Brown Ale

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Euforia
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: DuClaw Brewing Company Euphoria
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:22 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Brown Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Upslope Brewing Company Brown Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Our medium-bodied Brown Ale is brewed in the English tradition, with an infusion of American creativity. The rich, malty backbone balances an assertive hop character, and ends with a smooth, dry finish. Our Brown Ale boasts a dark brown body that supports a creamy tan head.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Brunette Nut Brown Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Nebraska Brewing Company NBC Brunette Nut Brown Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Our version of the classic English-style Brown Ale has a blend of six different malts and a hop schedule that results in a low hop character. The unique malt character brings to mind the taste of a blend of various nuts.15 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Nut Brown Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Santa Fe Brewing Company Nut Brown Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:The Brown Ale style originated in the pubs of England, where beer drinkers desired a beer that was both flavorful and complex, but at the same time mild enough to be a session beer. The Santa Fe Brewing Company's interpretation of this style uses a combination of high mash temperature, hard water, and low-alpha acid hops to produce a product that is both true to the style and distinctly Santa Fe. Brewing jargon aside, Santa Fe Nut Brown Ale is an easy-drinking beer, mild, smooth, and always a favorite.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Brown Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Saint Arnold Brewing Company Saint Arnold Brown Ale

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Truck Stop Honey Brown Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Back Forty Beer Co. Truck Stop Honey Brown Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Hops: Magnum and WillametteMalts: Honey malt, Crystall malt and Chocolate maltHoney: Alabama Wildflower (Mobile, AL)\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Buster Nut Brown Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Ska Brewing Co. Buster Nut Brown Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Malts: Victory & MunichHops: Northern Brewer, Cascade, & Willamette\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Pullman Nut Brown
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Flossmoor Station Restaurant & Brewery Pullman Brown Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:A traditional english brown ale, very nutty aroma towards hazel and Brazil nuts, deep brown in color and very well rounded body\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Nut Brown Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Arcadia Brewing Company Arcadia Nut Brown Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:This English-style brown ale has an alluring mahogany color capped by a rich foam head. It is brewed with six different varieties of premium malted barley, creating a robust body and delicious flavor profile featuring hints of chocolate, raisins, dates and almonds. It's ripe fruit notes and malty, sweet finish are counterbalanced by a subtle hop bitterness and aroma.26 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Heritage Coffee Brown Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Alaskan Brewing Co. Alaskan Heritage Coffee Brown Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:English malted oats, English chocolate malt and pale malt roasted with coffee beans at Heritage coffee company; Cascade and Calypso hops, and additions of hand-picked Brazilian coffee.19 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Traditional Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Big Rock Brewery Traditional Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:This medium bodied Brown Ale fills your mouth with a fusion of toasty malt and sweet caramel up front finishing with a nutty flavour, medium creamy carbonation and mild hop bitterness.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Ring Neck Braun Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brau Brothers Brewing Co. LLC Ring Neck Braun Ale

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Bone Shaker Brown
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Brewery: Moat Mountain Smoke House & Brewing Co.
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Moat Mountain Smoke House & Brewing Co. Moat Brown
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:An English-style brown ale. This beer has a biscuit-like smoothness with a rich, malt body and medium hop bitterness.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Brewer's Brown Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Shipyard Brewing Co. Brewer's Brown Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Available in 2005-06, and 2009-present.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Geary's Autumn Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: D.L. Geary Brewing Company Geary's Autumn Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Geary's Autumn Ale is a faithful interpretation of the classic brown ales of Great Britain. With a deep auburn color and a subtle nut-like flavor, Geary's Autumn Ale is the perfect choice as the seasons change. Original gravity - 1058; alcohol by volume – 5.8%; two row English malts (pale, crystal and chocolate); Cascade, Golding and Fuggle hops.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Pub Brown Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Sprecher Brewing Company Pub Brown Ale

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Third Stone Brown
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Empyrean Brewing Company Third Stone Brown
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:A myth shattering ale that proves all dark beers don't have to be filling. Sweetly smooth with nutty hints of roasted caramel flavor. Brewed with American, Canadian and English grown barley and American hops.13 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Anchor Steam Beer
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Anchor Brewing Company Anchor Steam Beer
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Anchor Steam® Beer owes its deep amber color, thick, creamy head, and rich, distinctive flavor to a historic brewing process like none other.It is a process that combines deep respect for craft brewing tradition with many decades of evolution to arrive at a unique approach: a blend of pale and caramel malts, fermentation with lager yeast at warmer ale temperatures in shallow open-air fermenters, and gentle carbonation in our cellars through an all-natural process called kräusening.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Dorothy's New World Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Toppling Goliath Brewing Company Dorothy's New World Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Our flagship beer was named after our founder’s grandmother and crafted to please her purely classic tastes. Mildly hopped, light in color and body, and clean to the taste, this california common-style lager drinks easy. Each sip charms the senses with distinct flavor and refreshing simplicity, delivering a smooth finish. Dorothy is truly the “Classic Beauty.”11 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Oscura
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Furthermore Beer Oscura

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Dampf Loc
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Local Option Dampf Loc
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Dampf Loc is an all-barley warm fermented ale brewed by the folks from Chicago’s Local Option; inspired by “Dampfbier” (literally “steam beer”) originally crafted by medieval peasant inhabitants of southeast Bavaria. During the fermentation process generous amounts of foam and surface bubbles burst in the tank, giving the illusion that the ferment is boiling or “steaming.” Tony Russomanno and Noah Hopkins took it upon themselves to brew Dampf Loc as a modern interpretation of its Teutonic predecessor, creating a “Hefe Gerste” ale that is true to its roots; unmistakable in character yet accessible to beer drinkers of all palates.Dampf Loc has a mild hop profile, medium body with pleasant effervescence and a clear, rich, orange hue. Dampf Loc is ideal for warm months, yet enjoyable year round.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Steam Engine Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Steamworks Brewing Co. Steam Engine Lager

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Village Reserve
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Short's Brewing Company Short's Village Reserve
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Fermented as "beer" from wort extracted from fully modified two-row pale malt which provides a beautiful straw color. This beer is aggressively hopped with Perle and Centennial hops. Its light body and low alcohol allow the hops to become more prominent throughout the beer. The floral aroma is attributed to heavy handfuls of centennial hops at the finish of the boil. Hearty handfuls of hops lend a grape fruity tone in the flavor and finish of the beer.40 I.B.U.'s10.6 deg. Plato4.2% A.B.V.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Hop Common
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Peekskill Brewery Hop Common
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Unfiltered with amber hues and a medium body. Segal Ranch Nugget and Cascade Hops give citrus and fresh pine on the nose. Finishes dry with slight bitterness.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: The Citizen
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Cismontane Brewing Company The Citizen

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Skjálfti
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Ölvisholt Brugghús Skjálfti

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Mountain Goat Steam Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Mountain Goat Beer Pty Ltd Mountain Goat Steam Ale

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Rio Grande Outlaw LagerSierra Blanca Brewing Company (Rio Grande)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Sierra Blanca Brewing Company (Rio Grande) Rio Grande Outlaw Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:This unique lager balances a rich caramel malt flavor with a smooth hop finish that keeps the palate crisp. Reddish-amber in color, this is a very complex California Common style beer with a great malt/hop balance.34 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Steamy Windows
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Liberty Street Brewing Company Steamy Windows
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:A "Steam" style beer made with a lager yeast and fermented at ale temperatures and then aged at lager temperatures for a smooth, clean finish.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Boston Common
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Beer Works Boston Common

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Mosquito Beach
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Lake Louie Brewery Company Mosquito Beach

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Red Bird Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Portsmouth Brewing Co. / Mault's Brewpub Portsmouth Brewing Red Bird Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:An American Home Run! Named for the 1939 Portsmouth, Ohio, minor league baseball team, Red Bird Ale is a classic steam ale brewed in tribute to the steam ales enjoyed along the Ohio river in the early 1800’s. Caramel malts lend the gorgeous red color and full flavor perfectly balanced with domestic Willamette, Perle & Liberty hops.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Steamhead
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Aviator Brewing Company Steamhead
Anaheim Brewery 1888.0
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Anaheim 1888 is based on a style of beer brewed at the original Anaheim Brewery and has a flavor that is popular with today's beer drinker. Copper-colored, full-flavored and well-hopped, Anaheim 1888 is our flagship beer.The beer is aptly named to reflect the glory days of the original Anaheim Brewery. It was in 1888 when Friedrich Conrad, our spiritual forefather, began construction on a vast brick building on West Broadway to house the expanded brewery.The Anaheim Gazette noted in 1890 that Conrad's beer "appears to be fully equal if not superior to the celebrated Anheuser beer of St. Louis. Besides it is a strictly Orange County product and all who are in the habit of using beer should give it a trial if only to encourage home industries."We think you should do the same.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Urban People's Common Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Linden Street Brewery Urban People's Common Lager

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Aftershock
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Palmetto Brewing Company Palmetto Aftershock
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:A Steamed IPA. In memory of the Charleston earthquake of 1886.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Westy
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Sun King Brewing Company Westy

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Theobroma
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Dogfish Head Brewery Theobroma
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Theobroma is a celebration of chocolate, the food of the gods.This Ancient Ale is based on chemical analysis of pottery fragments found in Honduras that revealed the earliest known alcoholic chocolate drink used by early civilizations to toast special occasions.The discovery of this beverage pushed back the earliest use of cocoa for human consumption more than 500 years to 1,200 B.C. As per the analysis, Dogfish Head's Theobroma (translated into "food of the gods") is brewed with Aztec cocoa powder and cocoa nibs (from our friends at Askinosie Chocolate), honey, chilies and annatto (fragrant tree seeds).It's light in color, not what you expect from your typical chocolate beer (not that you'd be surpised that we'd do something unexpected with this beer!).8 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Chipotle Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Rogue Ales Chipotle Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Label of 22 oz bottle:8 Ingredients: Harrington, Klages & Maier Munich Malts; Cascade & Willamette Hops; Chipotle Peppers, Free Range Coastal Waters & Top Fermenting Pacman Yeast.No Chemicals, No Preservatives, No Additives.Dedicated to Spanish author Juan de la Cueva, who, in 1575, wrote of a Mexican dish that combined seedless chipotles with ale.This ale is deep amber in color with a rich malty aroma, and delicately spiced with smoked Jalapeno peppers to give it that extra bite!Oregon Brewed - Established 1988Oxygen Fixing Caps - 35 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Ghost Face Killah
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Twisted Pine Brewing Company Ghost Face Killah
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Made with 6 chiles including Anaheim, Fresno, jalapeño, serrano, habenero, and ghost chile.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: 5 Vulture
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: 5 Rabbit Cerveceria 5 Vulture
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:5 Vulture is a deep ambered-colored ale with complex caramel aromas with toasted sugar notes and a long, elegant spicy finish. Roasted ancho chile is used to add depth and complexity, without adding heat or strong chile flavors.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Billy's Chilies Beer (Timberline Series)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Twisted Pine Brewing Company Billy's Chilies Beer (Timberline Series)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Our chili beer is made with five different kinds of fresh chili peppers. Rich pepper aroma greets you when the bottle is opened, followed by its satisfying beer taste and then subtle spiciness.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Fatali Four
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Upright Brewing Company Fatali Four
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:A blend of barrel aged Four that has fresh homegrown fatali chiles added for a couple months before bottling. It also incorporates light use of brettanomyces yeasts providing a contrasting earthy backdrop for the bright chile flavors. Cellar for up to three years.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Jalapeño Pepper Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Bent River Brewing Company Jalapeño Pepper Ale

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Hot-Jala-Heim
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Horseheads Brewing Inc. Hot-Jala-Heim
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:This style of beer is classified in the "Fruit/Vegetable" category as a "Chili beer". The focus is obviously on the chili peppers used during the brewing process. Our version uses a mix of hot peppers, including jalapenos and anaheims (hence the name...Hot-Jala-Heim). It has a delightful 'peppery' aroma as well as taste with a 'mild' sensation of heat experienced after swallowing.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Rio Grande Pancho Verde Chile CervezaSierra Blanca Brewing Company (Rio Grande)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Sierra Blanca Brewing Company (Rio Grande) Rio Grande Pancho Verde Chile Cerveza
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:This beer has an unmistakable roasted chile aroma and flavor without being too hot. The whole chile is used to infuse the beer with a mild green chile flavor and leaves you with just a hint of heat on the back end.12 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Patty's Chile Beer
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Wynkoop Brewing Company Patty's Chile Beer
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:A light German-style beer made with Anaheim chiles and smoked Ancho peppers. A 2006 Great American Beer Festival Bronze Medal Winner in the Fruit and Vegetable Beer category anda Wynkoop specialty.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Fire Escape
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Asheville Brewing Company Fire Escape

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Fuego
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Twisted X Brewing Company Fuego

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Spicy Bohemian
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Throwback Brewery Throwback Spicy Bohemian
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:We took our pilsener and “dry-hopped” it with roasted jalapenos. The result is a well-balanced beer with a very intoxicating peppery-type aroma, great jalapeno flavor, and just a bit of lingering heat.40 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Chili Pepper Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Six Rivers Brewery Chili Pepper Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:"Chile Pepper Ale - Alcohol content 6.0%HOT! Spicy ale made with assorted chilies blended with our wheat ale."\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Li'L Lucy's Hot Pepper Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Weston Brewing Company & O'Malley's Pub Li'L Lucy's Hot Pepper Ale

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Chili Tripel
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Midtfyns Bryghus Midtfyns Chili Tripel

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Green Chile Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Tommyknocker Brewery Chili Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:A blend of hot and mild Anaheim chiles infused in a refreshing light lager. A pleasant spicy bite makes for a delicious palette pleaser.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Hot Chocolate
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Valkyrie Brewing Hot Chocolate

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Sigda's Green Chili
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Coopersmith's Pub & Brewing Sigda's Green Chili

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Wildfire Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Fitger's Brewhouse Wildfire Lager

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Tri-Pepper PilsenerGreat Dane Pub & Brewing Company (Downtown)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Great Dane Pub & Brewing Company (Downtown) Tri-Pepper Pilsener

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: El Lapino
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Microbrasserie du Lièvre El Lapino

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Ring Of Fire
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Dragonmead Microbrewery Dragonmead Ring Of Fire
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:This fuller body American cream ale is brewed with an addition of hot peppers added to the boil as well as the conditioning tank. Silver medal winner in the 2012 World Beer Cup.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Green Chili Beer
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Flat Branch Pub & Brewery Green Chili Beer
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:This is the chili-heads favorite brew. A mild base beer is spiced up with Anaheim and Serrano peppers. This beer has a wonderful green chili aroma and a touch of heat in the finish. Have it with tomato juice as a “liquid enchilada”.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Chili Beer
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Calapooia Brewing Company Chili Beer

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Spotted Cow
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: New Glarus Brewing Company Spotted Cow
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Cask conditioned ale has been the popular choice among brews since long before prohibition. We continue this pioneer spirit with our Wisconsin farmhouse ale. Brewed with flaked barley and the finest Wisconsin malts. We even give a nod to our farmers.Naturally cloudy we allow the yeast to remain in the bottle to enhance fullness of flavors, which cannot be duplicated otherwise. Expect this ale to be fun, fruity and satisfying. You know you're in Wisconsin when you see the Spotted Cow.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Summer Solstice
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Anderson Valley Brewing Company Summer Solstice Cerveza Crema
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Also known as Summer Solstice Cerveza CremaOur Summer Solstice Seasonal Ale is a slightly sweet, malty session beer with a creamy mouth feel and clean finish. With hints of caramel in the nose and a touch of spice, it’s become affectionately known as “cream soda for adults”. The unique flavors and superior drinkability make for the ultimate refreshment on a hot summer day.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Genesee Cream Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Brewery: Genesee Brewing Co. / Dundee Brewing Co.
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Genesee Brewing Co. / Dundee Brewing Co. Genesee Cream Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:"Genny" Cream Ale.Smooth like a lager. Crisp like an ale. Cream ale was one of the first beer styles created in america and ours has been the style standard since 1960. Our cream ale has won numerous awards throughout the years and remains just as smooth and flavorful as it's always been. Cream ale, a true American original.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Wexford Irish Cream Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Greene King / Morland Brewery Wexford Irish Cream Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Based on a traditional Irish recipe from County Wexford that dates back to 1810, we use only the best ingredients to ensure that our Wexford Ale has a smooth mellow creaminess we believe you will enjoy.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Sunlight Cream Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Sun King Brewing Company Sunlight Cream Ale

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Golden Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Terrapin Beer Company Terrapin Golden Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Formerly Terrapin Cream Ale.Available in Georgia only!Terrapin Beer Company was started by two guys who love big, bold beers. We are known for using a ton of flavorful ingredients and for pushing the envelope with the brews we create.We have also been known to take pleasure in hiking, biking, kayaking, and just plain having fun in the great outdoors. When we get hot and sweaty even hopheads like us want nothing more than to enjoy a beer that is crisp and refreshing.Which is why we created the perfect session beer-the Terrapin Golden Ale.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Little Kings Cream Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Hudepohl-Schoenling Brewing Co. Little Kings Cream Ale

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Carolina Blonde
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Foothills Brewing Company Carolina Blonde

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Kiwanda Cream Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Pelican Pub & Brewery Kiwanda Cream Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Kiwanda Cream Ale celebrates Cape Kiwanda, the starting point of the stunning Three Capes Scenic Route and the birthplace of Pelican Brewing Company. Inspired by one of America’s traditional 19th century beer styles, Kiwanda has a golden color, floral aroma, refreshing body and a clean, snappy finish. Whether enjoyed with your toes in the sand at our oceanfront brewpub or in your own backyard, Kiwanda Cream Ale is proof that light colored beer can be both refreshing and inspiring.12.5 degrees PlatoBitterness: 25 IBUColor: 5 lovibond\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Derailed Black Cherry Cream Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Erie Brewing Co. Derailed Black Cherry Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Formerly Derailed Black Cherry Ale\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Cream Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Muskoka Brewery Dry Hopped Cream Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:First brewed in1996, our flagship Muskoka Cream Ale has since become a signature beer of the Muskoka region. Unmistakable with its rich amber colour and inviting floral tones, this laid-back English pub-style ale is smooth and easy-going. With a Cascade hoppiness and fuller body of flavour, this gold-medal winning Canadian Cream Ale is the quintessential taste of cottage country. Raise a glass.20 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Kentucky Vanilla Barrel Cream Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Brewery: Alltech’s Lexington Brewing and Distilling Co.
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Alltech’s Lexington Brewing and Distilling Co. Kentucky Cream Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Kentucky Vanillla Barrel Cream Ale is our take on a classic American style of beer. We took a cold-conditioned cream ale brewed with a hint of flaked corn and bourbon vanilla beans and aged it in freshly decanted Kentucky bourbon barrels for a minimum of two months. A perfect blend of vanilla and bourbon notes make this cream ale irresistible. The medium body and 5.5% ABV make Kentucky Vanilla Barrel Cream Ale the perfect complement to any dessert, or all day event.

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Sleeman Cream Ale (64*)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Sleeman Breweries Ltd. Sleeman Cream Ale (64*)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Created by George Sleeman in the late 1800s, Sleeman Cream Ale was the first brand produced by the two Guelph breweries, and still remains our most recognized brand.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Flagship Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Brewery: Grey Sail Brewing of Rhode Island
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Grey Sail Brewing of Rhode Island Flagship Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Our golden-colored cream ale, brewed in a similar manner to the crisp lagers of continental Europe, offers great balance between malty sweetness and noble hop bitterness. This gold-medal winning cream ale is the perfect session beer for any occasion.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Stillwater Vanilla Cream Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Thomas Creek Brewery Stillwater Vanilla Cream Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:23 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Killer Whale Cream Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Bold City Brewery Killer Whale Cream Ale

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Wild Night Honey Cream Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Swamp Head Brewery & Tasting Room Wild Night Honey Cream Ale

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Grazias
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Mike Hess Brewing Grazias

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Henry Weinhard's Blue Boar Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Blitz-Weinhard Brewing Co. Henry Weinhard's Blue Boar Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Malts: North American Select Pale and Caramel MaltsHops: Pacific Northwest Cascade, Willamette and Cluster HopsCalories/12 oz: 144Carbohydrates (g): 12.4% Alcohol by Vol: 4.60Bitterness Units: 14.0\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Fallen Apple
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Furthermore Beer Fallen Apple

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Cosmic Cream Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Cameron's Brewing Co. Cream Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Cameron’s Cream Ale is the beer that started our company. Hailed by Toronto Life in 1998 as “best new beer of the year.” This elegant golden ale is crisp, refreshing and balanced with a fruity backbone. Brewed with 2 row malted barley and specialty hops from the UK. Cameron’s Cream Ale is a dimensional beer that is refreshing in the summer and comforting in the colder seasons.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Canyon Cream Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Crow Peak Brewing Canyon Cream Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:A light bodied ale with malty dominated flavor. Very low hop bitterness, flavor, and aroma.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Cream Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Empire Brewing Company Cream Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Empire Cream Ale is carbonated with nitrogen so it cascades as it pours. This golden pub style ale has an extremely smooth mouthfeel, and a crisp hop flavor.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Kitsilano Maple Cream Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Granville Island Brewery Kitsilano Maple Cream Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Brewed using a hint of pure Canadian maple syrup, Kitsilano Maple Cream Ale is a smooth reminder of Vancouver’s laid-back lifestyle. Enjoy the bold taste of this bronze-coloured ale and toast all that Vancouver has to offer.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Première (Red)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Bières de Chimay S.A. Chimay Première (Red)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:This copper-colored ale boasts flavors of apricots, brown sugar and nutmeg. Brewed since 1982, Chimay Première is the first beer ever produced by the Trappist monks of Notre-Dame de Scourmont Abbey in Belgium.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Maudite
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Unibroue Maudite
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Without a doubt Unibroue’s best-known beer, La Maudite is inspired by abbey beers and Belgian double-style ales. It first hit the shelves in 1992 and took the province by storm with its 8% alcohol content, making it the first strong beer available in grocery stores.That’s where the idea came to tie its name and branding to a pact signed with the devil. The illustration of the “chasse-galerie” (or flying canoe) from a beloved Quebec legend captures the spirit of the beer.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Abbey Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brewery Ommegang Ommegang (Abbey Ale)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Abbey was Ommegang's first beer and was styled after Dubbels produced by Belgian Trappist monks. A deep, rich and malty ale, Abbey uses several Belgian specialty malts and spices resulting in a very aromatic, flavorful beer.Deep burgundy in color, topped by a dense tan head, Abbey Ale is rich on the palate but with a dry finish. Suitable for cellaring, Abbey develops wonderful caramel, fig, and currant notes with age.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Westmalle Trappist Dubbel
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brouwerij Westmalle Westmalle Trappist Dubbel
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Westmalle Dubbel (7%) is a dark red-brown beer with a rich, complex taste thanks to re-fermentation in the bottle. You pick up touches of caramel, malt and fruity esters reminiscent of ripe banana. The beer pearls beneath a covering of dense, cream-coloured froth. A lovely lace pattern forms on the inside of the glass once emptied. The long, dry finish of this balanced, mild Trappist beer will stay with you.Trappist or Dubbel?In 1865 the monks of Westmalle started brewing a dark Trappist beer in addition to their table beer. They adjusted the recipe in 1926, doubling the amounts of raw ingredients to produce a new, stronger beer. Dubbel is a logical name for this doubled beer, though it is more often simply called ‘Trappist’. To this day, the 1926 recipe is the basis for Westmalle Dubbel.Westmalle Dubbel: bottle and tapWe are all familiar with Westmalle Dubbel in 33 cl bottles. But around 150 carefully selected Belgian cafés and restaurants serve this beer on tap from barrels containing 20, 30 and 50 litres. In the barrel, this living beer evolves differently to emerge with a slightly sweeter taste.Westmalle Dubbel can also be purchased in 75 cl bottles. The beer matures in a different way in a larger bottle to produce a noticeably milder finish.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Trappistes Rochefort 6
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brasserie de Rochefort Trappistes Rochefort 6

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Prior 8
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brouwerij St. Bernardus NV St. Bernardus Prior 8

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Abbey
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: New Belgium Brewing Abbey Belgian Style Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Our award-winning Abbey stays true to tradition with an authentic Belgian yeast, six malts and a guarded recipe.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Trappist Westvleteren 8 (VIII)Brouwerij Westvleteren (Sint-Sixtusabdij van Westvleteren)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brouwerij Westvleteren (Sint-Sixtusabdij van Westvleteren) Trappist Westvleteren 8
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:(Blue Cap)\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Père Jacques
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Goose Island Beer Co. Pere Jacques
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Warm molasses color, dark fruit aroma, rich caramel flavor, rich soft body.26 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Dubbel Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Allagash Brewing Company Allagash Dubbel Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Allagash Dubbel boasts a deep red color and a complex malty taste. The finish is dry with subtle hints of chocolate and nuts. The yeast asserts itself by lending a classic Belgian fruitiness.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Pater 6
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brouwerij St. Bernardus NV St. Bernardus Pater 6

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Corsendonk Pater / Abbey Brown Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brouwerij Corsendonk Corsendonk Pater / Abbey Brown Ale

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Grimbergen Dubbel
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brouwerij Alken-Maes Grimbergen Dubbel

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: La Trappe Dubbel (Koningshoeven / Dominus)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Bierbrouwerij De Koningshoeven B.V. La Trappe Dubbel (Koningshoeven / Dominus)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:La Trappe Dubbel has a deep brown colour and attractive beige froth. The use of caramel malt gives it a gentle aromatic caramelised quality. It has a rich malty flavour with a touch of sweetness. Post-fermenting La Trappe Dubbel is a smooth drink, and yet has some real body and intense flavour to it.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Trappist Achel 8° Bruin
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Brewery: Brouwerij der St. Benedictusabdij de Achelse
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brouwerij der St. Benedictusabdij de Achelse Trappist Achel 8° Bruin

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Lost & Found
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: The Lost Abbey Lost & Found Abbey Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Modeled after the great Trappist and Monastic beers that inspired the founding of our brewery. A richly deep garnet colored ale created from a blend of Domestic and imported malts. As part of our commitment to interesting brewing endeavors, Chef Vince created a special raisin puree for this beer. Malts, raisins and a fantastic yeast strain working in harmony produce a beer of amazing complexity and depth.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Abbey Dubbel
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Flying Fish Brewing Company Bourbon Barrel Abbey Dubbel

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Bornem Double
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brouwerij Van Steenberge N.V. Bornem Dubbel

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Affligem Dubbel
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brouwerij De Smedt / Brouwerij Affligem Affligem Dubbel

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Abbey Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Abita Brewing Co. Abbey Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Abbey Ale honors the ancient tradition of monks who perfected the art of brewing beer to support the monastery and their "liquid bread". We offer up our support and thank them with a 25¢ donation to St. Joseph's Abbey with every bottle sold of this heavenly brew. Dark amber in color, the aroma of caramel, fruits and cloves invites you to contemplate the creamy head of this "Dubbel" or double ale. Abita Abbey Ale is a malty brew, top-fermented and bottle aged to rapturous perfection.32 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Resurrection
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: The Brewer's Art Brewer's Art Resurrection
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:During the fermentation of the first batch of this Abbey-style dubbel, the yeast «died» and was «resurrected» by brewer Chris Cashell. Made with five types of barley malt and lots of sugar, this beer is quite strong and flavorful, without being too sweet. 7%abv\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Brother David's Belgian-style Double Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Anderson Valley Brewing Company Brother David's Belgian-style Double Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Inspired by the classic Dubbels of Belgium, our Brother David’s Double has a dark brown body and aromas of warm cocoa, banana, and cloves. Specialty malts impart a toasted, nutty character and flavors of chocolate-covered cherries and candied fruits, while the subdued hop profile and Abbey yeast create spicy, herbal notes to compliment the warm, slightly sweet finish. Winner of a Gold Medal in the 2011 Great American Beer Festival™, Brother David’s Double is a truly complex and potent ale meant to be savored or shared with friends.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Brune
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brasserie de l'Abbaye du Val-Dieu Val-Dieu Brune

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: St. Feuillien Brune
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brasserie St. Feuillien St. Feuillien Brune
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:This brown ale has a marked ruby brown colour with a generous and lasting head. It has a distinctive aroma reflecting the wide range of ingredients used in its production. The fruitiness resulting from its fermentation blends harmoniously with a dominant liquorice and caramel flavour. The body is decidedly malty. The bitterness is the result of a complex alchemy between the fine hops and special malts used. These give St-Feuillien Brune a typical dark chocolate appearance. This beer creates an endless variety of sensations with a lingering taste and powerful aroma.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Siamese Twin Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Uncommon Brewers Siamese Twin Ale

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Benediction
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Russian River Brewing Company Benediction
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Brown in color, Benediction has notes aromas and flavors of chocolate, tobacco, and spice. The finish is mildly malty with just enough bitterness from the hops.Original Gravity: 1.060\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Augustijn Donker Brune
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brouwerij Van Steenberge N.V. Augustijn Brune

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: St. Sebastiaan Dark
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brouwerij Sterkens N.V. St. Sebastiaan Dark

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Brugse Zot Dubbel
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Brewery: Brouwerij Straffe Hendrik / Huisbrouwerij De Halve Maan
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brouwerij Straffe Hendrik / Huisbrouwerij De Halve Maan Brugse Zot Dubbel

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Ovila Abbey Barrel Aged Dubbel
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Sierra Nevada Brewing Co. Ovila Abbey Dubbel
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:This Abbey Dubbel was aged in a blend of red wine and bourbon barrels to add a new level of complexity to an already beguiling brew. Rich malt flavors of burnt sugar and caramel blend seamlessly with bright fruit notes from the wine barrels, while the bourbon oak lends a mellow hint of vanilla.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Solitude
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brewery Vivant Solitude

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Big Bison Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Crown Valley Brewing & Distilling Co. Big Bison Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Great lengths were taken to ensure its authentic characteristics. German and Belgian malts, noble hops and a unique yeast strain are all necessary to produce this unique ale. It is aged for one month; beer that tends to please red wine drinkers and is definitely not for the novice beer drinker.23 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: St. Vincent's Dubbel
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Captain Lawrence Brewing Co. St. Vincent's Dubbel

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Brother Joseph's Belgian Dubbel
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Straight To Ale Brother Joseph's Belgian Dubbel
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Maimed in an accident that left him with a hunched back, Brother Joseph Zoettl worked in the St. Bernard Abbey power plant shoveling coal. In his spare time, Brother Joseph used found objects such as marbles and chunks of concrete and tile to build miniature shrines and buildings on the Abbey grounds. Over 40 years, he created 125 different models and replicas. Today, the Ave Maria Grotto covers three acres and is world-renowned as both a fun roadside attraction and an awe-inspiring collection of folk art. We have named our Belgian dubbel after Brother Joseph as a testament to his perseverance, his hard work, and his indomitable spirit. A full-flavored abbey-style ale with a complex taste and aroma, Brother Joseph’s Dubbel is filled with specialty malt and dark fruit character.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Dark Abby
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Devils Backbone Brewing Company Dark Abbey
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Meet Abby, Azrael’s darker twin. This Belgian beauty is mysteriously alluring with a sultry flavor combination of brown sugar, plum and spices in a dark burgundy hue. Abby has a deep, rich flavor, and a serious strength but like her sister, hides behind a deceptively light fruity finish. On the surface she’s the sweetest girl you’ll ever meet, but one taste you’ll be trapped in her darkly alluring web.DARK ABBY FACTS:Alcohol by Volume: 7.5%Hop Bitterness (IBUs): 18Malts: Pilsner, Dark Munich, Honey, Dark CrystalHops: SaazSugar & Spice: Turbinado Sugar, Sorghum Syrup, Secret Spice Mix\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: St Martin Brune
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brasserie De Brunehaut St Martin Brune

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Dominus Vobiscum Double
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Microbrasserie Charlevoix Dominus Vobiscum Double

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Evil 8° Belgian-Style Dubbel Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Blue Mountain Brewery Evil 8° Belgian-Style Dubbel Ale

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Sterkens Dubbel Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brouwerij Sterkens N.V. Sterkens Dubbel Ale

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Natte
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brouwerij 't IJ Natte
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:After the ‘Zatte’, this is the oldest beer from Brouwerij ‘t IJ. Natte is classed as a ‘dubbel’, a Belgian category of smooth, dark beers. Because we partly use dark malt, Natte has a reddish-brown colour and a smooth, roasted flavour with earthy tones of brown sugar, nuts and plums. Completed with slightly bitter hops, this is a nicely balanced beer and one of the brewery’s classics.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Green's Endeavour Dubbel Dark Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Green's Gluten Free Beers Green's Endeavour

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Oro De Calabaza
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Jolly Pumpkin Artisan Ales Oro De Calabaza

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Domaine DuPage French Style Country Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Two Brothers Brewing Company Domaine DuPage French Style Country Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:One of the most award-winning craft beers (period), Domaine DuPage is a French Country Ale that offers a toasty caramel sweetness with just enough hops to cleanse the palate. A true original, both in style and taste, this decorated ale continues to shine as the flagship beer of Two Brothers.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Abbaye De Saint Bon-ChienBFM (Brasserie des Franches-Montagnes)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: BFM Brasserie Des Franches-Montagnes Abbaye De Saint Bon-Chien
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:The Abbey of Saint Bon-Chien, winey, tart and complex, matured - slowly - in oak barrels. The beer that forged the legend of the BFM across the Atlantic.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Gift Of The Magi
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: The Lost Abbey Gift Of The Magi
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:It seems that everyone knows the story of the Three Kings. Sent to follow the star in the sky each brought a gift for the baby they sought. One King brought Gold, the other Frankincense and the other Myrrh. Many breweries produce a Christmas Seasonal beer and this is our beer to celebrate the holiday season.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Avant Garde
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: The Lost Abbey Avant Garde
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:At the Lost Abbey, we pride ourselves on producing beers of the highest quality and distinction. Avant Garde is our commitment to brewing beers to no particular style. Some might want to label this as a beer brewed in the Biere de Garde tradition of Northern France. We would prefer to say it was brewed in the Avant Garde style of beers that will reward all those who seek the not so ordinary. Deep gold in color with hints of biscuits, caramel and fresh baked bread, this beer is sure to delight the senses and palates of consumers everywhere.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Fuego Del Otono, Autumn Fire
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Jolly Pumpkin Artisan Ales Fuego Del Otono, Autumn Fire
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:To catch a bit of soft radiance in each bottle, we wait for fall colors to begin their bright and fleeting glow before brewing this wonderful ale under their autumn fire. Gentle amber malt blend smooth caramel notes, gently lapping against a shore of distant forgotten spice. A beer to sip, contemplate and enjoy.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Bière De Mars
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Jolly Pumpkin Artisan Ales Bière De Mars
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:A sustaining beer that is brewed to comfort in the gusty ides of March and welcome in a wealth of warmer weather.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Perdition
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Russian River Brewing Company Perdition

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Bière De Mars
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brewery Ommegang Bière De Mars
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Ommegang Biere de Mars is a Belgian-style dry hopped amber ale with a bit of magical space dust woven in Brettanomyces bruxellensis, a wild-yeast used in the secondary fermentation. The Brett imparts added tartness, a bit of zing and some farmhouse funkiness.Biere de Mars reveals a copper-amber body and a frothy white head that builds, clings and stays. Aromas are of malt and grain, clove, fruit and a bit of funk. Flavors are full-bodied with delicate malty sweetness, followed by spicy, peppery yeastiness and Brett-induced funk. Hopping is subtly bitter and aromatic, bumped up a bit by dry hopping. The finish is dry and gently lingering. At 6.5% ABV; it also pairs nicely with spicy foods such as barbecue.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Southampton Biere De Mars
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Southampton Publick House Southampton Biere De Mars

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Jenlain Ambrée
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brasserie Duyck Jenlain Ambrée

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: La Goudale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Les Brasseurs de Gayant Goudale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Its light taste of special malts, flavored with Flanders hops and its aromas of high fermentation, gives La Goudale all its character and balance.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Castelain Blond Biere De Garde
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brasserie Castelain Castelain Blond Biere De Garde

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Le Mort Vivant
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Southern Star Brewing Company Le Mort Vivant

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Contemplation Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brewery Vivant Contemplation Ale

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Les Bière Des Sans Culottes
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brasserie La Choulette Les Bière Des Sans Culottes

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Jenlain Blonde
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brasserie Duyck Jenlain Blonde

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Saint Landelin La Divine
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Les Brasseurs de Gayant Saint Landelin La Divine

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Good Harbor Golden Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Leelanau Brewing Company Good Harbor Golden Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:This Golden Ale is Inspired by Franco-Belgain bière de gardes, but not exactly fitting the profile of its European counterparts, this beer is best described as a Michigan Bière de Garde. Hand-crafted by Ron Jeffries at his Jolly Pumpkin Brewery in Dexter, which is consistantly rated as one of one of the best in the world, all of the Leelanau Brewing Company beers are distingushed by their time spent in a large French oak barrique prior to bottling and re-fermentation. The wild yeasts inhabiting the brewery give all the beers made there a common thread, creating a family of beverages with rare harmony, despite their diverse styles.Decidedly refreshing despite the 7.5% abv, this style of beer was originally brewed in the slow winter season as payment for farmhands in the summer. We certainly don’t mind sitting down after a long day of work and breathing deep the symphony aromas wafting from the lofty, lacey head burgeoning from our tulip glass. Subtle notes of peaches, apricots, canned pineapple, bitters, and a faint herbaceousness belie the smooth and delicate taste. The slightly malty, fruity body quickly transitions effortlessly to a crisp, dry and somewhat tart finish. Signature hints of French oak and the complex yeast character place this all-natural beer among the best saisons, stock ales, and farmhouse styles of Michigan, France & Belgium.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Southampton Biere De Garde
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Southampton Publick House Biere De Garde

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Rendezvous
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Lakefront Brewery, Inc. Rendezvous
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:22 IBU17° Plato13° Lovibond\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: St. Amand
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brasserie Castelain St. Amand

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: La Choulette Ambrée
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brasserie La Choulette La Choulette Ambrée

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Oxtoberfest
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Oxbow Brewing Company Oxtoberfest
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:A farmhouse festbier featuring a malt body that is both dry and creamy with hints of smoke.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Ch'ti Blonde
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brasserie Castelain Ch'ti Blonde
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:After brewing and fermentation, CH’TI beers is kept for long weeks in storage tanks. In the calm and cool (0°C) environment, the beer matures, develops a finer taste, perfects its aroma and acquires its natural and characteristic sparkles. It is here also that the beer obtains its balance, finesse and gleam.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: La Choulette De Noël
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brasserie La Choulette La Choulette De Noël

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Jenlain Bière De Noël
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brasserie Duyck Jenlain Bière De Noël

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: French Country Christmas Ale (Biere De Garde)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Southampton Publick House French Country Christmas Ale (Biere De Garde)

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: L'Ambrée D'Esquelbecq / Thiriez Amber
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brasserie Thiriez L?Ambrée D?Esquelbecq / Thiriez Amber
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Local name - L'?Ambrée d'EsquelbecqUS Import - Thiriez AmberDescription on US bottle label:Daniel Thiriez painstakingly crafts his rustic farmhouse ales in a rustic farmhouse brewery in the beautiful countryside of French Flanders. This brisk Amber Ale is really a luminous golden-red. It is perfectly balanced, with a soft, fresh hop bitterness playing off a hearty whole-grain maltiness, and accented by an entrancing nose of earth and spice that is typical of French farm-country brewing.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: La Choulette Blonde
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brasserie La Choulette La Choulette Blonde

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Bière De Garde
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Choc Beer Co. / Pete's Place Bière De Garde
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:25 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Jenlain Bière De Printemps
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brasserie Duyck Jenlain Bière De Printemps
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:This is a Bière de Mars.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Sah'tea
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Dogfish Head Brewery Sah'tea
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:This Ancient Ale is a modern take on a 9th-century Finnish beer.The wort for Sah'tea is caramelized over white-hot river rocks, and the beer is fermented with a German weizen yeast. In addition to juniper berries foraged from the Finnish countryside, Sah'tea is flavored with black tea, cardamom, cinnamon, ginger, cloves and black pepper.The spicing is subtle and balanced, and Sah'tea is a highly-quaffable, truly unique brew with a full mouthfeel.6 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Arctic Circle Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Malmgårdin Panimo Arctic Circle Ale

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Lammin Kataja Olut
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Lammin Sahti Oy Lammin Kataja Olut

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Lammin Sahtia
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Lammin Sahti Oy Lammin Sahtia

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Finlandia Sahti
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Finlandia Sahti Ky Finlandia Sahti

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Summer Sahti
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Vintage Brewing Company Summer Sahti
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:1.056 OG8 IBUS\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Malmgård Jouluolut
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Malmgårdin Panimo Malmgård Jouluolut
