dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Tempo Beer Industries LTD Nesher Malt

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Obolon Kwas Chlebowy
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Obolon Brewery Obolon Kwas Chlebowy

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Krushka & Bochka Kvass
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Pivovarinniy Zavod Samko Krushka & Bochka Kvass

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Monastyrskiy Black Currant Kvas
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Monastyrskiy Kvas Monastyrskiy Black Currant Kvas

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Danilo Classic Kvas
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Darl, Tov Danilo Classic Kvas

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Danilo Okroshka Kvas
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Darl, Tov Danilo Okroshka Kvas

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Danilo Pohmilny Kvas
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Darl, Tov Danilo Pohmilny Kvas

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Malty
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Israel Beer Breweries Ltd. Malty

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Smetoniška Gira
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Vofas-Engelman Smetoni?ka Gira

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Brordinskiy Classical Kvass (??????????? ???????????? ????)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Borodino ZAO Borodinskiy Kvas

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Drevlyansky Kvass
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Radomyshlskij Pivovarennyj Zavod Drevlyansky Kvass

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Olimpia Kvas
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: SP Etrus Olimpia Kvas

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Summertime
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Goose Island Beer Co. Summertime
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:With a light fruity aroma and a bright, crisp finish, Goose Island Summertime Kölsch is the perfect summer session ale. A Kölsch beer brewed in the traditional German fashion, you’ll find yourself enjoying and savoring each sip of Summertime as much as you do those hot summer days and cool summer nights.20 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Reissdorf Kölsch
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brauerei Heinrich Reissdorf Reissdorf Kölsch

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Gaffel Kölsch
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Privatbrauerei Gaffel Becker & Co. Gaffel Kölsch

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Fancy Lawnmower
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Saint Arnold Brewing Company Saint Arnold Fancy Lawnmower
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:A true German-style Kölsch. Originally brewed in Cologne, this beer is crisp and refreshing, yet has a sweet malty body that is balanced by a complex, citrus hop character. Multiple additions of German Hallertauer hops are used to achieve this delicate flavor. We use a special Kölsch yeast, an ale yeast that ferments at lager temperatures, to yield the slightly fruity, clean flavor of this beer. Fancy Lawnmower Beer is a world class brew yet light enough to be enjoyed by Texans after strenuous activities, like mowing the lawn.Bronze Medal, 2006 Great American Beer Festival\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Samuel Adams East-West KölschBoston Beer Company (Samuel Adams)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Boston Beer Company (Samuel Adams) Samuel Adams East-West Kölsch

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Full Circle
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: New Holland Brewing Company New Holland Full Circle
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Formerly New Holland Lucid\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Santo
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Saint Arnold Brewing Company Saint Arnold Santo
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Santo is a black Kölsch, which technically doesn’t exist as a style, but this is as close as we can come to describing it. Essentially it is brewed using a Kölsch recipe with the addition of Munich and black malt. It is light bodied and floral yet with a distinct dark malt flavor. Our goal was to create a dark yet refreshing beer that would pair perfectly with a plate of enchiladas.The label artwork is by Houston artist Carlos Hernandez who is known for his Day of the Dead Rock Star series of paintings and prints.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Calumet Queen
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Three Floyds Brewing Co. & Brewpub Calumet Queen
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:A crisp and refreshing lighter summer offering, this Kolsch-style beer is golden in color, light-bodied and a perfect remedy for hot weather.20 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Früh Kölsch
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brauerei Früh Am Dom Früh Kolsch

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Sünner Kölsch
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Gebr. Sünner GmbH & Co. KG Sünner Kölsch

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Clearwater Kölsch
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Captain Lawrence Brewing Co. Captain's Kölsch
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Formerly known as Captain's KölschThis is the first beer that we have brewed that is not considered an ale. Brewed with imported German yeast, Kolsch is a style of beer that is stuck in between the two main styles of ale and lager… not as fruity as an Ale, and yet not quite as subtle as a Lager; our Kolsch blurs the lines between the two.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Curve Ball Blonde Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Pyramid Breweries, Inc. Curve Ball Blonde Ale

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Saranac Kölsch
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Matt Brewing Company Saranac Kölsch

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Kölsch
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Sierra Nevada Brewing Co. Sierra Nevada Kölsch Style Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Our Left Coast take on a crisp, classic German-style ale is hopped up with zesty American and European hops for a twist on a traditional light-bodied beer.From Cologne to California, Kölsch-style beers are a favorite around the world, prized for their incredible drinkability while maintaining a depth of flavor. As our stamp on this style, this Kölsch style has a punch of bright, citrusy American whole-cone hops to add West Coast character to this well-traveled ale.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Krankshaft Kölsch
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Metropolitan Brewing Krankshaft Kölsch
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Brewed in homage to the beer of Cologne, Krankshaft is a pale straw hued smile in a glass. We throw in a little wheat malt to round out an easy Santiam hop bitterness. There are no Köbes to serve them up, but you should feel free to have as many as you like.28 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: 32°/50° Kölsch
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: COAST Brewing Company 32/50
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Our take on a kolsch style ale that is soft on the palate with a delicate malt flavor. Balanced with a touch of wheat and honey notes .Dry and wine like with a flowery hop finish.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Karnival Kolsch
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Stoudts Brewing Co. Karnival Kolsch

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Endless River
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Mother Earth Brewing Endless River
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:A clean, crisp beer, Kolsch offers a very slight fruity flavor and aroma. It is light gold in color, with a delicate head. This light-bodied beer appeals to nearly everyone who samples it. Expect to enjoy a slight tang in the finish.Our Brew Master Says…"Kolsch is my favorite light beer style, hands down. Crisp, tangy and light on the palate: outstanding."Food Pairings:Leafy green salad with creamy dressing, broiled lobster, grilled or steamed shrimp, fried soft shell crab, peach cobbler.Preferred Glass: StangeAvailability: Year RoundABV: 5.0%Calories: 164\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Lug Tread Lagered Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Beau's All Natural Brewing Company Lug Tread Lagered Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Golden-hued, crisp and finely balanced, Lug Tread is our tribute to the classic beer of Cologne, Germany. Lug Tread is top fermented (like an ale) and then cold aged (like a lager) for a lengthy period. This gives our beer some light ale notes complemented by a lager-like crispness. Lug Tread displays interwoven malt and hop flavours, subtle fruit flavours and a crisp, lingering finish.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Geary's Summer Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: D.L. Geary Brewing Company Geary's Summer Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:The style of this ale is traditionally European, similar to a German kolsch: full bodied with a spicy hop tang and a rich, crystal clear golden color. Alcohol content is approximately 6% by volume.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Lancaster Kölsch
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Lancaster Brewing Company Lancaster Kölsch
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Our German-style Kolsch pays homage to the traditional beer of Cologne. It pours a pale straw color, delivering floral hop notes and a smooth malt character developed from extended cold aging.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Dundee Kolsch Style Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Brewery: Genesee Brewing Co. / Dundee Brewing Co.
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Genesee Brewing Co. / Dundee Brewing Co. Dundee Kolsch Style Ale

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Kölsch 151
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Blue Mountain Brewery Kölsch 151

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: HooDoo Kölsch Style Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Uinta Brewing Company HooDoo
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:This crisp kolsch-style ale is golden in color and exhibits refreshing hop character.25 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Shiner Kölsch
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Spoetzl Brewery Shiner Kölsch

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Gateway Kolsch
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: French Broad Brewing Co. Gateway Kolsch

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Gold Spike Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Berkshire Brewing Company Inc. Gold Spike Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:A pale golden ale featuring a crisp, clean malt flavor, Gold Spike is the perfect quaff for a warm day or when you are just looking for something a bit more refreshing. Brewed true to style, this interpretation of a German Kölsch uses an authentic yeast strain tracing to the beer’s ancestral home of Cologne.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Kolsch 45
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Short's Brewing Company Kolsch 45

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Kolsch
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Rock Bottom Restaurant & Brewery Kolsch

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Angry Angel
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Big Boss Brewing Angry Angel Kolsch

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Josephs Brau Summer Brew
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Trader Joe's Brewing Company Josephs Brau Summer Brew

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Sunbru
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Four Peaks Brewing Company Sunbru Kölsch-Style Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:A very light golden ale that is malty sweet, almost honey-like in the nose. This ale has a light to medium body and a very delicate flavor. Easy drinking, it has very low bitterness and a soft dry finish.17.3 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Budweiser
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Anheuser-Busch Budweiser
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Brewed using a blend of imported and classic American aroma hops, and a blend of barley malts and rice. Budweiser is brewed with time-honored methods including “kraeusening” for natural carbonation and Beechwood aging, which results in unparalleled balance and character.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Pabst Blue Ribbon (PBR)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Pabst Brewing Company Pabst Blue Ribbon (PBR)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:- Pabst Blue Ribbon is brewed in the finest traditions of an American Premium Lager dating back to 1844. Brewed with a combination of 2 & 6-row malted barley, select cereal grains and American and European hops, Pabst Blue Ribbon is fermented with a proprietary lager yeast. Our unique fermentation and maturation process results in a smooth, full bodied beer with a clean, crisp finish with a fine noble hop aroma.- ABV% 4.74- Calories 144\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Corona Extra
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Grupo Modelo S.A. de C.V. Corona Extra
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Also known as Coronita Extra (small bottles) and Corona Familiar (larger bottles).\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Miller High Life
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Miller Brewing Co. Miller High Life
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Miller High Life, also known as the Champagne of Beers, is a quintessentially classic, American-style lager. In 1903, Frederick Miller created Miller High Life because he believed that the good life, the High Life, should be accessible to everyone, not just the upper crust. To this day, Miller High Life continues to be faithfully brewed as a golden pilsner, utilizing light-stable galena hops from the Pacific Northwest and a select combination of malted barley.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Red Stripe Jamaican Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Desnoes & Geddes Limited Red Stripe Jamaican Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:In 2012, Diageo moved production of the U.S. supply of Red Stripe from Jamaica to the U.S.; The supply is produced by City Brewing Co. in La Crosse, Wisconsin and the Latrobe Brewing Company in Latrobe, Pennsylvania, which was the main brewery for Rolling Rock for over 60 years. Desnoes & Geddes will still make Red Stripe for Jamaica, Brazil, Canada and Europe.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Rolling Rock Extra Pale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Latrobe Brewing Co. Rolling Rock Extra Pale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Using a time-honored recipe with only the finest malted barley and blend of hops, Rolling Rock is a classic American lager that is as well-known for its distinctive, full-bodied taste as it is for its craftsmanship, heritage and painted green bottle.Full-flavored, with a subtle bite. Light-to-medium body and color. Brewed with only the choicest ingredients; a perfect blend of pale barley malt, rice and corn.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Dos Equis Special Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Brewery: Cervecería Cuauhtémoc Moctezuma, S.A. de C.V.
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Cervecería Cuauhtémoc Moctezuma, S.A. de C.V. Dos Equis Special Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:An authentic Mexican cerveza brewed in the style of Pilsner Lagers with a nuanced blend of malts, spices and earth tones. Ingredients: Water, Malted barley, Corn starch / syrup, Hops, Ascorbic Acid.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Modelo Especial
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Grupo Modelo S.A. de C.V. Modelo Especial
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Brewed as a model of what good beer should be, this rich, full-flavored Pilsner-style Lager delivers a crisp, refreshing taste.Well-balanced taste and light hop character with a crisp, clean finish. Modelo Especial is characterized by an orange blossom honey aroma with a hint of herb.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Miller Genuine Draft
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Miller Brewing Co. Miller Genuine Draft
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Miller Genuine Draft delivers a fresh from the tap taste through its proprietary "cold-filtered four times" brewing process. Introduced nationally in 1986, Miller Genuine Draft was born as the original cold-filtered packaged draft beer. Today, Miller Genuine Draft is reinforcing its status as the best draft beer in a bottle.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Labatt Blue
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Labatt Brewing Company Ltd. Labatt Blue
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Labatt Blue is the best-selling Canadian beer in the world. Introduced in 1951 as Labatt Pilsener, it was named for the colour of its label by fans of the Winnipeg Blue Bombers football team. Blue was the first brand in Canada with a twist-off cap and won the silver medal in the International Lager category at the 1998 Brewing Industry International Awards. Labatt Blue, brewed using specially selected aromatic hops, is a well-balanced, fully matured, full-flavoured beer with a fruity character and a slightly sweet aftertaste.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Foster's Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Foster's Group Limited Foster's Lager

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Tecate
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Brewery: Cervecería Cuauhtémoc Moctezuma, S.A. de C.V.
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Cervecería Cuauhtémoc Moctezuma, S.A. de C.V. Tecate
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:A well balanced bright golden lager beer with a malt crisp flavor, low to medium bitterness that finishes clean.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Landshark Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Margaritaville Brewing Co. Landshark Lager

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Molson Canadian Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Molson Coors Canada Molson Canadian Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Around the world, Canada is seen as a shining example of nature at its best. We have thousands of freshwater lakes and barley fields as far as the eye can see. That's what makes us so proud to brew Molson Canadian, our signature beer. Brewed without preservatives, from St. Johns to Vancouver, over 3000 Canadians have a hand in bringing Molson Canadian to their family, their friends, and their communities. The people who live here truly deserve a beer brewed with the best this land has to offer. That’s why we make sure our award winning lager is as clean, crisp and fresh as the incredible country it comes from.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Busch Beer
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Anheuser-Busch Busch Beer
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Busch and Busch Light are both brewed with a blend of premium American-grown and imported hops and a combination of malt and corn to provide a pleasant balanced flavor. Additionally, Busch Light undergoes a longer brewing process that produces a lighter body and fewer calories.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Sol
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Brewery: Cervecería Cuauhtémoc Moctezuma, S.A. de C.V.
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Cervecería Cuauhtémoc Moctezuma, S.A. de C.V. Sol
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Born in the heart of Mexico in 1899, Sol is a bright and refreshing lager.It’s inspired by the sun and brewed to shine just like those who drink it. The ones that radiate good vibes, that lighten the mood and always look at life on the bright side. The ones who not only shine, but shine their way.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Natural Ice
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Anheuser-Busch Natural Ice
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Natural Ice is brewed with a blend of premium American-grown and imported hops and a combination of malt and corn that lends Natural Ice its delicate sweetness. It then undergoes Anheuser-Busch’s exclusive ice-brewing process, which takes the beer to a temperature below freezing and leads to the formation of ice crystals which create its signature rich and smooth taste.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Narragansett Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Narragansett Brewing Co. Narragansett Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Made on Honor for five generations, The Famous Narragansett Lager has been one of the greats since 1890. Pre-Prohibition era drinkers toasted 'Gansett, Dr. Suess illustrated 'Gansett, the Sox scored with 'Gansett, and Captain Quint crushed 'Gansett. Today, the highest rated, heritage American lager (according to Beer Advocate) is brewed to be clean, crisp, refreshing and perfectly balanced. "Hi Neighbor! Have a 'Gansett!"\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Icehouse
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Miller Brewing Co. Icehouse
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:America's first domestic ice beer, Icehouse is traditionally brewed, fermented and, just before aging, its temperature is lowered to below freezing. This process imparts the beer's smoothness and an alcohol content that's slightly higher (5.5% by volume) than other regular premium beer brands. Icehouse was introduced in 1993 and has reinforced its position as the ultimate beer for wind-up and pre-game occasions. Blending humor and high-energy excitement, Icehouse marketing encourages its target consumers to take occasions to the next level with a great-tasting beer.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Batch 19Coors Brewing Company (Molson-Coors)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Coors Brewing Company Batch 19

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Bud Ice
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Anheuser-Busch Bud Ice
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Anheuser-Busch’s exclusive ice-brewing process takes the beer to a temperature below freezing, which leads to the formation of ice crystals in the finishing process that gives Bud Ice its rich, smooth taste.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Hamm's
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Hamm's Brewing Co. Hamm's
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Hamm's, first brewed in Minnesota in 1865, is America's classic beer. Hamm's is brewed using the purest water and the choicest barley malt, grain and hops. The beer that is "Born in the Land of Sky Blue Waters" is available in select states.Ingredients: Water, Barley Malt, Corn Syrup (Maltose), Yeast, Hops\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Lone Star Beer
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Pabst Brewing Company Lone Star Beer
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:- Lone Star Beer uses the finest hops from the Pacific Northwest with hearty grains from the Central and Northern Plains. Malted barley and corn extract combine to provide Lone Star with nature's finest ingredients for brewing. Lone Star's ingredients give this beer its full natural flavor. The choicest hops lend complexity and aroma to this beer, and its proprietary mashing regimen creates the perfect balance of alcohol, body, and character.- ABV% 4.65- Calories 136\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Old Milwaukee Beer
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Pabst Brewing Company Old Milwaukee Beer

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Presidente
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Cerveceria Nacional Dominicana Presidente
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Released to the market in 1935, for more than seven decades, Presidente has been connected to a particular way of feeling and being Dominican, associating occasions of consumption with great celebrations among friends and developing a true beer culture within our country.The successful presence of Presidente in international markets, together with its great acceptance by tourists who visit us, contributes to the international display of the quality of products from the Dominican Republic and the resources and attractions of the country and its people.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Milwaukee's Best
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Miller Brewing Co. Milwaukee's Best Dry
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Formerly Milwaukee's Best Premium\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Red Dog
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Miller Brewing Co. Red Dog

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Keystone IceCoors Brewing Company (Molson-Coors)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Coors Brewing Company Keystone Ice

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Old Style
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Pabst Brewing Company Old Style
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Originally called Golden Leaf Lager in the 1890’s, Old Style first appeared in local stores in 1902 and quickly became one of the region’s most widely enjoyed beers. It’s heritage and popularity are proudly displayed throughout Wisconsin and Illinois — one can’t go far without seeing a historically protected Old Style sign hanging on the side of a barn or in a tavern window.Old Style first crossed state lines into Illinois to capitalize nationwide bottlers strike and subsequent product rationing by the competition. It wasn’t long before Old Style became Chicago’s beer – served from the North Side to the South Side and everywhere in between. Being accepted as a true local, Old Style began sponsoring the Chicago Cubs in 1950. With Old Style still being served at Wrigley Field today, the partnership is one of longest standing in the country.In 2009, Old Style revived the centuries-old German brewing tradition called “Kraeusening.” This double fermentation process increases carbonation and richness, ultimately leading to a better tasting beer that has since been won medals at the Great American Beer Festival and World Beer Cup.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Milwaukee's Best Ice
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Miller Brewing Co. Milwaukee's Best Ice
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Milwaukee’s Best was first brewed by Gettelman in the 1890s, and became part of the Miller family in 1961. A refreshing, smooth, highly drinkable Ice Lager. The temperature of Milwaukee’s Best Ice is lowered to below freezing during brewing to form ice crystals that impart the beer’s smoothness and 5.9% alcohol content.Milwaukee’s Best Ice won the bronze medal for American-Style Specialty Lager at the 2003 Great American Beer Festival and 2006 World Beer Cup.Born in Milwaukee, WI, Milwaukee's Best Ice is a refreshing, smooth, highly drinkable American-Style Ice Lager. Milwaukee's Best Ice is available in a variety of packages.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Genesee Beer
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Brewery: Genesee Brewing Co. / Dundee Brewing Co.
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Genesee Brewing Co. / Dundee Brewing Co. Genesee Beer
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Brewed with six-row barley malt, corn grits and hops from the Yakima Valley.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Original
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Jacob Leinenkugel Brewing Company Leinenkugel's Original

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Stroh's
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Pabst Brewing Company Stroh's
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Stroh's American Lager is a full-bodied beer that upholds the Stroh family's rich brewing tradition and the Detroit spirit. Brewed in Milwaukee, WI with American grown Galena and Cascade hops, Stroh's American Lager delivers an excellence in taste that is balanced to perfection.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Grain Belt Premium
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: August Schell Brewing Company Grain Belt Premium
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Although the Grain Belt Premium recipe has changed hands over the years, one thing has remained the same–its legendary unique taste. And now that Premium is in the capable hands of a brewery with an even longer tradition than Grain Belt–the August Schell Brewery–may you rest assured that the flavor and heritage of Premium will live on forever.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Carta Blanca
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Brewery: Cervecería Cuauhtémoc Moctezuma, S.A. de C.V.
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Cervecería Cuauhtémoc Moctezuma, S.A. de C.V. Carta Blanca

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Imperial
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Cerveceria Costa Rica Imperial

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: National Bohemian Beer
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Pabst Brewing Company National Bohemian Beer

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Iron City Beer
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Pittsburgh Brewing Co. Iron City Beer

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Schlitz (Classic 1960's Formula)JOS. Schlitz Brewing Co. (Pabst)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: JOS. Schlitz Brewing Co. (Pabst) Schlitz Gusto (Classic 1960's Formula)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Brewed under contract for Pabst by Miller Brewing Co."Classic 1960's Formula" Schlitz Gusto reintroduced in 2008. 12 oz. bottles, 16 oz. "tallboy" cans, and draft.Original Schlitz in 12 oz. cans and draft:http://beeradvocate.com/beer/profile/106/263

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Taj Mahal Premium Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: United Breweries - UB Group Taj Mahal Premium Lager

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Molson Ice
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Molson Coors Canada Molson Ice

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Lionshead Pilsner
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Lion Brewery, Inc. Lionshead Pilsner
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:This deluxe American Pilsner is brewed with premium American malt, and a perfect touch of American grown hops. The Lionshead family of beers is brewed using our state of the art brew kettle and our century old brewhouse. Lionshead has a crisp, dry mouth feel with a subtle touch of sweet overtones.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Carib Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Carib Brewery Limited Carib Lager

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Birra Peroni
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Birra Peroni Industriale S.p.A. Birra Peroni

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Super Bock
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: UNICER União Cervejeira S.A. Super Bock

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brooklyn Brewery Brooklyn Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:In the late 1800’s Brooklyn was one of the largest brewing centers in the country, home to more than 45 breweries. Lager beer in the “Vienna” style was one of the local favorites. Brooklyn Lager is amber-gold in color and displays a firm malt center supported by a refreshing bitterness and floral hop aroma. Caramel malts show in the finish. The aromatic qualities of the beer are enhanced by “dry-hopping”, the centuries-old practice of steeping the beer with fresh hops as it undergoes a long, cold maturation. The result is a wonderfully flavorful beer, smooth, refreshing and very versatile with food. Dry-hopping is largely a British technique, which we’ve used in a Viennese-style beer to create an American original.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Toasted Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Blue Point Brewing Company Blue Point Toasted Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Our flagship and most popular brew, Toasted Lager is the best American amber Lager you’ll ever taste.To back up that claim, we use six different grains to perfect a balanced flavor of malt and hops, and a special proprietary lager yeast to give Toasted Lager an exceptional, long-lasting smooth finish that’s meant to be enjoyed year-round. Pairs perfectly with fresh seafood...or any food for that matter.28 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Amber
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Abita Brewing Co. Amber
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Amber is a Munich style lager brewed with crystal malt and Perle hops. It has a smooth, malty, slightly caramel flavor and a rich amber color. Abita Amber was the first beer offered by the brewery and continues to be our leading seller.17 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Original Honey Brown Extra Rich Lager (Beer Brewed With Honey)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Brewery: Genesee Brewing Co. / Dundee Brewing Co.
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Genesee Brewing Co. / Dundee Brewing Co. Dundee Original Honey Brown Lager

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Riverwest Stein Beer
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Lakefront Brewery, Inc. Riverwest Stein Beer

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Vinyl
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Magic Hat Brewing Company Vinyl
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Vinyl sails in on her shining wings as the spinning sun returns. She is the season-shifter, bursting from her cocoon to sing the ancient song of vernal yearning and to summon spring's sweet green return... Her metamorphosis becomes our own. Her thirsts are shared by all. Drink in her mysterious elixir as the revolution blooms again...24 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Barking Squirrel Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Hop City Brewing Co. Barking Squirrel Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Barking Squirrel is a 5% ABV amber lager with a distinct rich burnt orange colour and subtle noble hop aroma. Its medium body, pleasant hop bitterness and caramel malt sweetness makes it smooth and drinkable with a slight hop aftertaste.24 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Redbridge
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Anheuser-Busch Redbridge
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Rich, hearty and full-bodied gluten-free lager brewed from sorghum. Redbridge has a distinctively fruity hop aroma, a sweet toasted grain flavor and a well-balanced, moderately hopped finish.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: ZiegenBock Amber
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Anheuser-Busch ZiegenBock Amber
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Brewed in Houston, ZiegenBock is a beer of the South. Only available in Texas, this American-style amber lager, offers notes of roasted grains in the aroma and a sweet, smooth taste with a hop finish. The select imported hops and specialty malts create a taste worthy of a 2006 Great American Beer Festival Bronze Medal.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Grain Belt Nordeast
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: August Schell Brewing Company Grain Belt Nordeast
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Grain Belt Nordeast is an American Amber lager and is the newest member to the Grain Belt Family. It has a light maltiness and hop aroma with a mild bitterness. Smooth taste with an excellent drinkability.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Wisconsin Amber
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Capital Brewery Wisconsin Amber
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:This rich amber lager is the perfect balance of roasted caramel malts and clean hops flavors, making it a perfect choice for any occasion.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Rickard's Red
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Molson Coors Canada Rickard's Red
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Crafted using three different malted barleys, Pacific Northwest hops and the finest Brewer's Caramel, Rickard's Red is exceptionally flavorful with a smooth finish. Enjoy Canada's favorite red beer with its proud pub heritage served cold in a pint glass.Brewed using three different malt barleys, Pacific Northwest hops, and the finest Brewer's Caramel.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Creemore Springs Premium Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Creemore Springs Brewery Limited Creemore Springs Premium Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Lager is made the world over, but Creemore Springs Premium Lager is one of a kind. In all our travels, we've never found another like it. From the start, we've fire-brewed our flagship beer to be unique. It’s always made with the best ingredients and a strict adherence to traditional brewing methods. It’s just different up here, and so is our lager.Our unique lager has a brilliant copper colour, overtones of sweet caramel malt and an appealing, well-balanced floral hop character. It's fire-brewed using the best ingredients and our own spring water.24 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Red Oak Amber
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Red Oak Brewery Red Oak Amber
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:From the brewery: Red Oak Amber is a Munich Urtyp (Old Style) Lager. We begin the brewing process with custom kilned imported Munich Malt. Red Oak is then hopped with Spalt Noble Hops imported from Bavaria, the oldest hop growing region in the world. Before fermentation we add a yeast strain from Weihenstephen, the oldest brewery in the world, founded before 1040 AD. Weeks of aging gives Red Oak the smooth taste it is known for.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Texas Red Amber Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Rahr & Sons Brewing Company Rahr's Red Amber Lager

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Point Classic Amber
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Stevens Point Brewery Point Classic Amber
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Point Classic Amber is a multi-award winning amber-style lager. It boasts a recipe of the highest quality natural ingredients. Roasted caramel malts gives the beer its subtle caramel character and reddish-amber hue. American Tettnanger hops provide a soft sweetness and gentle hop aroma. The result is a distinctive flavorful beer that is remarkably smooth and clean.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Sleeman Honey Brown Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Sleeman Breweries Ltd. Sleeman Honey Brown Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Smooth Sleeman Honey Brown Lager is brewed in the tradition of cottage breweries at the turn of the century. Some might think the tradition is outdated; we just think we got it right the first time.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Winter Skål
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Capital Brewery Winter Skål
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:A full bodied beer with a warm amber hue showing off its rich malt heritage. Mildly bittered featuring a hop presence that compliments and rounds out the malt overtones.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Schell's Dark
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: August Schell Brewing Company Schell's Dark
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:This beer is dark because the barley is roasted longer– a flavorful lager that everyone will enjoy.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Starr Hill Jomo Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Starr Hill Brewery Starr Hill Jomo Lager

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Colorado Native Amber Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: AC Golden Brewing Company Colorado Native Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Colorado Native is a hand crafted lager made with all Colorado ingredients that celebrates the joys of life in Colorado. Hold up a pint of Colorado Native and drink in its amber lager color, brought to life with pale and caramel malts from our famous Moravian 2-row barley. We painstakingly balanced its malt character against select Chinook, Centennial and Cascade hops to create a perfectly balanced, full-flavored beer. A lager yeast fermentation gives Colorado Native a slight fruitiness, complementing a citrus aroma note from a late kettle hop addition. Everything then comes together to deliver a clean taste and dry finish that is very drinkable by itself, or paired with your favorite foods.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Fisherman's Brew
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Cape Ann Brewing Company Fisherman's Brew

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Michelob Honey Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Anheuser-Busch Michelob Honey Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:We brew our Michelob Honey Lager with European aromatic hops and toasted caramel barley malt for a balanced taste.What makes this beer really special, however, is the addition of a touch of natural wildflower honey. It all adds up to a just slightly sweet and uniquely soft beer.21 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Ornery Amber
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Tommyknocker Brewery Ornery Amber

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Pre-Prohibition Style Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Lucky Bucket Brewing Co. Pre-Prohibition Style Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Pre-Prohibition style salutes a time when lagers had greater character and more distinct flavor, when beer wasn't full of the additives found in many of today's mainstream lagers. Lucky Bucket's version has a light, malty flavor that's easy on the palate. Filtered twice, the subtle maltiness nicely balances a floral hop. Dry-hopped with a fresh blend of aromatic West Coast hops, Lucky Bucket Lager is a great session beer with an ABV of 4.5% and 20 IBU's.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Trader Jose's Dark Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Trader Joe's Brewing Company Trader Jose's Dark Lager

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Hudepohl Amber Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Hudepohl-Schoenling Brewing Co. Amber Lager

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Cypress Honey Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Granville Island Brewery Cypress Honey Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Brewed in small batches, our Cypress Honey Lager is lightly hopped, mild and bright, and given a hint of sweetness with pure Fraser Valley honey. It’s like a refreshing blast of Cypress Mountain air.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Rochester Red
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Rochester Mills Beer Co. Rochester Mills Rochester Red
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:This deep red colored English-style ale features a rich, malty flavor profile, medium body, and a low level of hop bitterness for a smooth, great tasting, easy to drink beer that pairs well with a wide range of popular food dishes.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Ruby Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Olde Hickory Brewery Ruby Lager

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Dundee Irish Red Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Brewery: Genesee Brewing Co. / Dundee Brewing Co.
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Genesee Brewing Co. / Dundee Brewing Co. Dundee Irish Red Lager

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Muddy Creek Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: The Defiant Brewing Company Muddy Creek Lager

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Stegmaier Amber Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Lion Brewery, Inc. Stegmaier Amber Lager

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Mojave Red
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Indian Wells Brewing Company Mojave Red
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:A smooth red lager without the bite. We use four types of specialty-malted barley and two types of hops, Hallertau and Cascade, which are added at the exact point in the brewing cycle to create the ideal quality blend of aroma and taste. We use our own proprietary strain of lager yeast, and all of our beers are brewed with our own on-site natural artesian spring water from the historic Indian Wells Spring. Mojave Red is lagered for several weeks, then finished to our exacting standards.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Longboard Island Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Kona Brewing Co. Longboard Island Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Longboard Island Lager is a smooth refreshing lager fermented and aged for five weeks at cold temperatures to yield its exceptionally smooth flavor. A delicate, slightly spicy hop aroma complements the malty body of this beer.18 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Sapporo Premium Beer
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Sapporo Breweries Ltd. Sapporo Premium Beer
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:No adjunct. All barley lager.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Kirin Ichiban
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Kirin Brewery Company, Limited Kirin Ichiban
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Kirin Ichiban is one of the world's most unique premium beers. The Ichiban shibori process uses only the most flavorful portion of the finest ingredients.100% Malt.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Moosehead Breweries Ltd. Alpine Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Sold throughout Canada, The United States, and in select countries around the world, our flagship Moosehead Lager is often regarded as Canada’s premium lager. This golden, refreshing lager offers a fine balance between malt sweetness and hop bitterness. Brewed with 100% Canadian two-row pale malt and Moosehead’s own lager yeast, Moosehead Lager is cool-fermented and cold-aged to impart its award-winning flavour.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Totally Naked
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: New Glarus Brewing Company Totally Naked
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Pure and crisp this is a beer with nothing to hide. Wisconsin two-row barley malt ensures a mellow and smooth body. We imported Noble Hop varieties from Germany and the Czech Republic to ensure a fine mature aroma with no coarse bitterness.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Michelob (Original Lager)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Anheuser-Busch Michelob (Original Lager)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Michelob Original Lager is brewed with pale, kilned two-row barley malt and noble European hops.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Shiner Kosmos Reserve
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Spoetzl Brewery Shiner Kosmos Reserve
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Kosmos Spoetzl knew how to brew great beer. Born in Bavaria, Kosmos mastery of German brewing carried him as far as Egypt before he found his way to the small Texas town of Shiner. Our proud brewery still carries his name and commitment to excellence in brewing. This full-flavored, hop-jacked lager is every bit as unique as the man himself and our way of saluting the brewmaster who started it all.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Shiner Blonde
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Spoetzl Brewery Shiner Blonde

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Molson Golden
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Molson Coors Canada Molson Golden
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:A smooth, mellow beer of moderate sweetness, not too bitter and slightly malty.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Joe's Premium American Pilsner
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Avery Brewing Company Joe's Premium American Pilsner
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:"a contemporary rendition of a classic style. Hopped with purpose, Joe's is beautifully bitter and dry with an abundance of floral, Noble German hops. Uber-sessionable. Utterly American. This is Premium American Pilsner."\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Simpler Times Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Minhas Craft Brewery Simpler Times Lager

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Henry Weinhard's Private Reserve
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Blitz-Weinhard Brewing Co. Henry Weinhard's Private Reserve
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Malts: North American Select Pale MaltHops: Pacific Northwest Cascade HopsCalories/12 oz: 150Carbohydrates (g): 13.0% Alcohol by Vol: 4.80Bitterness Units: 15.0\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Supper Club
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Capital Brewery Supper Club Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Classic Wisconsin lager, sporting an American malt profile. Moderate mouth feel, mild bittering and superb drinkability.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Mexican Logger
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Ska Brewing Co. Mexican Logger
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:The perfect Mexican lager. Light and refreshing, it really hits the spot after a long day of brutal chainsaw work. Brewed with the finest malt, Saaz hops, yeast, water, and love.18 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Craft Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Upslope Brewing Company Upslope Craft Lager

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Orange Blossom Pilsner
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Orange Blossom Pilsner LLC Orange Blossom Pilsner
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Orange Blossom Pilsner or OBP for short is a honey beer made with real, local orange blossom honey. It’s not sweet because the sugar in the honey is fermented, leaving OBP tasting crisp and clean.Brewed with real orange blossom honey. There are 2.3 teaspoons of pure Orange Blossom Honey in every can of OBP. But don’t go thinkin’ you’re getting a mouthful of sweetness, sweetness. The fermentation process gives it a crisp, refreshing flavor sans candy-assery. So crack open a cold one. The bees need the work.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Kenzinger
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Philadelphia Brewing Company Kenzinger
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:This crisp, light-bodied, golden beer is the very definition of refreshment. The combination of premium German pilsner malts and American Noble hops aims to please your taste buds and satisfy your thirst.Get Some!\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Golden
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Abita Brewing Co. Golden
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Golden is a crisp, clean continental lager. Just four ingredients are all it takes: American malt, Mt. Hood hops, German lager yeast and pure Abita Springs water. As the name implies, Abita Golden has a brilliant gold color. Its flavor makes this light lager the perfect match for Louisiana Creole food.11 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Alpine Glacier Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Tommyknocker Brewery Alpine Glacier Lager

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Sleeman Original Draught
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Sleeman Breweries Ltd. Original Draught
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Original Draught combines Sleeman's premium brewing heritage with the freshness and sociability of traditional draught beer. This unpasteurized lager goes down well in the company of friends.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: East Coast Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Cricket Hill Brewing Co. East Coast Lager

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Northwoods Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Jacob Leinenkugel Brewing Company Northwoods Lager

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Dortmunder Gold
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Great Lakes Brewing Company Great Lakes Dortmunder Gold
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Yes, it's known for winning medals worldwide. But locally, it's known as "Dort," our flagship lager that humbly maintains its smooth, balanced (and charmingly unpretentious) ways.A smooth, award-winning (and deceptively unassuming) balance of sweet malt and dry hop flavors.World Beer Championships16-Time Medal Winner Since 1994 (World Champion, Gold, Silver)Great American Beer Festival Awards1990 Gold Medal Winner\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Jinx Proof
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Three Floyds Brewing Co. & Brewpub Jinx Proof
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:This refreshing continental-style pils has a light body combined with a pronounced noble hop aroma and a crisp dry finish. This is the perfect beer for easy, flavorful drinking. Brewed in collaboration with our friends at Jinx Proof tattoo in Washington, D.C.35 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: DAB Original
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Dortmunder Actien Brauerei / DAB DAB Original

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:A traditional German lager brewed with all German grain and yeast.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Imperial Dortmunder
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Great Lakes Brewing Company Great Lakes Imperial Dortmunder

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Yebisu (Premium)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Sapporo Breweries Ltd. Yebisu (Premium)

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Shiner Fröst
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Spoetzl Brewery Shiner Fröst
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:When the weather outside matches the weather in your fridge, you know it's time to enjoy a nice Shiner Frost. This deliciously distinctive seasonal brings a hint of malty sweetness that quickly fades to show a crisp, hoppy character. It's chock-full of frosty goodness to pair perfectly with frosty days.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: DAB Export
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Dortmunder Actien Brauerei / DAB DAB Export

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Gordon Biersch Brewery Restaurant Gordon Biersch Golden Export
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:17 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Minneapolis Town Hall Brewery Dortmunder Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Light and refreshing German style golden lager brewed with classic German malt, Czech Saaz and American Sterling hops.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Reutberger Export Hell
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Klosterbrauerei Reutberg Reutberger Export Hell

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Aktien-Brauerei Kaufbeuren AG Premium Edel (Spezialbier Edel)

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: God Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: the Nils Oscar Company Nils Oscar God Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:God Lager - Good Lager in Swedish. Brewed using the company's own Vienna Malt and four German hop varieties, to of them being Hersbrucker and Tettnanger. 12.9° Plato.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Alpen Stoff
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Bürgerbräu Bad Reichenhall Alpen Stoff

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:A Dortmunder style German Lager with a malty taste and balanced hop content. Appreciated by beer connoisseurs and lovers of domestic styles alike.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Howe Sound Inn & Brewing Company Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Our lager is a version of the Dortmunder style. It is a pale golden lager, that is balanced between sweet malt and dry hop flavours. The lager has a clean, dry finish with some mild fruitiness delivered by the US version of German Hallertau hops and traditional Polish Lublin.18 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Hansa Export
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Dortmunder Actien Brauerei / DAB Hansa Export

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Der HirschBrau/Privatbrauerei Höss Allgäuer Hüttenbier

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Barnburner Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Lagerheads Smokehouse & Brewing Co. Barnburner Lager

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Aktien Original 1857
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Bayreuther Bierbrauerei Aktien Original 1857

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Jägerbier Export Hell
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Hofbrauhaus Freising Jägerbier Natürtrub Export Hell
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Formerly Jägerbier Natürtrub Export HellBrewed in the traditional export style, this speciality has an impressively powerful wort and an intensely malty aroma. A beer with character.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: New Belgium Brewing 1554 Enlightened Black Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:A surprisingly bright taste and a dry, chocolaty finish -- one evocotive of dark brews enjoyed in Belgian taverns 500 years ago. Not a porter, not a stout -- it's 1554.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Guinness Black Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Guinness Ltd. Guinness Black Lager

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Creamy Dark
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Jacob Leinenkugel Brewing Company Leinenkugel's Creamy Dark
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Dark lager with rich, nutty, cocoa flavorOur most award-winning beer, Leinenkugel’s® Creamy Dark is brewed with a special blend of four malts for a rich, nutty cocoa flavor and crisp finish. That makes it one deliciously dark, surprisingly smooth brew. Hey, the name says it all.In 2005 and 2006, Creamy Dark won a Gold medal at the Great American Beer Festival® in the American-style Dark Lager category. In 2002, 2008 and 2013 it won the Silver in the American-style Dark Lager category, and in 2004 received the Bronze in the American-style Dark Lager category.IBU: 20\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Heineken Dark Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Heineken Nederland B.V. Heineken Dark Lager

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Moonlight Brewing Company Death & Taxes Black Beer
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:A very dark yet surprisingly light-bodied Lager beer, crisp and refreshing with no heaviness.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Efes Dark
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Anadolu Efes Brewery Efes Dark

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Beerlao Dark
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Lao Brewery Co. Beerlao Dark
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Beerlao Dark is an award winning beer brewed with the finest ingredients and roasted malt. A full-bodied tasted experience with a golden brown color.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Black Licorice Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Short's Brewing Company Black Licorice Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:"A high gravity American dark lager aged on anise seed, Madagascar bourbon vanilla beans and fresh chocolate mint leaves."\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Bernard Cerne (Dark)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Bernard Family Brewery Bernard Cerne

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Alhambra Negra
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Grupo Cervezas Alhambra, SL Alhambra Negra

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Greenpoint Beerworks / Kelso of Brooklyn Kelso Nut Brown Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:This was our original recipe back in 2006. We wanted to create a nice dark lager, nutty from roasted malts (no nuts!) that is clean and easy drinking. To this day, it's one of our favorites. A mix of German Munich malts and good ol' American Williamette hops. Simply good. That's KelSo beer.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Sociedade Central de Cervejas Bohemia

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Dark 266
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Cameron's Brewing Co. Dark 266
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Cameron’s Dark 266 is a rare breed of beer that was originally brewed as a one-off draught for one of our specialty beer bars. The demand for an encore was so persistent that that we had to bottle it and share it with everyone. Specialty imported hops and dark malts result in a chestnut coloured lager with a wonderful lacy head. Taste the deliciousness of a North American Lager with the complexity of a German Schwarzbier.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Heineken Oud Bruin
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Heineken Nederland B.V. Heineken Oud Bruin
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Doesn't fit to Flanders Oud Bruin beer style category. Fits to Oud Bruin from Netherlands. It means uncomplicated in aroma and taste, low alcohol (usually 2,5% to 3,5% by ABV), semi-dark (amber) to dark lager with dominant sweetness.Micheal Jackson translates Oud Bruin from Netherlands like Old Brown Lager.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Stella Artois
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Stella Artois Stella Artois

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Heineken Lager Beer
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Heineken Nederland B.V. Heineken Lager Beer
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Also known as Heineken PilsenerMade with 3 ingredients, and they're all natural: Barley, Hops and water. Yeast is an important part of the brewing process, but it's not an ingredient! Our natural A-Yeast produces a fruity flavor that is key in making the Heineken you know and love, and is filtered out after fermentation.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Harp Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Guinness Ltd. Harp Lager

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Carlsberg Beer
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Carlsberg Danmark A/S Carlsberg Beer

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Kronenbourg 1664
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brasseries Kronenbourg Kronenbourg 1664
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Kronenbourg 1664 was named after the year the Hatt family, the founders of Kronenbourg. Itis the fifth oldest beer brand in the world that still exists today.Its golden hues and delicate bitterness come from selecting the best hops, the 'Strisselspalt', and the unique know-how of Kronenbourg’s master brewers for over 300 years.Strisselspalt is also named the caviar of hops by the expert master brewers around the world for its low bitterness and aromatic qualities. Its specific soil and culture technique requirements makes it rare and quite unique to the Alsace Region and Kronenbourg recipes.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Birra MorettiBirra Moretti (Heineken)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Birra Moretti (Heineken) Birra Moretti
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Also known as Birra Moretti L'Autentica\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Pure Brewed Organic Lager BeerSamuel Smith Old Brewery (Tadcaster)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Samuel Smith Old Brewery (Tadcaster) Samuel Smith's Pure Brewed Lager Beer
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Brewed with great care using only organic malted barley, organic hops, medium-soft water and a bottom-fermenting yeast; matured at low temperatures to bring out its delicate flavour and soft hop-character finish.The cold maturation period allows the bottom-fermenting yeasts to secondary ferment and improve this lager’s flavour, purity and condition.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Tiger Beer
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Asia Pacific Breweries Ltd. Tiger Beer
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Tiger was born on the hot streets of Singapore – the tropical island city state – a busy trading destination and melting pot of Asian, Indian, and British influences and culture. The ‘tropical lagering’ process brews a bravely creative and unpretentious lager. The result is the intensely refreshing, full-bodied taste of one of the world’s fastest growing premium beers.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Tennent's Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Tennent Caledonian Breweries Tennent's Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:First produced by Hugh Tennent at Wellpark in 1885, our flagship brand has long been established as Scotland's best-selling pint. Tennent's Lager is brewed to meticulously high standards, using exceptional ingredients and characterised by its clean taste and refreshingly crisp finish - best served ice cold. Having maintained its popularity in the face of changing tastes and fashions, Tennent's Lager has also earned widespread acclaim for its staunch commitment to football and music in Scotland.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Jupiler
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brasserie Piedboeuf Jupiler

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: James Boag's Premium Lager

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Damm S. A. Estrella Damm Daura
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Gluten-free (less than 6 ppm), but made using barley malt!\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Original Organic Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Mill Street Brew Pub Mill Street Original Organic Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:This 100% all natural certified Organic Lager is Ontario’s first organic lager, and contains no pesticides, insecticides, herbicides or chemical fertilizers. Brewed with imported malt and hops, this 4.2% European-style pilsner offers a light, crisp and refreshing flavour, with a clean finish.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Pilsener
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Browerij Nacional Balashi Balashi
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:The beer has a deep golden color totally clear and transparent, with a bitterness which is soft to the tongue and nose however with an aroma of fresh hops, a short aftertaste and easy on foam. The combination of all feels fresh and smooth to the mouth when cold, perfect for Aruba's hot climate.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Tuborg Premium Lager (Gold / Guld)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Tuborgs Bryggerier A/S Tuborg Premium Lager (Gold / Guld)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Different strengths are brewed for different markets: 5.0%, 5.3%, 5.5%, 5.8%.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Elephant Beer
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Carlsberg Danmark A/S Elephant Beer
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Carlsberg Elephant is a so-called ’Bock Bier’, brewed for the first time in 1959. The ample use of malt gives Carlsberg Elephant a vinous and rich character with apple, melon, banana, and caramel flavours balanced with a dry bitterness and hints of oak, bark, nuts and pine needles. The colours is pale gold with white foam.The elephants on the beer’s label are inspired by the two pair life-size elephant statues, which form part of the main entrance to the Carlsberg Group’s headquarters in Copenhagen.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Christoffel Nobel
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Bierbrouwerij Sint Christoffel B.V Christoffel Nobel
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:This golden-blond extra strong beer, with added fresh noble hop flowers during maturation of at least 10 weeks, is a unique beer, bottom fermented, unfiltered, and unpasteurized. Nobel refers to the varieties of noble hop species, selected because of their quality, which traditionally are low in bitterness and high in aroma. With 8.7% ABV, an attractive bitterness, a very pleasant hoppy Spalt, Saaz, or Golding aroma, and a slightly sweetish alcoholic aftertaste, we created a beer in a class of its own until the last swig.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Primátor 21% Rytírský (Knight's Lager)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Pivovar Náchod a.s. Primátor 21% Rytírský (Knight's Lager)

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Original Helles
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Bayerische Staatsbrauerei Weihenstephan Weihenstephaner Original
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:A good beer takes its time. The long storage makes our yellow bright lager, “Original”, a flavourful beer enjoyed with fine poured, white foam. With a mild hoppy note and its pleasant fresh spicy taste, it goes very well with salads, poultry, stews or with a hearty snack. Brewed according to our centuries-old brewing tradition on the Weihenstephan hill.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Hofbräu Original
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Hofbräuhaus München Hofbräu Original

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Spaten Münchner Hell (München/Premium Lager)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Spaten-Franziskaner-Bräu Spaten Münchner Hell (Premium Lager)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Marketed as "München" in the UK and "Premium Lager" in the USA.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Two Women Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: New Glarus Brewing Company Two Women Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:The collaboration of two Craft companies both led by women, New Glarus Brewing and Weyermann Malting, is unique. You hold the result “Two Women” a Classic Country Lager brewed with Weyermann’s floor malted Bohemian malt and Hallertau Mittelfrueh hops. A tempting and graceful classic lager found…Only in Wisconsin!\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Hell Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Surly Brewing Company Hell
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Not unlike a Zwickel Bier from Germany, Hell is not filtered and fermented with lager yeast. American hops takes a back seat to the Pils malt sweetness and fresh bread aroma. The color is well... hell (Deutsch for light). It's fiendishly drinkable, and you don't have to sell your soul to get another.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Münchner Hell (Original Munich Lager)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Paulaner Brauerei GmbH & Co. KG Paulaner Original Münchner
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Known as "Munich Lager" or "Original Munich Lager" outside of Germany.Our Original Munich Lager is a true classic with its clear and bright gold sparkling hue, crowned by a pure white head. A beer which always goes down well: mild, elegant malts, with a hint of sweetness and a soft hint of hops in the background. This Munich beer is ideal to accompany spare ribs and spicy dishes. Just try it!\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Victory Helles Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Victory Brewing Company Victory Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Formerly Victory Lager\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Löwenbräu Original
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Löwenbräu AG Löwenbräu Original

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Aecht Schlenkerla Helles Lagerbier
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brauerei Heller-Trum / Schlenkerla Aecht Schlenkerla Helles Lagerbier
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:“Schlenkerla Helles” is brewed with fine Bavarian aroma hops from the area around the city of Nürnberg. It's lagered in century old caves underneath the historic Schlenkerla brewery and maltings. Schlenkerla Helles is boiled in the same copper kettles and bottom fermented by the same yeast as the historic Schlenkerla Smokebeer. Its subtle smokiness without using smoke malt makes “Helles Schlenkerla Lager” a unique representative of the classic lager beer style “Bavarian Helles”.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Hotter Than Helles Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Cigar City Brewing Hotter Than Helles
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Our Munich Lager is a nod to the thirst quenching lagers of Germany. Our Helles has a sweet malt expression that is balanced by floral bitterness from the use of German Hallertaur Mittelfruh hops. A very refreshing beer that will also entice you by its subtle complexity and drinkability.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Hacker-Pschorr Münchner Gold
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Hacker-Pschorr Bräu GmbH Hacker-Pschorr Münchner Gold
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:At the end of the 19th century, Munich took great pleasure in two new beaming additions to the city; the golden Angel of Peace and the first lager beer specialty, Munich Gold. Still brewed by us to this day according to the age-old recipe, this slightly stronger beer is a mature masterpiece and delights with its enticing malty aroma and its slightly stronger original wort.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Gorch Fock
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Three Floyds Brewing Co. & Brewpub Gorch Fock
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:A light golden colored Franconian style Helles Lager. With a slightly sweet malt body, a noble hop profile and a crisp finish this beer is as traditional as we’ll ever get.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Bikini Blonde Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Maui Brewing Co. Bikini Blonde Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:A clean, crisp & refreshing Helles, perfect any time.18 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Longfin Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Ballast Point Brewing Company Longfin Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Our Longfin Lager has become one of the go-to beers with the team at the brewery. A solidly balanced Helles that finishes clean with a hint of hops, it would easily fit in at any German beer garden. But we think it’s perfect for enjoying on the beach, the boat or anywhere else you can put an ice chest full of beer.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Gold Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Stoudts Brewing Co. Stoudt's Gold Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:AKA "McGillin's Genuine Lager" and "Golden Helles Lager"\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Stiegl Goldbräu
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Stieglbrauerei zu Salzburg GmbH Stiegl Goldbräu

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Helles Golden Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Sly Fox Brewing Company Helles Golden Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:German Pils malt / Saaz & Hallertauer M. Hops18 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Estrella Galicia Especial
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Hijos De Rivera, S.A. Estrella Galicia
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Nace en 1972 como la Especial Rivera. Pronto se convirtió en la cerveza más representativa de la Compañía. Elaborada a partir de un mosto específico, en el único centro de producción de Hijos de Rivera, en A Coruña. Los Maestros Cerveceros emplean en su fabricación aproximadamente un mes de trabajo, el 50% del cual se dedica a su guarda en frío. Cerveza dorada y brillante. Excelente balance aromático entre las maltas y lúpulos. En boca ligeramente floral y herbal, de calidez moderada y con una intensa y prolongada sensación lupulada.Born in 1972 as “Especial Rivera”, it would soon become Company’s most representative beer. Brewed by Hijos de Rivera’s Brewmasters in the only Company’s brewery placed in A Coruña. It takes a whole month to be brewed, half of it inside the maturing tanks. Golden color. Clean and bright. Excellent aromatic balance between malts and hops. Lightly floral and herbal flavors, with a moderate warm mouthfeel, and an intense hoppy bitter taste that lingers in the mouth.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Firestone Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Firestone Walker Brewing Co. Firestone Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:We created our first Firestone Lager in 2000, and it proved to be well ahead of its time. Now it's back, new and improved, for those who finally want a better lager.In a craft world dominated by hoppy beers, we have gone back to basics with Firestone Lager. this is our hardest beer to make--and our easiest one to drink. Made in the classic all-malt Munich Helles style, Firestone Lager demands technical perfection from our brewing team, with a transparent canvas that would otherwise reveal the smallest flaw. Gambrinus pilsner malt establishes a crisp, dry base with a soft mouthfeel, while noble German hops provide just a whisper of bitterness. The result is an impossibly smooth and immensely drinkable beer that aims to help redefine American Lager. In the words of Brewmaster Matt Brynildson, "Firestone Lager is made for drinking, not thinking. It's all about enjoying a good, clean beer."\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Penn Gold
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Pennsylvania Brewing Company Penn Gold
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Nationally acclaimed as the best Munich-style beer made in America. Penn Gold is a light-colored, medium bodied lager beer with a delicate hop aroma.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Henninger Premium Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Henninger Bräu AG Henninger Premium Lager

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Gold Leaf Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Devils Backbone Brewing Company Gold Leaf Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Golden Lager.While Gold Leaf is on the lighter side, it takes five weeks to perfect this traditional German-style lager. An homage to the days when beers were made 100% from malted barley, Gold Leaf is brewed with four European malts tempered with a touch of three imported hops. Plus, it’s got subtle bready notes. And since it’s not super hoppy or dark, this beer doesn’t hide any flavor inconsistencies. That just keeps us honest.Malts: Pilsner, Weyermann Pilsner, Vienna, Acidulated MaltHops: Northern Brewer, Saaz, TettnangIBU: 21COLOR: Gold\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Lager House Original Golden Helles
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Christian Moerlein Brewing Company Christian Moerlein Lager House Original Golden Helles

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Munich-Style Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Thomas Hooker Brewing Company Thomas Hooker Munich Style Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:A true Helles style, our lager is golden in color with a pleasant, malty aroma balanced by a rich, smooth flavor. Using only the finest Bavarian malts and finished with Saaz hops, one sip will make you feel like you're in one of Germany's finest beer gardens.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Rahr's Blonde
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Rahr & Sons Brewing Company Rahr's Blonde
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Rahr's Blonde Lager was the first beer to come out of Rahr & Sons Brewing Company. It is a medium-bodied traditional Munich-style Helles Lager that features a rounded maltiness without being too heavy. And like every proud Texan, it has a good head, is pleasant – but not overly sweet. Have some fun with a blonde today!\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Blonde Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Rahr & Sons Brewing Company Blonde Lager

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Andechser Spezial Hell
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Klosterbrauerei Andechs Andechser Spezial Hell
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Its clear gleaming look and firm, fine pored head goes hand in hand with its fresh and pure aroma. Malty nuances are the first impressions.Spezial Hell is pleasantly tangy with a full, round malt body that cannot fail to fascinate. The soft flavour carries a distinctive balance of sweet accents and bitter hoppiness.It concludes on equally soft malty nuances – a classical festival beer in the tradition of old Bavarian brewing.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Helles Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Fordham Brewing Company Fordham Helles Lager
