dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Clean & refreshing, this Bavarian style lager uses four different German grains & three hop varieties to create an intricate flavor profile & a beautiful deep golden color. Helles is brewed in the style of Munich’s everyday drinking beer. Prost!\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Hacker-Pschorr Münchner Hell
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Hacker-Pschorr Bräu GmbH Hacker-Pschorr Münchner Hell

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Hacker-Pschorr Edelhell
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Hacker-Pschorr Bräu GmbH Hacker-Pschorr Edelhell

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Weltenburger Kloster Barock-Hell
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Klosterbrauerei Weltenburg Weltenburger Kloster Barock-Hell

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: 1516 Bavarian Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Okanagan Spring Brewery 1516 Bavarian Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:The decree states that only four ingredients can be used when making beer: barley, hops, yeast and water. The result is a lager with a crisp finish and a rich golden colour.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Helles Belles
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Ninkasi Brewing Company Helles Belles

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Hummin' Bird
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Red Oak Brewery Hummin' Bird
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:From the brewery: Hummin' Bird is a Light Lager or Hell (Helles) similar to those found throughout Bavaria. We use carefully selected Pilsner Malt...then it is delicately hopped with imported Tettnang Noble Hops. Then we add a proprietary lager yeast strain which is not filtered out providing ones daily supply of vitamin B. Hummin' Bird is slow-cold aged for over one month resulting in a lush mouth feel.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Neuschwansteiner
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Der HirschBrau/Privatbrauerei Höss Neuschwansteiner

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Ottakringer Helles
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Ottakringer Brauerei AG Ottakringer Helles

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Hoponius Union
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Jack's Abby Brewing Hoponius Union
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:This lager harmoniously combines lager yeast fermentation and west coast IPA hops. Our India style Pale Lager is like a traditional IPA but with a twist - it’s fermented cold and aged for extended periods. A blend of classic American hops creates a huge tropical fruit and citrusy hop aroma. A dry finish accentuates the pleasant bitterness and hop profile. Hoponius Union uses locally grown dehulled spelt from MA.65 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Kiwi Rising - Double IPL
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Jack's Abby Brewing Kiwi Rising
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:This is an intensely hoppy and strong lager that we refer to as a Double India Pale Lager. Over four pounds of hops per BBL of New Zealand hops (Kiwi Hops) were used in progressively larger hop additions throughout the brewing process. Four kettle hop additions, whole leaf hops in the hop back, and multiple dry hop additions infuse an intense floral and citrusy aroma. No kiwifruit or kiwi birds were used in the production of this beer.

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Fathom IPL
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Ballast Point Brewing Company Fathom India Pale Lager

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Gulo Gulo I.P.L
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Wolverine State Brewing Company Gulo Gulo Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:This ground-breaking style combines the essential ingredients and hopping methods used to create a world-class I.P.A. Then using our expert lagering techniques and house lager yeast we created an instant favorite among the existing and steadily growing number of “hop-heads” and craft “lager-heads” in the beer world today. Gulo Gulo I.P.L. is hopped with Cascade, Chinook, Columbus, Warrior and Pilgrim hops. It is dry-hopped once in the fermenter and then a second time with whole-cone Cascade hops before packaging.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: India Pale Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Pyramid Breweries, Inc. Pale Ale

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Caesar Augustus (Lager/IPA Hybrid)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Williams Brothers Brewing Company Caesar Augustus (Lager/IPA Hybrid)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:This Lager/IPA hybrid is a revolution in refreshment and flavour. All the crisp clean notes of the finest lager but with the discrete bitter finish of a well-balanced IPA. It's not confused about what it wants' to be, it's just the best of both worlds.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Asahi Super Dry
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Asahi Breweries Ltd Asahi Super Dry
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Asahi Super Dry was a direct result of extensive market research which indicated a consumer preference for a more palatable beer with less maltiness, relatively high alcohol content and a light aftertaste, that paired well with the changing Japanese diet. With this insight Asahi used its brewing knowledge to develop a beer with a crisp bite, refreshing taste and clear finish to satisfied this requirement. Code named project FX, Asahi engineered a highly attenuated, highly carbonated pilsner. The later renamed product, Super Dry began sales on March 17th 1987 and gave birth to the dry beer category. The market success spawned similar competitor products and initiated what was known as the “Dry Wars” in Japan and a brief marketing fad for dry beers internationally. However Asahi has stood the test of time and now years later Super Dry continues it legacy as the world’s premier dry beer. Special Yeast - Asahi # 318 is the proprietary ingredient used to give Super Dry its “dryness”. This special strand of yeast produces high attenuation during fermentation in conjunction with the choice grains.Finest Ingredients – Asahi uses select grains and hops sourced worldwide based on strict criteria to maintain flavor consistency and promote sustainability. Barely with high starch content and both noble style bitter and fine aroma hops are key contributors to Super Dry’s smooth taste. ABV 4.9-5.2% (Depends on package type and location)IBU 20SRM 4\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Sapporo Original Draft Beer
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Sapporo Breweries Ltd. Sapporo Original Draft Beer

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Orion Premium Draft Beer
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Orion Beer Co., Ltd. Orion Premium Draft Beer
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:With an even more refreshing taste, a new draft beer was born in the summer of 2015, the same year draft beer celebrated its 55th birthday. The backdrop to the primary color designs, a tradition in draft beer, is a cool, crisp color of champagne gold. The three stars and our logo proudly stand out, and the champagne gold color expresses the fine quality and refreshing sense of beer. The design incorporates the “red sun”, “blue skies”, and “navy blue seas” of Okinawa in the color scheme.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Kirin Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Kirin Brewery Company, Limited Kirin Lager

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Beerlao Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Lao Brewery Co. Beerlao Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Beerlao is brewed from the best local rice and overseas high quality malt giving it a unique taste. Beerlao was launched in 1973 and has become the best selling and leading brand in Laos. It was also awarded gold medals by various international competitions. Beerlao is one of the most successful exports and is currently available in 13 countries worldwide.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Sapporo Draft Beer
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Sapporo Breweries Ltd. Sapporo Draft Beer

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Koshihikari Echigo Beer
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Brewery: Uehara Shuzou Co. Ltd. / Echigo Beer Pub
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Uehara Shuzou Co. Ltd. / Echigo Beer Pub Koshihikari Echigo Beer
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Koshihikari Echigo Beer is a rice lager beer that uses a super-premium short grain rice called Koshihikari. Produced in the ideal rice growing region of Niigata Prefecture, Koshihikari is known to be the best quality rice in Japan. The flavor of this premium beer can only be made with this rice.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Asahi Draft (Jukusen)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Asahi Breweries Ltd Asahi Draft (Jukusen)

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Kirin Classic Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Kirin Brewery Company, Limited Kirin Classic Lager

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Asahi Orion
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Asahi Breweries Ltd Asahi Orion

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Asahi Dry Premium
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Asahi Breweries Ltd Asahi Premium

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Siwo
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Brewery: Hangzhou Xihu Beer Asahi Co. , Ltd.
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Hangzhou Xihu Beer Asahi Co. , Ltd. Siwo

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Sapporo Fuyumonogatari - The Winter's Tale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Sapporo Breweries Ltd. Sapporo Fuyumonogatari - The Winter's Tale

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Organic Beer Shinshu Sansan
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Yo-Ho Brewing Company Organic Beer Shinshu Sansan

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Zhujiang Beer
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Guangzhou Zhujiang Brewery Co. Ltd. Zhujiang Beer

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Kirin Bar Beer
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Kirin Brewery Company, Limited Kirin Bar Beer

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Kirin Premium Draft Beer
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Kirin Brewery Company, Limited Kirin Premium Draft Beer

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Kirin Ichiban Maribana
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Kirin Brewery Company, Limited Kirin Ichiban Maribana

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Kirin Brau Meister
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Kirin Brewery Company, Limited Kirin Brau Meister

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Taiwan Beer Draft Beer Only 18 Days
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Taiwan Tobacco & Liquor Corporation Taiwan Beer

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Hapa Beer
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Great Divide Brewing Company Hapa Beer

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Zwickel
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Urban Chestnut Brewing Company Zwickel
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Our flagship lager, pronounced ‘zv-ick-el’, is an unfiltered, unpasteurized, German classic that finishes as a smooth-drinking, vitamin rich (from the yeast), naturally cloudy bier.Malts: Two-Row & PilsnerHops: Hallertau 20 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Mönchshof Kellerbier
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Kulmbacher Brauerei AG Mönchshof Kellerbier (Kellerbräu)

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Hacker-Pschorr Munchner Kellerbier (Anno 1417)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Hacker-Pschorr Bräu GmbH Hacker-Pschorr Anno 1417

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Buttenheimer Keller Bier
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: St. Georgenbräu Buttenheimer Keller Bier

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Creemore Springs Kellerbier
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Creemore Springs Brewery Limited Creemore Springs Kellerbier
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Kellerbier is an unfiltered, medieval German beer known for its naturally cloudy appearance. Served straight from the brewmaster’s cellar, it was a true honour for special guests visiting a brewery to be offered a taste. These days we happily make it available to one and all. Our Kellerbier is wonderfully aromatic with a hint of citrus and spice imparted by German whole leaf hops. Not too many breweries make Kellerbier, but then, we've always done things a little differently.30 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Summer Teeth
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Columbus Brewing Company Columbus Summer Teeth
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Crisp, golden lagerBeer is meant to be shared and nothing says summer like sharing a crisp, golden lager with friends. This traditional German style lager is brewed with a blend of European malts and hops to create a refreshing, easy-drinking beer.Bronze Medal, Kellerbier or Zwickelbier, Great American Beer Festival® 2010\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Moosbacher Kellerbier
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Private Landbrauerei Scheuerer Moosbacher Kellerbier

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Zeppelin Bier
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brauerei Max Leibinger GmbH Zeppelin Bier
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Our Zeppelin Beer is a so-called "Kellerbier". The name "Kellerbier" has historical roots, dating back to the time when beer was still served directly from the cellar. It is an unfiltered, naturally cloudy beer with a low carbon dioxide content, and it contains all of the natural sediment. As a result, Kellerbier is rich in valuable nutrients such as yeast, protein, minerals and vitamins.Following the old family tradition, Zeppelin beer is brewed in accordance with the German Purity Law of 1516. As with all of our beers, we use the world-famous Tettnanger aromatic hops, high-quality barley grown in upper Swabia and pure water from the uplands of the Alps. We give the dark amber Zeppelin beer seven weeks to quietly mature. The result is a fully flavoured, mildly malty Kellerbier of the highest quality and goodness with an alcohol content of 5.2 percent. It’s a beer which is almost unrivaled in taste, thanks to its extremely delicately spiced, original flavor.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Beersel Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brouwerij Drie Fonteinen Beersel Lager

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Série Signature Kellerbier
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Les Trois Mousquetaires Série Signature Kellerbier
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Unfiltered golden lager inspired by the Kellerbiers, or "cellar beers", found in the northern Bavarian region of Franconia. This Kellerbier marries a rich malt flavor with an herbal hop character.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Arcobräu Zwickl Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Arcobräu Gräfliches Brauhaus Arcobräu Zwickl Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Also known as Arcobräu Zwicklbier\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Paracelsus Zwickl
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Stieglbrauerei zu Salzburg GmbH Paracelsus Zwickl

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Kubelbier
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Brewery: Brauerei Hofstetten Krammer GmbH & Co. KG
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brauerei Hofstetten Krammer GmbH & Co. KG Kubelbier

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Fürsten Zwickel
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Fürst Wallerstein Brauhaus Fürsten Zwickel

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Mönchsambacher Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brauerei Zehendner GmbH Mönchsambacher Lager

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Bud Light
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Anheuser-Busch Bud Light
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Bud Light is brewed using a blend of premium aroma hop varieties, both American-grown and imported, and a combination of barley malts and rice. Its superior drinkability and refreshing flavor makes it the world’s favorite light beer.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Miller Lite
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Miller Brewing Co. Miller Lite

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Bud Light Lime
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Anheuser-Busch Bud Light Lime
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Bud Light Lime is brewed using a combination of barley malts, non-malted cereal grains, subtle hopping and natural lime flavor.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Michelob Ultra
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Anheuser-Busch Michelob Ultra
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Brewed using the finest barley malt, select grains, all-imported hops and a pure-cultured yeast strain. The special choice of grains combined with the extended mashing process produces a smooth, refreshing beer with fewer carbohydrates.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Sam Adams LightBoston Beer Company (Samuel Adams)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Boston Beer Company (Samuel Adams) Sam Adams Light

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Natural Light
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Anheuser-Busch Natural Light
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Natural Light is brewed with a blend of premium American and imported hops, and a combination of malt and corn. Its longer brewing process produces a lighter body, fewer calories and an easy-drinking character.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Corona Light
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Grupo Modelo S.A. de C.V. Corona Light

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Keystone LightCoors Brewing Company (Molson-Coors)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Coors Brewing Company Keystone Light
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Brewed since 1989, Keystone Light is a triple-filtered American-style light lager. Or as we like to say, it’s the smoothest of smooth. Keystone Light has a clean, crisp taste and smooth finish, making it the beer of choice for those who want to grab life by the ‘Stones. So, what are you waiting for? Stop reading and get grabbing. Looking for something bolder? Pick up Keystone Ice.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Bud Light Platinum
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Anheuser-Busch Bud Light Platinum

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Tsingtao Beer
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Tsingtao Brewery Co., Ltd. Five Star All Malt Beer

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Busch Light
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Anheuser-Busch Busch Light
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Busch and Busch Light are both brewed with a blend of premium American-grown and imported hops and a combination of malt and corn to provide a pleasant balanced flavor. Additionally, Busch Light undergoes a longer brewing process that produces a lighter body and fewer calories.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Amstel Light
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Amstel Brouwerij B. V. Amstel Light
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:ABV in the USA is 4.1%\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Budweiser Select
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Anheuser-Busch Budweiser Select
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Brewed with two-row and roasted caramel malt for a rich color, and a blend of hand-selected premium American and Bavarian hops for balance and flavor. Budweiser Select spends approximately twice as long as regular beers in the brewhouse, which results in lower carbohydrate and calorie content after fermentation.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Heineken Premium Light Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Heineken Nederland B.V. Heineken Premium Light Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:3.3% ABV in some states in the USA\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Michelob Light
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Anheuser-Busch Michelob Light
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Michelob Light is brewed with pale, kilned two-row barley malt and noble European hops.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Miller High Life Light
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Miller Brewing Co. Miller High Life Light

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Milwaukee's Best Light
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Miller Brewing Co. Milwaukee's Best Light

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Labatt Blue Light
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Labatt Brewing Company Ltd. Labatt Blue Light
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Labatt Blue Light was introduced in 1983 as a lower-alcohol, lower-calorie version of Canada’s most popular brand. Blue Light uses specially selected North American aromatic hops and the same strain of lager yeast as the one used to produce Labatt Blue. The result is a crisp, clean and delicately balanced beer, with a slight sweetness and citrus-like hop character.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Budweiser Select 55
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Anheuser-Busch Budweiser Select 55
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Select 55 is brewed with specialty malts and a blend of imported and domestic hopping. Select 55 has a light golden color and offers aroma notes of toasted malt and subtle hopping.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Michelob Ultra Amber
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Anheuser-Busch Michelob Ultra Amber
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Brewed using the finest two-row and dark-roasted specialty malts for color, and a blend of imported and premium United States-grown noble aroma hops for balance and flavor.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Michelob Golden Draft Light
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Anheuser-Busch Michelob Golden Draft Light
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Michelob Golden Draft Light is a premium cold filtered light lager beer that is brewed using a blend of two-row and six-row barley malt, premium American hops and rice to create its smooth, refreshing taste. It also undergoes a longer brewing process to produce a lighter taste, and fewer calories.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Tecate Light
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Brewery: Cervecería Cuauhtémoc Moctezuma, S.A. de C.V.
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Cervecería Cuauhtémoc Moctezuma, S.A. de C.V. Tecate Light
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:A bold choice for those who prefer a light beer, with clear golden color, defined malt character and smooth bitterness. The fermenting process and the hops used impart a light citrus flavor and aroma, making for a truly unique light beer.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Michelob Ultra Lime & Prickly Pear Cactus
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Anheuser-Busch Michelob Ultra Lime Cactus
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Michelob ULTRA Fruit Lime Cactus has an exotic fruity aroma with a clean citrus finish.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Sankaty Light
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Cisco Brewers Inc. Sankaty Light

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Miller Genuine Draft 64
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Miller Brewing Co. Miller Genuine Draft Light 64

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Shiner Light Blonde
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Spoetzl Brewery Shiner Light Blonde
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:The folks at "the little brewery" in Shiner, TX (pop. 2,069), are proud of this refreshing, 99-calorie addition to the Spoetzl family of beers. It's brewed with the same handcrafted, small-batch pride you expect from Shiner, delivering a unique light beer. So when you're looking for a smooth, easy-drinking brew, pick up an ice-cold Shiner Light Blonde. It's light done right. PROSIT!\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Genny Light
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Brewery: Genesee Brewing Co. / Dundee Brewing Co.
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Genesee Brewing Co. / Dundee Brewing Co. Genny Light

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: I.C. Light
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Pittsburgh Brewing Co. I.C. Light

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Medalla Light
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Compañía Cervecera de Puerto Rico Medalla Light

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Old Milwaukee Light
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Pabst Brewing Company Old Milwaukee Light

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Beck's Premier Light
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brauerei Beck & Co. Beck's Premier Light

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Kirin Light Beer
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Kirin Brewery Company, Limited Kirin Light Beer

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Michelob Ultra Fruit Pomegranate Raspberry
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Anheuser-Busch Michelob Ultra Pomegranate Raspberry
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Michelob ULTRA Fruit Pomegranate Raspberry delivers a unique berry aroma that finishes with a hint of pomegranate.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Shiner Light
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Spoetzl Brewery Shiner Light

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Light
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Abita Brewing Co. Light
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Light is uniquely hand-crafted using 100% all natural ingredients: malted barley, the finest hops, German lager yeast and pristine Abita Springs water. The result is the smoothest, most flavorful light beer you will ever taste.10 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Red Stripe Light
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Desnoes & Geddes Limited Red Stripe Light

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Molson Canadian Light
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Molson Coors Canada Molson Canadian Light
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Canadian Light maintains the same character as Molson Canadian, which is slowly fermented to provide a light beer.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Beck's Light
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brauerei Beck & Co. Beck's Light
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Not to be confused with Beck's Premier Light.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Pabst Blue Ribbon Light
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Pabst Brewing Company Pabst Blue Ribbon Light

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Presidente Light
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Cerveceria Nacional Dominicana Presidente Light

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Mickey's
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Miller Brewing Co. Mickey's

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Steel Reserve 211 (High Gravity)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Steel Brewing Company Steel Reserve 211 (High Gravity)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Brewed in different abv. versions: 6.0%, 7.3%, 8.1%, & reports of a 8.9%. In a few counties/states, a 3.2% version is also available.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Olde English 800
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Miller Brewing Co. Olde English 800
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:There are two variants, a 5.9% ABV and a 7.5% ABV version.Olde English 800 is one of America's leading malt liquor brands. Commonly referred to as "OE800," it offers smooth, rich taste with a slightly fruity aroma that is a favorite among malt liquor drinkers. OE wears the crown because it is the King of Malt Liquors.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Colt 45 Malt Liquor
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Pabst Brewing Company Colt 45 Malt Liquor
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Introduced in 1963 by the Baltimore, Maryland-based National Brewing Company, Colt 45 was named in honor of running back Jerry Hill, who was #45 on the 1963 Baltimore Colts football team. Through high-profile partnerships with actor Billy Dee Williams and comedian Redd Foxx — who both appeared in radio, print, and TV advertisements – Colt 45 established itself as the premier malt liquor beverage by the early 1970s.It was also during this time that the iconic slogan, “Works Every Time,” became synonymous with the brand. The Williams relationship lasted for nearly four decades, until he passed the torch to music mogul, Snoop Dogg in 2010.With Snoop at the helm, we’ve entered an exciting new Colt 45 era.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Molson XXX
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Molson Coors Canada Molson XXX
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Brewed to be our strongest tasting lager using extra malt and hops in the brewhouse and fermented to give a smooth slightly sweet well balanced beer at 7.3% alcohol.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: King Cobra Premium Malt Liquor
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Anheuser-Busch King Cobra Premium Malt Liquor
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:King Cobra is an American malt liquor with a robust and full-bodied, smooth, clean taste.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Natty Daddy (8%)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Anheuser-Busch Natty Daddy

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Hurricane Malt Liquor
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Anheuser-Busch Hurricane
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Hurricane Malt Liquor is full-bodied and robust and offers a smooth, slightly fruity and slightly sweet taste.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Magnum
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Miller Brewing Co. Magnum

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: St. Ides High Gravity Malt Liquor
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Saint Ides Brewing Company St. Ides High Gravity Malt Liquor
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:St. Ides Premium Malt Liquor was renamed to St. Ides High Gravity Malt Liquor.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Olde English 800 High Gravity
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Miller Brewing Co. Olde English 800 High Gravity

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Dog Bite High Gravity Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Brewery: Genesee Brewing Co. / Dundee Brewing Co.
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Genesee Brewing Co. / Dundee Brewing Co. Dog Bite High Gravity Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:A lager with a hard bite shouldn't be hard to drink. That's why dog bite is brewed with select hops and malted barley for a well-balanced, mellow taste that'll have high-gravity drinkers coming back again and again.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Haywards 5000 Super Premium Beer
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Shaw Wallace & Company Ltd. Haywards 5000 Super Premium Beer

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Schlitz High Gravity V.S.L Very Smooth LagerJOS. Schlitz Brewing Co. (Pabst)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: JOS. Schlitz Brewing Co. (Pabst) Schlitz High Gravity V.S.L Very Smooth Lager

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Labatt Max Ice
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Labatt Brewing Company Ltd. Labatt Ice
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Formerly Labatt Maximum Ice\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Country Club Malt Liquor
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Pabst Brewing Company Country Club Malt Liquor

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Steel Reserve 211 Triple Export
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Steel Brewing Company Steel Reserve 211 Triple Export

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Colt 45 High Gravity Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Pabst Brewing Company Colt 45 High Gravity Lager

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Old Monk 10000
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Mohan Breweries & Distilleries Ltd Old Monk 10000

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Camo Black Ice
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Camo Brewing Company Camo Black Ice

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Region Riot
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Three Floyds Brewing Co. & Brewpub Region Riot
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:This delightful malt liquor was brewed to celebrate the equally delightful "Region" that we brew in. Brewed with a portion of Indiana corn, this is what a malt liquor should be.10 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Colt 45 Double Malt Liquor
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Pabst Brewing Company Colt 45 Double Malt Liquor

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Crazy Stallion
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: City Brewing Company, LLC Crazy Stallion

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Camo Silver Ice
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Camo Brewing Company Camo Silver ICE

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Evil Eye
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Melanie Brewing Company Evil Eye

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Camo High Gravity Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Camo Brewing Company Camo High Gravity Lager

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Stack 101 High Gravity Smooth Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: United Brands Company Stack High Gravity Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Stack 101 High Gravity Smooth Lager is brewed with the finest extra malted barley and select hops for a bold yet exceptionally smooth taste. Stack 101 Smooth Lager is the first introductory brew style by Stack Brewing Company. Stack Beer is brewed with superior ingredients for big, bold and smooth flavor.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Molson Brador
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Molson Coors Canada Brador
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:This malt liquor is a robust, full bodied beer with a distinctive aroma and a sweet, smooth taste.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Earthquake High Gravity Lager (10%)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: City Brewing Company, LLC Earthquake High Gravity Lager

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Schlitz Red Bull X. L. Xtra Long Malt LiquorJOS. Schlitz Brewing Co. (Pabst)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: JOS. Schlitz Brewing Co. (Pabst) Schlitz Red Bull X. L. Xtra Long Malt Liquor

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Axe Head Malt Liquor
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Minhas Craft Brewery Axe Head Malt Liquor

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Clear Creek Ice
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Minhas Craft Brewery Clear Creek Ice

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Camo Black Extra
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Camo Brewing Company Camo Black Extra

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Negra Modelo
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Grupo Modelo S.A. de C.V. Negra Modelo
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Negra Modelo, better known as "the cream of the beer", is a Munich-type beer with 5.3º of alcohol that offers a balanced flavor and a delicate aroma of dark malt, caramel and hops.Today it occupies the first place in sales among dark beers in Mexico. This beer is accompanied by a bright deep amber color, which is adorned with abundant, white and compact foam.Negra Modelo was introduced in Mexico in 1925 as the dark beer called Modelo, to begin its great tradition. In 2014 it changed its image to a more sophisticated bottle but with the same content. Ingredients - Water, barley malt, non-malted cereals, hops\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Warsteiner Premium Dunkel
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Warsteiner Brauerei Warsteiner Premium Dunkel
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:A rich dark amber beer with full-flavored, smooth taste nicely accented with satisfying notes of roasted malt and subtle bottom fermenting yeast tones.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Hofbräu Dunkel
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Hofbräuhaus München Hofbräu Dunkel
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Dark specialties were being made in Bavaria long before the advent of pale specialties. Over the years, Hofbrau Dunkel lost nothing of its popularity. With the rich flavour, it remains a refreshing beverage, suitable for all occasions. A traditional Munich deliciousness.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Beck's Dark
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brauerei Beck & Co. Beck's Dark

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Harpoon Dark
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Harpoon Brewery Barrel Aged Munich Dark
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:A blend of specialty malts gives this beer a velvety mouthfeel with roasted notes and a hint of chocolate, balanced by a subtle hop aroma. Hard to describe but easy to drink, Harpoon Dark is rich in character and light on the palate.35 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Spaten Dunkel
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Spaten-Franziskaner-Bräu Spaten Dunkel

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Eastside Dark
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Lakefront Brewery, Inc. Eastside Dark

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Penn Dark
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Pennsylvania Brewing Company Penn Dark
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Munich and various roasted malts give it a very malty, rich flavor with a hint of burnt flavor. 100% imported Hallertau hops, moderate bitterness and aroma.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Dark Cloud
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Mother Earth Brewing Dark Cloud

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Weltenburger Kloster Barock Dunkel
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Klosterbrauerei Weltenburg Weltenburger Kloster Barock Dunkel

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Asahi Black (Kuronama)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Asahi Breweries Ltd Asahi Black (Kuronama)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:"a premium dark ale."\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Flensburger Dunkel
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Brewery: Flensburger Brauerei GmbH Und Co. KG
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Flensburger Brauerei GmbH Und Co. KG Flensburger Dunkel

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Pious Monk Dunkel
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Church Brew Works Pious Monk Dunkel

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Garten Bräu Munich Dark
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Capital Brewery Capital Dark
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Styled after a traditional European Dunkel lager with dark caramel malt flavor with smooth dry finish. One of our Original Brau beers, Capital Dark is our most award winning beer and still remains an all-time favorite.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: König Ludwig Dunkel
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Brewery: Kaltenberg International / König Ludwig International GmbH & Co.KG
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Kaltenberg International / König Ludwig International GmbH & Co.KG König Ludwig Dunkel

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Barbarossa Double Dark Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Christian Moerlein Brewing Company Barbarossa Double Dark Lager

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Red Tape Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Jack's Abby Brewing Red Tape Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Navigating the labyrinth of brewery licensing and state regulations isn't easy. When we finally got the green light, we also got inspired with the perfect name for our pilot brew. Red Tape Lager has a full malty flavor typical of Bavarian dark lagers. It's brewed with 100% Dark Munich Malt. Additions of Glacier hops for bittering and noble German hops for aroma strike a balance between American and European flavors.25 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Schadenfreude
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Surly Brewing Company Schadenfreude

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Ettaler Kloster Dunkel
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Klosterbrauerei Ettal / Ettaler Klosterbetriebe GmbH Ettaler Kloster Dunkel
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Dark beers are the traditional Bavarian beers. Common, mild malt flavor is all in addition to the rich, red-black color. Our dark a pronounced freshness in the on trunk is added, then goes up in a soft roundness. The monastery of darkness is a beer for connoisseurs. It is suitable all year round, but especially it fits to the traditional Bavarian cuisine.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Holzar-Bier
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Der HirschBrau/Privatbrauerei Höss Holzar-Bier

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Dunkel Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Sly Fox Brewing Company Dunkel Lager

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Winter Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Sprecher Brewing Company Winter Brew
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Few things accompany long winter nights as well as this Munich-style Dunkel Bock. Savor our brewmaster’s enticing blend of dark roasted and sweet caramel malts. Capped by an oatmeal-colored head, the rich flavors of this Bavarian-style lager make it the perfect selection for long winter nights.Randy's Notes: “Winter brew is a Munich style dunkel bock of much repute among those who know us best. It has won the World Beer Cup, Gold and Bronze medals.”Degrees Plato (Initial Gravity): 14.5PWeeks Aged: 8Year First Brewed: 1986Serving Temperature: 50°Malts: Black Patent, Caramel, Chocolate, PaleHops: Cascade, Chinook, Mt. Hood, Tettnanger\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Franconia Dunkel
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Franconia Brewing Company Franconia Dunkel

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Saranac Lake Effect Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Matt Brewing Company Saranac Lake Effect Lager

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Hirter Morchl
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brauerei Hirt GmbH Hirter Morchl

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Dunkel
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: The Olde Mecklenburg Brewery Dunkel Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Winter has met its match in the form of this classic Munich-style dark lager. Smooth, with caramel and roasted malt flavors courtesy of Dark Munich and Carafa malts, Dunkel offers an easy-drinking finish to even the coldest, darkest days of winter. It may be freezing outside, but the conditions inside this bottle of Dunkel are always absolutely perfect. Enjoy it all winter long.

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Gösser Dark BeerBrauerei Göss (Brau Union)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brauerei Göss (Brau Union) Gösser Dark Beer

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Organic Pinkus Jubilate
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brauerei Pinkus Mueller Organic Pinkus Jubilate

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: León
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Grupo Modelo S.A. de C.V. León

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Hacker-Pschorr Münchner Dunkel
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Hacker-Pschorr Bräu GmbH Hacker-Pschorr Münchner Dunkel

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Saranac Long John Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Matt Brewing Company Saranac Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Long John Lager is a robust easygoing Dunkel Lager. The caramelized malty sweetness is nicely balanced by a toasted nuttiness that'll surely light up your taste buds on a winter's day.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Fearless Youth
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Grimm Brothers Brewhouse Fearless Youth
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Once upon a time in the land of Bavaria, a darkness fell upon the beer in the town of Munich. But have no fear – this darkness was born of a toasted malt that produces a bready chocolate flavor. This full-bodied brew is now known as a Munich Dunkel. Our dunkel is made with just enough hoppy bitterness to scare away any overt sweetness. Then it is carefully lagered to produce a cleaness that no one will shudder at.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Original Münchner Dunkel
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Paulaner Brauerei GmbH & Co. KG Paulaner Original Münchner Dunkel

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Andechser Export Dunkel
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Klosterbrauerei Andechs Andechser Dunkel
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Characterised by its firm and fine pored head. Even before the first sip, the beer epicure will register the soft aromas of dark malt carrying caramel and cocoa accents with a nuance of smokiness.Andechser Export Dunkel is pleasantly tangy with a full, round, malty body. The nuance of quality plain chocolate marries well with the soft bitterness of the smoky undertone.It concludes on a mild, harmonious note.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Tradition
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Bayerische Staatsbrauerei Weihenstephan Weihenstephaner Tradition

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Negra
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Mahou S.A. Negra

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Samuel Adams OctoberfestBoston Beer Company (Samuel Adams)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Boston Beer Company (Samuel Adams) Samuel Adams Octoberfest
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:In 1810, the Oktoberfest tradition was born when Munich celebrated the Crown Prince's wedding with a special beer and 16-day party. Our version of this classic style blends hearty malts for a deep, smooth flavor of caramel, creating a brew that's perfect for the season, or whatever you're celebrating. Smooth with a roasty sweetness, and light hop character.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Oktoberfest Märzen
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Paulaner Brauerei GmbH & Co. KG Paulaner Oktoberfest-Märzen
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:An amber beer style that was developed to celebrate the original Oktoberfest over 200 years ago. This full bodied beer with its rich malt flavor, dark toffee note and underlying fruitiness has a masterful hop balance.The secrets behind Paulaner's excellent taste and unwavering quality are locally sourced ingredients and a tradition of craftsmanship that has been passed down and perfected by our dedicated brewmasters since 1634. Here in Munich, Paulaner beer is not a mere product -- It's a matter of the heart.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Spaten Oktoberfestbier Ur-Märzen
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Spaten-Franziskaner-Bräu Spaten Oktoberfestbier Ur-Märzen

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Oktoberfest
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Great Lakes Brewing Company Great Lakes Oktoberfest
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Prost! Our take on this classic German style is a celebration of maltiness— packed with rustic, autumnal flavors to put a little more oomph into your oom-pah-pah.Über smooth with vibrant malt flavors and a festive flourish of noble hops (lederhosen not included).World Beer Championships4-Time Medal Winner (Gold, Silver)\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Festbier
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Victory Brewing Company Festbier
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Friendship and camaraderie: the two keys to any festive event. And then there’s the beer. It should be full-bodied, yet infinitely smooth. Seductively malty, with a kiss of the hops for balance. This is our Festbier. Painstakingly crafted from German malts, decoction brewed for full flavor and carefully aged for depth of character. Subtly sweet with a delicate malt nose, our Festbier gains its impressive body from our use of all imported German malts and decoction brewing process. Gather with your friends for a festive moment of Victory!\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Hacker-Pschorr Oktoberfest Märzen
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Hacker-Pschorr Bräu GmbH Hacker-Pschorr Oktoberfest-Märzen
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Forbidden as it was to brew in summer, a stronger beer – the Märzen – was brewed earlier in March. It would finally be served at the Oktoberfest, under the “Heaven of Bavaria”. We have returned once again to the age-old recipe and recreated that gloriously smooth, honey-coloured piece of history from times gone by. And all is brewed with due reverence to the Bavarian Purity Law of 1516.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Festbier
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Bayerische Staatsbrauerei Weihenstephan Weihenstephaner Festbier
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:A full rich bodied, hoppy, seasonal lager. Especially brewed for the Festbier season. This beer truly represents the Bavarian way of celebrating. Deep gold color, great mouth-feel and lots of flavor. Prost!\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Oktoberfest
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Jacob Leinenkugel Brewing Company Leinenkugel's Oktoberfest
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Rich and toasty Märzen-style beerOur proud German heritage shines through in our homage to arguably the world’s greatest festival. A traditional Märzen-style beer, our Leinenkugel’s® Oktoberfest has a toasted malt flavor and subtle, spicy hop notes that make it perfect for celebrating fall in true German fashion. So let your steins runneth over.IBU: 20\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Hofbräu Oktoberfestbier
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Hofbräuhaus München Hofbräu Oktoberfestbier
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:The Oktoberfest originated in 1810 in Munich, Germany, as a wedding celebration for the Crown Prince Ludwig of Bavaria. This product was created especially for this event and is brewed usually for the Oktoberfest, now the largest beer festival in the world. Hofbräu München (HB) is one of a selected group of breweries granted the privileges of supplying the Oktoberfest with their products. Using the highest quality ingredients, HB's Oktoberfest Specialty has its own distinctive and unique taste.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: The Kaiser
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Avery Brewing Company The Kaiser
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:The Kaiser once said, “Give me a woman who loves beer and I will conquer the world.” If the Kaiser and his significant other had tipped this bottle, we’d all be “sprechenden Deutsch!” We took all that is good in a traditional Oktoberfest – gorgeous, deep copper sheen, massive malty backbone and spicy, floral, pungent Noble hops – then intensified each into this, an Imperial Oktoberfest.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Oktoberfest
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Left Hand Brewing Company Left Hand Oktoberfest
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:This is no festivus for the restivus, on the contrary, we start brewing in the spring and it takes a full two months to reach lagered perfection. Biscuity, malty goodness dominates upfront while the noble pedigree hops lend a properly spicy, dry finish.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Octoberfest Beer
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Harpoon Brewery Catamount Octoberfest Beer
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:The character and complexity of Harpoon Octoberfest comes from the malt and hops. When looking at a freshly poured Harpoon Octoberfest, you will notice the garnet-red color with a firm, creamy head. The beer’s color is from a blend of Munich, chocolate, and pale malt. The thick head results in part from wheat malt added to the grist. The hop aroma of this beer is not overpowering but it is present. Tettnang hops add a subtle spice nose that blends with the malt character. This beer is full-bodied, smooth, and malty. Willamettehops are used to provide a gentle bitterness and to balance any residual sweetness present from the malt. The finish is soft and malty with a mild bitterness.30 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Shiner Märzen-Style Oktoberfest
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Spoetzl Brewery Shiner Oktoberfest
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Just like the world's largest beer festival, our little brewrey has Bavarian roots and a long tradition of honoring tradition. Which is why we made this märzen-style with German-grown Hallertau tradition. If that doesn't make you polka dance for joy, we don't know what will.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Staghorn Octoberfest
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: New Glarus Brewing Company Staghorn Octoberfest
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:100% Natural - great Midwestern and European Malts, the world's most expensive hops, fresh yeast from Germany, and clear Wisconsin water make our Staghorn Octoberfest "Wisconsin's Real Red." You will find absolutely no additives, preservatives or artificial agents of any kind in this bier. Staghorn is brewed using the time honored methods to release the smooth flavor of our roasted malts.This Octoberfest combines a smooth amber body with a clean, crisp finish. Be sure to hold this one up to the light of any harvest moon and enjoy "Wisconsin's Real Red."\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Hoss Oktoberfest Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Great Divide Brewing Company Hoss
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:HOSS is based on the Märzen lagers of Germany. Rich, layered malt notes, with hints of cherry and dark fruits, dominate, while the unique addition of rye imparts a slightly earthy, spicy character. Hoss finishes crisp and dry, and its brilliant red-orange color is a toast to the sunsets that make the perfect backdrop for this beer.AWARDS:2009 Great American Beer Festival, Bronze Medal, Rye Beer2010 World Beer Cup, Bronze Medal, Rye2010 Australian International Beer Awards, Gold Medal & Overall Champion Lager\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Dogtoberfest
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Flying Dog Brewery Dogtoberfest
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:There is sauerkraut in my lederhosen. I repeat: There is sauerkraut in my lederhosen!Malts: Vienna, MunichHops: Perle, HallertauYeast: Lager30 IBUBrewed with 100% imported German ingredients.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Oktoberfest
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Yuengling Brewery Oktoberfest
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Yuengling® is proud to offer our Oktoberfest as an homage to our German Heritage. Copper in color, this medium bodied beer is the perfect blend of roasted malts with just the right amount of hops to capture a true representation of the style.26 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Beck's Oktoberfest
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brauerei Beck & Co. Beck's Oktoberfest

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Märzen
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Gordon Biersch Brewery Restaurant Gordon Biersch Märzen
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Our most popular beer, Märzen (Maert-zen) is a smooth, mildly sweet, auburn colored lager. This beer originated from Bavaria, where it was brewed in March (Marz in German) and stored in caves to be enjoyed during warmer weather. At the end of September, any remaining kegs of Märzen were consumed during the two week celebration which became famous as Oktoberfest. We hope you'll enjoy it year round.18 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Munsterfest
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Three Floyds Brewing Co. & Brewpub Munsterfest

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Oaktoberfest
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Firestone Walker Brewing Co. Oaktoberfest
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Oaktoberfest is a true German Marzen bier brewed with premium imported Pilsner and Vienna malts and is spiced with Bavarian hop from the mother land. Light Amber in color, soft malty profile, full bodied lager beer. Fermented with the famous Bavarian Augustiner Lager yeast from Munich. We utilized German Hallertauer Traditions for both bittering and aroma additions adding a rich, noble hop presence to this beer.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Warsteiner Premium Oktoberfest
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Warsteiner Brauerei Warsteiner Premium Oktoberfest
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Celebrate German heritage with this authentic, German Specialty Beer.A truly German import brewed according to the German Purity Law, as are all Warsteiner beers, in limited quantities especially for Oktoberfest celebrations. This special edition has a well-balanced, mild and smooth taste with a uniquely soft, hoppy aftertaste and 5.9% alcohol. So bring a bit of Germany with you to your next Oktoberfest celebration and bring a Warsteiner Oktoberfest Special Edition.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Bob's '47 Oktoberfest
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Boulevard Brewing Co. Bob's '47 Oktoberfest
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Our fall seasonal beer, Bob’s ’47 Oktoberfest is a medium-bodied, dark amber brew with a malty flavor and well-balanced hop character. With this Munich-style lager we salute our friend Bob Werkowitch, Master Brewer and graduate of the U.S. Brewer’s Academy, 1947.27 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Oktoberfest
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Summit Brewing Company Summit Oktoberfest Marzen
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Brewed in the classic Märzen style with Northern Brewer hops from Germany. Rich, toffee malt flavors up front with a clean hop finish as crisp as the autumn air. Unfortunately, like the fall colors, this seasonal beer is gone before you know it.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Oktoberfest Bier (Oktoberfest Wiesn)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Paulaner Brauerei GmbH & Co. KG Paulaner Wiesn Bier
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Labeled as Oktoberfest Bier in Germany and Oktoberfest Wiesn in the US.This full bodied golden Oktoberfest lager is the only beer served in Paulaner Oktoberfest tents today. It is the pinnacle of German brewing: wonderfully mellow with a balanced harmonious taste. It has a strong note of malt and the pleasant fragrance of hops.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Copper Legend Octoberfest
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Jack's Abby Brewing Copper Legend
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Ancient timelines talk of dark days, plagued by hardships and Kingdom demands. When hope was all but lost, a legend emerged. A plumber. With copper pipes and an uncanny wit, he battled fierce foes and saw to the brewery’s opening. Our Octoberfest is malty, smooth and exceedingly drinkable. It is perfect to celebrate and honor today’s legends. We use locally grown wheat from MA, Munich malt and noble hops.22 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Atom Smasher
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Two Brothers Brewing Company Atom Smasher
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Named with our atom-colliding scientific neighbor in mind, this Oktoberfest-style lager is oak-aged, providing added layers of depth to the signature flavors of roasted malt, caramel and toffee found in marzen style beers. But a beer this exceptional shouldn’t be limited to just Oktoberfest. Raise a glass, stein or boot to Augustfest, Septemberfest and beyond!\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Oktoberfest
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Saint Arnold Brewing Company Saint Arnold Oktoberfest
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:A full bodied, malty, slightly sweet beer celebrating the Autumn harvest. This rich beer has a round malt flavor and an above average alcohol content perfect for a cool fall evening. Malt: Three different blended Munich-style malts Hops: Czech Saaz and Tettnanger.Original Gravity: 1.061 (15.5° Plato)Color: Red-Amber Bitterness: 24 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Oktober Fest
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Stoudts Brewing Co. Oktober Fest

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Oktoberfest
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Blue Point Brewing Company Blue Point Oktoberfest
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Originally brewed a couple hundred years ago to celebrate the betrothal of the Crown Prince of Bavaria, we’re helping keep the tradition alive by brewing Oktoberfest every fall for our most royal/loyal followers.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: OktoberFish
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Flying Fish Brewing Company OktoberFish

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Oktoberfest
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Sly Fox Brewing Company Oktoberfest
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Ein prosit! This seasonal gem is best enjoyed under a humongous tent while you and thousands of your closest friends sing enthusiastically. Or anywhere, really. It’s all about the gemütlichkeit, baby!\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Fest Märzen Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Narragansett Brewing Co. Narragansett Fest
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Based on the "Bavarian" style beer that Narragansett produced in the '60s and '70s, this elegant Oktoberfest style Marzen is brewed with the highest quality German malts and hops. Weyermann's Munich malt creates a rich bready and toasty base, while the noble Tettnang hops add a crisp, but subtle and dry spiced finish. King Grambrinus would be proud!\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Schell's Oktoberfest
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: August Schell Brewing Company Oktoberfest
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:The Oktoberfest or Marzen (March) type of beer was originally brewed in March, and laid down in caves before the summer weather rendered brewing impossible. Stocks would be drawn upon heavily during the summer, and exhausted by October.In Germany, this tradition has come to be associated with one specific style, Oktoberfest Bier. In keeping with true German tradition, August Schell Oktoberfest beer is brewed just once a year. Brewed with the perfect balance of Pale, Munich, and Cara Pils malt with Liberty and Perle hops to create a rich, smooth taste.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Oktoberfest
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Capital Brewery Oktoberfest
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:2014 GABF Gold Medal (German-Style Marzen)The mother of all seasonal beers has a fiery amber hue with rich malty overtones that dominate the flavor.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Oktoberfest Lager Beer
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Lakefront Brewery, Inc. Oktoberfest Lager Beer

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Barktoberfest
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Thirsty Dog Brewing Company Barktoberfest

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Dundee Oktoberfest
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Brewery: Genesee Brewing Co. / Dundee Brewing Co.
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Genesee Brewing Co. / Dundee Brewing Co. Dundee Oktoberfest

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Oktoberfest
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Sprecher Brewing Company Oktoberfest
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Gold Medal Winner in the German-style/Oktoberfest category at the 2004 Great American Beer Festival (GABF).\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Aecht Schlenkerla Rauchbier Märzen
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brauerei Heller-Trum / Schlenkerla Aecht Schlenkerla Rauchbier Märzen
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:ABV may vary slightly year to year.Aecht Original Schlenkerla Maerzen Smokebeer, considered the classic example in its category, has been brewed for centuries in the baroque town of Bamberg in Franconia (Bavaria/Germany). Following the most ancient malting traditions, all its select barley malts are kilned over a fire of beech wood logs at the Schlenkerla maltings. Brewed in classic copper vessels and matured for months in 14th century cellars, Aecht Schlenkerla Rauchbier is a truly unique smoky beer experience.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Aecht Schlenkerla Rauchbier Urbock
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brauerei Heller-Trum / Schlenkerla Aecht Schlenkerla Rauchbier Urbock
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:First tapping every first Thursday of October. A bitter Smokebock for the strongbeer-season (October through December). Matured for weeks in the deep rock-cellar and tapped freshly from the oakwood cask.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Smoke & Dagger
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Jack's Abby Brewing Smoke & Dagger
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Cloaked in mystery, this dark black beer skirts the line between a schwarzbier and smoked porter. The use of a small percentage of traditional Beechwood smoked malt adds complexity and balances the liberal use of chocolate malt. Notes of roasted grains, beechwood smoke,and coffee accompany a full bodied-and sweet chocolately malt character. Smoke & Dagger uses locally grown unmalted barley from MA.25 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Aecht Schlenkerla Eiche
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brauerei Heller-Trum / Schlenkerla Aecht Schlenkerla Eiche
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Facts on Aecht Schlenkerla Eiche:While for the classic Aecht Schlenkerla Rauchbier traditionally beech has been — and still is — used, the malt for Schlenkerla Oak Smoke is kilned with oak wood. The resulting Schlenkerla Oak Smokemalt has a smoother and more multilayered smoky note than the intensely aromatic beech smokemalt. The hence complex smokiness in this double bock is paired with the multifaceted bitterness of finest Hallertau aroma hops. With 8% alcohol and amber color it matures for months in the 14th century brewery cellars into a special treat for smoke beer lovers. As one of the last traditionally made smoked beers, Aecht Schlenkerla Rauchbier is a passenger in the „Ark of Taste” by SlowFood®.Brewed with 100% Schlenkerla Oak Smoke Malt40 IBU from finest aroma hopsBernstein (amber) color\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Aecht Schlenkerla Rauchbier Weizen
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brauerei Heller-Trum / Schlenkerla Aecht Schlenkerla Rauchbier Weizen
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Schlenkerla Smokebeer Wheat is an ale with light smoky aroma. As Bavarian wheat beers, it is being brewed with a mixture of both barley malt and wheat malt. The portion of barley malt is hereby a classic Schlenkerla smokemalt, while the wheat malt remains unsmoked. Served unfiltered with its natural haziness, Schlenkerla Wheat reaches its full aroma through bottle fermentation with fine top fermenting yeast.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Aecht Schlenkerla Fastenbier (Lentbeer)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brauerei Heller-Trum / Schlenkerla Aecht Schlenkerla Fastenbier
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:The Original Schlenkerla Lentbeer is an unfiltered smokebeer, brewed according to the Bavarian Purity Law of 1516. Bottom-fermenting yeast gives the reddish brown lentbeer a natural cloudiness. Its smokey aroma is already noticeable in the smell, combined with a fine hoppy note. In the drink the fullbodied, highly drinkable lentbeer shows its strong malty flavour, rounded up with the smokey taste and a light bitterness. Due to the nourishing yeast, the Original Schlenkerla Lentbeer has the "Brotzeit already included" (German word for afternoon snack).\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Rauch Ür Bock
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Caldera Brewing Company Rauch Ür Bock

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Eisenbahn Rauchbier
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Cervejaria Sudbrack Ltda Eisenbahn Rauchbier

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Ludwig's Revenge
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Roy Pitz Brewing Company Ludwig's Revenge

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Göller Rauchbier
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brauerei Göller Zur Alten Freyung Göller Rauchbier

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Saranac Rauchbier Smoked Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Matt Brewing Company Saranac Rauchbier

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Rauchbier
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Southern Star Brewing Company Rauchbier

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Bonfire Of The Valkyries
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Brewery: New Albanian Brewing Company - Pizzeria and Public House
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: New Albanian Brewing Company - Pizzeria and Public House Bonfire Of The Valkyries
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:20 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Rauchbier
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Sly Fox Brewing Company Rauchbier

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Aecht Schlenkerla Kräusen
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brauerei Heller-Trum / Schlenkerla Aecht Schlenkerla Krausen
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Also known as Helles Märzen Kräusen Blend.In the world of German brewing, Kräusen refers to the intense proliferation of bubbles and foam formed during fermentation of a young or “green” beer. And Aufkräusen (literally to kräusen it up), refers to a historic brewing technique in which some green beer is added to a fully-matured lager. This is a very old and very typically German tradition, and today even English-speaking brewers refer to this technique as krausening. Krausening brings the vibrant freshness of young beer to the more refined, austere flavors of a fully-matured lager.Aecht Schlenkerla Kräusen starts out as normal Helles Schlenkerla Lager and matures for months in the old rock cellars underneath the brewery. Just before filling it is blended using the before mentioned "Kräusen" technique with classic Märzen Rauchbier. The result is an unfiltered, bottom fermented and amber color Märzen Lager hybrid with a vibrant and slightly smoky flavor.IBU: 30\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Smoky MaryNew Orleans Lager & Ale Brewing Company (NOLA)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Brewery: New Orleans Lager & Ale Brewing Company (NOLA)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: New Orleans Lager & Ale Brewing Company (NOLA) Smoky Mary
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:We’ve stepped out of the boxcar and created our own take on a German Rauchbier (Smoke beer). Instead of using Beechwood, we have selected the indigenous pecan wood and smoked a munich malt in our homemade malt smoker.The Smoky Mary has a subtle smoked flavor that pairs well with barbeque and just about anything off of the grill. She clocks in at 5.3% alcohol by volume, which makes it a nice sessionable smoked beer.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Smoke Out
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Starr Hill Brewery Smoke Out

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Deep Purple Rauchbier
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Brewery: Marshall Wharf Brewing Company / Three Tides Restaurant
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Marshall Wharf Brewing Company / Three Tides Restaurant Deep Purple
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Smoke on the water! This Bamberg inspired smoked ale is bacon in a glass. Very polarizing beer, you either like the style and taste, or you never want to drink it again. Unique, brewed using German malts and Noble hops.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Smokey The Beer
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Brewery: Zero Gravity Craft Brewery / American Flatbread
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Zero Gravity Craft Brewery / American Flatbread Smokey The Beer
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:This style is brewed using a majority of beechwood- smoked malt (smoked in Bamberg). The smoke character is well integrated and balanced by a hint of roasted malt and German hops.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Rauchbier
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Iron Hill Brewery & Restaurant Rauchbier
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Bamburg-style German amber lager made with beech wood smoked malt giving this beer a distinct smoked character in both aroma and flavor.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Weiherer Rauch
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brauerei Gasthof Kundmüller Weiherer Rauch

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Hallerndorfer Raiterla Rauchbier
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brauerei Gasthof Rittmayer Hallerndorfer Raiterla Rauchbier

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Rauchbock
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Appalachian Brewing Company Rauchbock

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Bamberg Rauchbier
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Micro Cervejaria Bamberg Bamberg Rauchbier

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Bishop Bob's Holy Smoke
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Dragonmead Microbrewery Dragonmead Bishop Bob's Holy Smoke
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:This beer is a Bamberg-style Rauchbier. The town of Bamberg in Germany originated the style of smoked beers. These beers are made with a dose of smoked barley. Our recipe relies on a light bock recipe for its base and contains about 20% imported smoked barley. The noble German hops are used to balance the taste into a unique beer drinking experience.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Samuel Adams Black LagerBoston Beer Company (Samuel Adams)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Boston Beer Company (Samuel Adams) Samuel Adams Black Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Literally translated as “black beer,” schwarzbiers are one of the oldest and most traditional German beer styles. Dating back to around 800 BC, this dark, roasty beer combines caramel and chocolate malt notes with a bright flavor and crisp finish.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Schwarzbier
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Köstritzer Schwarzbierbrauerei GmbH & Co. Köstritzer Schwarzbier
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:First-class, refined ingredients, the unique recipe and a passionate brewing tradition that you can taste: Köstritzer Schwarzbier stands for pleasure in perfection. It is the unique roasting of malting barley to the finest roasted malt, which gives Köstritzer Schwarzbier its unique malt aroma and unmatched character.The market leader in the segment of bottom-fermented, dark beers presents itself in an elegant, bubbly manner, and promises a special kind of beer experience at first sight with its strong color and pronounced foam crown.Taste the difference and enjoy Germany's most popular black beer.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Shiner Bohemian Black Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Spoetzl Brewery Bohemian Black Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Germans call it a schwarzbier (black beer), but Shiner fans know this one as Shiner 97. Unusually smooth for a dark beer, our Bohemian black lager is brewed with roasted malts and Czech Saaz and Styrian hops. All else pales in comparison.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Baba Black Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Uinta Brewing Company Baba Black Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Robust and smooth, this full-flavored lager is exceptionally drinkable and pitch black in color.32 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Saranac Black Forest Black Beer
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Matt Brewing Company Saranac Black Forest
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:A Bavarian Black beer with distinctive caramel malt sweetness and a rich creamy trademark head. Flavorful, yet smooth…very drinkable!\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Howl
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Magic Hat Brewing Company Howl
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Born of dark and cold and snow in the marrow of the northeast's longest night, Howl comes in on wailing winds with winter-weary eyes burning holes in sunless shadows. In its darkened depths our inner voids are warmed.32 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Black Bavarian
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Sprecher Brewing Company Black Bavarian
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Bronze Medal Winner in the European Darks category at the 1988 Great American Beer Festival (GABF).\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Mönchshof Schwarzbier
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Kulmbacher Brauerei AG Mönchshof Schwarzbier

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Ugly Pug Black Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Rahr & Sons Brewing Company Ugly Pug Black Lager

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Krušovice Cerne
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Královský Pivovar Krušovice a.s. Krušovice Cerne

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: McSorley's Irish Black Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Pabst Brewing Company McSorley's Irish Black Lager

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Schwarzbier
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: The Duck-Rabbit Craft Brewery Duck-Rabbit Schwarzbier
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:The Duck-Rabbit Schwarzbier is a refreshing summer lager (sometimes referred to as a "black pils"). In true Duck-Rabbit fashion, we've made ours extra schwarzy! It's very dark and quite roasty. Lots of Hallertau hops give this brew an authentic German character.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Dark Helmet
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Westbrook Brewing Co. Dark Helmet
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Dark Helmet is a German-style black lager (or Schwarzbier) brewed with 10% malted rye. Chocolate and Carafa malts give this beer its dark color and ludicrously smooth, roasty flavor. May the Schwarz be with you!25 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Krombacher Dark
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Krombacher Brauerei Krombacher Dark

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Einbecker Schwarzbier
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Einbecker Brauhaus AG Einbecker Schwarzbier

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: S1nist0r Black Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: 10 Barrel Brewing Co. S1nist0r Black Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:We craft our S1NIST0R Black Ale using a special German dehusked black malt that is free of astringency, giving the beer a rich black color without the traditional dark beer characteristics. You will notice subtle hints of chocolate with an easy drinking balance on the back end. In the glass the dark color may look intimidating to some, but don't let this beer fool you. Our unique combination of malts creates a very light body and smooth finish.28 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Schwarzbier
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Gordon Biersch Brewery Restaurant Gordon Biersch Schwarzbier
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:21 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Black Thunder
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Austin Beerworks Black Thunder

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: BREWtality - Espresso Black Bier
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Midnight Sun Brewing Co. BREWtality - Espresso Black Bier
