dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Three Floyds Brewing Co. & Brewpub Pride & Joy Mild Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:A smooth, medium-bodied session beer with bright citrus hop aroma and finish. Our interpretation of an American Mild Ale.42 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Pale 31 California Pale Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Firestone Walker Brewing Co. Pale 31
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Pale 31 is brewed to exemplify the classic California pale ale style, hence the name honoring the Golden State as the 31st state to be admitted to the Union. Beautiful ?oral and citrus hop aromas greet the nose with undertones of lightly toasted malt. Crisp pale and crystal malts o?er a hint of sweetness. Subtle hop bitterness o?ers a refreshing ?nish. Perfect for a sunny day at the beach or barbecue with friends, Pale 31 represents the bold yet approachable spirit that embodies our state.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: New DogTown Pale Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Lagunitas Brewing Company New Dogtown Pale Ale

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Fresh Hop Pale Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Great Divide Brewing Company Fresh Hop Pale Ale

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Phin & Matt's Extraordinary Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Southern Tier Brewing Company Phin & Matt's Extraordinary Ale

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Grunion Pale Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Ballast Point Brewing Company Pale Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Our Grunion Pale Ale wasn’t born on a beach, but in a backyard. Originating from an employee-only home brew contest, this award-winning hoppy pale ale is named after the tiny local fish known for late night frolics on shore. A pair of new hop varieties lend strong yet balanced summer melon aromas and herbal flavors, while a soft caramel malt sweetness holds it all together.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Saranac American Pale Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Matt Brewing Company Saranac Pale Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Officially American: previously an English pale ale, we’ve converted this beer over to an American-style Pale Ale.We’ve dialed UP the hop profile, adding more focus to American style hops, like Cascade, Chinook, Citra, and Willamette.Hop Infusion: every drop of beer is exposed to our hop slurry as the beer passes from fermentation to aging, resulting in a more brilliant, cleaner hop character.Saranac Pale Ale’s foundation was built on the tried and true English varieties, Golding and Fuggles. We brighten Pale Ale with the three “C”s; a strong focus on Citra, complimented by Cascade, and Chinook. We then bridge the old world with the new with the two most distinctive hops Bramling Cross and Jester, both descendants of English and North American varieties.Malts: Crystal, Two-RowHops: Bramling Cross, Jester, Citra, Cascade, ChinookOriginal Gravity: 13.5° PlatoIBU: 32\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Boat Beer
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Carton Brewing Company Boat
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Boat Beer is designed to be complex enough to merit drinking a few without being crippled by alcohol. Kolsch yeast and German malts are combined to be crisp and refreshing, while a generous amount of American hops have been added to keep it remarkable. Expect it to dance out of the glass with a whack of grapefruit and open into a crisp, stony tangle of white and yellow fruit with pine and moss notes. An IPA for everyday drinking, drink boat beer when you are thirsty from softball, fishing, or explaining why your team is best.Session AleABV: 4.2% | IBU: 35 | SRM: 3.5http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NYLRXRjCq2c

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Goose Green Line Pale Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Goose Island Beer Co. Green Line Pale Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Honey color, bright American hop aroma, citrus flavor, light crisp body.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: St. Lupulin
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Odell Brewing Company St. Lupulin
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:A mystical legend echoes in our brew house—that of St. Lupulin (loop-you-lin), the archetypal hophead. He devoted endless summers to endless rows of hops, tending to the flowers and the beloved resin within—lupulin. Extraordinary oils in this yellow resin provide this dry-hopped extra pale ale with an undeniably pleasing floral aroma and clean, crisp finish. One sip of this seasonal summer ale and you too will believe.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Orval Trappist Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brasserie d'Orval S.A. Orval Trappist Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Orval beer is a high fermentation beer. The ageing process adds a fruity note, which strikes a subtle balance between the beer’s full-bodied yet complex flavour and bitterness.The beer was first brewed in 1931 and owes its unparalleled taste to the quality of the water, the hops and the yeast used. The brewery has selected very aromatic and unique hop varieties, which hark back to the first brewmaster of Orval, who hailed from Bavaria. The beer’s aromas are very pronounced while maintaining the right level of bitterness thanks to the English method of dry hopping.The various stages of fermentation – combined fermentation with the original yeast and with wild yeast, followed by fermentation in the bottle – mean the beer must age for some time and requires numerous quality controls.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Rare Vos Amber Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brewery Ommegang Rare Vos (Amber Ale)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Rare Vos Amber Ale is styled after the smooth, drinkable beers popular in Belgian cafés. It pours a light copper hue, contrasting beautifully with a big, creamy white head. The nose offers orange blossoms and slight spice.On the palate, the caramel maltiness shines strongly but with little sweetness. The profile leans toward dry fruity (yeast-affiliated), slightly fruity/hoppy with a beguiling spiciness. This complex, medium-bodied beer has a smooth mid-palate and moderate dry finish.Well-balanced in all elements, it's a mild, mellow brew.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Redemption
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Russian River Brewing Company Redemption

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Palm / Palm Speciale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brouwerij Palm NV Palm / Palm Speciale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:ABV 5.1 to 5.4%\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Karma Belgian Style Pale Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Avery Brewing Company Karma

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Luciérnaga, The Firefly
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Jolly Pumpkin Artisan Ales Luciérnaga, The Firefly

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Raftman
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Unibroue Raftman
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Unibroue introduced Raftman to the Quebec market in March 1995. This coral-hued beer has a unique taste that combines the smooth character of smoked malt whisky with the flavours of fine yeast.IBU: 15.5\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Verboten
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Weyerbacher Brewing Co. Verboten
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Formerly Zotten, but taken off the market in Feb 2010 in a copyright infringement agreement between Weyerbacher and Bierbrouwerij De Halve Maan.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Stone Soup
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: New Glarus Brewing Company Stone Soup

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Liquid Gold
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Captain Lawrence Brewing Co. Liquid Gold
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Light golden in color, but packed with flavor. This Belgo-American Ale is bursting with the spicy aromas and flavors created by the unique imported yeast strain. Fermented at higher temperatures, this beer throws off notes of clove, banana and citrus fruit. Light in color but big on flavor.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: De Koninck APA (Antwaarpse Pale Ale)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brouwerij De Koninck NV De Koninck

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Brugse Zot
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Brewery: Brouwerij Straffe Hendrik / Huisbrouwerij De Halve Maan
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brouwerij Straffe Hendrik / Huisbrouwerij De Halve Maan Brugse Zot

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Taras Boulba
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brasserie de la Senne Taras Boulba
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Light blonde with 4.5% alc., generously hopped with the finest aromatic hops, giving it a very refreshing character and a scent reminiscent of citrus.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Dorée
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Bières de Chimay S.A. Dorée
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:The menu at the abbey's cafe (Auberge de Poteaupré) lists this beer as "Speciale De Poteaupré."\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: The Citizen
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: DC Brau Brewing Co. The Citizen
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:The Citizen Belgian Ale is inspired by the timeless Tripel style ales of Belgium. Using a traditional high gravity "Abbey" yeast strain that encourages the production of highly palatable ethanol notes supported by Aromatic and "The Citizen" also exhibits the noble hop spiciness that is common to most Belgian Ales. Reigning in at 7.0% ABV this is the Brau's strongest offering in our flagship portfolio. Become a Citizen of the world, one sip at a time!\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Belgian Style Amber Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Dark Horse Brewing Company Dark Horse Amber Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Formerly known as Dark Horse Amber AleWhile the malt and hops give this beer an amazing copper color, medium body, and a smooth mouth feel; it’s the yeast that sets this one apart from other amber ales. Inspired by Belgium's beer, women and mussels we thought it would be cool to give our Amber a little Belgian touch. We accomplish this by using an "almost Belgian" yeast strain producing similar esters and flavors commonly found in more traditional Belgian beers.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Singel
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Hardywood Park Craft Brewery Singel
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Unfiltered, unpasteurized, and uninhibited, Hardywood Singel is a feat in balance. Sunshine golden with a fluffy head and a veil of Belgian ale yeast, Singel’s tropical fruit esters complement its spicy hop aromatics. Delicate in body, Singel’s mellow, dry finish culminates a truly ethereal experience. Hardywood Singel's stylistic inspiration originates with the Trappist brewers of western Europe, who are often celebrated for their gloriously complex dubbels and tripels, and whose devotion to crafting heavenly libations is second to none. Unknown to many, some of the Trappist brewers also brew a milder ale for daily consumption within the walls of the monastery. Hardywood Singel is our interpretation of this style.30 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Saint's Devotion
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: The Lost Abbey Saints' Devotion
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:A Brett-finished version of our Devotion Ale. Saint’s Devotion is bottle conditioned with brettanomyces to deepen the layers of flavor on our most hop-forward beer from Lost Abbey lineup.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Bruegel Amber Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brouwerij Van Steenberge N.V. Bruegel Amber Ale

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Cuvée Des Trolls
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brasserie Dubuisson Frères sprl Cuvée Des Trolls
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:he Cuvée des Trolls was created in 2000 in the tanks of microbrewery Le Brasse-Temps, which was established in Louvain-la-Neuve by Brasserie Dubuisson.It is an unfiltered blonde beer with a natural cloud. The beer is produced using only yeast, malt, hops, sugar and water and has an alcohol volume of 7%.Thanks to the addition of dried orange peel during the boiling process, the beer has very pleasant fruity aromas that are in beautiful harmony with its delicate, fully rounded taste.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Hommel Bier
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Perennial Artisan Ales Hommel Bier
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:A dry-hopped Belgian Pale Ale which defies tradition by combining Chinook and Columbus hops in the kettle, a dry hop addition of Simcoe, Cascade, and Mt. Hood Hops, American malts, and a Belgian yeast strain. The result is a beer with earthy and spicy tones from the yeast and a slight orange note contributed by the hops.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Fatty Boombalatty
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Furthermore Beer Fatty Boombalatty

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Lil' Devil
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: AleSmith Brewing Company AleSmith Lil' Devil

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Hell's Belle
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Big Boss Brewing Hell's Belle

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Saranac Belgian Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Matt Brewing Company Saranac Belgian Ale

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Witkap Pater Singel / Stimulo
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brouwerij Slaghmuylder Witkap Pater Singel / Stimulo

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Zinnebir
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brasserie de la Senne Zinnebir

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: It Takes A Lot Of Great Beer To Make Great Wine
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Russian River Brewing Company It Takes A Lot Of Great Beer To Make Great Wine
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:There is an old familiar saying in the wine business: "It takes a lot of great beer to make great wine!" Winemakers, cellar workers, and grape pickers alike rarely (if ever) reach for a nice big glass of red wine in the middle of harvest. Wine is quite delicious, but not very refreshing on a hot summer day. The beverage of choice during harvest is BEER! Ice-cold, refreshing, and thirst-quenching BEER! The beer in this bottle is a toast to our winemaking friends who work around the clock during harvest to make world-class wine right here in our own back yard! Cheers!Brewed with a blend of California ale yeast and saison yeast.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: It's Alright!
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Mikkeller ApS It's Alright!
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Brewed at De Proef Brouwerij, Lochristi-Hijfte, Belgium.Ingredients: Water, malt (pale and caramunich), light rock sugar, hops (hallertauer og styrian goldings), ale yeast and brettanomyces.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: White Birch Belgian Style Pale Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: White Birch Brewing White Birch Belgian Style Pale Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:This straw colored beer greets with an aroma of noble hops, pears and Belgian esters. The flavor follows nicely with a moderately spicy hop and Belgian yeast effect buoyed by a soft malt body. The finish is crisp and dry. We enjoy this beer with spicy foods, grilled steaks, grilled chicken and mandarin salad. Where you take it is only limited by your imagination. For those interested in styles, the name of this beer comes from the color over trying to meet any particular style.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Fleur De Lehigh
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Philadelphia Brewing Company Fleur De Lehigh

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Bière Du Boucanier Red
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brouwerij Van Steenberge N.V. Bière Du Boucanier Red

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Levon
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Omnipollo Leon
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Formerly LeonLeon is whole-cone hopped and fermented dry using a champagne yeast. The yeast and the hops (Amarillo & Simcoe) in combination with a variety of malts.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: DBA (Double Barrel Ale)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Firestone Walker Brewing Co. Double Barrel Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:DBA—a.k.a. Double Barrel Ale—is the trailblazing ?agship beer that started it all for us back in 1996. Partially fermented in our patented Firestone Union oak-­-barrel brewing system, DBA quickly took the Central Coast by storm and set the pace for future beers to come. Today, DBA is regarded as a California classic, and stands as an iconic tribute to traditional cask-­-fermented English ales. Pale malts create a smooth middle with ribbons of caramel, English to?ee and toasted oak.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Bass Pale Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Bass Brewers Limited Bass Pale Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:A classic pale ale. This version of Bass for the North American market at 5% to comply with USA ale regulations.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Old Speckled Hen
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Greene King / Morland Brewery Old Speckled Hen
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Old Speckled Hen is popular with ale drinkers up and down the country and renowned for its unique character and consistent quality.The great British ale was first brewed to commemorate the 50th anniversary of the MG car factory in Abingdon, Oxfordshire. It was even named after the factory’s old run around car which was often parked outside the paint shop. Spattered in paint, the car became known as the “Owld Speckl’d Un”. The eagle-eyed might even see the resemblance between MG’s logo and the Old Speckled Hen label!More than 35 years on, the great premium ale continues to be a finely balanced beer with a distinctive rich, malty taste and fruity aroma.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Samuel Adams Boston Ale (Stock Ale)Boston Beer Company (Samuel Adams)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Boston Beer Company (Samuel Adams) Samuel Adams Boston Ale (Stock Ale)

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Summer Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brooklyn Brewery Brooklyn Summer Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Summer in Brooklyn is all about following your impulses, winging it from beaches and barbecues to stoops and rooftops. Brooklyn Summer Ale is a refreshing, flavorful pale ale made to accompany you on all your warm weather adventures. 18 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Organic Pale AleSamuel Smith Old Brewery (Tadcaster)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Samuel Smith Old Brewery (Tadcaster) Samuel Smith's Old Brewery Pale Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Known as Organic Best Ale in the UK.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Smuttynose Shoals Pale Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Smuttynose Brewing Company Smuttynose Shoals Pale Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Our interpretation of a classic English beer style is copper-colored, medium-bodied and pleasantly hopped. Its flavor is delightfully complex: tangy fruit at the start, with an assertive hop crispness and a long malty palate that one well-known beer writer has compared to the flavor of freshly-baked bread.52 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Denver Pale Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Great Divide Brewing Company Denver Pale Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:This American pale ale opens with big citrus and pine notes, then smooths out with a faint toasted malt character and dry, slightly bitter finish. Denver Pale Ale is your go-to beer from city to trail and back again, no matter what the time or season.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Whale's Tale Pale Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Cisco Brewers Inc. Whale's Tale Pale Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Whale's Tale Pale Ale is an English style pale ale named in honor of Nantucket's whaling history. Wonderfully balanced with Maris Otter malt, hints of crystal malt and generously hopped with East Kent Goldings, it has a rich honey color and fruity hop aroma.40 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Extra Pale Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Summit Brewing Company Summit Extra Pale Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:A pioneer in craft beer (hey, that rhymes), Summit Extra Pale Ale has been gracing the pint glasses of serious beer lovers since 1986. Bronze color. Gold medal-winning flavor. Featuring caramel, biscuity malts balanced by an earthy hop bite and juicy citrus.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Monty Python's Holy Grail Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Black Sheep Brewery PLC Monty Python's Holy Grail Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Draught 4.0% / Bottle 4.7%Another fine addition to the Black Sheep flock of premium bottle ales. This ale was specially commissioned to commemorate the 30th anniversary of Monty Python in 1999.Ten years later on the 40th anniversary Holy Grail is still going strong. With more hops than a killer rabbit, it's a full-flavoured golden ale with a distinctively fruity flavour followed by the Black Sheep signature dry finish.We brew Holy Grail with Maris Otter malt, an old and expensive variety that is renowned for the taste and the quality of the beer it produces.A mixture of old English Hop varieties including a touch of WGV hops gives Holy Grail its lovely fruity nose.We use a touch of wheat which helps deliver the lovely creamy head and lacing down the glass - just what you would expect from a proper Yorkshire beer!\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Samuel Adams Pale AleBoston Beer Company (Samuel Adams)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Boston Beer Company (Samuel Adams) Samuel Adams Pale Ale

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Lord Chesterfield Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Yuengling Brewery Lord Chesterfield Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:One of our heritage beers, Yuengling Lord Chesterfield Ale has as much rich heritage as it does flavor and appeal. Crafted in a unique two-stage European brewing style for enhanced bitterness, it utilizes both conventional kettle hopping and dry hopping after fermentation resulting in a dry sharp finish. Its distinct robust flavor is derived from a delicate combination of sweet maltiness and lingering herbal bitterness.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: 5 Barrel Pale Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Odell Brewing Company 5 Barrel Pale Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:The distinctive hop character of our 5 Barrel Pale Ale is due to the extraction of essential oils from select hops. We treat 5 Barrel Pale Ale to an infusion of fresh whole hop flowers in the Hop Back and the Fermentor, as well as four hop additions during the kettle boil. We like how this gives the beer a fresh, lively flavor and aroma.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Sparkling Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Coopers Brewery Limited Coopers Sparkling Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Little has changed since Thomas Cooper brewed his first batch of Sparkling Ale in 1862. It's still naturally conditioned in the bottle with our unique strain of Coopers yeast. To enjoy the complete Sparkling experience, roll the bottle to mix in the yeast sediment before pouring. No additives. No preservatives.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Original Pale Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Coopers Brewery Limited Coopers Original Pale Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Our 'Pale' is naturally conditioned in the bottle or keg. This traditional Coopers brewing method produces the trademark sediment that gives our ales a distinctive, fine cloudy appearance.This beer is a deep golden colour and pours with a generous level of foam. To unlock its full flavour potential, make sure to roll before pouring. No additives. No preservatives.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Tetley's English Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Carlsberg-Tetley Brewing Ltd Tetley's English Ale

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Scarecrow Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Wychwood Brewery Company Ltd Scarecrow Ale

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Bitter & Twisted
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Harviestoun Brewery Ltd. Bitter & Twisted
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:English Golden AleBitter & Twisted is a superbly-balanced, refreshingly-lively beer. It has a malty-sweet aroma with a floral, fruity hoppiness and a zingy, zesty flavour. Complex, rounded, sweet and dry; this is the connoisseurs' session beer par excellence!HOPS: Hersbruker, Celeia, Perle, BobekMALTS: Lager malt, crystal malt, malted wheat & oats34 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Scape Goat Pale Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Big Sky Brewing Company Scape Goat Pale Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Scape Goat is our award-winning Pale Ale. It is a very smooth brew, refreshing and well-balanced. Scape Goat took home the Gold Medal from the North American Brewers' Association competitions as the best English-style pale ale brewed west of the Mississippi, but only because it is the best. Scape Goat is brewed with pale, crystal malts, and Kent Goldings and Crystal hops.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Geary's Pale Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: D.L. Geary Brewing Company Geary's Pale Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Our flagship. This is a classic British pale ale with a nod to the legendary beers of Burton-on-Trent. Copper-colored, dry, clean, and crisp with lots of late hop taste, in an appetizing complex with ale fruitiness from imported Hampshire yeast. Original gravity - 1047; alcohol by volume - 4.5%; two row English malt (pale, crystal and chocolate); Cascade, Mt. Hood, Tettnang and Fuggle Hops.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Ipswich Original Pale Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Ipswich Ale Brewery Ipswich Original Ale

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: WychCraft
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Wychwood Brewery Company Ltd WychCraft

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Kentucky Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Brewery: Alltech’s Lexington Brewing and Distilling Co.
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Alltech’s Lexington Brewing and Distilling Co. Kentucky Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Our Master Brewers describe Kentucky Ale as a marriage between two classic beer styles, Irish Red Ale and English Pale Ale. Light amber in color, Kentucky Ale owes its unique body and character to select imported malts and a pinch of wheat malt for a rich, smooth taste. The unique body and character of Kentucky Ale is heavily influenced by the water, drawn from aquifers in the limestone rock underlying the Bluegrass Region of Kentucky.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Chamberlain Pale Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Shipyard Brewing Co. Chamberlain Pale Ale

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Over-The-Rhine Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Christian Moerlein Brewing Company Christian Moerlein Over-The-Rhine Ale

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Very Bad Elf Special Reserve Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Ridgeway Brewing Very Bad Elf

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: English Bay Pale Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Granville Island Brewery English Bay Pale Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Easygoing—like the sunny shores of English Bay itself. Out of the bottle you’ll notice the rich, coppery colour and caramel malt flavour up front, balanced with a dry roasted finish that’s sure to put a smile on your face. Just grill up some burgers, kebabs or tenderloin—and chill\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: 8th Street Pale Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Four Peaks Brewing Company 8th Street Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:21 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Whitbread Pale Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Whitbread PLC Whitbread Pale Ale

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: English Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: St. Peter's Brewery Co Ltd St. Peter's English Ale

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Unfiltered Double Barrel Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Firestone Walker Brewing Co. Unfiltered Double Barrel Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:100% Barrel Fermented.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Angler's Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Arcadia Brewing Company Arcadia Angler's Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:his strikingly authentic English-style pale ale is brewed with all-English malts and a pound and a half of Pacific Northwest hops per barrel. It is medium-bodied, crisp and well-balanced with a flavor profile featuring subtle notes of caramel, toffee and toasted malt, counterbalanced by the ideal level of hop bitterness. The delicate herbal hop finish is produced by Goldings whole leaf hops.1054 OG; 34 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Golden Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: St. Peter's Brewery Co Ltd St. Peter's Golden Ale

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Country Pale Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Wachusett Brewing Company Wachusett Country Pale Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Our first brew back in the early 90’s, the original pale ale with perfectly balanced hops & malts creating super drinkability.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Dundee English-Style Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Brewery: Genesee Brewing Co. / Dundee Brewing Co.
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Genesee Brewing Co. / Dundee Brewing Co. Dundee English-Style Ale

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Chupacabras Pale Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Cucapá Brewing Company Cucapá Chupacabras Pale Ale

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Stone Mill Organic Pale AleGreen Valley Brewing Company (Crooked Creek)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Green Valley Brewing Company (Crooked Creek) Stone Mill Organic Pale Ale

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Pale Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Mayflower Brewing Company Mayflower Pale Ale

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Heavy Seas - Pale Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Heavy Seas Beer Heavy Seas - Pale Ale

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Mama's Little Yella Pils
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Oskar Blues Grill & Brew Mama's Little Yella Pils
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Mama's Little Yella Pils - Our upcoming new canned good is a small-batch version of the beer that made Pilsen, Czechoslovakia famous. Mama's is made with hearty amounts of pale malt, German specialty malts, and a blend of traditional (Saaz) and 21st century Bavarian hops. Our first canned lager, it's also fermented at cool temperatures with a German yeast.This tasteful reality Czech is the perfect antidote for the watered-down versions of pilsner clogging Americaâ's shelves. And Mama's gentle hopping (about 35 IBUs) and low ABV (just 5.3%) mean we're finally honoring consumer requests for a delicious but less-challenging beer. (Hey, we like a good low-dose session beer, too.) Look for our Gold Metal Winner on US shelves in March.Sadly, the Feds rejected our Take Two and Call Us in the Morning line on the can.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: PILS (Czech Style Pilsner)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Lagunitas Brewing Company Lagunitas PILS (Czech Style Pilsner)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Our only Lager, brewed with loads of imported Saaz hops and a bottom-fermenting yeast strain that leaves it Light and Crisp and Easy to Slam, yet full of real flavor and all the things you yearn for.Like Adam and Eve, Isaac and Ishmael, Mao and Confucius, Good and Evil, Day and Night, Hittites and Visigoths, John and Lorena, or Groucho and Moe, Ales and Lagers are as different as can be. Still, we must love each for who they are, separately but equally, with liberty and justice for all. Cheers!\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Staropramen Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Pivovary Staropramen Staropramen Lager

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: The Wright Pils
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Great Lakes Brewing Company Great Lakes The Wright Pils

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Nomad
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Great Divide Brewing Company Nomad

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Golden Pheasant
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Pivovar Zlaty Bazant a.s. Golden Pheasant
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:A golden pheasant in a field of ripened barley has always been a sign of a rich and bountiful harvest.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Torch Pilsner
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Foothills Brewing Company Torch Pilsner
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Torch PilsnerA well structured, Czech-style pilsner. Torch is strong in alcohol with a rich, full finish. Good mouth feel and well-balanced Czech Saaz hops ensure that Torch is not your typical pilsner.Alcohol by Volume (ABV): 5.3%Color (SRM): 3.7Bitterness (IBUs): 35Torch Pilsner-bgAVAILABILITYYear-round\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Steam Whistle Pilsner
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Steam Whistle Brewing Steam Whistle Pilsner
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:We believe that world-class results require focus and dedication, so we developed a distinctive recipe for our single brand based on Europe's renowned brewing standards yet is brewed fresh locally at our independent, Canadian Brewery.We use traditional brewing techniques and only four natural ingredients including spring water, malted barley, hops and yeast - all GMO-free. There is a fifth ingredient in every refreshing bottle, and that is the passion of our dedicated Brewmaster and staff.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Krušovice Imperial
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Královský Pivovar Krušovice a.s. Krušovice Imperial

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Czech Style Pilsner
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Gordon Biersch Brewery Restaurant Gordon Biersch Czech Style Pilsner
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Czech Pilsner is a crisp, golden, highly hopped lager. This style beer was first brewed in Pilsen, Czechoslovakia in 1842 using a sample of special yeast smuggled from Germany by a Czech monk. Until this time all beers were dark and cloudy. The new Czech Pilsner was the first beer to be brewed clear and golden.36 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Summer Of Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Cisco Brewers Inc. Summer Of Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:The lager is the lightest, most refreshing of our beers. It's a classic Bavarian style lager with a delicious bready malt palate and an assertive noble hop finish. It just makes your mouth beg for more.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Pilz
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Live Oak Brewing Company Live Oak Pilz
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Styled after the Bohemian classic, Pilz is a crisp golden pilsner with an assertive hop character. With special Moravian heirloom barley malt, a traditional decoction mash creates a firm yet light body and deep golden color. Cold fermentation with a Czech lager yeast and lengthy secondary conditioning produce a brilliant beer that highlights the spicy and grassy Saaz hops. Authenticity in a glass; Pilz is beer.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Reality Czeck
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Moonlight Brewing Company Reality Czeck
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:A delicate soft Lager, authentic to the west coast of the Czech Republic.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Shiner 101 Czech Style Pilsner
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Spoetzl Brewery Shiner 101 Czech Style Pilsner

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Joseph's Brau Bohemian Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Trader Joe's Brewing Company Trader Joe's Bohemian Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Formerly Trader Joe's Bohemian Lager\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Josephs Brau PLZNR Czech-Style Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Trader Joe's Brewing Company Josephs Brau PLZNR Czech-Style Lager

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Session Pils
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Notch Brewing Notch Session Pils
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Czech style pale lager known as Svetlé Výcepní. The 10 plato strength (4% ABV) is the most popular in the Czech Republic, as opposed to the 12 plato strength (5% ABV) that is more familiar in the US. Brewed with European malts, Czech Saaz hops and soft water.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Saranac Bohemian Pilsener
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Matt Brewing Company Saranac Bohemian Pilsener

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Pontius Road Pilsner
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Short's Brewing Company Short's Pontius Road Pilsner

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Long Day Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Red Hare Brewing Company Long Day Lager

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Montejo
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Grupo Modelo S.A. de C.V. Montejo

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: ??Žatec
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: ?Žatecký Pivovar ??Žatec

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Sound Czech
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Terrapin Beer Company Terrapin Sound Czech

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Creemore Springs Traditional Pilsner
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Creemore Springs Brewery Limited Creemore Springs Traditional Pilsner
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Pilsner was first made back in 1842 by the Bohemians. They used special pale malt and an abundance of hops to create a delicious, golden beer. Up here at Creemore Springs we fire-brew our pilsner the same traditional way, using only four natural ingredients starting with our own clear flowing spring water. It’s eminently drinkable, and always refreshing. Classic yet unique; it’s our fresh take on a traditional Czech pilsner.26 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Kozel
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Pivovar Velké Popovice a.s. Kozel

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: HUB Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Hopworks Urban Brewery HUB Lager

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Czech Pilsner
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Brewery: Moat Mountain Smoke House & Brewing Co.
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Moat Mountain Smoke House & Brewing Co. Moat Czech Pilsner
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:A European-style pilsner. Dry hopping produces a bouquet of aromas from the addition of traditional noble hops. This beer has a bigger malt profile than the average American Pilsner. It has medium hop bitterness and a clean floral finish.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Kelso Pilsner
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Greenpoint Beerworks / Kelso of Brooklyn Kelso Pilsner

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Pils
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Heater Allen Brewing Pils
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Formerly known as "Pale Lager Beer"This is our take on the renowned Bohemian-style pale lager that you might find in Bavaria or the Czech Republic. When coming up with the recipe for Pils owner/brewmaster, Rick, brewed 17 batches of this beer to make it perfect. The recipe is based on the traditional and beloved Pilsner Urquell, which is why we have chosen not to filter our beer and why our lagering time is as long as it is--from brewday to when we can or keg Pils it is at least eight weeks. Our Pilsner is a little more golden, rounder, and a little more malt driven than many other versions. The beer possesses strong hop character that is balanced by its rich, round, malty palate. Refreshing and balanced.1.012 BG, 38 IBU, 3.8 SRM\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Prima Pils
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Victory Brewing Company Prima Pils
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Prima! It’s a German exclamation of joy. It’s a recognition of accomplishment. It’s what escaped from our lips the first time we sampled this mighty pilsner recipe. With heaps of whole flower European hops and fine German malts, we achieved the bracing herbal bite and smooth malt flavor that we sought. Prima… an exclamation of Victory! Prost!44 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Samuel Adams Noble PilsBoston Beer Company (Samuel Adams)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Boston Beer Company (Samuel Adams) Samuel Adams Noble Pils
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Samuel Adams® Noble Pils is brewed with all 5 Noble hops for a distinct hop character and fresh taste. Deep golden in color with a citrusy hop aroma, Samuel Adams Noble Pils is a traditional Bohemian Pilsner. The honeyed malt character from traditional Bohemian malt is balanced by delicate yet pronounced citrus, floral, and piney notes from the Noble hops. The winner of our 2009 Beer Lover's Choice® election, this beer was chosen by over 67,000 drinkers for its crisp complexity and refreshing taste.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Beck's
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brauerei Beck & Co. Beck's

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Scrimshaw Pilsner
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: North Coast Brewing Co. Scrimshaw Pilsner
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Named for the delicate engravings popularized by 19th century seafarers, Scrimshaw is a fresh tasting Pilsner brewed in the finest European tradition using Munich malt and Hallertauer and Tettnang hops. Scrimshaw has a subtle hop character, a crisp, clean palate, and a dry finish.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Premium Pils (Premium Beer)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Bitburger Brauerei Bitburger Premium Pils
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Marketed as Premium Beer in the USA.Note first the bright, fresh golden colour and rich frothy head so typical of this elegant Pilsner beer. Its refined herbal notes are delicately poised, followed by a nutty and honeyed aftertaste. The overall impression of this gently sparkling beer is one of deep harmony, with the unmistakeable bitterness of the hops balanced and contained by an agreeable, mellow sweetness in the body.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: The Crisp
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Sixpoint Brewery Sehr Crisp Pilsner
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Old world craftsmanship with new, clean flavors. Bright pilsner malts meet Noble hop character. The Crisp, American Pilsner innovation.We were sixty feet underground when the beer came calling. While sinking tankards in ancient beer caves near the foot of the Alps, inspiration struck -- and at that exact moment, THE CRISP® was born. The can in your hand turns obsession to reality. Now that's Crisp.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Sunshine Pils
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Tröegs Brewing Company Tröegs Sunshine Pils
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Like the rising sun, Sunshine Pils delivers winter, spring, summer and fall. This deceptive complex pilsner is all about the tightrope walk of two-row barley, zesty Saaz hops and lager yeast. It's a go-to when the sun is shining, and it makes us happy when skies are gray.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Bohemia Clásica
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Brewery: Cervecería Cuauhtémoc Moctezuma, S.A. de C.V.
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Cervecería Cuauhtémoc Moctezuma, S.A. de C.V. Bohemia Clásica
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Also known as Bohemia Clásica Golden Pilsner\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Radeberger Pilsner
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Radeberger Exportbierbrauerei Radeberger Pilsner

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Pilsner
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brooklyn Brewery Brooklyn Pilsner
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Brooklyn Pilsner is a refreshing golden lager beer, brewed in the style favored by New York’s pre-prohibition brewers. In the 1840’s, the pilsner style emerged from central Europe to become the world’s most popular style of beer. Like its ancestors, Brooklyn Pilsner is traditionally brewed from the finest German two-row barley malts. German-grown Perle and Hallertauer hops provide a crisp, snappy bitterness and fresh, floral aroma. The flavor of the malt comes through in the finish. We ferment Brooklyn Pilsner at cool temperatures, and then give it a long, gentle maturation (lagering), which results in a beer of superior complexity and smoothness. We believe that you will find there to be none finer. Unlike mass-marketed so-called pilsners, Brooklyn Pilsner does not contain cheap fillers such as corn or rice, nor does it contain any preservatives or stabilizers. Brooklyn Pilsner is the real thing.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Saranac Adirondack Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Matt Brewing Company Saranac Adirondack Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:German Amber Lager\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Jever Pilsener
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Brewery: Friesisches Brauhaus zu Jever GmbH & Co KG
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Friesisches Brauhaus zu Jever GmbH & Co KG Jever Pilsener
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Hardly any other premium beer has remained as true to itself as Jever. For 170 years now, Jever has been cultivating its own Frisian-bitter taste.The special mix of the best brewing water and high-quality hops makes our Jever so Frisian-tart and refreshing at the same time!\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: König Pilsener
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: König-Brauerei GmbH König Pilsener

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Pikeland Pils
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Sly Fox Brewing Company Pikeland Pils
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:OG 11 ºP / 44 IBUs\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Pils (Pilsner)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Bayerische Staatsbrauerei Weihenstephan Weihenstephaner Pilsner
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Known as "Pilsner" in the USA.Golden-yellow and bright, with 32 bitter units and quite hoppy compared to most of the other Pilsners our Weihenstephaner Pilsner comes up with a distinctive aroma of hops with a pleasant bitterness. This combination provides a balanced mix and guarantees great enjoyment. Brewed according to our centuries-old brewing tradition on the Weihenstephan hill.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Pils
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Stoudts Brewing Co. Stoudts Pils

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Trumer Pils
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Trumer Brauerei Berkeley Trumer Pils

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Krombacher Pils
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Krombacher Brauerei Krombacher Pils
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Krombacher, situated in the beautiful hills of Westfalia, draws upon the local mountain spring water, soft and low in minerals, ideal for brewing a Pilsner style beer. Taste: a wonderful balance of hops and malt with a distinct crispness on the finish.24 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Stiegl Pils
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Stieglbrauerei zu Salzburg GmbH Stiegl Pils

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Rothaus Pils Tannen Zäpfle
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Badische Staatsbrauerei Rothaus AG Rothaus Pils Tannen Zäpfle

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: SOS (Save Our Shore)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Abita Brewing Co. SOS (Save Our Shore)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:This Abita Beer is a message in a bottle...a distress signal for the troubled waters of our Gulf Coast. For every bottle sold Abita will donate 75¢ to the rescue and restoration of the environment, industry and individuals fighting to survive this disastrous oil spill. This unfiltered Weizen Pils is made with Pilsner and Wheat malts. It is hopped and dry hopped with Sterling and German Perle hops. It has a brilliant gold color, a sweet malt flavor, and a pleasant bitterness and aroma.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Summer Pils
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Saint Arnold Brewing Company Saint Arnold Summer Pils
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:A golden Munich-style Helles. Crisp and refreshing, this beer is perfect for a hot summer day. Saint Arnold Summer Pils has a delicate, sweet malt taste complemented by an abundant hop aroma and flavor. This beer is brewed with fine German malt, and a copious quantity of "noble" hops imported from the Czech Republic.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Wernesgruner
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Wernesgrüner Brauerei AG Wernesgruner

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Pilsener
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Brewery: Brauerei C. & A. Veltins GmbH & Co.
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brauerei C. & A. Veltins GmbH & Co. Veltins Pilsner

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Organic Ur Pils
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brauerei Pinkus Mueller Organic Ur Pils

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Hans' Pils
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Real Ale Brewing Company Hans' Pils

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Premium Pils
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Paulaner Brauerei GmbH & Co. KG Paulaner Premium Pils

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Elm City Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: New England Brewing Co. Elm City Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Named after New Havens historic nickname, this is a true German Pilsner made with all German ingredients.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: EKU Pils
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Kulmbacher Brauerei AG EKU Pils

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Flensburger Pilsener
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Brewery: Flensburger Brauerei GmbH Und Co. KG
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Flensburger Brauerei GmbH Und Co. KG Flensburger Pilsener

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Dinkelacker CD-Pils
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Dinkelacker-Schwabenbraeu AG Dinkel Acker Cd-Pils
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Named for Carl Dinkelacker.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Pearl-Snap
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Austin Beerworks Pearl Snap Pils

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Simpler Times Pilsner
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Minhas Craft Brewery Simpler Times Pilsner

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Hometown Blonde
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: New Glarus Brewing Company Home Town Blonde
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Embrace a classic! Hometown Blonde is an Old World style pilsner, assertively hopped with four premium hop varieties. Tettnanger, Saaz, Styrian Golding and Strisselpalt varieties all grace this German-style brew with the complex character you enjoy in a classic pilsner.Expect to pour an elegant blonde glass of beer, crowned with a rich head of foam that resonates with our chorus of hops. Although delicate in appearance, our Hometown Blonde has a backbone, but of course that's no surprise in Wisconsin. Enjoy!\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Almaza Pilsner Beer
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brasserie Almaza S.A.L. Almaza Pilsner Beer

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Braumeister Pils
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Victory Brewing Company Braumeister Pils

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Wolters Pilsener
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Hofbrauhaus Wolters GmbH Wolters Pilsener Premium
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Our distinctive Pilsener beer, well balanced bitterness and easy to drink. Gold in colour, fresh and very digestible.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Kulmbacher Edelherb Premium Pils
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Kulmbacher Brauerei AG Kulmbacher Edelherb Premium Pils
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Our Edelherb is the first Kulmbacher Pils and is brewed according to the original recipe. In memory of the brewing family.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: My Antonia
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Dogfish Head Brewery My Antonia
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:My Antonia (named after the Willa Cather read), is a continually-hopped imperial pilsner. This lager for ale lovers is citrusy, sweet and refined.My Antonia started out as a collaboration beer when Sam brewed it at Birra del Borgo (hope you can read Italian) outside Rome, Italy, with owner/brewer Leonardo DiVencenzo in October 2008. In 2010, we began brewing My Antonia here in Delaware for U.S. distribution.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Krampus
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Southern Tier Brewing Company Krampus (Imperial Helles Lager)

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Samuel Adams Hallertau Imperial PilsnerBoston Beer Company (Samuel Adams)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Boston Beer Company (Samuel Adams) Samuel Adams Hallertau Imperial Pilsner

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Morimoto Imperial Pilsner
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Rogue Ales Morimoto Imperial Pilsner
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:4 Ingredients:Malts: 100% French Pilsner.Hops: 100% Sterling.Yeast & Water: Czech Pils Yeast & Free Range Coastal Water.18º PLATO74 IBU80 AA16º Lovibond\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Imperial Spruce India Pilsner
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Short's Brewing Company Imperial Spruce India Pilsner
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Original batch (from Imperial Series--750 ml bottles) was 10% abv. New, 2010, 12 oz. bottles are 7.15% abv.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Evil Power
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Three Floyds Brewing Co. & Brewpub Evil Power
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:A fortified European-style Pilsner lagered to perfection, brewed with Heavy Metal Warriors Lair of The Minotaur, in commemoration of their fourth full length release “Evil Power".56 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Tilted Smile Imperial Pilsner
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Uinta Brewing Company Tilted Smile Imperial Pilsner
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Tilted Smile breaks away from the crowd. Big in alcohol, yet approachable and versatile. Confidently balanced with Saaz hops and 100% Pilsen malt. Crisp and delightfully carbonated.30 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Draft Bear
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Mikkeller ApS Draft Bear
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Brewed at De Proef Brouwerij, Lochristi-Hijfte, Belgium.Ingredients: Water, malts (pils, carapils and amber), light candy sugar, hops (amarillo and cascade) and lager yeast.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Regal Pilsner
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Breckenridge Brewery Regal Pilsner
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:A double Pilsner with distinct hoppy attributes and a pronounced malty backbone. It is strong in character and steadfast in its resolve to provide maximum drinking pleasure. All hail our Brewmaster and the fruits of his labor, Regal Pilsner!\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: The Curl
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Short's Brewing Company Short's The Curl
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Brewed with 40% more ingredients to bump any ordinary pilsner to an imperial level. We hop the kettle four times, using a good amount of Amarillo hops to balance the malty sweetness from the pilsen malt and lots of flaked maze. At 7.5% ABV and 50 Bittering Units, this beer is still very quaffable and packed full of flavor thanks to the help of our house American lager yeast. This beer was brewed upon the request of every ones favorite beer tender, Jeremy ?the curl? VanSice7.1% ABV50 I.B.U.?s\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Hitachino Nest Ancient Nipponia
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Kiuchi Brewery Hitachino Nipponia
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:"Nipponia is brewed using the revived Japanese breed of Kanego Golden barley which was first developed in 1900, along with another strain of hops called 'Japanese-bred Sorachi Ace'. Nipponia is a delightfully golden coloured beer with citrus edge and complex and lingering taste."Malt: Kaneko GoldenHops: Sorachi AceAlcohol Vol: 8.0%Color: Golden YellowWon a Bronze Medal at the Australian International Beer Awards 2012 in category 5D "Other International Style Lager Packaged".\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Orange Blossom Pilsner² (Squared)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Thomas Creek Brewery OBP Squared (Orange Blossom Pilsner Squared)

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Pecker Wrecker
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Rahr & Sons Brewing Company Pecker Wrecker

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: überPils
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Blue Mountain Brewery überPils

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Summer Pilsner Fusion
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Element Brewing Company Summer Pilsner Fusion

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Whistler Imperial Pils
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Karl Strauss Brewing Company Whistler Imperial Pils

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Uber Ursa Pils
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Atwater Block Brewery Uber Ursa Pils

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Elsa Von Horizon
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Brewery: New Albanian Brewing Company - Pizzeria and Public House
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: New Albanian Brewing Company - Pizzeria and Public House Elsa Von Horizon

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Epic Larger
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Epic Brewing Company Epic Lager
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Tigers. Balls of Twine. Waimea Bay waves. Pyramids. Ohakune Carrots. Some things are meant to be big. Flavours. Aromas. Beer. The list is large but we think it should be bigger. There is a time and place for subtlety, for a delicate touch. This is not one of them. Turning the amplifier up to eleven? Yeah, that’s it.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Edmund Fitzgerald
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Great Lakes Brewing Company Coffee Infused Edmund Fitzgerald Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Robust and complex, our porter is a bittersweet tribute to the legendary freighter's fallen crew--taken too soon when the gales of November came early.37 IBUs\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Black Butte Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Deschutes Brewery Black Butte Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Alc. by Vol.: 5.2%IBUs: 30192 calories per 12 oz serving\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Vanilla Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Breckenridge Brewery Vanilla Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Deep in the jungles of Papua New Guinea and Madagascar grows the perfect ingredient for an extraordinary Porter brewed in Colorado. Breckenridge Brewery’s Vanilla Porter. An ale that has all the chocolate and roasted nut flavor of a classic Porter, with an enigmatic surprise thrown in for good measure.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Anchor Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Anchor Brewing Company Anchor Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:With deep black color, a thick, creamy head, rich chocolate, toffee and coffee flavors, and full-bodied smoothness, Anchor Porter® is the epitome of a handcrafted dark beer.A blend of specially roasted pale, caramel, chocolate, and black malts, along with our top-fermenting yeast, creates complexity without bitterness. The brew is hopped at a high rate, and naturally carbonated. The result is dark in the glass, but surprisingly light on the palate.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Sierra Nevada Brewing Co. Sierra Nevada Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Porter is a testament to roasted malts which give it a rich, bittersweet and roasted coffee-like flavor that's a perfect complement to a variety of foods. Before Sierra Nevada was a reality, our nights were spent perfecting homebrews and dreaming of starting a brewery. Back then, one of our favorites was a porter made with homemade malt roasted in our kitchen. Decades later, we still love the rich, bittersweet and roasted malt flavors of that original brew.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Mocha Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Rogue Ales Mocha Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Ruddy brown in color, a bittersweet balance of malt and hops, yet a surprisingly light and refreshing taste.Ingredients: 2-Row, Munich, C120, Chocolate, Black, Kiln Coffee & Rogue Farms Dare™ & Risk™ Malts; Rogue Farms Rebel & Liberty Hops; Free Range Coastal Water & Pacman Yeast.47 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Everett Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Hill Farmstead Brewery Everett Robust Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Everett (1908-1939) was our grandfather’s brother; Hill Farmstead Brewery rests upon the land that was once home to him and his 13 siblings. In his honor, this Porter is crafted from American malted barley, English and German roasted malts, American hops, our ale yeast, and water from our well. It is unfiltered and naturally carbonated. Decadent in its depth, with a complex backbone of chocolate, coffee, and malty sweetness, this is the ale that I dream to have shared with Everett.Pale, Caramel, and Chocolate Malt, Roasted Barley, Columbus hops; Ale Yeast, and our Well Water.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Samuel Adams Holiday PorterBoston Beer Company (Samuel Adams)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Boston Beer Company (Samuel Adams) Samuel Adams Holiday Porter

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Coconut Hiwa Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Maui Brewing Co. CoCoNut Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Formerly CoCoNut PorterA robust dark ale with hand-toasted coconut & hints of mocha.30 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Alpha Klaus Christmas (Xmas) Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Three Floyds Brewing Co. & Brewpub Alpha Klaus Christmas (Xmas) Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Alpha King’s festive cousin. A big American Christmas Porter brewed with English chocolate malt, Mexican sugar and of course, tons of strange American hops. Cheers!38 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Pipeline Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Kona Brewing Co. Pipeline Porter

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Vanilla Java Porter (VJP)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Atwater Block Brewery Atwater Vanilla Java Porter

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Oatmeal Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Highland Brewing Highland Oatmeal Porter

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Cutthroat
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Odell Brewing Company Odell Cutthroat Pale Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Not quite a stout but definitely no lightweight, Cutthroat is smooth and robust. Inspired by the classic London porters, we use dark roasted malts to create a deep, rich color and flavor that hint at chocolate and coffee. We named it Cutthroat as our tribute to the Colorado state fish – with its own rich heritage and unmistakable dark coloring. And while we’re big fans of small batches, here’s to the currently threatened Cutthroat population reaching mass quantities.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Mississippi Mud Black & Tan
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Mississippi Brewing Co. Mississippi Mud Black & Tan

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Dead Reckoning Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Tröegs Brewing Company Tröegs Dead Reckoning Porter

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Twilight Of The Idols
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Hill Farmstead Brewery Twilight Of The Idols
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Twilight of the Idols is our winter porter. We brew Twilight each autumn, with a touch of locally roasted coffee and cinnamon, and age it on a blend of select vanilla beans. Originally conceived with a friend in 2009 while brewing in Denmark, the name of this annual release is inspired by the title of one of the last texts written by one of our philosophical idols, Friedrich Nietzsche.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Coffeehouse Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Berkshire Brewing Company Inc. Coffeehouse Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:This rich, dark ale takes BBC’s popular Drayman’s Porter and adds Dean’s Beans organic coffee to the mix, creating an enticing blend of everyone’s favorite beginning and end of day beverages. Robust and aromatic, Coffeehouse Porter is sure to please, no matter what time of day you choose to enjoy it.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Black Marlin
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Ballast Point Brewing Company Black Marlin Porter

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Road Dog
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Flying Dog Brewery Road Dog Porter

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: New World Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Avery Brewing Company New World Porter

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Southern Tier Brewing Company Porter

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Old Leghumper
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Thirsty Dog Brewing Company Old Leghumper

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Mudpuppy
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Central Waters Brewing Company Mudpuppy Porter

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Saranac Caramel Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Matt Brewing Company Saranac Caramel Porter

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: (512) Pecan Porter(512) Brewing Company
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: (512) Brewing Company (512) Pecan Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Nearly black in color, (512) Pecan Porter is made with Organic US 2-row and Crystal malts along with Baird’s Chocolate and Black malts. Its full body and malty sweetness are balanced with subtle pecan aroma and flavor from locally grown pecans. Yet another true Austin original!\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Saranac Black & Tan
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Matt Brewing Company Saranac Black & Tan
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Stout & Lager\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: TREAT (Imperial Chocolate Pumpkin Porter)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Midnight Sun Brewing Co. TREAT (Imperial Chocolate Pumpkin Porter)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Intriguing doses of sweet spices, cocoa nibs and pumpkin transform an exceptional porter into a mesmerizing potion. Pour this tantalizing brew into a snifter and experience its many eccentric nuances, which will delight your taste buds.This is the same award-winning recipe that garnered a GOLD MEDAL at GABF in 2007. Formerly known simply as Imperial Chocolate Pumpkin Porter, we’ve named it T.R.E.A.T.: The Royal Eccentric Ale Treatment.30 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Great Northern
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Summit Brewing Company Summit Great Northern Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Originally named after the London market workers who popularized this brew, we dubbed our Porter with a nod toward the majestic railway stretching from St. Paul to Seattle. Roasted malts offer up coffee notes and lead to a slightly sweet, chocolatey finish. All aboard!\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: The Duck-Rabbit Craft Brewery Duck-Rabbit Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:The Duck-Rabbit Porter is very dark in color. This robust ale features a pronounced flavor of roasted grains reminiscent of dark chocolate. Also, we add oats to the grist for a round, silky mouthfeel. The malt is well balanced with hops to make this a fantastic choice for fans of traditional, robust, full-flavored beers. We're confident that you'll love this yummy porter!\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Wasatch Polygamy Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Utah Brewers Cooperative Wasatch Polygamy Porter

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Coffee Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Real Ale Brewing Company Shade Grown Coffee Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Formerly "Shade Grown Coffee Porter".Born from owner Brad Farbstein’s homebrewing experiments in college — our porter is a rich, robust ale with a dry finish. Fresh, cold-brewed organic fair trade coffee courtesy of Katz Coffee in Houston, TX is added just prior to packaging. Our most popular seasonal release, it’s a whole new way to enjoy your coffee with breakfast, lunch or dinner.A rich, robust porter with a dry finish. Brewed with organic hops, malted barley, and Ruta Maya Shade Grown organic coffee beans from Chiapas, Mexico.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Thunderstruck Coffee Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Highland Brewing Highland Thunderstruck Coffee Porter

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Penn Quarter Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: DC Brau Brewing Co. Penn Quarter Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Penn Quarter Porter is our first in a line of draft-only limited-release beer, and it's a robust porter! In the way that The Public is on the line between a pale ale and an IPA, this is on the line between a porter and a stout - with chocolate notes and a dry, roasted finish.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Port City Brewing Porter

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Coco Loco
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: NoDa Brewing Company Coco Loco
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Enjoy the blend of chocolate and brown malts in this robust porter with crazy-rich color and ruby highlights. The subtle bitterness of chocolate is balanced by sweet, organic toasted coconut. Perfect to pair with food or just to enjoy alone. So go nuts, you'll be glad you did.

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Smuttynose Baltic Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Smuttynose Brewing Company Smuttynose Baltic Porter (Big Beer Series)

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Shipwreck Porter - Bourbon Barrel-Aged
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Arcadia Brewing Company Arcadia Shipwreck Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:The Baltic-style Porter has a robust malt character and a slight herbal hop bitterness. Aged for 12 months in 10-year-old Kentucky bourbon oak barrels, this alluring dark liquid features appealing undertones of vanilla, oak, cocoa, and coffee. The aging occurs in abandoned mines in Michigan, at a constant temperature of 45F.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Baltika #6 Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Baltika Breweries Baltika #6 Porter

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Baltic Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: The Duck-Rabbit Craft Brewery Duck-Rabbit Baltic Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:The Duck-Rabbit Baltic Porter is deep, rich and velvety soft. A full blooded roasty character with almost no burnt flavor is balanced by complex alcohol notes. Strong (9% alcohol by volume) yet unfailingly subtle, this special brew rewards unhurried attention. Enjoy!\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Smoke
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Surly Brewing Company Smoke
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Ebony-hued, Smoke wafts out of the bottle and into your senses, borne on the wings of European traditions, wrapped in American innovation. Lager-brewed, like any true Baltic Porter, with smoked malts from Bamberg, Germany, the home of Rauchbiers, then mellowed by oak-aging. Black malt flavors mesh with notes of raisins, plums, figs and licorice with the subtle smoke on the side, for a complex and luxurious, yet silky smooth drinking experience. It's a sipper at Alc. 8.2% by VOL., but everyone knows you can't have Smoke without fire!\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Sinebrychoff Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Oy Sinebrychoff Ab Sinebrychoff Porter

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Black Boss Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: BOSS Browar Witnica S.A. Black Boss Porter

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Carnegie Porter 5,5%
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Carlsberg Sverige AB Carnegie Porter 5,5%
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:First introduced in 1836. Strong beers were banned in Sweden 1923-1956.The 5.5 % original recipe was re-introduced in 1985 as a beer fermented with both top and bottom yeast. In 1993, the yeast was changed to a single bottom-fermenting strain. In 2009, the label design and name was changed from "Carnegie Stark-Porter" to "Carnegie Porter".40 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Topless Wytch
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Three Floyds Brewing Co. & Brewpub Topless Wytch
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:This strong, Baltic-style Porter has a rich, velvety mouthfeel with notes of bakers chocolate and molasses.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Grande Cuvée Porter Baltique
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Les Trois Mousquetaires Les Trois Mousquetaires Porter Baltique
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Robust dark lager inspired by Porters from around the Baltic Sea region. This beer is luxuriously round with a mild bitterness. The malts contribute flavors of coffee, chocolate, and vanilla. The use of cherry-wood smoked malt provides a subtle hint of smoke.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Brewery: Nøgne Ø - Det Kompromissløse Bryggeri A/S
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Nøgne Ø - Det Kompromissløse Bryggeri A/S Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:In this quite dark ale, dark malts provide flavors of coffee and dried fruit. Try with dark chocolate, cheese or red meat dishes.30 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Smoked Baltic Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Great Divide Brewing Company Smoked Baltic Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:"this dark lager gets its special twist from a hefty addition of Bamberg smoked malt." Note that Baltic Porters are often fermented with lager yeast.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Southampton Imperial Baltic Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Southampton Publick House Southampton Imperial Baltic Porter

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Double Brown Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Deep Ellum Brewing Company Double Brown Stout

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Baltic Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Foothills Brewing Company Foothills Baltic Porter

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Tsarina Esra
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brouwerij De Molen Tsarina Esra Reserva
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Tsarina Esra is an imperial porter. A style with his roots in England from many ages ago. It's fullness, it's richness in flavor and it's warming feeling makes it perfect for cold nights. Because of the enduring barrel aging in Ardbeg whisky barrels, this edition is enriched with crazy (really!) peat flavours. It was injected with Brett while in the barrels. Flavor indication: Chocolate, liquorice, funky peaty\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Utenos Alus Porter

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Porteris
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Aldaris Porteris

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Danzig Baltic Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Devils Backbone Brewing Company Danzig Baltic Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Danzig, which we named after a Baltic Sea town, isn’t for the faint of heart… or mouth. It’s a well-balanced, full-bodied blend of a strong English porter and a Germanic black lager, making it smooth with a sneaky high ABV. The intense mix of malts and hops provides flavors of chocolate, coffee, and caramelized sugar. No wonder it won Bronze at the World Beer Cup 2018. It’s full-on! Hence the lightning bolt on the pack.Malts: Pilsner, Vienna, Dark Munich, Carafa II, CaraRed, Brown Malt, Chocolate MaltHops: Northern Brewer, TettnangIBU: 28COLOR: Black\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Mørke - Pumpernickel Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Beer Here Mørke - Pumpernickel Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Brewed in collaboration with Shelton Brothers. Lots of rye malt and spices inspired by the dark German bread.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Akevitt
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: HaandBryggeriet Akevitt Porter (Barrel-Aged Porter)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Matured on Aquavit casks.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Bourbon Barrel Aged Shaman's Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Atwater Block Brewery Atwater Bourbon Barrel Aged Shaman's Porter

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Baltic Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Uncommon Brewers Baltic Porter

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Grand Imperial Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Browar Amber Grand Imperial Porter

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Kurofune Porter
