dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Baird Brewing Company / Fishmarket Taproom Kurofune Porter

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Fear And Trembling (Cabernet/Bourbon Blend)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Hill Farmstead Brewery Fear And Trembling (Cabernet/Bourbon Blend)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Fear and Trembling is Hill Farmstead’s first collaboration – a Baltic Porter brewed with malt that was hand smoked over maple wood by our Danish friend, and former colleague, Anders Kissmeyer. This bottled version was blended from beer aged in both American Oak Cabernet barrels and Bourbon barrels. As a student of philosophy and former resident of Copenhagen, it is fitting that our brewer named our first collaboration after Denmark’s great thinker: Søren Kierkegaard. All three contemplated absurdity, faith, and salvation while wandering the shores of the Baltic Sea…“…continue to work out your salvation with fear and trembling…”\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Alice Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: BrewDog Alice Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Weighing in at 5.2% ABV, Alice Porter hides a huge complexity behind her modest strength. Roasty and smooth with fruity, rich coffee character. Alice Porter takes a sudden twist in an unexpected direction; a blend of hops that add a light, balancing citrusy twist and a subtle spiciness. Alice Porter is the first of our 2105 seasonal brews.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Hoogstraten Poorter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brouwerij Sterkens N.V. Hoogstraten Poorter

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Limfjordsporter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Thisted Bryghus Limfjordsporter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Brewed with liquorice. The recipe was developed during the 70's at the Urban brewery in Aalborg. Thisted bought the name, and the production restarted in 1997.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Fuller's London Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Fuller Smith & Turner PLC Fuller's London Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Fuller's London Porter is an award-winning example of this historic English style; smooth and creamy with delicious chocolate and coffee flavors derived from the roasted malt.The griffin Brewery is Chiswick, London, has brewing fine ales since 1654.The Fuller, Smith & Turner partnership dating back to 1845, brews an excellent range of award-winning beers, many of which are available in the U.S. including London Pride pale ale and the Old's original ESB.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Old Engine Oil Black Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Harviestoun Brewery Ltd. Old Engine Oil
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Legend has it that Old Engine Oil was dedicated to our Head Brewer’s love of classic cars. But it’s the thick, dark, chocolatey viscosity that reveals the real inspiration behind the name.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Bully! Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Boulevard Brewing Co. Bully! Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:The intense flavors of dark-roasted malt in Boulevard’s rendition of the classic English porter are perfectly balanced by a generous and complex hop character. Bully! Porter’s robust nature makes it the ideal companion to a variety of foods, from seafood to chocolate.49 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Samuel Adams Honey PorterBoston Beer Company (Samuel Adams)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Boston Beer Company (Samuel Adams) Samuel Adams Honey Porter

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: People's Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Foothills Brewing Company People's Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:People's Porter is a robust English-style brew with a dark, ruby hue. Complex chocolate, caramel and toffee notes give way to an herbal bitterness, finishing with a pleasant hint of espresso.42 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Washington's Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Yards Brewing Co. General Washington's Tavern Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Formerly General Washington's Tavern PorterDetailed in a letter from the General to his officers during the war, Washington’s recipe employed molasses to aid fermentation and give rich caramel notes to this robust, roasty ale. The recipe reflected his admiration for Philadelphia-style porters, especially those brewed by Robert Hare (whose original brewery stood just blocks from where ours is now). Our Tavern Porter, inspired by Washington’s, is dark, smooth, and complex with just a hint of dried fruit in the finish.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Mayflower Brewing Company Mayflower Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Taking its cues from “Three Threads”, a bartender’s blend of three distinct ales, Porter became the beer of choice for 18th-century Londoners. Mayflower Porter embraces this history. This complex brew is smooth and full-flavored with notes of roasted coffee beans and bittersweet chocolate that will warm the palate all year long. Mayflower Porter is a rich, complex brew that is smooth and full-flavored. Five varieties of malted barley provide notes of roasted coffee beans and bittersweet chocolate with a hint of smokiness.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Old-Style Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: St. Peter's Brewery Co Ltd St. Peter's Old-Style Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:A blend of a mature and young ale creates a porter of traditional character that’s dark cherry in colour and complex in taste. Aromas of liquorice, rum, raisin and chocolate with hints of coffee are in abundance in this full-bodied, warming ale.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Coffee Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Meantime Brewing Company Limited Coffee Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Whilst we would not recommend having this at breakfast with your bacon and eggs, our Coffee Beer is made with real coffee and has a caffeine hit to match. The natural flavors of the beans selected and hand roasted by our friends at the Union Coffee Roasters go well with the roast barley in the beer to give a silky-smooth drink with distinct chocolate and vanilla notes.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Zwet.Be
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brouwerij Drie Fonteinen Zwet.Be
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:A porter brewed with lambic yeast.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Santa's Butt
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Ridgeway Brewing Santa's Butt

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: London Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Meantime Brewing Company Limited London Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Porter was the great London beer style of the 18th and 19th centuries, when the city was revered as both the brewing capital and trading hub of the world. Named after the legions of porters in her docks, streets and markets who drank this powerful beer to slake their thirst, Meantime London Porter is a classic interpretation of this complex dark beer style.Wonderful with mature cheese, beef, lamb, or as traditionally served, with oysters.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Boxcarr Pumpkin Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Starr Hill Brewery Box Car Pumpkin Porter

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Green Man Brewery Green Man Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Dark, full-bodied, and rich in flavor, Green Man Porter is wonderfully easy to drink. It offers a creamy, smooth mouthfeel and finishes with distinctive chocolate notes. This traditionally crafted, award-winning British-style Porter, like a true rock star, enjoys a legendary following.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Sly Rye Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Yazoo Brewing Company Sly Rye Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:A rich, chocolaty English Porter with a clean finish. We use the finest floor-malted Maris Otter malts from England, the same malts used for the best single-malt scotch. A portion of malted rye gives a spicy, slightly dry finish.28 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Publican Porter (Imperial London Porter)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Short's Brewing Company Short's Publican Porter (Imperial London Porter)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:A Robust Porter.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Geary's London Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: D.L. Geary Brewing Company Geary's London Style Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Faithfully recreated by Geary’s, this classic English style has a deep mahogany color and a restrained roasted malt flavor. The result is rich and complex, yet smooth and refreshing. Original gravity - 1045; alcohol by volume - 4.2%; two row English malt (pale, crystal, chocolate and black); Cascade, Willamette and Golding hops.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Original Flag Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Darwin Brewery Ltd. Original Flag Porter

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Black Duck Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Greenport Harbor Brewing Company Black Duck Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:A black ale that puts the flavor of the malt front and center. It has a mild hop character that balances strong notes of cocoa and hints of coffee. A full-bodied roasty treat that finishes dry. Pairs well with chocolate, BBQ, as well as fresh shellfish.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Kennebunkport Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Federal Jack's Restaurant & Brew Pub Kennebunkport Porter

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Contorter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Ale Asylum Contorter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Our porter is dark in color yet soft on the palate. English chocolate malts give it a complex, rich flavor wrapped in a silky smooth finish.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Entire Butt English Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Salopian Brewing Company Ltd Entire Butt English Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Historically the term used to describe a porter blended from a variety of ales, entire butt uses 14 different malts and 3 hops to recreate this forgotten style of porter. The beer is black/brown with a crisp white head and is distinctly vinuous. It has little hop character as essentially the flavour is derived from the malts. Malts used: pale Maris Otter, lager, wheat, pale crystal, dark crystal, dark chocolate, pale chocolate, black, roasted barley, caramalt, torrified wheat, amber malt, brown malt and malted oats.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: St. George Brewing Company, The Porter

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Benchwarmer Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Cooperstown Brewing Company Benchwarmer Porter

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Black Wych
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Wychwood Brewery Company Ltd Black Wych
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:BLACK WYCH A Dark Mysterious Spellbinding PorterBLACK WYCH spellbinding porter , The Black Wych has cast her spell , start with a measure of alluring rich dark malt & allow the bitterness to creep in. This silkily smooth porter is a force to be reckoned with.Brewed primarily for export.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Vanilla Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Mill Street Brew Pub Mill Street Vanilla Porter

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Old Growler
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Nethergate Brewery Co. Ltd. Old Growler

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Longfellow
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Shipyard Brewing Co. Longfellow Winter Ale

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Rickard's Dark
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Molson Coors Canada Rickard's Dark
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Brewed in the style of English porters, Rickard's Dark is creamy with a smooth finish that holds just a hint of pure Quebec maple syrup.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Shoo-Fly Pie Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Lancaster Brewing Company Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Made with eight different malts, four types of hops and a touch of Lancaster County molasses, this tasty brew has a rich brown hue with a medium to full body flavor.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Duke Of Winship
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Middle Ages Brewing Co., Ltd. Duke Of Winship
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:"Scotch Porter"A sensual dark brew with the softness of a Scotch ale crafted with the malt make-up of an English porter.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Midnight Sun
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Williams Brothers Brewing Company Midnight Sun

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Longboat Chocolate Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Phillips Brewing Company Longboat Double Chocolate Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Classic Pairings in History: Stevie Wonder & Paul McCartney Super Dave Osborne & Mr. Fuji Cheddar cheese & pickles Bob & Doug McKenzie Mork & Mindy Bonnie & Clyde Chocolate & Beer!!! We'd say that Longboat is a classic chocolate porter, but lets face it, who's ever heard of a chocolate porter? It is, however, a rich dark ale, with a distinctive chocolate finish. Comes in a 650mL bottle, cause 341mL just isn't enough!\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Busted Knuckle Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Big Woods Brewing Co. Busted Knuckle Red Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:This is our signature ale. Busted Knuckle is a hybrid ale, most similar to a “light” porter. We say “light” because, while it does have complexity, it is also a very smooth and approachable beer.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Old Slug Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: RCH Brewery Old Slug Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:In the old brewery we had a problem with slugs getting into the brewery. As the beer leaves a trail down the glass as you drink it like a slug, that's how the beer was named. A delicious traditional porter with a full bodied taste of chocolate, coffee, blackcurrant and black cherry with a good aroma. A near black colour with a good white head when served through a tight sparkler.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Pigs Ass Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Harvest Moon Brewery Pigs Ass Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:First brewed by Harvest Moon in 1997, this beer is a multiple award-winning dark ale brewed in the Burton, England style owing to the similarity of water chemistry in Belt compared to this classic porter producing area in England. Plenty of body without a sharp bite, this ale is brewed with pale, caramel, chocolate and black malts to create a creamy, smooth, roasted, slightly chocolate tasting ale with a touch of hops in the finish. This ale can be enjoyed in every season and is best when served cool, not cold. And why the name? While drinking this new brew one evening back in 1997, the local hog farmer showed up to collect our spent mash and we that what could be better for fattening pigs?\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Anvil Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: French Broad Brewing Co. Anvil Porter

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Victory At Sea - Coffee And Vanilla
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Ballast Point Brewing Company Victory At Sea Coffee Vanilla Imperial Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Our Victory at Sea Imperial Porter is a bold, smooth brew with just the right amount of sweetness. We infused this robust porter with whole vanilla beans and San Diego’s own Caffe Calabria coffee beans. The subtle roasted notes and minimal acidity of the cold brewed coffee, balances perfectly with the sweet caramel undertones of the malt, creating a winning combination for your palate.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Gonzo
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Flying Dog Brewery Gonzo Imperial Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Too weird to live, too rare to die, Gonzo Imperial Porter is bold and forceful, like the man it was brewed to honor – Dr. Hunter S. Thompson. Complex layers of roasted chocolate, coffee, brown sugar, and vanilla malt flavors are balanced with a one-of-a-kind hop bite that hits you like a homemade firecracker. Buy the ticket and take the ride by pairing this rich and creamy porter with blue cheeses, smoked meats, BBQ, chili, chocolate and coffee desserts. Best shared with your closest circle of friends— real or hallucinated.Malts: Caramel, Black, ChocolateHops: Northern Brewer, CascadeYeas: American Ale, English AleIBU: 85ABV varies\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Birth Of Tragedy
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Hill Farmstead Brewery Birth Of Tragedy
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Birth of Tragedy is the imperial and oak barrel-aged version of our annual winter porter, Twilight of the Idols. Brewed with locally roasted coffee and Vermont honey, we age this beer for a year in personally selected bourbon barrels from our favorite distilleries.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Gonzo - Barrel-Aged
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Flying Dog Brewery Barrel-Aged Gonzo Imperial Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Aged for months in oak whiskey barrels from A. Smith Bowman, our deep and dark Gonzo gets even more mysterious with notes of vanilla and whiskey warmth.Malts: Caramel, Black, ChocolateHops: Northern Brewer, CascadeYeast: American Ale and English Ale85 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Mogli
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Caldera Brewing Company Mogli
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:'Oak Aged Imperial Porter Brewed with Chocolate'Caldera Kettle SeriesJune 2011 - first release in waxed 22 oz. bottles\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: The Devil Made Me Do It!
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Tyranena Brewing Company The Devil Made Me Do It! Coffee Imperial Oatmeal Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Coffee beans used are a blend of Costa Rican and Sumatran from Berres Brothers Coffee Roasters in Watertown, Wi.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Dirty Old Man Imperial Rye Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Tyranena Brewing Company Dirty Old Man Imperial Rye Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Aged in Rye Whiskey barrels.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Alberta Clipper
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Great Lakes Brewing Company Great Lakes Alberta Clipper

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Devil Over A Barrel Bourbon Barrel-Aged Imperial Coffee Oatmeal Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Tyranena Brewing Company Devil Over A Barrel - Bourbon Barrel-Aged Coffee Imperial Oatmeal Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Imperial Oatmeal Porter. 60% Porter brewed with coffee beans and aged in bourbon barrels blended with 40% Porter brewed with coffee beans.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Yin & Yang
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Evil Twin Brewing Evil Twin Yang

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: (512) Whiskey Barrel Aged Double Pecan Porter(512) Brewing Company
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: (512) Brewing Company (512) Whiskey Barrel Aged Double Pecan Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:(512) Double Pecan Porter is a robust porter accented by locally grown roasted pecans and subtly enhanced by aging in recently emptied oak whiskey barrels. For the first ever bottling, only one 200L barrel was bottled. Notes of chocolate, coffee and pecan marry with the subtle flavors of vanilla and whiskey to make this a wonderful winter warmer worth sharing and savoring. We sincerely hope you enjoy every sip.2010 - Jack Daniels barrels2011 - Maker's Mark barrels2012 - Jack Daniels barrels2013 - Maker's Mark barrels\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Red Eye Coffee Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Two Brothers Brewing Company Red Eye Coffee Porter

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Everett (Barrel Aged)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Hill Farmstead Brewery Everett (Barrel Aged)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Batch 2: Barrel aged for 18 months in hand select bourbon barrels from our favorite distilleries.Batch 3: Our Everett porter aged for over 28 months in hand-selected bourbon barrels from some of our favorite distilleries. 500ml.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Victory At Sea - Barrel-Aged
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Ballast Point Brewing Company Victory At Sea (Barrel Aged) Imperial Porter

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Black Cherry Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Short's Brewing Company Bourbon Black Cherry Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Black Cherry Porter is made using local Northern Michigan sweet black cherries and eight different malts. Combined, the ingredients provide the deep radiant flavor profile and create the dark opaque color. A slight purple lace from the fruit puree enticingly leads into smooth soft hints of roasted chocolate and pleasurable black cherry flavors.55 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Southampton Imperial Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Southampton Publick House Southampton Imperial Porter

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Anubis
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Laughing Dog Brewing Anubis Imperial Coffee Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:A complex Imperial coffee porter made with award-winning Evans Brothers cold-brew coffee. Subtle chocolate and coffee notes are balanced by black malt bitterness and malt sweetness.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Pugsley's Signature Series: Imperial Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Shipyard Brewing Co. Shipyard Imperial Porter (Pugsley's Signature Series)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:A full-bodied, very dark, malty beer with a good roasted character. The beer has an OG of 1.070, rounding out after fermentation with just a slight residual sweetness and cutting dry at the finish.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Pecan Pie Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Clown Shoes Pecan Pie Porter

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Black Ball Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: To Øl Black Ball Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Ingredients: Water, malt (pilsner, smoked, chocolate, cara munich and brown), roasted barley, rolled oats, brown sugar, hops and yeast.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Founders Brewing Company Founders Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:No absence of hops gives Founders' robust porter the full flavor you deserve and expect. 45 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Robust Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Smuttynose Brewing Company Smuttynose Robust Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:This hearty, mahogany colored ale is brewed to evoke the dark, full-bodied ales that were a favorite of dockworkers and warehousemen (hence the name “Porter”) in 19th century London. It is a good bet that when Dickens’ Mr. Pickwick sat down for a pint, we would have been drinking an ale much like our Robust Porter.This is a smooth and very drinkable beer, characterized by its well-balanced malt and hops, plus subtle notes of coffee and chocolate.43 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Icelandic Toasted PorterEinstök Ölgerð (Einstök Beer Company)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Einstök Ölgerð Icelandic Toasted Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:With notes of coffee and dark chocolate, this porter is roasty and rich, with a robust, yet smooth body. Toasted malts give it a sinister black color, but its crisp taste will have you believing that there’s no more need to be afraid of the dark.Lager malt, Munich malt, chocolate malt, Bavarian hops, with the slight addition of authentic Icelandic roasted coffee.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: People's Porter - Barrel-Aged
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Foothills Brewing Company Barrel Aged Peoples' Porter

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Thirsty Trout Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Dark Horse Brewing Company Dark Horse Thirsty Trout Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Thirsty Trout is a rich, robust American Porter. Dark brown in color with medium to heavy body and hints of light roast. Aromas of chocolate leave way to a full mouthfeel and somewhat sweet finish to make this porter a desirable companion. Thirsty Trout is a rich, robust American Porter that will have you yelling "CHOCOLATE!" after the first whiff. Dark brown in color with medium body and hints of light roast. The aromas of chocolate cupcake lead the way to a sweet caramel and toffee body that finish beautifully with hops. Stay trout my friends.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Chief BlackHawk Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Tyranena Brewing Company Chief BlackHawk Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Chief BlackHawk Porter is a robust black and sharply bittersweet ale. This style was traditionally the session beer consumed by the porters in London.Hold your glass to the light and you may glimpse dashes of garnet dancing through this dark, black ale. Count on a dense and creamy mocha head to rise a few inches and leave a sticky, lacy trail down the sides of your glass as it slowly settles.The aroma of coffee beans and bittersweet chocolate will water your mouth. Visions of sticking your finger in a bowl of thick, fudgey batter or stealing a darkened and decadent chocolate chip cookie might creep into your thoughts. A variety of dark, roasted malts…Brown, Chocolate, Black…lend rich flavors and deep colors to this ale.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Payback Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Speakeasy Ales & Lagers Payback Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:American hops provide a smooth distraction for Payback Porter’s robust strength, which is concealed within the shadows of dark imported malts. Brewed with English chocolate malts and rolled oats, this Robust Porter pours a deep chocolate brown and is rich in roasted malt aromas and coffee flavors. With notes of espresso, baker’s cocoa, and sweet, toasted maltiness, Payback finishes with a creamy mouthfeel.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Bobo's Robust Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Big Sky Brewing Company Bobo's Robust Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:A small bottle with big flavor! Brewed with six different malts and generously hopped, robust doesn't really begin to describe this beer. Smooth chocolate flavors with hints of Coffee, Caramel and Vanilla. Hop presence is copious and is matched by rich malt flavors.32 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Black Robusto Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Drake's Brewing Co. Drake's Black Robusto Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:A robust Porter, Drake’s Black Robusto has a roasty character and is stronger in alcohol than a regular porter (thus “robust’). Dark black in color with chocolate maltiness from seven different types of barley and spicy herbal hop character from Northdown and Williamette hops.25 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Pile O' Dirt Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Crow Peak Brewing Pile O' Dirt Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:This robust porter is black in color, is medium-bodied and has a rich, roasted malt flavor ending with a pleasing hop flavor and mild hop bitterness.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Penetration Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Kuhnhenn Brewing Company Kuhnhenn Penetration Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:This black in color porter has a roasty, caramel, low hop aroma. It has a lightly burnt malty taste with a medium dry finish. A clean refreshing porter.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Gran Sport Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Coop Ale Works Gran-Sport Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Gran Sport is a robust porter marked by its finesse and distinct malt backbone. Aromatic notes of chocolate and roasted coffee compliment the full-bodied mouthfeel derived from a healthy addition of oat flakes. Dark. Roasty. Malty. Splendid.43 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Black Earth PorterGreat Dane Pub & Brewing Company (Downtown)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Great Dane Pub & Brewing Company (Downtown) Black Earth Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Dark and full-bodied, this is our interpretation of the classic English Porter style. Made with nine varieties of malt and assertively hopped, our porter is packed with flavor. Strong coffee and chocolate tones create a special brew for those advancing on the path of fine beer appreciation.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Black Cat Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Brewery: Zero Gravity Craft Brewery / American Flatbread
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Zero Gravity Craft Brewery / American Flatbread Black Cat Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:A robust dark ale with plenty of roasted malt character. Coffee, chocolatey goodness with enough hops to balance. Put your 9th grade superstitious self aside and cross paths with this nimble beast.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Robust Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Bridge Road Brewers Robust Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Big chocolate, roasted and mocha notes are the key to this style. A wise country football coach once said: “there’s no point half doing something”. And in making this porter we’ve taken his advice on board, our Robust Porter uses plenty of roast barley and chocolate malt to give you a big porter that won’t leave you asking for more.Try this one with dark chocolate and liquorice. Bridge Road’s Porter, like many of its beers, pulls no punches. Make no mistake, the Robust Porter is big and bold, yet its smooth roasty texture makes it one to convert the non-dark drinker. Match it with rich chocolate deserts, cold winter nights or freshly shucked oysters.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Robust Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Emmett's Brewing Company Robust Porter

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Smoked Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Stone Brewing Co. Stone Smoked Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:A porter with hints of chocolate & coffee balanced by subtle smokinessFirst Release: December 1996When first released, our smoky version of a traditional English porter was ahead of its time. Today, it's a highly regarded staple among craft beer fans and our go-to food complement, pairing effortlessly with all kinds of cuisine, from peanut butter and banana sandwiches to braised pork belly and apple pie. This worldly libation is dark, smooth and complex, with chocolate and coffee flavors suffused with subtle smokiness from the addition of peat-smoked malt.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Smoked Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Alaskan Brewing Co. Alaskan Smoked Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:The dark, robust body and pronounced smoky flavor of this limited edition beer make it an adventuresome taste experience. Alaskan Smoked Porter is produced in limited "vintages" each year on November 1 and unlike most beers, may be aged in the bottle much like fine wine.45 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Smoked Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: O'Fallon Brewery Smoke (Smoked Porter)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Dark, rich and smoky…this classic porter is brewed with 63% German smoked malt and makes a perfect after dinner (or anytime) sipper for those who love a “bigger” beer. Winner of the Gold Medal in the 2004 Great American Beer Festival® for best Smoked Beer in America!24 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: London Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Arcadia Brewing Company Arcadia London Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:This 18th Century-style Smoked Porter has subtle accent of peat-like Bamberg smoked malt, which is apparent in both the aroma and flavor. It is brewed with seven varieties of premium European malted barley, resulting in note of bittersweet chocolate and coffee that are counter-balanced by a long-sustaining finish of Goldings hops.42 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Benji's Chipotle Smoked Imperial Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Tyranena Brewing Company Benji's Chipotle Smoked Imperial Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Big, black and smokey, an imperial porter, rich full-bodied with a silky chocolate crown. Dark roasted flavors host the smokey character of wood-fired malt while chipotle peppers add a smoldering tickle of heat.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Pleasantville Smoked Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Captain Lawrence Brewing Co. Pleasantville Smoked Porter

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Mesquite Smoked Porter - MSP
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Ranger Creek Brewing & Distilling Mesquite Smoked Porter - MSP

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Viven Porter / Viven Smoked Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brouwerij Van Viven Viven Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Viven porter is a rather bitter porter with nice roasted flavours. Viven porter is an art of brewing. The Porter has a very enjoyable aftertaste and makes many friends.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Leaning Chimney Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Brewery: Grey Sail Brewing of Rhode Island
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Grey Sail Brewing of Rhode Island Leaning Chimney Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Our winter seasonal is brewed in the robust porter style using peat-smoked malt. The addition of American hops create a piney-resin flavor with a smooth finish. Copious amounts of black malt lend to a khaki-colored head and dark chocolate backbone.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: The Big Smoke
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: 8 Wired Brewing Co. The Big Smoke
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Now what is this? A smoked beer?? It really isn't as crazy as it sounds. 250 years ago virtually all beers were smoked (it's true, Google it!), but with the dawning of the industrial revolution most of the smoke lifted. However, in the German town of Bamberg the flame has quite literally been kept alive and to this day the town’s brewers produce world renowned beers brewed with their own special rauchmalz (beechwood smoked malt).We’ve taken our best porter recipe and added a good measure of that same Bamberg Rauchmalz. The smoke mingles beautifully with the rich, dark roasted chocolate flavours of the porter without being overpowering. Although it pairs extremely well with smoked seafood, barbeques, strong cheeses and hearty stews, its food friendliness isn’t limited to savouries; chocolate and caramel based deserts are great companions too! Trust us; it really isn't as crazy as it sounds.40 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Smokestack
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: East End Brewing Company Smokestack Heritage Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Nov/Dec release.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Smoke Signal
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Swamp Head Brewery & Tasting Room Smoke Signal
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Smoke Signal is an American style Robust Porter, using a generous amount of pale ale malt smoked with Alderwood, the smoke source used in the Pacific Northwest for salmon. We smoke 150 pounds of pale malt for each 10 barrel batch of Smoke Signal.Alderwood imparts a slightly sweet smoke flavor that balances well with the residual sweetness of the beer imparted through the use of dark crystal malts; chocolate and roasted barleys combine with American hops to deliver a flavorful robust porter with just the right amount of smoked flavor.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Double Porter Smoked
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Rock Art Brewery Double Porter Smoked
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:This deep dark brew may help to tame those cool evenings and put a little spunk in the long nights. You’ll flavor the sweet caramel malts, roasted grains, a big mouth feel and a touch of smoked grain.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Up In Smoke Smoked Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Fat Heads Brewery & Saloon Up In Smoke Smoked Porter

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Smoked Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Choc Beer Co. / Pete's Place Smoked Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:42 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Campfire Smoked Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Throwback Brewery Throwback Campfire Smoked Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Campfire is a full-bodied, robust smoked porter. We put a lot of love into this beer – hand-smoking the malt on local applewood, giving this beer a very appealing and balanced smoky flavor & aroma. The result? Jet-black roasty toasty goodness.Since we took care to craft this beer with just the right balance of smokiness, you can pair Campfire with a wide variety of foods – especially barbecue! Or, for dessert, you might want to simulate a beautiful night outdoors by pairing Campfire with S’mores!48 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Smokebrush Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Bristol Brewing Company Smokebrush Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Fashioned in the Robust Porter style, mahogany-hued Smokebrush Porter is a richly roasted, gratifying brew. A clever combination of malts smoked on peat and beechwood add an ever-so-slightly smoky character to the finish. Look for a new label designed each year by a local artist. One of our Community Ales, 100% of the profits from this beer go to the Smokebrush Foundation for the Arts and their Creative Community Efforts, like the Uncle Wilber Fountain.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Vermont Smoked Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: The Vermont Pub & Brewery Vermont Smoked Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:We smoke our own malts over apple, maple and hickory woodchips to recreate this 17th Century Style robust ale.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Big Black Smoke
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Great Lakes Brewing Company Great Lakes Big Black Smoke

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Smoked Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Spring House Brewing Company Smoked Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Prior to brewing our Smoked Porter, Matt selects specialty malts to be smoked over an open flame, imparting a unique flavor profile in the porter. The malts are smoked using apple and hickory wood for a full 72 hours. Spring House Brewing Co. chose to smoke the grain in a local smoke house that dates back to the late 19th century. This one-of-a-kind smoke house imparts layers of smoky depth to the beer that cannot be replicated. Enjoy!\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Smoked Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Feral Brewing Co. Smoked Porter

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Smoke House Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Brewery: Moat Mountain Smoke House & Brewing Co.
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Moat Mountain Smoke House & Brewing Co. Moat Smoke House Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Our version of a robust porter, dark malt dominates the flavor profile, mouth feel is lighter than our stout, bitterness balanced to allow the specialty grains to shine.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Smoked Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Middle Ages Brewing Co., Ltd. Smoked Porter

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Porter, Smoked
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: COAST Brewing Company Porter, Smoked
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:We took a classic Ameican Porter and brewed it with 40% Briess cherry wood smoked malt. Lower in alcohol to allow the maltiness through. Black in color, medium body, soft hops and intensely smoky.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Smoked Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Captain Lawrence Brewing Co. Imperial Smoked Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:A complex beer with layers of flavors unfolding as this it slides down your throat. Before the introduction of indirect-fired malt kilns, all beers had a smoky flavor. Today only a handful of brewers produce beer reminiscent of those of the past. We use imported German smoked malt to add depth and complexity to our Smoked Porter.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Smoked Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Davidson Brothers Restaurant & Brewery Smoked Porter

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Pumking
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Southern Tier Brewing Company Pumking
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:19 Degrees Plato8.8 Degrees L2-row Pale MaltCaramel MaltPureed PumpkinKettle Hops: MagnumAroma Hops: Sterling\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Punkin Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Dogfish Head Brewery Punkin Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Also known as Punkin Brown AleA full-bodied brown ale with smooth hints of pumpkin and brown sugar. We brew our Punkin Ale with pumpkin meat, brown sugar and spices. As the season cools, this is the perfect beer to warm up with.Punkin Ale is named after the seriously off-centered southern Delaware extravaganza Punkin Chunkin (check out some of these Discovery Channel videos of Punkin Chunkin, you gotta see it to believe it!). In fact, Punkin Ale made its debut as it claimed first prize in the 1994 Punkin Chunkin Recipe Contest. Yes, that was a full 6 months before we even opened our doors for business! 28 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Pumpkinhead Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Shipyard Brewing Co. Pumpkinhead Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Pumpkinhead is a crisp, refreshing wheat ale with delightful aromatics and subtle spice flavor. To celebrate the fall season, we enhance the pumpkin flavor with a proprietary blend of spices including cinnamon and nutmeg.A proper pint of Pumpkinhead is served in a pint glass rimmed with sugar and cinnamon and often accompanied by a shot of spiced rum or vanilla vodka.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Imperial Pumpkin Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Weyerbacher Brewing Co. Imperial Pumpkin Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:We set out to make a bold monument for The King of the Pumpkins!This 8.0% ABV pumpkin ale is the mother of all pumpkin ales. It is heartier, spicier and more “caramelly” and “pumpkiny” than its faint brethren! We have added lots of pumpkin along with cinnamon, nutmeg and a touch of cardamom and clove, giving this beer a spicy, full-bodied flavor.This truly is an Imperial Pumpkin Ale. Perfect finisher on a cool autumn night or match it up with a slice of pumpkin pie and fresh whipped cream.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Samuel Adams Harvest Pumpkin AleBoston Beer Company (Samuel Adams)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Boston Beer Company (Samuel Adams) Samuel Adams Harvest Pumpkin Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Brought back in 2010\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Post Road Pumpkin Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brooklyn Brewery Post Road Pumpkin Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Early American colonialists, seeking natural ingredients for brewing ales, turned to pumpkins, which were plentiful, flavorful and nutritious. Blended with barley malt, pumpkins became a commonly used beer ingredient. Post Road Pumpkin Ale brings back this tasty tradition. Hundreds of pounds of pumpkins are blended into the mash of each batch, creating a beer with an orange amber color, warm pumpkin aroma, biscuity malt center, and crisp finish.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Pumpkin Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Smuttynose Brewing Company Smuttynose Pumpkin Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Smuttynose Pumpkin Ale is our homage to the craft and heritage of America’s brewers. Recipes calling for the use of pumpkins in beer date back to early colonial times, when brewers sought to extend their supply of costly imported malt with locally grown ingredients, such as squash and “pompions.”In that spirit, we brew our ale with the addition of pumpkin to the mash, along with traditional spices to create a delicious American original.45 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Pugsley's Signature Series: Smashed Pumpkin
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Shipyard Brewing Co. Shipyard Smashed Pumpkin (Pugsley's Signature Series)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:A big-bodied beer with a light coppery orange color and pleasing aromas of pumpkin and nutmeg.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Ichabod Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: New Holland Brewing Company New Holland Ichabod Ale

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Rumpkin
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Avery Brewing Company Rumpkin
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:We wondered what would happen if a monstrous pumpkin ale, plump full of spicy gourdiness, were aged in fine fresh rum barrels to add suggestions of delicate oak and candied molasses. Rumpkin is what happened! This first member of the Annual Barrel-Aged Series was brewed with roasted pumpkins from a local Boulder County farm, and spiced with nutmeg, cinnamon, and ginger.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Good Gourd Imperial Pumpkin Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Cigar City Brewing Good Gourd Imperial Pumpkin Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Legend has it that when a pumpkin comes into the world it is possessed by either a good or an evil spirit. Ours got all the good baby! Bursting with real pumpkin flavor and yummy pumpkin spices including Ceylon cinnamon, Jamaican all-spice, Zanzibar cloves and nutmeg, Good Gourd is a celebration of Fall and that spookiest of holidays, Halloween. Pair Good Gourd with pumpkin soup, pumpkin pie and costume parties.35 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Night Owl Pumpkin Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Elysian Brewing Company Night Owl Pumpkin Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Brewed with 150 lbs. of pumpkin in each batch. Made with Pale, Munich and Crystal malts green and roasted pumpkin seeds, pumpkin in the mash, boil and fermenter. Bittered with Horizon hops. Spiced in conditioning with nutmeg, clove, cinnamon, ginger and allspice.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Buffalo Bill's Pumpkin Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Buffalo Bill's Brewery Buffalo Bill's Pumpkin Ale

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Saranac Pumpkin Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Matt Brewing Company Saranac Pumpkin Ale

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: UFO Pumpkin
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Harpoon Brewery UFO Pumpkin
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Imagine a pumpkin vine wound its way in a field of barley, and a brewer harvested it all to make a beer. Add Northwestern hops and a blend of spices, and you've got UFO Pumpkin. The malt combination provides a smooth body and slightly sweet flavor, which balances perfectly with the earthy notes derived from the pure pumpkin. And like all of our UFO beers, UFO Pumpkin is unfiltered so all the wonderful flavors are right there in your glass. Cheers!20 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Pumpkinator
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Saint Arnold Brewing Company Pumpkinator
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:This is the same beer as Divine Reserve #9. If you have already reviewed that beer, please do not review it again here or you risk losing the older review when the listings are merged.http://www.saintarnold.com/beers/pumpkinator.html

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: La Parcela
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Jolly Pumpkin Artisan Ales La Parcela

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: The Great’ER Pumpkin
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Heavy Seas Beer Heavy Seas - The Great Pumpkin
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:In the most worthy of pumpkin patches and during the silence of the midnight hour, the Greater Pumpkin raises up and pours a rich deep and burnished orange color. Heady aromas of bourbon, cinnamon, ginger, allspice and clove linger seductively over the thick white head of this tremendous brew. Its love at first sip as the full malt body, dominated by British crystal malt, brown sugar and pumpkin, slowly washes over your tongue. Bourbon barrel aging rounds out the flavors with notes of oak, vanilla, and bourbon. Pairs well with crisp autumn weather, crunchy fallen leaves, and the knowledge that your kids will be asleep soon so you can raid their Halloween candy bags.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: The Great Pumpkin
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Elysian Brewing Company The Great Pumpkin

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Frog's Hollow Double Pumpkin Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Hoppin' Frog Brewery Frog's Hollow Double Pumpkin Ale

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Dark O' The Moon
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Elysian Brewing Company Dark O' The Moon
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Spookily smooth and chocolatey. A perennial favorite and 2010 Silver medalist in the Great American Beer Festival Field Beer category, Dark o' the Moon is brewed with Great Western pale, Crisp 77° Crystal, Munich, Cara-Vienne, roasted, chocolate and Special B malts with roasted pumpkin seeds in the mash. Pumpkin in the mash, kettle and fermenter. Bittered with Magnum and finished with Saaz and crushed cinnamon.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Pumple Drumkin Spiced Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Cisco Brewers Inc. Pumple Drumkin Spiced Ale

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: The Fear
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Flying Dog Brewery The Fear
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Why is there only one time of the year - as goblins, ghouls and ghosts frolic on front lawns - when we embrace THE FEAR? At all other times, THE FEAR dominates us, controls us and prevents us from greatness. What is there to THE FEAR? Disagreement? Criticism? Humiliation? Whatever THE FEAR is that consumes you, embrace it. Only then will the true artist in you rise up.Malts: Carabrown, Midnight Wheat, Chocolate, ViennaHops: Warrior, WillametteYeast: American AleIBU: 45Special: 300 pounds of pumpkin added per 50 barrels\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Pumpkin Beer
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: O'Fallon Brewery Pumpkin Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Like pumpkin pie in a bottle...we add 136 pounds of real pumpkin to the three-barley mash and then season the finished beer with cinnamon, nutmeg and cloves.11 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Southampton Pumpkin Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Southampton Publick House Southampton Pumpkin Ale

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Fisherman's Pumpkin Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Cape Ann Brewing Company Fisherman's Pumpkin Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Had been 6.75% ABV.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Pumking - Rum Barrel Aged
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Southern Tier Brewing Company Oak Aged Pumking
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Back in 2014 we had the good fortune of finding a cache of rum barrels which we quickly filled with Pumking making what was affectionately called “Rumking.” We were lucky to have found more barrels, and in 2018, found some of the best we’ve ever used. This batch is at least as delicious as versions past.Imagine our inimitable Imperial Pumking Ale as the captain on the high seas, flying the Jolly Roger. The ‘King sails for ports unknown in this limited release. Rum Barrel Aged Pumking has been kept like secret treasure in the hollows of the brewery, patiently awaiting discovery. Yo ho ho!Enjoy Rum Barrel Aged Pumking now, or keep it hidden standing upright in a dark and cool place until you can say ‘anchors aweigh!’2018 New label design, same great Rum Barrel Aged Pumking!ABV varies by batch.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Spooky Tooth Imperial Pumpkin
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Fat Heads Brewery & Saloon Spooky Tooth Imperial Pumpkin
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Rich amber color with aroma of sweet pumpkin pie and savory spices. Creamy mouthfeel with flavors of pumpkin followed by sweet malt, pie crust, spice, hints of brown sugar and a clean finish.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Hipp-O-Lantern Imperial Pumpkin Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: River Horse Brewing Co. Hipp-O-Lantern
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:A festive Ale brewed with pumpkin and molasses. A variety of hand-crushed, whole spices set up an impressive aroma and well balanced taste.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Mother Pumpkin Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Blue Point Brewing Company Blue Point's Mother Pumpkin Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Formerly Blue Point Pumpkin AleOur golden orange-colored Pumpkin Ale is brewed with pumpkin and spices to produce a delicious taste of fall. This mild ale has little bitterness and a malty backbone. The spicy characteristics take the lead in this roasty beer and its tremendous depth of character will keep you warm during the fall season.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Abt 12
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brouwerij St. Bernardus NV St. Bernardus Abt 12
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:St. Bernardus Abt 12 is widely regarded as one of the best beers in the world. It is therefore no surprise that it is our brewery’s flagship beer, ranked at the very top of the St. Bernardus beer hierarchy. It is brewed in the classic quadrupel style and adheres to the original 1946 recipe.ColourThis is a dark beer with a robust head that is ivory in colour.CharacteristicsColor: DarkType of beer: Quadruple / Top fermentationAlcohol degree: 10 %° Plato: 20Recommended pouring temperature: 8 - 12 °CColor (EBC): 60Bitterness (EBU): 20Shelf life: 4 years (bottle) / 1,5 years (keg)Packaging: Bottle: 33 cl / 75 cl - Keg: 20 L\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Trappistes Rochefort 10
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brasserie de Rochefort Trappistes Rochefort 10

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Three Philosophers
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brewery Ommegang Three Philosophers Belgian Style Blend (Quadrupel)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Three Philosophers is a unique blend of a Belgian-style dark ale and Liefmans Kriek, an authentic cherry ale from Belgium. Cherry chestnut in color, it's opaque but not cloudy with full carbonation topped by a smooth, tan head. Flavors and aromas of roasted malt, molasses and brown sugar, dark fruits, brandied raisins and chocolate, Three Philosophers has notable sweetness with low hop bitterness. The mid-palate shows a soft malt center which gives way to a dry, warm, wine-like finish.The complexity of this beer make it a good candidate for ageing gracefully, as spicy sherry and port notes should intensify.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Trappist Westvleteren 12 (XII)Brouwerij Westvleteren (Sint-Sixtusabdij van Westvleteren)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brouwerij Westvleteren (Sint-Sixtusabdij van Westvleteren) Trappist Westvleteren 12
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:The heaviest of the Westvleteren beers, the 12 is a quadrupel style beer, which can be recognized by its yellow cap. Like the other Westvleteren beers, the bottle does not have a label, and the cap therefore has all the required information.The Westvleteren 12 has always been rated high on beer reviews, and is by some considered to be the best beer in the world.Just as the other Westvleteren beers, it can only legally be purchased at the monestary (on appointment) or in the bar across the street. However, it often finds its way on the grey market where it's sold at high prices.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: The Sixth Glass Quadrupel Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Boulevard Brewing Co. The Sixth Glass
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:”Do you know what dwells in a glass?” asks Ole, in Hans Christian Andersen's The Watchman of the Tower. Better known for stories such as The Little Mermaid, Andersen wrote this short, cautionary tale for a somewhat older audience. Our quadrupel ale, also meant for the mature connoisseur, is a deep and mysterious libation, dark auburn and full-bodied, its sweetness deceptive. As Ole describes the glasses in turn, their contents become more ominous until, in the sixth glass...22 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Stickee Monkee
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Firestone Walker Brewing Co. Sticky Monkey
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:It has been said that the only constant is change and the same is true for barrel-aged beers. Cut from a similar recipe, this barrel-aged Quad evolves and shows a different face each year; a result of time spent aging in the barrel. Turbinado brown sugar from Mexico adds wonderful molasses flavors that are reminiscent of Belgian candi sugar. It has a full body and lush texture with barrel expression all over; toasted oak, coconut, leather and rich cigar tobacco.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Bourbon Barrel Quad Barrel-Aged Ale (BBQ)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Boulevard Brewing Co. Bourbon Barrel Quad (BBQ)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Based loosely on the Smokestack Series’ The Sixth Glass, this abbey-style quadrupel is separated into a number of oak bourbon barrels where it ages for varying lengths of time, some for up to three years. Cherries are added to make up for the “angel's share” of beer lost during barrel aging. Selected barrels are then blended for optimum flavor. The resulting beer retains only very subtle cherry characteristics, with toffee and vanilla notes coming to the fore.19 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: La Trappe Quadrupel (Koningshoeven / Dominus)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Bierbrouwerij De Koningshoeven B.V. La Trappe Quadrupel (Koningshoeven / Dominus)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Quadrupel is La Trappe’s heaviest ale with a stunning amber colour. Its warm and intense flavour is rich and finely balanced. Malty sweet, slightly burnt, and pleasantly bitter with a sweet aftertaste. Quadrupel continues to ferment after bottling and offers aromas of banana, almond, vanilla and others.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Pannepot
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: De Struise Brouwers Pannepot
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Old Fisherman's Ale is a dark ale brewed with spices. Pannepot is a term that describes the Fishing Boats from the village of De Panne. Brewed and bottled on the Deca Brewery in Woesten-Vleteren.EBC:99, IBU:27, OG:1100, FG:1025, ABV:10%Hops: Bramling Cross, Hallaertau MF\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Christmas Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brouwerij St. Bernardus NV Christmas Ale

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Terrible
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Unibroue La Terrible
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:In 2002, when the SAQ requested an exclusive new high-end product, Unibroue responded with Terrible. Given its dark colour and 10.5% alcohol content (a first for Unibroue), we knew that this Belgian quadruple-style ale might very well be greeted with reticence.So we gave it a name that would evoke terror and worry, but also something extraordinary, formidable and awe-inspiring. From here on out, no other beer can ever be called Terrible.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: The Reverend
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Avery Brewing Company The Reverend
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Beer Style: Belgian Style Quadrupel AleHop Variety: SterlingMalt Variety: Two-row barley, Aromatic malt, Cara-45, Cara-20, Special BSugars: Belgian Candy SugarOG: 1.085 ABV: 10.0% IBUs: 24 Color: TawnyThe Reverend, was created in tribute to the life of our friend Tom Boogaard’s grandfather, an ordained Episcopal Reverend. Tom was inspired by the life of his grandfather and wanted to create a tribute beer that contained his sterling traits. True to the spirit and character of the departed Reverend, this beer is strong willed, assertive, and pure of heart.Our brewers included as many authentic imported Belgian specialty malts as they could, making this the perfect beer for folks who love malty beers and are ready to take the next step. A divinely complex and beautifully layered beer with hints of dark cherries, currants, and molasses, complimented by an underlying spiciness. Sinfully smooth considering the high alcohol content.The Reverend is the second installment of “The Holy Trinity of Ales” series.Food pairing: Try The Reverend with a gyro or paired with our favorite: steamed spicy saffron mussels.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: V-Twelve
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Victory Brewing Company V-Twelve
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Heady with a aromatic fruity start and taste, this amber ale features hints of pear and apricot in its well-nuanced flavor. The initial impression of fruitiness concludes in a refreshing dryness that begs you to sip again. Be fore- warned, this ale is immense as it registers 12% abv.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Gulden Draak 9000 Quadruple
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brouwerij Van Steenberge N.V. Gulden Draak Quad

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Quad
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Weyerbacher Brewing Co. Quad

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Pannepot Reserva
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: De Struise Brouwers Pannepot Reserva

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Judgment Day
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: The Lost Abbey Judgment Day
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:A massive beer in every sense of the word. A stronger and more contemplative version of our Lost and Found Ale. Judgment Day is the base beer for our Cuvee de Tomme. Many of the Trappist Breweries produce a version of beer which ages incredibly well for many years to come. And, since none of us knows when the end of the world is coming, we suggest you stock up with lots of Lost Abbey beers so that when the end of the world magically appears from no where, you’ll have a beer or two on hand for even the stingiest of angels.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Kasteel Rouge
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brouwerij Van Honsebrouck N.V. Kasteel Rouge
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Kasteel Rouge is a blend of Kasteel Donker (Quad) and cherry liquor. The mix of these two excellent products creates an exceptional soft beer with references to the dark mother beer.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Blasphemy
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Weyerbacher Brewing Co. Blasphemy

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Kasteel Donker
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brouwerij Van Honsebrouck N.V. Kasteel Donker

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Straffe Hendrik Quadrupel
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Brewery: Brouwerij Straffe Hendrik / Huisbrouwerij De Halve Maan
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brouwerij Straffe Hendrik / Huisbrouwerij De Halve Maan Straffe Hendrik Quadrupel

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Rigor Mortis Abt
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brasserie Dieu Du Ciel Rigor Mortis ABT
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Strong brown ale inspired by the beer brewed by Belgian Trappist monks. Very little bitterness, this beer has intense malty and sweet flavours, mixed with the taste of chocolate and caramel. It presents complex red fruit and spice flavours due to the type of yeast that is used during the brewing process. This beer is at its best only after it has aged for six months. The Rigor Mortis are complex beers designed and brewed with patience and care in the tradition of the great Belgian Abbey beers.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Smuttynose Gravitation (Big Beer Series)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Smuttynose Brewing Company Smuttynose Gravitation (Big Beer Series)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:This big, dark ale is brewed using a variety of Belgian specialty malts along with 200 pounds of raisin puree per batch. The resulting flavor is a viscous mix of dark fruit, rum, toffee and raisins balanced with aromatic fruitiness of the Belgian yeast.25 IBU2009 - 6.6%2010 - 12.0%2011 - 12.5%2012 - 12.0%2013 - 11.5%2015 - 12.3%\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: La Trappe Quadrupel - Oak-Aged
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Bierbrouwerij De Koningshoeven B.V. La Trappe Quadrupel Barrique (Oak Aged)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:In 2009, the Koningshoeven brewery reinstated an age-old tradition: aging La Trappe Quadrupel in oak barrels (also known as ‘barriques’).This way of aging ale results in a unique, complex flavour, which varies from one type of barrel to another. Quadrupel can be conserved for many years, and is a real treat for true ale enthusiasts. And this is yet another ale that continues to ferment after bottling, while its rich taste and high tannin content are likely to even surprise many a wine drinker!BATCH 1 (blended on June 1, 2010). New Oak Heavy Toast - 18.2%New Medium Acasia - 9.1%Port Medium Burnt - 36.4%Port Medium Toast - 36.4%BATCH 2 (blended on July 26, 2010). New Medium Oak Toast - 9%Port Medium Burnt Toast (Amer. Oak) - 64%Port Medium Burnt Toast (French Oak) - 9%Port Medium Toast (French Oak) - 18%BATCH 3 (blended on September 17, 2010).New Oak Medium Toast - 18%Port Medium Toast (French Oak) - 55%La Trappe Q. Medium Toast (French Oak) - 27%BATCH 4 (blended on 5 November 2010).New Oak Medium Toast - 27%Port Medium Toast (French Oak) - 9%La Trappe Q. Medium Toast (French Oak) - 18%La Trappe Q. Medium burnt (Amer. Oak) - 36%New Oak Heavy Toast - 10%BATCH 5 (blended on January 25, 2011):New Oak Heavy Toast - 20%White wine used Oak Heavy Toast - 80%BATCH 8 (blended in October 2011):Whiskey - 70%New Fr. Oak Medium Toast - 30%BATCH 14 (blended on June 24, 2013).Acacia Wood - 7% New Oak Barrels - 11% Limousine Barrels with Cognac - 82%BATCH16 (blended in March 2014)Brandy\t36,5%Oloroso\t27%New Oak Medium Toast\t10%New Oak High Toast\t10%Late Burgundy\t10%BATCH 28 Bruichladdich Port Charlotte Single Malt 71%New Oak Medium Toast 29%BATCH 30Cachaça 80%New Oak Medium Toast 20%BATCH 33:Bourbon US 80%New Oak Medium Toast 15%New Oak High Toast 5%\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Urthel SamaranthDe Leyerth Brouwerijen (Urthel)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: De Leyerth Brouwerijen (Urthel) Urthel Samaranth

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Kasteel Cuvée Du Chateau
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brouwerij Van Honsebrouck N.V. Kasteel Cuvée Du Chateau

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Malheur 12°
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brouwerij De Landtsheer NV Malheur 12°

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Grand Cru
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brasserie de l'Abbaye du Val-Dieu Val-Dieu Grand Cru

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: St. Amatus 12
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: De Struise Brouwers St. Amatus 12

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Box Of Chocolate
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Charleville Vineyard Microbrewery Box Of Chocolate
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:It's Difficult to express Love's nuances, much like the complexity of this Belgian style Chocolate Quad. You Might use a Box of Chocolate to express your love, we use it to demonstrate our passion for great beer.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Ichor
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Sly Fox Brewing Company Ichor
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:This Abbey-style Quadruple brewed with German Pils and Roast malts and dark candi sugar, hopped with German Tradition hops. Luscious and seductive, Ichor is brewed for both the body and the soul. This beer will improve with careful aging but is ready to drink now.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Hertog Jan Grand PrestigeArcense Stoombierbouwerij (Hertog Jan Brouwerij)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Arcense Stoombierbouwerij (Hertog Jan Brouwerij) Hertog Jan Grand Prestige

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: 't Smisje BBBourgondier
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brouwerij Smisje 't Smisje BBBourgondier
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Currently only 50 cases of this beer are available per year. Brewed in honor of the Burgundian Babble Belt.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Three Philosophers - Bourbon Barrel-Aged
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brewery Ommegang Bourbon Barrel Aged Three Philosophers
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:We have a new twist on an old favorite coming out in February. Our unique Three Philosophers Quardupel Ale is universally-known as the preferred elixir of life’s meditators, thinkers and theorizers. Now, thanks to Brewmaster Phil Leinhart and the 24 bourbon barrels he got his hands on, mullers of life’s mysteries can ponder all the more deeply. “We’ve experimented with barrel aging in the past and had great success,” said Brewmaster Phil Leinhart. “Three Philosophers is such a lovely, complex beer and it ages so beautifully that we thought it the perfect fit for pairing with bourbon barrels. The result is exactly what we hoped for: even more complex flavors and a slightly fuller body than the standard. We’re sure this’ll be a crowd pleaser.”Like the original, Bourbon Barrel-aged Three Philosophers pours a deep burgundy hue with a fluffy, off-white head. Patience through the aging process rewarded the brewers with flavors of caramel, raisin, dried fruit, molasses, and vanilla and aromas of oak, vanilla, and subtle hints of cherry. The body is ample but still finishes faintly dry with lingering hints of malt, bourbon, and cherry. The effects of barrel-aging, eliciting remnant alcohol from the cooperage during the aging process, escalated the ABV of the beer from 9.7% to a significant, yet sneakily subtle, 11.4% ABV.ABV varies by batch\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Fat Tire Amber Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: New Belgium Brewing Fat Tire Amber Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Fat Tire Amber is the easy-drinking Amber Ale born in Colorado from New Belgium Brewing Company, a certified B-Corp. \t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Hopback Amber Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Tröegs Brewing Company Tröegs Hopback Amber Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Standing 12 ft. tall at the center of the brew deck is our HopBack vessel; here, whole flower hops swirl in hot wort coaxing hop oil into aromas of grapefruit pith and pinesap. This bright hop nose is counterbalanced with malt tones of toffee and Caramel.Hops: Cascade, Willamette, Nugget, Crystal55 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Censored
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Lagunitas Brewing Company Censored
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:35 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Red Rocket Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Bear Republic Brewing Co. Red Rocket Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Red Rocket Ale is a bastardized Scottish style red ale that traces it's origins to our homebrew roots. This full bodied and hoppy brew finishes on the palate with sweet, caramel malt flavors.2009 California State Fair - SILVER1999 Great American Beer Festival® Other Strong Ales or Lagers - SILVER1998 Great American Beer Festival® Other Strong Ales - SILVER\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Zoe
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Maine Beer Company Zoe
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Our take on an American amber ale. Complex malt bill delivers notes of dark raisin, chocolate and biscuit. Copious additions of American hops yield notes of pine and citrus.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Santa's Private Reserve Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Rogue Ales Santa's Private Reserve Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:10 Ingredients:Carastan 30-37 & 13-17, Crystal 70-80 & Rogue Micro Barley Farm Dare? & Risk? Malts; Chinook & Rogue Farm Revolution & Freedom Hops; Free Range Coastal Water and Pacman Yeast. 13º PLATO65 IBU73.1 AA26.75º L\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Red Seal Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: North Coast Brewing Co. Ruedrich's Red Seal Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Formerly known as: Ruedrich's Red Seal AleMalt and hops are beautifully married in this full-bodied, copper-red Pale Ale. Red Seal is generously hopped for a long, spicy finish. An excellent accompaniment to grilled meats and rich sauces.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Boont Amber Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Anderson Valley Brewing Company Boont Amber Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Balance is what makes our Boont Amber Ale so unique: rich, crystal malts give this beer a deep copper hue and contribute a slight caramel sweetness while the herbal, spicy bitterness from carefully selected whole-cone hops impart a crisp, clean finish. Hints of sun toasted grain, toffee, and fruity esters compliment the mellow, noble hop aroma.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Tocobaga Red Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Cigar City Brewing Tocobaga Red Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Pours amber in color with notes of citrus and caramel. Citrus hop bitterness upfront with notes of caramel and an Amish bread sweetness. Citrus hop bitterness returns at the end for a long dry finish.75 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Gaelic Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Highland Brewing Highland Gaelic Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:A deep amber colored American ale, featuring a rich malty body. Cascade and Willamette hops add a complex hop flavor and aroma. This ale is exceptionally balanced between malty sweetness and delicate hop bitterness.Hops: Chinook, Willamette and Cascade32 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: American Amber Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Rogue Ales American Amber Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:American Amber Ale is the second-ever beer created by Rogue’s brewmaster John Maier. This tawny amber brew with a toffee aroma, delicate roasted malt notes and smooth finish displays what beer judges call the “perfect embodiment of an American Amber Ale."Ingredients: C40, C150, 2-Row & Rogue Farms Dare™ & Risk™ Malts; Rogue Farms Rebel Hops; Free Range Coastal Water & Pacman Yeast.13º PLATO53 IBU73.1 AA23º Lovibond\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Avalanche Amber Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Breckenridge Brewery Avalanche Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:This classic American amber ale blends pale, chocolate, and caramel malts to create a well-rounded, flavorful beer. Caramel malts lend whispers of toffee and an enjoyable sweetness, while a touch of bittering hops gives this beer its clean finish. Crafted for balance, Avalanche is a versatile and satisfying anytime beer.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: CascaZilla
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Ithaca Beer Company Cascazilla
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:The name CascaZilla (Cas-kuh-zil-uh) is a play on both the name of a gorge in Ithaca called Cascadilla and the monster amounts of Cascade Hops we use to make the beer. The predominant flavor and aroma of this beer comes from fresh American hops. CascaZilla gets its distinctive red color from a healthy portion of caramel malt, which also lends to the beer, a hearty body and sweetness. It is a hoppy red ale!\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: St. Rogue Red
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Rogue Ales St. Rogue Red

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Prohibition Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Speakeasy Ales & Lagers Prohibition Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Prohibition Ale is the first beer we bootlegged back in 1997. Anything but traditional and now a GABF winning brew (2013–American Amber/Red Category), Prohibition pours a deep reddish amber hue, with a fluffy tan head that leaves a beautiful lacing on the glass. A lush, complex aroma teases the senses with juicy grapefruit, citrus, pine, spice and candied caramel malts. Mouth-feel is creamy, with a silky, medium body and modest carbonation.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Red Tail Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Mendocino Brewing Company Red Tail Ale

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Switchback Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Switchback Brewing Company Switchback Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Switchback Ale (First sold October 22nd, 2002) Using only traditional ingredients, Switchback Ale is a reddish-amber ale which is particularly well-balanced, allowing for complexity of flavor coupled with an unusually smooth and refreshing character.
