dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Brewed and bottled on the Deca Brewery in Woesten-Vleteren.Oud Vlaams Bruin - Blend 30% Old & 70% NewEBC:52, IBU:15, OG:1078, FG:1018, ABV:??Hops: Bramling Cross, Hallertau MF\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Madamin
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: LoverBeer Madamin
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Oak amber ale. Fermented and maturated only in oak vats. The name "Madamin" is a piedmontese word meaning "young lady". Available in 375 ml or 750 ml bottles.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Grande Dame Oud Bruin
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brasserie Trois Dames Grande Dame Oud Bruin
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:A sour brown ale, brewed in the Flemish tradition, that rivals even the best Oud Bruins coming out of Belgium. Elegant and rustic, and full of complex flavors, berries, spice, and a hint of nuttiness, this is a great beer to share with friends on a special occasion.Born of the fortuitous encounter between a strong stout and fermented apricots from the Valais, which never reached the distillers. Our Oud Bruin (Flemish for “Old Brown”) is a rather unorthodox take on the style. It nevertheless boasts the typical sweet and sour balance between a solid malty, toffee-like, chocolaty, roasted and fruity backbone. Into this the fermented apricots merge seamlessly, with their lactic sourness, leathery and horse blanket notes from wild yeasts and a discrete touch of apricot deep down. It finally evolves harmoniously into a slightly bitter finish. Altogether a pretty unique yet very drinkable beer.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Old Growth
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Trinity Brewing Company Old Growth
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Flemish-inspired Brown Ale aged in French oak barrels.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Undressed
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Picobrouwerij Alvinne / Den Bierzolder Wild Undressed
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Almost unhopped brown ale, the base beer for Morpheus Wild and Kerasus, undressed for the fans of the true "oud bruin" style.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Oud Bruin Belgian Style Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Grand Teton Brewing Co. Oud Bruin
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Our Oud Bruin is firmly in the East Flanders tradition. We used American 2-row barley and German melanoidin malt (for red color) as well as maize (to lighten the body). The wort was simmered in the kettle for 24 hours and then hopped lightly with English Kent Goldings for balance.We fermented with a Flemish blend of yeast and bacteria cultures, including lactobacillus, pediococcus, and brettanomyces. It took six months at cellar temperature for the culture to achieve the style’s characteristic quenching sourness. Finally, we bottle-conditioned the beer according to the “methode champenoise,” so it, too, can be laid down, to be brought out when it can be truly enjoyed.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Chunga's Old Bruin
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Jackie O's Pub & Brewery Chunga's Old Bruin
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:A Flanders style brown ale. We took Chomo-lung-ma (our organic honey nut brown) and aged it in a second generation Woodford Reserve barrel (subtle bourbon flavor, notes of American oak) for four months with 30lbs of tart cherries and a specially blended culture of wild yeast and beer souring bacteria. Chunga's Old Bruin exhibits and aroma of sweet cherries and faint chocolate/ roasted malt complemented by a faint oak bouquet. The flavor has a pronounced sour character with the caramel, chocolate, and roasted malt finish.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: SoBro
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Three Floyds Brewing Co. & Brewpub SoBro

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Oud Bruin
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brouwerij Liefmans Oud Bruin

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Le Serpent
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Snake River Brewing Company & Brewpub Le Serpent
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Cory’s endeavor into the realm of Flanders style sour ale. Extremely rare, inoculated with multiple souring organisms and laid down in French oak barrels for over one year, Le Serpent is an example of a Belgian sour brown at it’s finest. On draft in the pub for a short time and also hand-bottled and bottle-conditioned. There is a very limited quantity of 750 ml bottles available for take away. Act quickly to experience this exotic beer style!\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Duchesse De Bourgogne
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brouwerij Verhaeghe Duchesse De Bourgogne
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Belgian top-fermented reddish-brown ale, a blend of 8 and 18 months old beers following the careful maturation in oak casks.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Rodenbach Grand Cru
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brouwerij Rodenbach N.V. Rodenbach Grand Cru
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Flanders Red Ale- a blend of 1/3 young beer and 2/3 aged beer matured for 2 years in oak foeders. The original sour ale.

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Cuvée Des Jacobins Rouge
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brouwerij Bockor N.V. Cuvee Des Jacobins Rouge
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Cuvée des Jacobins Rouge is a Flemish Sour Ale, red in color with a beguiling balance of malty sweetness and acidic sharpness. It is made from spontaneously fermented and barrel-aged beer of at least 18 months in age. The beer is cooled overnight in a large, shallow metal vessel called a coolship and then fermented and aged in large oak foudres which are made in France and assembled on-site at Bockor.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Red Poppy
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: The Lost Abbey Double Red Poppy
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Perhaps no country embraces the use of fruit in beers more so than Belgium. Numerous traditional as well as regional specialty ales are infused with every sort of fruit imaginable. In this way, the flavor of the fruit becomes especially prominent.Red Poppy Ale is a veritable celebration of Sour Cherries in an explosion of aromas and tastes. Brewed from a brown ale base and aged in our oak barrels for over 6 months, this beer is not for the faint of heart.The Golden Poppy is the state flower of California and the Red Poppy is found in Flanders Fields where our inspiration for this beer comes from.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: La Roja
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Jolly Pumpkin Artisan Ales La Roja
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:An artisan amber ale brewed in the Flanders tradition. Deep amber with earthy caramel, spice, and sour fruit notes developed through natural barrel aging. Unfiltered, unpasteurized and blended from barrels ranging in age from two to ten months.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Rodenbach Classic (Red)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brouwerij Rodenbach N.V. Rodenbach Classic (Red)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:ABV varies 5.0-5.2% ABV\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Rodenbach Caractère Rouge
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brouwerij Rodenbach N.V. Rodenbach Caractère Rouge
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Flanders Red Ale- two-year ale matured in oak foeders, that is aged for an additional six months with cherries, raspberries and cranberries. Vinous and very complex with notes of wood and caramel. The brewer allow the beer to macerate with fresh cherries, raspberries and cranberries. After this maceration in oak, the beer re-ferments in the bottle. The result is RODENBACH Caractère Rouge, an exceptional RODENBACH with fruit maceration and a 7% alcohol volume. The brew is more than unique and extremely exclusive, as only 900 75-cl bottles were produced (first batch). Geunes serves this wilful beer as part of his other unique range of beer varieties in his restaurant, ’t Zilte, at the Antwerp MAS museum.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Cascade Kriek Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Cascade Brewing / Raccoon Lodge & Brewpub Cascade Kriek Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:This NW style sour red ale is blend of red ales aged in oak barrels for up to eight months, then aged on fresh Bing and sour pie cherries for an additional eight months. Aromas of rich, dark cherries, oak and slight hints of cinnamon are noticed up front. Dark, tart cherries and light spice notes dance on the palate and lead to a rich, dark, tart sparkling finish of dark cherries and oak.Note:Kriek 2007 = 6.6% ABVKriek 2008 = 8.1% ABVKriek 2009 = 7.3% ABVKriek 2010 = 7.1% ABVKriek 2012 = 7.2% ABVKriek 2013 = 8.2% ABVKriek 2014 = 8.2% ABVKriek 2015 = 7.1% ABVPlease note which version is being reviewed, if known.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Rodenbach Alexander
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brouwerij Rodenbach N.V. Alexander Rodenbach
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Flanders Red Ale- a blend of 1/3 young and 2/3 two-year old ale matured in oak foeders, that is macerated with sour cherries.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Ichtegem's Grand Cru
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brouwerij Strubbe Ichtegem's Grand Cru

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Barriquée (Sour Version)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Panil Barriquée (Sour Version)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Also known as Panil Barriquée RiservaThis is the version imported to the US.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Vichtenaar
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brouwerij Verhaeghe Vichtenaar
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:The "Vichtenaar" is a beer that is brewed on the basis of deeply burned malt, spicy and fruity hops, yeast and soft water pumped from a well with a depth of 172 m, which is a guarantee of the quality and the purity of the water. After the main fermentation and the second lagering the "Vichtenaar" undergoes a third fermentation in oak casks for several months. The oak casks are large vats with a capacity ranging between 5000 and 25000 liters. The "Vichtenaar" is a traditional and typical beer for West Flanders, in the Northwest of Belgium. The taste of the "Vichtenaar" can be described as slightly acidic and complex and this through the long fermentation in oak casks. The fresh taste of the "Vichtenaar" makes it a particularly thirst-quenching beer, especially during the summer months. The "Vichtenaar" is also one of the last old-Flemish red-brown beers which are matured in oak casks and is especially appreciated for its authenticity by the beer connoisseur. In 1958 “Brewery Verhaeghe” obtained for its beer "Vichtenaar" the first prize in the international contest for beers in Ghent.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Verhaeghe Echte Kriek / Echte Kriekenbier
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brouwerij Verhaeghe Verhaeghe Echte Kriek / Echte Kriekenbier
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Echt Kriekenbier, (real cherry beer)" is as the name suggests a cherry beer that is manufactured with only the real fruit of cherries instead of with flavor enhancers or extracts of cherries. The fruit is sourced from the region around Sint-Truiden in Limburg (Belgium).Unlike the most famous fruit beers the basic beer of the "real cherry beer" is not a Lambic but a West-Flemish red-brown ale aged in oak wood. About mid-July at the picking, the Northern cherries are brought in at the brewery and laid in on the base beer.Because the taste of the cherry fruit varies from year to year and this according to the number of hours of sunshine or rain, the kriekenbier at its final composition is blended with cherry beer from the year before and two-year old cherry beer. This with the intention of becoming a more constant taste of the "real cherry beer" over the years.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Zoetzuur Flemish AleDe Proefbrouwerij (bvba Andelot)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: De Proefbrouwerij (bvba Andelot) Zoetzuur Flemish Ale

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Michael
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Brewery: Hair of the Dog Brewing Company / Brewery and Tasting Room
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Hair of the Dog Brewing Company / Brewery and Tasting Room Michael
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Michael is a Flanders Red, made in memory of Michael Jackson. The Beer was Brewed in January of 2007, and aged in American oak and Sherry barrels since then. It is just over 6% alcohol, made with Organic Pilsner, Vienna and Munich malts and fermented with a variety of yeast and bacteria.Released November 2009 & Fall 2012.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: La Roja - Grand Reserve
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Jolly Pumpkin Artisan Ales La Roja - Grand Reserve
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:"THE RED"SOUR AMBER ALEAged in large oak casks then bottle fermented, La Roja is a Franco-Belgian style ale crafted on the Flander's tradition of aged and blended beers. La Roja is rich and lush with undertones of caramel fruit and spice. Truly an ale of grace and distinction.Cheers and Mahalo plenty!IBU: 25TIME IN OAK: 2 Months - 15 MonthsHOPS: Strisselspalt & TettnangGRAINS: Pilsner Malt, Pale Malt, Munich 10, Wheat Malt, Crystal 150, & Black MaltADDITIONAL INGREDIENTS: Dextrose\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: La Roja Du Kriek
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Jolly Pumpkin Artisan Ales Roja De Kriek
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:La Roja du Kriek – Sour Amber Ale with Michigan Cherry Juice. This is what happens when 3100 gallons of 2013 La Roja meets 50 gallons of Michigan tart cherry juice, aged in oak barrels and bottle conditioned – a perfect blend of sour and tart joie de vivre!\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Barriquée (Italy Version)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Panil Barriquée (Italy Version)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:This version is not exported to the US.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Kriek Des Jacobins
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brouwerij Bockor N.V. Jacobins Kriek
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:The basic ingredient of our Jacobins Kriek is wort made of wheat and malted barley. This wort is first boiled and then transported to the brewery’s open cooling vessel to cool down.Afterwards it spontaneously ferments in big oak barrels, giving the beer its refined flavour and aroma.To obtain its true “kriek” or cherry flavour, natural cherry juices are also added. The fruitiness of the aroma clearly reveals itself in the mouth. Our Jacobins Kriek has a well-balanced, pleasant and slightly sweet flavour, which is best enjoyed when drunk out of its own bowl-shaped glass. An excellent thirst quencher and... perfect for drinking in an outdoor café!\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: La Luna Rossa
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Birrificio Del Ducato La Luna Rossa
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:I think that in the life of every brewer exists a particular moment that makes him proud and satisfied with his work: for me this time comes during the blend of La Luna Rossa. Maybe because it is the beer that it takes more time before leaving the brewery, or maybe for a certain analogy with the trade of enologist, it is always very emotional when myself and Luca (a solid presence at the brewery) find ourselves between sour splashes and leftover pieces of fruit that remind me the “visciole” (morello cherry) my grandfather used to eat while playng cards. It starts with an acidic base that has made at least 2 years of mixed fermentations (conducted mainly by lactic, acetic bacteria and brettanomyces) which have at least 6 months macerated cherries and sour cherries, blend with a small part of chimera and some young beer; the blend is put in numbered bottles indicating the year of the cuvée, which refined further 12 months before selling.La Luna Rossa is like a kriek on the basis flemish red, has an extraordinary complexity associated with a wonderful elegance, for lovers of the genre is definitely one of those beers that you find it difficult to forget.- GiovanniIn the glass, to the nose and in the mouth …Born from the blend about different beers, some of them aged in barrels until 2 years with the addition morello and marasca cherries. Intense amber colour with ruby reflections, extraordinary aromatic complexity: fruity aromas (marasca and morello cherries in the first place), accompanied by subtle ethereal notes and sublime acetic hints and lactic acid, as well as shades of oxidized malts. In the mouth it is tasty, large, persistent, and ends with a magnificent and uplifting acidity.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Rodenbach Foederbier
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brouwerij Rodenbach N.V. Rodenbach Foederbier

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Ned
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Alpine Beer Company Ned

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Portsmouth Flanders Red - Maude
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Portsmouth Brewery Portsmouth Flanders Red - Maude
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:This Flemish style soured mash, medium-bodied red ale is lactic, tart and delicious. It is traditionally blended with at least year old gueuze and fruits.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Tulach Leis
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: The Vermont Pub & Brewery Tulach Leis
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:A Flemish Style Vermont Sour Red Ale fermented with brettanomyces yeast providing slight tartness with barnyard aromas and flavors. This recipe was the result of the collaborative efforts of VPB brewers both past and present in honor of their mentor and Master Brewer, Greg Noonan. The name (Toolah - Leez) comes from county Cork in Ireland where the Noonan clan originated. 6.1% ABV. Hits the style.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Leipziger Gose
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Gasthaus & Gosebrauerei Bayerischer Bahnhof Leipziger Gose
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:This original Leipzig beer specialty lends us the name for our brewery. Gose is a regional beer specialty that was brought to Saxony-Anhalt in the year 1738. Originally Gose comes from Goslar, a small town in Lower Saxony, and the river “Gose” in this town. This beer specialty has a refreshing, slightly sour taste and is ideal for quenching your thirst. Gose is brewed with the additional ingredients lactic acid, cilantro, and salt. Gose is a top-fermented beer with 4.5% ABV and 10.8% wort. You can enjoy it in different variations.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Gose
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Upright Brewing Company Gose
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Based on an obscure centuries old German style that incorporates salt and coriander into a distinctly tart wheat beer with a dry champagne like finish. 2010 World Beer Cup Bronze medal winner.Malts: pilsener, wheat, organic caramelHops: hallertauer mittelfrühAlso: coriander, saltYeast: French saison1st Release - January 20102nd Release - April 2011\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Imperial Cherry Gose
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Southern Tier Brewing Company Imperial Cherry Saison
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:The finished beer is a striking, lustful shade of red with a persistent white head and durable lacing thanks to the large portion of wheat in the grist. The nose is defined by equal parts bright lactic acidity and cherry notes with a hint of coriander. On the palate, the strong lactic acidity is accentuated by the natural tartness of the cherry juice. Quantitatively, this beer is quite sweet, but we find that this level of residual sweetness is just enough to balance the acidity and that the overall perception of the beer is actually quite dry. The beer finishes very clean and in conjunction with the salt in the finish, it definitely makes you want to come back for more.pH - 3.4Total Acidity: 9.9 ml/100g\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: KBS (Kentucky Breakfast Stout)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Founders Brewing Company Founders KBS (Kentucky Breakfast Stout)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:What we’ve got here is an imperial stout brewed with a massive amount of coffee and chocolates, then cave-aged in oak bourbon barrels for an entire year to make sure wonderful bourbon undertones come through in the finish. Makes your taste buds squeal with delight.Now labeled as "KBS."ABV varies by batch.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Bourbon County Brand Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Goose Island Beer Co. Bourbon County Brand Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:60 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Ten FIDY
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Oskar Blues Grill & Brew Ten FIDY
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:This titanic, immensely viscous stout is loaded with inimitable flavors of chocolate-covered caramel and coffee and hide a hefty 98 IBUs underneath the smooth blanket of malt. It is made with enormous amounts of two-row malt, chocolate malt, roasted barley, flaked oats and hops.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: The Abyss
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Deschutes Brewery The Abyss
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:A deep, dark Imperial Stout, The Abyss has almost immeasurable depth and complexity. Hints of molasses, licorice and other alluring flavors make it something not just to quaff, but contemplate.As for the great “drink it now or let it age” debate, we stand clearly on the fence. Distinct and delicious on release, the flavors meld and fuse into an entirely different pleasure after a year or more in the cellar.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Bourbon County Brand Coffee Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Goose Island Beer Co. Bourbon County Brand Coffee Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:2017 Release - Intelligentsia Black Cat Espresso Beans2016 Release - Intelligentsia Fletcha Roja2015 Release - Intelligentsia Los Delirios2014 Release - Intelligentsia Zirikana Coffee Beans2013 Release - Intelligentsia ‘Los Inmortales’2012 Release - Intelligentsia La Tortuga Beans2011 Release - Intelligentsia Anjilanaka Beans2010 Release - Intelligentsia Black Cat Espresso Beans\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Speedway Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: AleSmith Brewing Company AleSmith Speedway Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Jet Black, with an off-white head. Starts with a strong coffee and dark chocolate sensation, then fades to a multitude of toasty, roasty and caramel malt flavors. Clean and crisp, full- bodied. Warmth from the high alcohol content lightens up the feel. You won't fool your taste buds - this beer is HUGE!\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: CBS (Canadian Breakfast Stout)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Founders Brewing Company Founders CBS Imperial Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Canadian Breakfast Stout (CBS) is the epitome of why we launched the Backstage Series: to bring some of our most sought-after beers, which have been available primarily at the taproom or at a few select events, to a much larger audience.Canadian Breakfast Stout is an Imperial Stout brewed with a blend of coffees and imported chocolates, then aged in spent bourbon barrels that have most recently been aging pure Michigan maple syrup.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Storm King Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Victory Brewing Company Storm King Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Emerging from the deepest shades of darkness, a rolling crescendo of flavors burst forth from this robust stout. The thundering, hoppy appeal of Storm King subsides into the mellow subtleties of roasted malt, exhibiting an espresso-like depth of character in its finish. An exquisite blend of imported malts and whole flower American hops merge harmoniously in this complex ale. Discover the dark intrigue of Storm King, as it reveals the rich, substantial flavors that it holds within.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Yeti
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Great Divide Brewing Company Barrel Aged Yeti
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Yeti Imperial Stout is an onslaught of the senses. It starts with big, roasty malt flavor that gives way to rich caramel and toffee notes. Yeti gets its bold hop character from an enormous quantity of American hops. It weighs in at a hefty 75 IBUs.2005 Great American Beer Festival, Silver Medal, Imperial Stout2008 Great American Beer Festival, Bronze Medal, Imperial Stout2009 Great American Beer Festival, Silver Medal, Imperial Stout2010 BeerAdvocate “Top 100 Beers On Planet Earth,” #36\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Choklat (Blackwater Series)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Southern Tier Brewing Company Choklat
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Choklat is every bit a dessert beer, encompassing the complexity of the darkest, bittersweet candy together with that of the original frothy beverage. We combine the finest ingredients to tempt your senses & renew the power & interrelation of history in every bottle.Cacao is a mystical bean. We're not surprises that ancient hieroglyphs depict chocolate being poured for rulers & gods.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Péché Mortel
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brasserie Dieu Du Ciel Péché Mortel (Bourbon Barrel)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Péché Mortel (French for "Mortal Sin") is an intensely black and dense beer with very pronounced roasted flavours. Fair trade coffee is infused during the brewing process, intensifying the bitterness of the beer and giving it a powerful coffee taste. Péché mortel is brewed to be savored; we invite you to drink it in moderation.This stout style, high in alcohol and bitterness in order to favour preservation, was historically brewed to support the long and arduous voyage necessary to export the beer from England to Russia. The word Imperial comes from the fact that the beer was specially brewed for the Russian tsar’s court.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: World Wide Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Dogfish Head Brewery World Wide Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Brewed with a ridiculous amount of barley, World Wide Stout is dark, rich, roasty and complex. This ageable ale clocks in at 15-20% ABV and has a depth more in line with a fine port than with a can of cheap, mass-marketed beer.70 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Oak Aged Yeti Imperial Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Great Divide Brewing Company Oak Aged Yeti Imperial Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Imperial stout aged on new French and American oak chips.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Cappuccino Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Lagunitas Brewing Company Cappuccino Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:For That Extra KrunkCoffee is my shepherd; I shall not doze. It maketh me to wake in green pastures. It leadeth me beyond the sleeping masses. It restoreth my brain, It leadeth me in the paths of consciousness for it's name's sake. Yea, though I walk through the valley of the shadow of sleep, I will fear no artificial sweetener for thou art with me; Thy cream and thy sugar they comfort me. Thou preparest a carafe before me in the presence of my zzz's, Thou anointest my day with sunlight; My cup runneth over. Surely richness and flavor shall follow me all the days of my life: and I will dwell in the house of Cappuccino forever... Let us sip... or whatever...\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Imperial Biscotti Break
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Evil Twin Brewing Evil Twin Biscotti Break
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:The Roman Empire had a certain "je ne sais quoi" - festive food culture, extravagant architecture, and spectacular live entertainment. Some might argue the Emperors were brutal, mad, and hungry for power, and the people vain when taking baths and working out all day. Listen - that's still all part of the secret Imperial ingredient - keep it cool, clean, confident, arrogant, and flamboyant. Forza Imperiale.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Hunahpu's Imperial Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Cigar City Brewing Hunahpu's Imperial Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:In Mayan mythology, Hun Hunahpu was the father of the Mayan hero twins Hunahpu and Xbalanque. Hun Hunahpu, along with his brother Vucub Hunahpu, was tricked by the Dark Lords of the underworld and slain. Hun Hunahpu’s corpse morphed into a cacao tree, his head becoming a cacao pod, which in typically awesome mythology fashion, spit upon the hand of a young maiden named Xiquic who promptly became pregnant with the hero twins. The twins would ultimately grow up to avenge their father and uncle and defeat the Dark Lords and ascend the heavens to become the moon and sun. We brew Hunahpu's Imperial Stout once a year and release it only at the brewery on the second weekend in March. We will continue to do so until the end of the cycle.80 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Black Tuesday
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: The Bruery Black Tuesday
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Our infamous Black Tuesday is an imperial stout aged in bourbon barrels for over a year. Rich caramel, toasted malt, vanilla, burnt wood and anise are just a few of the many flavors in this rich, decadent imperial stout.2009: 19.5% ABV 2010: 18.2% ABV 2011: 18.3% ABV 2012: 19.2% ABV2013: 18.9% ABV2014: 19.7% ABV2015: 19.9% ABV2016: 20.3% ABV2017: 19.5% ABV2018: 19.5% ABV2019: 19.4% ABV\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Miles Davis' Bitches Brew
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Dogfish Head Brewery Miles Davis' Bitches Brew
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:In honor of the 40th anniversary of the original release of Bitches Brew, Miles Davis' 1970 paradigm-shifting landmark fusion breakthrough, we've created our own Bitches Brew -- a bold, dark beer that's a fusion of three threads of imperial stout and one thread of honey beer with gesho root. It's a gustatory analog to Miles' masterpiece.38 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Espresso Oak Aged Yeti Imperial Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Great Divide Brewing Company Espresso Oak Aged Yeti Imperial Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:A generous infusion of Denver's own Pablo's espresso adds yet another layer of complexity to this beer, combining with the vanilla oak character, intense roasty maltiness and bold hop profile to create a whole new breed of mythical creature. It's official: You can now have Yeti with breakfast.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Warlock
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Southern Tier Brewing Company Warlock
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Imperial stout brewed with pumpkins Warlock is brewed to enchant your palate on its own and also to counterpoint our Imperial Ale, Pumking. Make your own black magic by carefully pouring this Imperial Stout into a goblet.Dark and mysterious, the Blackwater Series is serious about high gravity. Reanimate your senses with Warlock’s huge roasted malt character, moderate carbonation and spicy pumpkin pie aroma.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Chocolate Oak Aged Yeti
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Great Divide Brewing Company Chocolate Oak Aged Yeti
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Chocolate Oak Aged Yeti Imperial Stout is another revered incarnation of our legendary imperial stout. We toned down the hops a bit to allow cocoa nibs to contribute some pleasing bitterness, while vanilla notes from the oak combine with the cocoa to create an aroma and flavor akin to a gourmet chocolate bar. A dash of cayenne keeps things lively, adding just a bit of heat to the finish. Another great Yeti? Hell yes.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Double Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Green Flash Brewing Co. Double Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:We explored 19th Century British Stout recipes, then charted a fresh course to land on a modern American version of the old-world classic. Our Double Stout encompasses the very best of both worlds. Golden naked oats, dark crystal and roasted malt offer a luscious balance of bittersweet chocolate and hints of coffee. Fair winds and following seas. Smooth sailing, all the way home.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Abraxas
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Perennial Artisan Ales Abraxas
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:*ABV varies by year*An Imperial Stout brewed with ancho chili peppers, cacao nibs, vanilla beans, and cinnamon sticks. Pouring deep brown with a thick head, this beer has a complex body with a delicious lingering roastiness. Abraxas is brewed with unique ingredients intended to challenge and excite the palate. It may be enjoyed right away or allowed to age in the bottle. Vertical tastings are encouraged.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Beer Geek Brunch Weasel
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Mikkeller ApS Beer Geek Brunch Weasel
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Brewed at Nøgne Ø.Imperial oatmeal stout brewed with coffee. Ingredients: Water, malts, hops, yeast and Vietnamese ca phe chon coffee.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Chocolate Rain
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: The Bruery Chocolate Rain
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Black Tuesday with Vanilla Bean & Cocoa Nibs.2011: 18.5% ABV 2012: 19.5% ABV2013: 18.0% ABV2014: 18.5% ABV2015: 18.4% ABV2016: 19.7% ABV2017: 19.6% ABV2018: 19.5% ABV2019: 19.5% ABV\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Brewer's Reserve Bourbon Barrel Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Central Waters Brewing Company Brewer's Reserve Bourbon Barrel Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:American-style stout aged for 1 year in used 12 year bourbon barrels.The brewery's most highly sought after beer, this imperial stout is aged to perfection in oak bourbon barrels. Look for this tasty teat to contain hints of bourbon and vanilla with roasted overtones that is [sic] sure to please any connoisseur's palate. Serve at cellar temperature from a snifter glass and enjoy this expression of out passion for brewing.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Dark Truth
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Boulevard Brewing Co. Dark Truth Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Throughout the ages, man has been fascinated by the quest for hidden knowledge, the search for the secret to transforming the elemental into the extraordinary, the simple into the sublime. Ladies and gentlemen, we present for your consideration this exotic, inky concoction, the almost magical creation of our modern day alchemists who have turned humble grains—barley, wheat, rye, and oats—into black, liquid gold. Layers of complex flavors slowly emerge from the glass: espresso, roasted fig, crème brulée. Belgian yeast provides a plum-like fruitiness, noble German hops reveal spicy, herbal notes, while the rich, velvety mouthfeel mellows to a dry, smoky finish.60 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Big Bear Black Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Bear Republic Brewing Co. Big Bear Black Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Big Bear is a big, black, stout you can really sink your teeth into. The bold, roasty, caramel malt flavor is balanced by Centennial and Cascade hops.2009 California State Fair – 2nd GOLD2009 LA International Beer Competition – GOLD2007 Great American Beer Festival® American-Style Stout – SILVER2002 World Beer Cup - GOLD\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Mokah
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Southern Tier Brewing Company Mokah
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:As scientists, our brewers utilize their materials to exacting standards. As artists, they couldn’t resist the temptation to combine two of our highly acclaimed Blackwater Series Imperial Stouts: Jahva and Choklat. Alone each is perfect, but together as Mokah they are an inimitable expression of two of the world’s most sought after flavors. Enjoy Mokah stout with – or as – your favorite dessert!\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Speedway Stout - Bourbon Barrel-Aged
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: AleSmith Brewing Company AleSmith Speedway Stout - Barrel Aged

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Ten FIDY - Bourbon Barrel Aged
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Oskar Blues Grill & Brew Ten Fidy (Oak-Aged)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Aged through four seasons and from a blend of the top Bourbons around, this Ten Fidy has morphed into a monster of cranked up flavor. Espresso, burnt sugar, rich chocolate, caramel notes are now driving alongside the vanilla, oak, bourbon from the barrel and been smoothed out during maturation. Even at 12.5% (75 IBUs) it is cool and drinkable, letting each sip add more and more complexity.ABV varies year to year\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Imperial Eclipse Stout - Elijah Craig (12 Year)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: FiftyFifty Brewing Co. Imperial Eclipse Stout - Elijah Craig (12 Year)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Imperial Stout aged 200 days in an Elijah Craig bourbon barrel.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Speedway Stout - Vietnamese Coffee
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: AleSmith Brewing Company AleSmith Speedway Stout - Vietnamese Coffee
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:This Vietnamese coffee version of Speedway Stout is and continues to be AleSmith's most popular variation of the ever-growing Speedway Stout collection. Since 2012 we have been adding this blend of four Vietnamese coffees, known in Vietnam as cà phê sa dá, to our popular imperial stout. The coffee beans were slowly roasted at low temperatures and then brewed by AleSmith with a traditional phin-style filter that gently percolates water through the ground coffee. The result is an intensely aromatic and bold tasting coffee that complements the notes of chocolate and roast in this massive stout.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Bourbon County Brand Vanilla Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Goose Island Beer Co. Bourbon County Brand Vanilla Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Bourbon County Brand Stout spiced with fresh vanilla beans.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Chocolate Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Rogue Ales Chocolate Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:12 Ingredients:Great Western 2-Row, Crystal 135- 165, Chocolate & Rogue Micro Barley Farm DareTM & RiskTM Malts; Rogue Micro Hopyard Revolution & Rebel Hops, Rolled Oats, Roasted Barley, Natural Chocolate Flavoring, Free Range Coastal Waters & Pacman Yeast.15º PLATO69 IBU77 AA135º Lovibond\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Obsidian Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Deschutes Brewery Obsidian Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Deep, robust and richly rewarding, this is beer to linger over. Obsidian has distinct notes of espresso, chocolate, roasted malt and black barley, with just enough hop bite to cut the sweetness.IBUs: 55220 calories per 12 oz serving\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Sierra Nevada Brewing Co. Sierra Nevada Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Sierra Nevada Stout s a full-bodied American version of the traditional black ale. It is perfectly balanced with big roasted malt flavors and earthy, whole-cone hops.In 1980, when we were building our fledging brewery, we needed a beer with bold flavors to test the new, hand-built brewhouse. That first brew was a stout rich with roasted malts and earthy, whole-cone American hops. We liked that original stout so much that we've kept it as we've grown. Decades later it still reminds us of that early pioneering spirit.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Chicory Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Dogfish Head Brewery Chicory Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Chicory was one of the first beers we started brewing at our pub back when it opened in 1995. It's a dark beer made with a bunch of roasted chicory, organic Mexican coffee, St. John's Wort and licorice root. We use whole-leaf Cascade and Fuggle hops, as well as pale, roasted and oatmeal grains.21 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Mean Old Tom
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Maine Beer Company Mean Old Tom
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Our American-style stout aged on organic vanilla beans. Intense notes of coffee and dark chocolate lead way to subtle notes of natural vanilla. Flaked oats generate a silky mouthfeel.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Tres Blueberry Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Dark Horse Brewing Company Dark Horse Tres Blueberry Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:A full bodied stout made with all malted barley and blueberry. Flavors of chocolate, roast malt and light blueberry make up the palate with lots of fruity blueberry aroma.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Aphrodisiaque
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brasserie Dieu Du Ciel Aphrodisiaque
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Also known as Aphrodite.Black ale with aromas and flavours of vanilla, dark chocolate, bourbon and roasted malt. The vanilla and cocoa marry nicely, without out-competing each other, to produce a surprisingly well balanced beer. This beer is mildly hoppy, but the cocoa introduces a touch of bitterness. Its colour may be intimidating, but it is a very smooth beer within reach of most beer drinkers. This highly appreciated dessert beer is brewed with organic fair-trade cocoa and first rate vanilla beans.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Out Of Bounds Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Avery Brewing Company Out Of Bounds Stout

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Black Mocha Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Highland Brewing Highland Black Mocha Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Highland’s most robust beer, having a very malty body with a large, roasted chocolate flavor, all achieved solely through the use of special roasted barley grains. It is black in color with a very clean finish and moderate hop flavor. While the porter style was developing, some brewers produced a stout porter and over time generated a new style known simply as stout. These beers traditionally contain a distinct roasted malt flavor and can run the gamut from a dry stout, such as Guinness to a sweet stout such as Watney’s Cream Stout. Our Black Mocha falls in the sweet stout range and derives its chocolate and coffee tones from the use of appropriate roasted malt grains and is very often used as an after dinner libation or an accompaniment to dessert.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Fuel Cafe (Coffee Flavored Stout)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Lakefront Brewery, Inc. Fuel Cafe (Coffee Flavored Stout)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:This unique stout combines the flavor of roasted malts and Milwaukee's renowned Fuel Cafe coffee. Pours a deep, dark color with a beautiful creamy tan head. Coffee aromas dominate the nose, with a background of roasted grain. The fine balance of mild hops, the gentle acidity of choice coffee and the full mouth feel from roasted malt barley make this an unforgettable brew.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Coffee Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: New Glarus Brewing Company Coffee Stout

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Brewhouse Coffee Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Central Waters Brewing Company Brewhouse Coffee Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:A coffee lover's delight! A wonderful stout infused with coffee that is specially roasted for us by Emy J's in Stevens Point, WI.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Chocolate Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Harpoon Brewery Harpoon Chocolate Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Harpoon Chocolate Stout is brewed with an abundance of chocolate malt and a touch of chocolate.40 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Cocoa Loco
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Arcadia Brewing Company Arcadia Cocoa Loco
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:This triple chocolate stout is a unique interpretation of the style, combining three different chocolate malts, cacao nibs and 63 percent semi-sweet chocolate, creating a sinfully delicious brew. The addition of blackstrap molasses produces an earthy, caramelized tone in an already complex flavor profile. It's creamy, milkshake-like mouthfeel earns this beer the reputation of being dessert in glass.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Bison Organic Chocolate Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Bison Brewing Bison Organic Chocolate Stout

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Rise Up Coffee Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Evolution Craft Brewing Company Rise Up Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:A caribbean style stout, infused with coffee. Ours is rich and dark with a toasted brown head, well balanced, roasty and full flavored. Cold steeping ...Read Morewith organic coffee from local shop Rise Up Coffee imparts a generous but balanced coffee nose and flavor\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Captain Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Alpine Beer Company Captain Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:The Captain is leader of a fire crew. This beer takes charge of your taste buds with its rich flavor. Roasty malt character that has hints of chocolate and coffee which balances the smooth, velvety finish. The thick, creamy head lasts and lasts, leaving lace in your glass as your beer disappears. This beer pairs well with food. Great with dinner or as breakfast or even with a rich vanilla-bean ice cream. 1.060 OG 31 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Luna Coffee Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Hinterland Brewery Restaurant Luna Coffee Stout

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Blue Bridge Coffee Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Coronado Brewing Company Blue Bridge Coffee Stout

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Valdez
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Pisgah Brewing Co. Pisgah Valdez
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:This robust Coffee Stout is a mouthful of flavor! A dark, roasty grain bill stands as the backdrop for a galaxy of coffee aroma and flavor, made possible by local organic bean roasters Dynamite Roastery. A Pisgah fan favorite, Valdez is brewed bi-annually and never lasts as long as the flavor.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: CEO Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Right Brain Brewery CEO Stout

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Irish Channel StoutNew Orleans Lager & Ale Brewing Company (NOLA)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Brewery: New Orleans Lager & Ale Brewing Company (NOLA)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: New Orleans Lager & Ale Brewing Company (NOLA) Irish Channel Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:This is an American style stout that has sweet malt flavors of caramel and chocolate, complimented by a crisp bitterness produced by roasted barley and American Hops. The complex malt bill of pale and roasted malts result in this well balanced stout that is smooth, rich, dark and delicious! And watch out – ABV 6.8%!\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Survival "7-Grain" Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Hopworks Urban Brewery Survival "7-Grain" Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:The seven grains: Barley (Egyptian), Wheat (Mesopotamian), Oats (Egyptian), Amaranth (Aztec), Quinoa (Incan), Spelt (Mesopotamian), and Kamut (Egyptian).Finished with 15 pounds of cold-pressed Stumptown 'Hairbender' espresso.2011 - Finished with 15 pounds of cold-pressed Stumptown Organic Holler Mountain Coffee.2012 - Finished with 20 pounds of cold-pressed Stumptown Organic Holler Mountain coffee.35 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Crème Brûlée Java Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Kuhnhenn Brewing Company Kuhnhenn Crème Brûlée Java Stout

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Black Phoenix (Chipotle Coffee Ale)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Bootlegger's Brewery Black Phoenix (Chipotle Coffee Ale)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Stout brewed with coffee and chipotle peppers.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Java The Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Jackie O's Pub & Brewery Java The Stout

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Hickory Stick Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Olde Hickory Brewery Hickory Stick Stout

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Planet Bean
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Spring House Brewing Company Planet Bean Coffee Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Planet Bean Coffee Stout is smooth, dark, full-bodied, and satisfyingly rich. Coffee beans expertly roasted at Cumberland County Coffee Company give this stout its powerful aroma and pronounced fresh-brewed coffee flavor. Your only problem with this tempting brew will be resisting the urge to pour it in your coffee mug before work!\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Naked Fish
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: DuClaw Brewing Company Naked Fish
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:First brewed in 2002, Naked Fish, like most traditional Stouts, is medium-bodied and nearly black in color with a light tan head. But where Naked Fish turns the stout style upside down is in its flavor profile. Gourmet Chocolate Raspberry Coffee is added to the grain bill to produce a taste experience you’ll never forget. Naked Fish hooks you with flavors and aromas of roast coffee, raspberry and dark chocolate, before releasing you to a dry, chocolatey finish. These enticing flavors, combined with a moderate 4.6% abv, are guaranteed to make you get naked. Fish. Or whatever.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Heart Of Darkness
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Magic Hat Brewing Company Heart Of Darkness
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Our inky-black stout had a smooth, round palate with a dreamlike undercurrent of bittersweet chocolate. This dense liquid-silk summoned hope from hibernation and balanced winter's endless white snows with a rich swirl of creamy black rapture.30 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Scottish Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Belhaven Brewery Company Ltd. Belhaven Scottish Stout

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Dragonhead Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Orkney Brewery Dragonhead Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Dragonhead is a legendary stout: dark, intense and fully-flavoured it is our tribute to the Vikings and their cultural legacy in Orkney. On the nose, this black stout has a smooth roasted malt aroma giving bitter chocolate, dark roasted coffee and smoky notes balanced by hints of spicy Goldings Hops. On the palate, the dark roasted malts combine to give a rich, rounded palate of chocolate, toast and nut, with a satisfying spicy hop finish.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Monk's Stout Dupont
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brasserie Dupont sprl Monk's Stout Dupont

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Echigo Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Brewery: Uehara Shuzou Co. Ltd. / Echigo Beer Pub
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Uehara Shuzou Co. Ltd. / Echigo Beer Pub Echigo Stout

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Double Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Hook Norton Brewery Co. Ltd. Double Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:A blend of malts gives Double Stout a character all of its own. Black malt enriches the colour and teases the palate with an unmistakable ‘toast’ flavour. Brown malt gives it the dryness.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Dorothy Goodbody's Wholesome Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Wye Valley Brewery Dorothy Goodbody's Wholesome Stout

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Strike Out Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Cooperstown Brewing Company Strike Out Stout

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Bad King John
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Ridgeway Brewing Bad King John

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Rosie Parks Oyster Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Fordham Brewing Company Oyster Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:The legendary skipjack Rosie Parks once dredged for oysters on the Chesapeake Bay. Formerly the fasted of the fleet and a beauty to behold, she underwent construction and was relaunched on November 2, 2013. This 5.0% stout contains Chesapeake Bay Oyster shells.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Hopback Entire Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Hop Back Brewery plc Hopback Entire Stout

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Double Stout (2012- )
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Shepherd Neame Ltd Double Stout

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Blackheart Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Middle Ages Brewing Co., Ltd. Blackheart Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Raised from the dead for 2019 - this beer is an over the top Irish Dry Stout. Large amounts of roasted barley and chocolate malt are balanced by a big addition of flaked barley and the world's finest British pale ale malt. Extremely roasty but still highly drinkable.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: March Of The Penguins
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Williams Brothers Brewing Company March Of The Penguins

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Maple Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Cannery Brewing Company Maple Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:The addition of natural maple brings this premium Stout a softer, smoother mouth feel and adds a touch of sweetness to balance the dark rich malts. It is a truly Canadian version of an old British classic.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Boréale Noire
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brasseurs Du Nord Inc. Boréale Noire

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: London Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Meantime Brewing Company Limited London Stout

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Dark Arts
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Magic Rock Brewing Dark Arts
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Dark Arts blends four malts and bags of whole hops to deliver a decadently deep and indulgent experience. A luxuriously smooth mouthfeel, is followed by spicy hop notes and full flavours of chocolate, liquorice, blackberries and figs. The finish is rich and satisfying with a lingering roasted bitterness. Our stout will convert you to the dark side.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Extra StoutSamuel Smith Old Brewery (Tadcaster)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Samuel Smith Old Brewery (Tadcaster) Samuel Smith's Old Brewery Extra Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Formerly Samuel Smith's Old Brewery Extra Stout\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Bonecrusher Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Schmohz Brewing Company Bonecrusher Stout

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Martello Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Garrison Brewing Company Martello Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Heavily roasted malts characterize this darkest of traditional brews. Martello Stout is uncompromisingly bold like the unique towers which once defended our maritime shores.30 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Woody Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Lost Rhino Brewing Company Woody Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Stout aged in Bourbon Barrels from Bowman’s Distillery. Roasted malts and herbal hops provide an aroma of coffee and spicy chocolate which blends with caramel and vanilla notes that are products of the aging in the Bourbon soaked oak barrels.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Pemaquid Oyster Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Brewery: Marshall Wharf Brewing Company / Three Tides Restaurant
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Marshall Wharf Brewing Company / Three Tides Restaurant Pemaquid Oyster Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Brewed every year for the Pemaquid Oyster Festival in Damariscotta, this riich, chocolatey brew benefits from having ten dozen live oysters involved in the beer....mmmm oysters.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: McCallum's Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Belhaven Brewery Company Ltd. Belhaven McCallum's Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:McCallum's is a traditional Scottish stout - rich and dark in colour. A hint of fruit and a touch of sweetness makes it happiness in a bottle. More hops than a kangaroo - if you're a stout fan, you'll love McCallums.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Potro
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Cervecera Mexicana S.A. De C.V. Potro
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Granted, this beer doesn't fit exactly in the definition of a Stout --any Stout.But an e-mail from the brewmaster of this facility clearly states that their intention is to make a lighter version of an English Stout.Why tone it down? Weather issues.They want a beer that can be enjoyed in our mostly hot climate so it can appeal Mexican beer drinkers.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Black Creek Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Black Creek Historic Brewery Black Creek Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Stout is a Porter gone mad. In fact the style was known as "Stout Porter" well into the 19th century. Using extra-darkly roasted grains means chocolate and coffee flavours are more intense, and the sweetness that one finds in Porter is lacking.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Black
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Lancaster Brewery Company Ltd Black

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Titanic Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Titanic Brewery Titanic Stout

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Guinness Foreign Extra Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Guinness Ltd. Guinness Foreign Extra Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Foreign Extra Stout is brewed with generous hops and roasted barley for a bittersweet balance and full-flavored, natural bite. Developed for global export from Ireland, the addition of extra hops ensured this Stout would arrive in perfect condition. Today it is enjoyed by millions around the world.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Lion Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Ceylon / Lion Brewery Limited Lion Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:The dark caramel, large dense headed brew, with its 8.8% alcoholic content, is unique due to its sweet notes of chocolate and coffee interspersed into a foundation of dark roasted barley. Symbolic black to denote leadership, power, focus and strength, is dominant in the labeling as the lion journeys in the twilight unafraid, unbowed and unchallenged.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Indra Kunindra
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Ballast Point Brewing Company Indra Kunindra
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Indra Kunindra is a burst of madras curry, cumin, cayenne, coconut, and kaffir lime leaf. Enjoy!Our India-style Export Stout is a unique collaboration with award-winning home brewer Alex Tweet. Released in limited quantities, this explosion of South Asian flavors is reason enough to kneel down and thank the heavens. And further proof of San Diego's status as a brewer's playground, and a beer lover's utopia.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Fade To Black - Volume 1
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Left Hand Brewing Company Fade To Black Volume 1 - Foreign Export Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Volume 1 - Foreign Stout - Pours black with licorice, espresso bean, molasses, and black cardamom notes that give way to a feeling of self loathing, burnt opportunities and smoked relationships. 2010 Gold Medal Winner at the Great American Beer Festival in the Foreign Stout category.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Best Extra Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Coopers Brewery Limited Coopers Best Extra Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Now here's a beer with punch. Coopers Best Extra Stout is a beacon for lovers of a hearty brew. With its robust blend of fruit and chocolate flavours and bitter hop notes, it's everything a stout should be. An all malt brew that's naturally conditioned in the bottle, Coopers Best Extra Stout's unique rich, dark texture comes from our liberal use of specially roasted black malt. No additives. No preservatives.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Lump Of Coal Dark Holiday Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Ridgeway Brewing Lump Of Coal

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Extra Export Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brouwerij De Dolle Brouwers De Dolle Extra Export Stout

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Zonker Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Snake River Brewing Company & Brewpub Snake River Zonker Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:A rich, well-balanced foreign style stout with a huge amount of roasted barley as well as chocolate, black, and caramel malts. The intense roast character is the main attribute of this black colored beer. The alcohol content is 6.0%. Zonker has been recognized time and again as one of the top foregin style stouts.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Dragon Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Desnoes & Geddes Limited Dragon Stout

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Tsunami Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Pelican Pub & Brewery Tsunami Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Like the force of nature it is named for, Tsunami Stout will bowl you over with its jet black color and dark seductive aroma. Roasted malts and unmalted barley give this full-bodied brew its dense creamy head and distinct dark chocolate and cappuccino flavors that swell to a clean, rounded malty finish. Grab a Tsunami and head for high ground.16.8 degrees PlatoBitterness: 50 IBUColor: 150 lovibond\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Malpais Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: La Cumbre Brewing Co. Malpais Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:A meal in a glass. Brewed with 7 different malts, you should be ready for a full onslaught of creamy stout intensity. Broadly in the style of a Foreign Extra Stout, this is our heaviest and most intense year-round offering.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Exit 1 Bayshore Oyster Stout.
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Flying Fish Brewing Company Exit 1
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Exit 1 is beer brewed with oysters. The creamy flavor of English chocolate and roasted malts harmonizes with minerals from oyster shells. Irish ale yeast adds a bit of fruitiness and a dry crispness. The rich stout is perfect for cool weather-and especially delicious when paired with a few Jersey oysters on the half shell.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Captain Swain's Extra Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Cisco Brewers Inc. Captain Swain's Extra Stout

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Dissent
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Steel Toe Brewing Dissent

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: San Quentin's Breakout Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Marin Brewing Company San Quentin Breakout Stout

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Foreign Style Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Upslope Brewing Company Stout

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Export Stout London 1890
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: The Kernel Brewery Export Stout

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Cazeau Tournay Noire
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brasserie De Cazeau Cazeau Tournay Noire

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Square Tail Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Brewery: Moat Mountain Smoke House & Brewing Co.
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Moat Mountain Smoke House & Brewing Co. Moat Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:A Foreign-style stout. Invitingly smooth, clean and full –bodied, excellent to enjoy anytime of year. Roasted malt in mouth finishes with coffee and chocolate notes.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Foreign Export Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Ridgeway Brewing Foreign Export Stout

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Hakim Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Harar Beer Factory Hakim Stout

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Oesterstout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Scheldebrouwerij Oesterstout

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Black Magic Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Oggi's Pizza & Brewing Co. Black Magic Stout

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Hot Blooded Foreign Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Cigar City Brewing Hot Blooded Foreign Stout

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Extra Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Brewery: Zero Gravity Craft Brewery / American Flatbread
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Zero Gravity Craft Brewery / American Flatbread Extra Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:A black Irish Ale with garnet hues and a tan head. Aroma of chocolate and coffee are followed by the rich flavors of roasted barley, with a dry finish.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Extra Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Jopen Bier BV Haarlem Jopen Extra Stout

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Jamaica Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Big City Brewing CO LTD Jamaica Stout

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Black Rock Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Crossroads Brewing Company Black Rock Stout

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Bulls Bay Oyster Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: COAST Brewing Company Bulls Bay Oyster Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Brewed with local oysters from Jeff Spahr at localoysters.com! Smooth and Roasty, briny (minerally and salty!??) that can only be attributed to the oysters.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Strong Back Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Bahamian Brewery Beverage & Co. Ltd. Strong Back Stout

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Guinness Foreign Extra Stout (Africa)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Guinness Nigeria PLC Guinness Foreign Extra Stout (Africa)

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Foreign Export Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Kuhnhenn Brewing Company Kuhnhenn Foreign Export Stout

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Cascade Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Cascade Brewery Company Ltd. Cascade Export Stout

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Tsingtao Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Tsingtao Brewery Co., Ltd. Tsingtao Stout

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Starkweather Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Liberty Street Brewing Company Starkweather Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Formerly known as LS Foreign Extra Stout.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Ceres Royal Stout (Ceres Extra Strong Stout)Ceres Brewery (Royal Unibrew)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Ceres Brewery (Royal Unibrew) Ceres Royal Stout (Ceres Extra Strong Stout)

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Guinness Draught
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Guinness Ltd. Guinness Draught

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Guinness Extra Stout (Original)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Guinness Ltd. Guinness Extra Stout (Original)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Aroma: Medium and balanced. A roast character with subtle fermentation fruitinessFlavor: A perfect rounded flavor of bitter and sweetPalate: Smooth with a slight bite leading to a dry finishAppearance: Distinctively black full bodied liquid with a rich creamy head\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Murphy's Irish Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Murphy Brewery Ireland Limited Murphy's Irish Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Murphy’s is an internationally recognized Irish stout, brewed since 1856 in the iconic Lady’s Well Brewery, Cork.Classified as an Irish Dry Stout, Murphy’s is dark in color and medium-bodied. It is silky smooth with toffee & coffee undertones, almost no bitterness, and a irresistible creamy finish.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Old #38 Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: North Coast Brewing Co. Old #38 Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:53 IBUs\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: O'Hara's Irish Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Carlow Brewing Company O'Hara's Irish Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:The flagship of the O’Hara’s brand, this uniquely Irish stout brings one back to how Irish stouts used to taste. First brewed in 1999, it has since been awarded prestigious honours for its quality and authenticity.O’Hara’s Irish Stout has a robust roast flavour complemented by a full-bodied and smooth mouth feel. The generous addition of Fuggle hops lends a tart bitterness to the dry espresso-like finish. This sessionable stout beer is filled with rich complex coffee aroma mingled with light liquorice notes. The combination of traditional stout hops with an extra pinch of roast barley allows us to stay true to Irish tradition, recreating a taste so often yearned for by stout drinkers.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Black Sun Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Three Floyds Brewing Co. & Brewpub Black Sun Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:6.5% ABV, 50 IBUs - Black Sun has a nose of coffee, roasted malts and piney hops. This medium bodied stout has a broad depth of maltiness and a clean dry finish. December release.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Beamish Irish Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Beamish & Crawford Plc. Beamish Irish Stout

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Black Hawk Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Mendocino Brewing Company Black Hawk Stout

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Dry Irish Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brooklyn Brewery Brooklyn Dry Stout

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Love Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Yards Brewing Co. Love Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Our brewers have poured their hearts and roasted malted into this rich, slightly sweet stout. Luscious notes of coffee and chocolate accent the smooth, creamy, mouth feel. We will not apologize for any amorous affairs resulting from the consumption of this beverage.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Blue Fin Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Shipyard Brewing Co. Blue Fin Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:A classic Irish Stout. Full bodied, yet smooth and spectacular in appearance.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Guinness Draught Extra Cold
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Guinness Ltd. Guinness Draught Extra Cold

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Donnybrook Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Victory Brewing Company Donnybrook Stout

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Dark Starr Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Starr Hill Brewery Dark Starr Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Dark Starr Stout has won more national and international awards than any other Dry Irish Stout in the country. Brewed with roasted barley, and with hints of coffee and dark chocolate, it packs a robust taste into a surprisingly light body. This signature brew pours like velvet and drinks like a slice of grandma’s pumpernickel bread.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: O.V.L. Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Russian River Brewing Company O.V.L. Stout

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Oyster Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: The Porterhouse Brewing Company Oyster Stout

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Black Fly Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Gritty McDuff's Brewing Company Gritty McDuff's Black Fly Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:There's beer and then there's stout, and Gritty McDuff 's Black Fly Stout is the real deal. Black Fly is a dry, all-malt stout packed with roasted flavor. We use six different grains in the brewing of this dark masterpiece and balance the full palate with Oregon Willamette and Yakima Clusters hops. Like the legendary Irish stouts that inspired it, Black Fly Stout is rich, robust and a touch mysterious. The finest stout west of Galway Bay!16 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Dragoon's Irish Dry Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Moylan's Brewery Moylans Dragoons Dry Irish Stout

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Dry Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Boulevard Brewing Co. Dry Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Velvety black and perfectly opaque, this surprisingly smooth, drinkable beer is a delightful harmony of smoky roasted flavors and tangy, coffee-like notes. Available only on tap at fine establishments throughout our distribution region.28 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Guinness Extra Stout (Canada)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Guinness Ltd. Guinness Extra Stout (Canada)

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Black Cab
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Fuller Smith & Turner PLC Black Cab
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Brewed with the knowledge of London’s oldest family brewer, Fuller’s Black Cab is a rich, dark stout that transports you to a time gone by. London was famous for stouts in the 19th century - and we’re on a journey to make that the case again.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Uncle Steve's Irish Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Short's Brewing Company Short's Uncle Steve's Irish Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Uncle Steve’s Irish Stout is Short’s version of the classic Irish Stout, complete with a dark color, soft head, and smooth full flavor typical of this lighter bodied style. A simple grist formula provides a base of roasted malt flavors with a creamy drinkability everyone loves.20 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Wrasslers XXXX Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: The Porterhouse Brewing Company Wrasslers XXXX Stout

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Cobblestone Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Mill Street Brew Pub Mill Street Cobblestone Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:We produce a traditional styled Irish Stout that is served using beer gas to produce that familiar creamy pore. This is the same system that draft Guinness uses. Our black stout has a roasted malt flavour and a hint of toasted walnuts and chocolate in the finish. Select imported hops are used to dry out the finish of this ale.30 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: O'Reilly's Irish Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Sly Fox Brewing Company O'Reilly's Irish Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:This Irish Style Stout is brewed with imported Pale and British Roasted Barley and hopped with Cascade and East Kent Goldings. Black in color, light in body, and roasty dry.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Saranac Irish Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Matt Brewing Company Saranac Irish Stout

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Stouterik (The Brussels Stout)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brasserie de la Senne Stouterik

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Portsmouth Black Cat Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Portsmouth Brewery Portsmouth Black Cat Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Yes, Arthur, there is another stout. Our Irish-style "dry" stout is brewed with four different malts, roasted barley and Chinook hops. It is big, bold, smooth & tasty, and we think it's the best thing on either side of St. James Gate.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: O'Hara's Leann Folláin
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Carlow Brewing Company O'Hara's Leann Folláin
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:O’Hara’s Leann Folláin (”leann folláin” being the Gaelic/Irish phrase meaning wholesome ale or stout) is a full-bodied extra Irish stout launched in 2009 following the very positive feedback to our limited edition O’Hara’s Celebration Extra Stout which was brewed in 2008. We have now included “Leann Folláin” in our 500ml bottle core brand range. O’Hara’s Leann Folláin at 6.0% abv is laden with complex chocolate and coffee flavours balanced by a robust bitterness and delicate spicy aroma imparted from the generous portions of Northdown and Fuggle Hops.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Three Feet Deep
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Furthermore Beer Three Feet Deep

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Plain Porter
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: The Porterhouse Brewing Company Plain Porter

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Hillsborough River Dry Irish Stout (Patio Tools)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Cigar City Brewing Hillsborough River Dry Stout (Patio Tools) - Cedar Aged (Humidor Series)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Pours black in color with coffee and very light cocoa notes. Hillsborough River is brewed with roasted barley which contributes forward coffee notes with small notes of cocoa and toffee in the flavor.35 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Susquehanna Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Appalachian Brewing Company Susquehanna Stout

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Irish Style Stout
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Sprecher Brewing Company Irish Style Stout
