dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Dogfish Head Brewery Faithfull Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Faithfull Ale is a celebration of Pearl Jam's 20th anniversary as a band and its extraordinary debut album, "Ten." In recognition of these milestones, this Belgian-style golden ale is delicately hopped to 20 IBUs and fruit-forward from 10 incremental additions of black currants over a one-hour boil. Faithfull clocks in at 7% ABV.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Hades Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Great Divide Brewing Company Hades Ale

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Arabier
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brouwerij De Dolle Brouwers De Dolle Arabier

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Reinaert Flemish Wild AleDe Proefbrouwerij (bvba Andelot)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: De Proefbrouwerij (bvba Andelot) Reinaert Flemish Wild Ale

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Grand Cru Winter Reserve
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Flying Fish Brewing Company Grand Cru Winter Reserve

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Moinette Blond
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brasserie Dupont sprl Moinette Blond

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Lucifer
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brouwerij Het Anker Lucifer

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Boskeun
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brouwerij De Dolle Brouwers De Dolle Bos Keun
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Boskeun is the nickname of Jo, one of the two brothers who preferred to brew blond beer at home. It is a special Easter beer, one of the first real Belgian Easter beers. (Slaghmuylder's paasbier being first). It has been brewed with pale malt, Golding hops, cane sugar and refermented in the bottle. It's a seasonal beer, so we suggest not to keep it eternally. The name Boskeun means rabbit of the wood (virgin wood, maybe?) and the label shows it, sampling the last brew.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Victoria Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Allagash Brewing Company Allagash Victoria Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Victoria Ale was inspired by a visit to Victoria Mansion, in Portland, Maine and the visual references to Bacchus, the god of wine. The brewer's decided to fuse the worlds of beer and wine. Over two hundred pounds of Chardonnay (Vidal Blanc in 2010) grapes were brought in, crushed on site and added directly to the mash. Victoria Ale's aroma is fruity spice, and the taste presents subtle notes of green banana, black pepper, and fresh-crushed mint. With a focus on the subtle, wine-like character of the grapes, the 9.0% ABV brew boasts a pale copper color, Belgian yeast influence, and a medium body with a long candied fruit finish with hints of honeydew melon, and, of course, white wine grapes.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Victor Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Allagash Brewing Company Allagash Victor Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:The Victor Ale was inspired by its feminine-named predecessor, the Victoria Ale. With chardonnay grapes to make the Victoria Ale unique, our brewers decided to use red grapes for the Victor. Over one hundred pounds of cabernet franc grapes were crushed on site and added directly to the mash. In addition to a generous portion of Pilsner malt, Victor is hopped with Fuggles and Hallertau and fermented with a wine yeast strain. With a focus on the subtle wine-like character of the grapes, the 9.0% ABV brew maintains a copper color, wine yeast influence and a medium body with a tart and spicy finish.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Grand Cru
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: North Coast Brewing Co. Grand Cru

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: BelzebuthBrasserie Grain d' Orge (Brasserie Jeanne d'Arc SA)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Brewery: Brasserie Grain d' Orge (Brasserie Jeanne d'Arc SA)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brasserie Grain d' Orge (Brasserie Jeanne d'Arc SA) Belzebuth

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: It's Alive!
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Mikkeller ApS It's Alive!
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Brewed at De Proef Brouwerij, Lochristi-Hijfte, Belgium.Ingredients: Water, malt (pale and cara), light candy, hops (hallertauer and styrian goldings), yeast and brettanomyces.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Malheur 10°
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brouwerij De Landtsheer NV Malheur 10°

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Barbãr (Belgian Honey Ale)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brasserie Lefèbvre SA Barbãr (Belgian Honey Ale)

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Melange A Trois - Reserve Series Aged In French Oak Chardonnay Barrels
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Nebraska Brewing Company Melange A Trois Reserve Series Aged In French Oak Chardonnay Barrels
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Our first beer in the Reserve Series, Melange A Trois begins with a wonderfully big Strong Belgian-Style Blonde Ale and moves into the extraordinary category through an additional 6 month French Oak Chardonnay Wine Barrel maturation. The essense of Chardonnay permeates while a subtle sweetness remains from the Ale itself. Oak tannins combine to create a fascinating mesh of dry, sweet, and wine-like character. One of our favorites!\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: La Guillotine
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brouwerij Huyghe La Guillotine

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Southampton Grand Cru
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Southampton Publick House Southampton Grand Cru

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Hoegaarden Grand Cru
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brouwerij van Hoegaarden Hoegaarden Grand Cru

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Alpha Kong
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Three Floyds Brewing Co. & Brewpub Alpha Kong
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:A super fruity, dry hopped, Belgian sextuple, with notes of cardamon.70 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: St. Feuillien Grand Cru
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brasserie St. Feuillien St. Feuillien Grand Cru

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Seigneuriale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Unibroue La Seigneuriale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:This beer was initially brewed by the now defunct Seigneuriale brewery in Boucherville. Unibroue decided to revive it in 2012, in honour of its name and unique recipe.The "Régime Seigneurial" flourished in New France until the mid-nineteenth century. In 1667, Pierre Boucher, Sieur de Grosbois, established a seigneurie in Boucherville on the South Shore of Montreal. The last three seigneurs resided in the sumptuous François Pierre Boucher manor of Boucherville, which was built in the 1750s and declared a historical monument in 1974. This ale is dedicated to these ancestral roots.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Kentucky Bourbon Barrel Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Brewery: Alltech’s Lexington Brewing and Distilling Co.
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Alltech’s Lexington Brewing and Distilling Co. Kentucky Bourbon Barrel Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Award winning Kentucky Bourbon Barrel Ale is a unique sipping beer with the distinctive nose of a well-crafted bourbon. Our Kentucky Ale is aged for up to 6 weeks in freshly decanted bourbon barrels from some of Kentucky’s finest distilleries. Subtle yet familiar flavors of vanilla and oak are imparted to this special ale as it rests in the charred barrels. Pleasantly smooth and robust, Kentucky Bourbon Barrel Ale may also be served as an aperitif or after dinner drink.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Immort Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Dogfish Head Brewery Immort Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:For this beer, we use maple syrup from Red Brook Farm -- Sam's family farm in Western Massachusetts, peat-smoked barley, juniper berries and vanilla.Immort is fermented with a blend of English and Belgian yeasts, then aged in the big oak tanks at the brewery.The sweet and earthy flavors meld magnificently in the Immort Ale. But be warned, the ABV is 11%, so after one or two you may start feeling immortal (even though we promise you won't be).50 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Fuller's 1845
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Fuller Smith & Turner PLC Fuller's 1845
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Matured for 100 daysFirst brewed in 1995 to commemorate the 150th anniversary of Fuller, Smith & Turner, this bottle conditioned recipe is inspired by the original Fuller's brewing books. The Amber malt and Goldings hops combine to create a delicious fruitcake aroma. As this beer is bottle conditioned, we recommend it is stored upright and poured carefully.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Yorkshire StingoSamuel Smith Old Brewery (Tadcaster)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Samuel Smith Old Brewery (Tadcaster) Samuel Smith's Yorkshire Stingo
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Some of the oak casks at Samuel Smith’s date back more than a century with the individual oak staves being replaced by the Old Brewery coopers over the years. Gradually the casks soak in more & more of the character of the ale fermented in stone Yorkshire squares. Yorkshire Stingo is aged for at least a year, matured in these well-used oak casks in the brewery’s underground cellars deriving fruit, raisin, treacle toffee, Christmas pudding and slight oaky flavours, before being further naturally conditioned in bottle.Not suitable for vegans.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Ubu Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Lake Placid Craft Brewing Company Ubu Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Our famous English-style Strong Ale, deep garnet red in color, with a smooth, hardy taste and a nice warm feeling to follow.38 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Geary's Hampshire Special Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: D.L. Geary Brewing Company Geary's Hampshire Special Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Once Maine’s legendary seasonal specialty, Hampshire is now available year round. Hampshire has a huge toasted malt flavor balanced by assertive hoppiness. The finish is long and lingering with the malt and hop notes blending with alcohol warmth. Original gravity - 1070; alcohol by volume - 7%; two row English malts (pale, crystal and chocolate); Cascade, Mt. Hood and East Kent Golding hops.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: King Goblin
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Wychwood Brewery Company Ltd King Goblin

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Adnams Broadside
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Adnams plc, Sole Bay Brewery Adnams Broadside

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Extra Strong Vintage Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Coopers Brewery Limited Coopers Extra Strong Vintage Ale

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Hen's Tooth
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Greene King / Morland Brewery Hen's Tooth

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Riggwelter Yorkshire Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Black Sheep Brewery PLC Riggwelter Yorkshire Ale

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Insanely Bad Elf Imperial Red Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Ridgeway Brewing Insanely Bad Elf

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Old Crafty Hen
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Greene King / Morland Brewery Old Crafty Hen
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:A strong fine ale combines the malty taste with a smooth raisin finish.Challenger provides a key herbal dry hop character, First Gold and Goldings give some citrus fruit and crystal malt provides warming toffee in the main beer of this blended ale. The use of some old 5X 12% ale adds dried fruit and raisin and produces a complex flavoured and richly satisfying ale. The tradition of brewing a Strong Suffolk Ale and maturing in Oak Vats is one that unlike other UK brewers, GK have continued - the practice is mentioned in 1810 in connection with GK.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Seriously Bad Elf
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Ridgeway Brewing Seriously Bad Elf

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Manchester Star AleJ.W. Lees & Co (Brewers) Ltd
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: J.W. Lees & Co (Brewers) Ltd Manchester Star Ale

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Jolly Roger Christmas Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Maritime Pacific Brewing Company Maritime Pacific Jolly Roger Christmas Ale

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Bracia
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Thornbridge Brewery Bracia
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Bracia is the Celtic name for a beverage brewed in Iron Age Europe with reference found on a Roman inscription at Haddon Hall, Derbyshire. Little is known about this except it was high in alcohol, brewed with cereals and, most probably, honey.Thornbridge's Bracia has been infused with a generous amount of dark and bitter Chestnut Honey sourced from the Alpine foothills of North East Italy.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Moonraker AleJ.W. Lees & Co (Brewers) Ltd
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: J.W. Lees & Co (Brewers) Ltd Moonraker Ale

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Reindeer's Revolt
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Ridgeway Brewing Reindeer's Revolt
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Bartender, if anyone calls, I'm not here, right? Every year, it's the same nightmare, hauling that over-sized, red-suited endomorph all over kingdom come, up to my shivering haunches in snow and muck! You call him a Saint? Slave-driver, more like. Going down in history is all well and good, but what about the here and now? My therapist says I have to start doing thing for me for a change. It's about time I had a Merry Christmas myself, don't you think?\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Pride Of Milford Special Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Cooperstown Brewing Company Pride Of Milford Special Ale

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Wizard's Winter Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Middle Ages Brewing Co., Ltd. Wizard's Winter Ale

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Twelve Days
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Hook Norton Brewery Co. Ltd. Twelve Days

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: An Brain Blásta
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: The Porterhouse Brewing Company Brainblasta

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Extra Special Oak (ESO)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Element Brewing Company Extra Special Oak (ESO)

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Triple
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: W.H. Brakspear & Sons plc Triple

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Monkey Wrench Strong Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Daleside Brewery Monkey Wrench Strong Ale

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Morocco Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Daleside Brewery Morocco Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Brewed & Bottled for Levens Hall, Cumbria.www.levenshall.co.ukBrewers Notes: A rich, dark and mysterious ale brewed to the ancient recipe held secret at Levens Hall for over 200 years.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Otro Mundo Strong Red Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Otro Mundo Brewing Company Otro Mundo Strong Red Ale

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Peculiar
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Granite Brewery & Restaurant Peculiar
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:A strong English ale, not too hoppy and reddish brown in colour. It is a dark, malty brew, full in taste with a sweet dry finish.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: 1488 Whisky Beer
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Tullibardine Distillery 1488 Whisky Beer

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Otter Head
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Otter Brewery Ltd Otter Head

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Old Admiral
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Lord Nelson Brewery Hotel Old Admiral

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: The Saints Whisky Beer
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: St. Peter's Brewery Co Ltd St. Peter's The Saints Whisky Beer
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:A superbly balanced beer golden in appearance with peaty smoky aromas and smooth whisky flavours from peated malt. With a measure of English Whisky from St. George’s Distillery in Norfolk, it is rich in flavour and a superb after dinner drink.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Centurion's Ghost Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: York Brewery Company Limited Centurion's Ghost Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Centurion's Ghost is a multiple gold medal award-winning dark ruby ale. It has a smooth roasted malt palate, and a combination of Challenger, Fuggle and Bramling Cross hops give it a subtle bitterness with autumn fruit flavours that linger on the aftertaste.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Ripon Jewel Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Daleside Brewery Ripon Jewel Ale

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: La Fin Du Monde
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Unibroue La Fin Du Monde
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:La Fin du Monde was developed through 18 months of research on a unique strain of yeast originating from Europe. It is brewed in honor of the intrepid European explorers who believed they had reached the “end of the world” when they discovered North America ‘the new world’. This triple-style golden ale recreates the style of beer originally developed in the Middle Ages by trappist monks for special occasions and as such it was the first of its kind to be brewed in North America.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Golden Monkey
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Victory Brewing Company Golden Monkey
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:A magical, mystical Monkey whose golden sole glows with the wisdom of the ages. This radiant ale is rich in the spirited tradition of Belgian-inspired brewing. Our Golden Monkey is both playfully delightful and profoundly satisfying. Exotic spice from the East rounds out this global journey to joy. Get on board. This Monkey's bound for glory!\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Westmalle Trappist Tripel
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brouwerij Westmalle Westmalle Trappist Tripel

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Tripel (White)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Bières de Chimay S.A. Chimay Tripel (White)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Labeled Chimay Cinq Cents in 750ml bottle.This blonde ale is dry and floral with a slight hop bitterness. The hoppiest Chimay ale, Cinq Cents was created by famed brewmaster Father Theodore in 1966.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Tripel Karmeliet
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brouwerij Bosteels Tripel Karmeliet
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:3 grains - barley, wheat, oat. Styrian hops.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Tripel
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brouwerij St. Bernardus NV St. Bernardus Tripel

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Trippel
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: New Belgium Brewing Trippel Grand Cru
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Our Trippel has always been a big, beautiful Belgian-style ale, but in 2015, we tweaked the recipe to include a new yeast variety and even more complex malt profile. This golden beer opens with a bold blast of spicy Noble hops, courtesy of Saaz and Hallertau Mittlefruh, and gives way to the fruity aromas offered by our traditional Belgian yeast. Brewed with Pilsner and Munich malts, Trippel is classically smooth and complex, and sings with a high-note of sweet citrus before a pleasantly dry finish delivers a warm, strong boozy bite. Give Trippel a sip to get you smiling.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Don De Dieu
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Unibroue Don de Dieu
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Don de Dieu (Gift of God) was the name of the ship that Samuel de Champlain sailed on his mission to “explore and discover the vast and perilous land of America” in the name of the King of France. His travels led to the founding of Quebec City in 1608.Inspired by this great adventure, Unibroue created Don de Dieu—an abbey-style triple wheat beer refermented in the bottle. Soft and round, it has delicately nuanced fruity and hoppy notes.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Tripel Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Allagash Brewing Company Allagash Tripel Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:This strong golden ale is marked by passion fruit and herbal notes in the aroma, with suggestions of banana and honey in the complex palate. The Tripel has a remarkably long and smooth finish.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Merry Monks
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Weyerbacher Brewing Co. Merry Monks' Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Merry Monks, 9.3% ABV, is a Belgian-style Tripel. Pilsner malt combined with an Abbey yeast strain yields a remarkable and complex flavor packed with notes of spice, banana and pear. Nicely balanced, with a moderate to dry finish.Merry Monks is bottle conditioned which imparts a special effervescence to the beer and a creamier carbonation. The ongoing fermentation inside the bottle will change the character of the beer as it ages and you’ll find it becomes dryer with age. You may want to lay down a few bottles for future evaluation. We suggest storing at cellar temperatures (around 55°F) and away from light.This brew is available year-round. Keep your eye out for Merry Monks in 25 oz. cork-and-cage champagne bottles for an exceptional experience!\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Maredsous 10 - Triple
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brouwerij Duvel Moortgat NV Maredsous 10 - Triple

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Trade Winds
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: The Bruery Trade Winds Tripel
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Our Summer seasonal, Trade Winds Tripel is a Belgian-style Golden Ale with a Southeast Asian twist. Instead of using candi sugar (typical for such a beer), we use rice in the mash to lighten the body and increase the gravity, and spice with Thai Basil. The result is an aromatic, digestible and complex beer made for a lazy summer evening.25 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: La Trappe Tripel (Koningshoeven / Dominus)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Bierbrouwerij De Koningshoeven B.V. La Trappe Tripel (Koningshoeven / Dominus)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:La Trappe Tripel’s aroma is slightly malty and estery. Despite its full, rich flavour, this out-of-the-ordinary ale still has a light and dry aftertaste with a touch of bitter finesse.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Samuel Adams New World Tripel (Barrel Room Collection)Boston Beer Company (Samuel Adams)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Boston Beer Company (Samuel Adams) Samuel Adams New World Tripel (Barrel Room Collection)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Aged in oak barrels; hand-bottled corked & caged; bottled-conditioned.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Agnus Dei (Abbey Pale Ale)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brouwerij Corsendonk Corsendonk Agnus / Abbey Pale Ale

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Gouden Carolus Tripel
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brouwerij Het Anker Gouden Carolus Tripel

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Dulle Teve (Mad Bitch)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brouwerij De Dolle Brouwers De Dolle Dulle Teve (Mad Bitch)

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Sapient Trip Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Dark Horse Brewing Company Dark Horse Sapient Trip Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Why is the Grim Reaper holding a mailbox? Well, that mailbox is from a dead Dark Horse beer. The Grim Reaper better know as "Death" was quite found of our classic Sapient Summer Wheat Ale. When we changed it into a Belgian Style Triple, Death thought it would only be appropriate to bring something from that beer into this beer. So he picked the mailbox, and we weren’t about to argue with him. You can say what you want about him, but that Death sure has a big heart. So anyway...we brewed this beer with a Trappist yeast strain so it is very traditional. The flavors are incredibly complex with notes of mild fruit and finishes with a bit of clove. Although this beer is higher in alcohol it is very smooth and finishes dry on the palate.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Devil's Backbone
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Real Ale Brewing Company Devil's Backbone

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Trappist Achel 8° Blond
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Brewery: Brouwerij der St. Benedictusabdij de Achelse
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brouwerij der St. Benedictusabdij de Achelse Trappist Achel 8° Blond

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Affligem Tripel
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brouwerij De Smedt / Brouwerij Affligem Affligem Tripel

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Brother David's Triple Abbey Style Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Anderson Valley Brewing Company Brother David's Triple Abbey Style Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Similar to Belgian-style Strong Pales, the Tripel is often characterized by its lighter color, spicy aromatics, and complexity. Brother David’s Triple is brewed with copious amounts of pale malts as well as Belgian candi sugar, giving it a deep golden hue, medium body and rich mouth feel. The dense head gives off aromas of candied orange peel, clover honey, pears, and a hint of freshly mown fields. The fruity esters and spicy hop flavors balance the phenolic characteristics leading to a peppery, citrusy finish.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Bornem Triple
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brouwerij Van Steenberge N.V. Bornem Triple

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Tripel Horse
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: River Horse Brewing Co. Bourbon Tripel Horse
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Our take on a Belgian Style Tripel Ale, brewed with spices and fermented with a Trappist yeast strain which lends hints of vanilla and creates a variety of complex flavors.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Golden Delicious
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Captain Lawrence Brewing Co. Golden Delicious
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Triple Aged In Apple Brandy Barrels\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: St. Feuillien Triple
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brasserie St. Feuillien St. Feuillien Triple
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:This beer has a white, smooth and very compact head. Its pale amber colour is very characteristic revealing a distinctive maltiness. It has a rich aroma with a unique combination of aromatic hops, spices and the typical bouquet of fermentation – very fruity. Secondary fermentation in the bottle gives it a unique aroma due to the presence of yeast. St-Feuillien Triple has a very strong and exceptionally lingering taste thanks to its density and its long storage period. Whether served as a refreshing aperitif in summer or savoured during the winter months, the Triple is a connoisseur’s beer par excellence.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Final Absolution Trippel
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Dragonmead Microbrewery Dragonmead Final Absolution Trippel
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Dragonmead's signature product! This is the ultimate Belgian style. The very high gravity of this beer is balanced by the smoothness of its finish. Banana and Clove aromas come from the Belgian yeast strain combining with the generous dose of Belgian Candi Sugar. The Saaz hops help to give this beer a balanced bitterness with no noticeable hop aroma.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Straffe Hendrik Bruges Tripel Bier 9°
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Brewery: Brouwerij Straffe Hendrik / Huisbrouwerij De Halve Maan
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brouwerij Straffe Hendrik / Huisbrouwerij De Halve Maan Straffe Hendrik Brugse Tripel Bier 9°

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Watou Tripel
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brouwerij St. Bernardus NV Watou Tripel

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Trippel
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Green Flash Brewing Co. Green Flash Trippel

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Damnation Batch 23 (Oak Aged)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Russian River Brewing Company Damnation Batch 23 (Oak Aged)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:We turned our regular Damnation recipe into a Tripel. It is bittered with Tomahawk and has Sterling and Cascade in the mid-boil and finish. The beer was then aged on new American oak chips for two to three weeks.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Triple
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brasserie de l'Abbaye du Val-Dieu Val-Dieu Triple

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Augustijn Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brouwerij Van Steenberge N.V. Augustijn Ale

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Kasteel Tripel
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brouwerij Van Honsebrouck N.V. Kasteel Triple

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Eau Benite
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Unibroue Eau Benite
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:First brewed in 1996, Eau Benite "Oh-Bey-Knit" (Holy Water) was developed to offer the characteristics of a bottle refermented triple with a slightly lower alcohol content. This is a refreshing pale golden ale with a slightly fruity nose and a pleasant character.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Abbey Triple
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Sprecher Brewing Company Abbey Triple
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:A Belgian Trappist triple yeast culture balanced with the finest imported pale barley, Belgian aromatic malt and oats, gives this golden ale a fruity bouquet and a light refined taste.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Tripel Van De Garre
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brouwerij Van Steenberge N.V. Tripel Van De Garre
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:This is the house beer for the famous De Garre pub in Brugges, Belgium. Brewed using traditional Belgian triple base with three times the amount of malt allows the brewer to achieve the 11% ABV.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Winter Session Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Peak Organic Brewing Company Winter Session Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:This winter wheat beer uses dark malting to provide subtle toasty notes. We then single-hop and dry-hop this beer with Citra hops from our friend Brad’s farm. Interesting pineapple notes from the Citra hop provide a stark contrast to the toasty notes in the body. An engaging and sessionable Winter Seasonal.62 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: River Guide
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Berkshire Brewing Company Inc. River Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Formerly River Ale\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Black Wit-O
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: No Label Brewing Company Black Wit-O

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Cornstalker Dark Wheat
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Thunderhead Brewing Company Cornstalker Dark Wheat
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:A fantastic Dark Wheat. Clean, roasty, round, and surprisingly dry. Incredibly drinkable.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Black Walnut Wheat
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Piney River Brewing Company Black Walnut Wheat
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Buckets, burlap bags and pickup truck beds are filled with black walnuts each fall in the Ozarks. The rich and lively flavor of the wild, hand-harvested black walnut is a renowned flavor of the region. We're proud to continue celebrating local flavor and tradition with our handcrafted Black Walnut Wheat Ale.18 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Red Bud
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Greenbush Brewing Company Red Bud

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: WRed Wheat
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Wild Rose Brewery & Taproom WRed Wheat
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:From the distinctive red-amber hues, to aromas of biscuits and a sweetness of caramel, this beer is not to be taken lightly. Wild Rose WRed Wheat is hand crafted, striking a fine balance between malt and hops. The final result is a beer that is crisp, clean and refreshing.16 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Shredder's Wheat
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Barley Brown's Brewpub Shredder's Wheat

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Ruddy Wheat
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Weston Brewing Company & O'Malley's Pub Ruddy Wheat

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Gwiniz Du
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brasserie Britt de Bretagne Gwiniz Du

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Oktoberfest
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Schmohz Brewing Company Oktoberfest

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Winter Wheat
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Franconia Brewing Company Winter Wheat

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Outlaw McCaw
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Freetail Brewing Company Outlaw McCaw

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Jamieson Mountain Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Jamieson Brewery Jamieson Mountain Ale

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Winter Wheat
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Middle Ages Brewing Co., Ltd. Winter Wheat

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Yin-Yang Witbier
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Iron Hill Brewery & Restaurant Yin-Yang Witbier

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Red Wheat
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Flat Branch Pub & Brewery Red Wheat
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Our Red Wheat is a variation of our Honey Wheat. It is reddish copper in color due to a generous addition of colored malts that also contribute a slight caramel taste. Wheat malt is added to make up 50% of the total malt bill. Nicely balanced with a light addition of German Perle and Tettnang hops. A very easy to drink yet flavorful and light beer.16 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Dark Wheat
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Brewery: The Merchant Ale House Restaurant & Brewpub
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: The Merchant Ale House Restaurant & Brewpub Dark Wheat
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Our Dark Wheat is made from 50% wheat malt and Hallertau hops are used to form a well hopped amber beer. Most try this beer with a lemon but you can usually catch the brewer enjoying it with a lime.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Gumballhead
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Three Floyds Brewing Co. & Brewpub Gumballhead
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:An American wheat beer with a refreshing, crisp citrus finish. This delicious session beer is brewed with boatloads of Amarillo hops.35 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Samuel Adams Summer AleBoston Beer Company (Samuel Adams)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Boston Beer Company (Samuel Adams) Samuel Adams Summer Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:An American Wheat, brewed with malted wheat, lemon zest and grains of paradise - a rare pepper from Africa first used as a brewing spice in the 13th Century to create a crisp and spicy flavor and body.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: 312 Urban Wheat
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Goose Island Beer Co. 312 Urban Wheat
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Crisp, bright flavor shines like city lights on Lake Michigan. Hazy and unfiltered, our award-winning Urban Wheat Ale's flavor flows from start to finish.18 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Unfiltered Wheat
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Boulevard Brewing Co. Unfiltered Wheat
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Boulevard Unfiltered Wheat Beer is a lively, refreshing ale with a natural citrusy flavor and distinctive cloudy appearance. This easy drinking American-style wheat beer has become our most popular offering, and the best-selling craft beer in the Midwest.14 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Circus Boy The Hefeweizen!
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Magic Hat Brewing Company Circus Boy
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Unfiltered and unfettered, Circus Boy is a unique and refreshing American-style Hefeweizen. Is he a who? Or a what? Or perhaps some of both? Be amazed by the flavorful haze of this wonderful wheat beer.15 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: UFO Hefeweizen
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Harpoon Brewery UFO Hefeweizen
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:UFO Hefeweizen is an American unfiltered wheat beer. Perhaps UFO’s initial sensory perception is also its most prominent: a cloudy golden color and a dense, frothy head. The yeast, which has not been filtered out, accounts for the cloudiness of UFO. Wheat malt tends to create a larger head than barley malt, the cereal grain most often used in brewing. When served in a traditional wheat beer glass with a lemon, UFO presents an appealing and distinctive visual image.The aroma has a faint but clear citrus-like character. This is produced by the special yeast and accounts for the Bavarian tradition of serving hefeweizens with a lemon. The lemon accentuates the yeast’s fruity, tart fragrance. UFO has a soft mouthfeel and a refreshing, light body. The wheat malts and subtle hopping give the beer a mild, delicate flavor. UFO has a clean finish. Unlike some imported hefeweizens, UFO does not have the spicy, tropical flavors typical of European-brewed style.19 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Hop Sun (Summer Wheat Beer)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Southern Tier Brewing Company Hop Sun (Summer Wheat Beer)

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Berry Weiss
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Jacob Leinenkugel Brewing Company Leinenkugel's Berry Weiss

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Anchor Summer Beer
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Anchor Brewing Company Anchor Summer Beer

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Blue Moon Summer Honey WheatCoors Brewing Company (Molson-Coors)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Coors Brewing Company Blue Moon Summer Honey Wheat

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Samuel Adams Coastal WheatBoston Beer Company (Samuel Adams)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Boston Beer Company (Samuel Adams) Samuel Adams Coastal Wheat

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Wailua Wheat
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Kona Brewing Co. Wailua Wheat
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Swimming in a fresh water pool at the base of a cascading waterfall is what we all imagine we would find in paradise. On Maui, follow the old Hana Highway and you will find such a place – Wailua Falls. This plunging cascade of clear water is the inspiration for our Limited Release Wailua Wheat Ale. This golden, sun colored ale has a bright, citrus flavor that comes from the tropical passion fruit we brew into each batch. Sit back, relax and enjoy paradise anytime.15 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Montana Trout Slayer Wheat Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Big Sky Brewing Company Montana Trout Slayer Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Trout Slayer is a filtered wheat ale, fermented at cool temperatures, making it a smooth drinkable session beer. Brewed with Palisade, Glacier, and Mt. Hood hops, this straw colored beer is sure to please any craft beer drinker.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Sweaty Betty Blonde
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Boulder Beer / Wilderness Pub Sweaty Betty Blonde

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: SummerBright Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Breckenridge Brewery SummerBright Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Enjoy Poolside or Sprinklerside. Breck Brew's SummerBright is the result. The craftsman's touch combines white wheat, two row pale and munich malt with the pacific northwest's most intriguing hops to create a bright, clean ale ideal for picnicking, evenings on the screen porch and enjoying the whims of the summer breeze.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Blue Star Great American Wheat Beer
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: North Coast Brewing Co. Blue Star Great American Wheat Beer

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Summer Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Shipyard Brewing Co. Summer Ale

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Easy Street Wheat
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Odell Brewing Company Chili Easy Street Wheat

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Whitsun Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Arcadia Brewing Company Arcadia Whitsun Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Brewed in the style of a mid-19th century English Festival Ale, this unfiltered wheat beer displays a translucent orange color topped with a creamy, white head. Wheat enhances the mouthfeel of the beer and produces pleasant bread-like notes while Michigan honey provides a caramelized sweetness in the flavor profile. This beer is spiced with orange peel and coriander and small amounts of three hop varieties pleasantly counterbalances the sweetness.Brewed with Michigan honey.1062 OG; 17 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Pineapple Mana Wheat
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Maui Brewing Co. Mana Wheat
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Maui Gold pineapple gives sweet aroma to this smooth-bodied, tropical brew.18 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Dirty Blonde Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Atwater Block Brewery Dirty Blonde Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:From mild to wild this one’s the perfect companion for whatever you’re up for. Crisp wheat smoothness gives way to a touch of coriander snap and a kiss of sweet orange peel perk that lingers on your lips. With a beautiful cloudy golden hue and ample head this one makes you love her more with every pour.8 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Solace
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Firestone Walker Brewing Co. Solace

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Jack Whacker Wheat Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Tommyknocker Brewery Jack Whacker Wheat Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:An American-style wheat ale brewed with malted. Low hopping rates allow the refreshing aroma and citrus flavor of a late addition of lemon grass to dominate. This unfiltered beer retains all of its protein, flavor, and some of its yeast, resulting in a traditionally cloudy appearance.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Blue Moon Spring Blonde Wheat AleCoors Brewing Company (Molson-Coors)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Coors Brewing Company Blue Moon Spring Blonde Wheat Ale

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: White Gold
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Ithaca Beer Company White Gold
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:A Belgo-American Ale brewed with domestic barley and French wheat malts, the finest Continental and U.S. grown hops, and fermented with Belgian, English and Wild yeasts.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Saranac Pomegranate Wheat
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Matt Brewing Company Saranac Pomegranate Wheat

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Summer Session Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Peak Organic Brewing Company Peak Organic Summer Session Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:A traditional summer wheat beer marries a West Coast pale ale. Locally grown wheat provides a complex mouthfeel and Amarillo dry hopping gives a citrusy aroma.61 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Saranac Summer Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Matt Brewing Company Saranac Summer Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Available in the 12 Beers of Summer sampler. Not to be confused with Saranac Summer Brew (a German Radler).\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Sun Block
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Captain Lawrence Brewing Co. Sun Block Witte
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:As the sun starts to peek out from around the dark winter clouds, it is a clear reminder that brighter days lie ahead. Deviating from the original recipe, this new and improved Sun Block comes with a little more oomph in flavor, but still has that great summertime body.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Funk Blueberry Citrus Wheat
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: DuClaw Brewing Company Funk
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:The traditional American Wheat Ale serves as a solid baseline, but we couldn’t be content until we tore the roof off this sucker! Funk, our Blueberry Citrus Wheat Ale, sets the rhythm with a soulful fusion of American wheat and hops, before unleashing a stunning encore with big notes of blueberry and Meyer lemon. It’s no jive, you’ll just dig it!\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Willy Vanilly
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Alpine Beer Company Willy Vanilly
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:The base for this beer is Willy Wheat. They add Vanilla to the tanks during aging. Try mixing it with Alpine's Captain Stout for a Captain & Vanille.Draft availability only.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Canebrake
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Parish Brewing Company Canebrake
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Canebrake is crisp and smooth with a beautiful golden honey color. This refreshing American wheat style brew highlights sweet remnants of sugarcane with notes of honey, spice, and citrus on the finish. A new Louisiana tradition, Canebrake was the first commerical beer in the world brewed with local sugarcane syrup!16 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Hefeweissbier Dunkel
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Bayerische Staatsbrauerei Weihenstephan Weihenstephaner Hefeweissbier Dunkel
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Our dark wheat beer is impressive with its creamy white foam. A fruity-fresh sweetness and hints of mature bananas harmonise with delicious flavours of roasted malt, sparkling and full-bodied with a light caramel taste on the first sip. An excellent accompaniment from hearty meals and game to chocolate and nut desserts. Brewed according to our centuries-old brewing tradition on the Weihenstephan hill.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Shiner Holiday Cheer
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Spoetzl Brewery Shiner Holiday Cheer
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Holiday traditions come in all shapes and sizes. Ours come in freshly wrapped bottles and cans. This old-world dunkelweizen is brewed with Texas peaches and roasted pecans - perfect for cracking open in front of a crackling fire.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Franziskaner Hefe-Weisse Dunkel
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Spaten-Franziskaner-Bräu Franziskaner Hefe-Weisse Dunkel

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Erdinger Weissbier Dunkel
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Erdinger Weissbräu Erdinger Weissbier Dunkel
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Also labelled as Erdinger Hefe-Weizen DunkelCarefully selected dark malts with delicate roasting aromas give ERDINGER Dunkel its full-bodied flavor and strong character.This elegant wheat beer has a lustrous, deep dark-brown appearance in the glass. The first sip reveals a harmonious symphony of carefully selected wheat and barley malts with exquisite Hallertau aroma hops. The taste buds detect hints of caramel, nuts and fresh bread. An unmistakable top-fermenting accent is provided by ERDINGER’s traditional yeast.ERDINGER Dunkel first saw the light of day in 1989, when ERDINGER’s master brewers created a dark wheat beer as a birthday present for the private brewery’s owner, Werner Brombach. He liked it so much that he decided to put it on the market in 1990.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Samuel Adams DunkelweizenBoston Beer Company (Samuel Adams)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Boston Beer Company (Samuel Adams) Samuel Adams Dunkelweizen
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Read the reviews.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Hacker-Pschorr Dunkel Weisse (Weisse Dark)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Hacker-Pschorr Bräu GmbH Hacker-Pschorr Dunkle Weisse

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Julius Echter Hefe-Weissbier Dunkel
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Würzburger Hofbräu AG Julius Echter Hefe-Weissbier Dunkel

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Hefe-Weissbier Dunkel
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Paulaner Brauerei GmbH & Co. KG Paulaner Hefe-Weissbier Dunkel

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Andechs Weissbier Dunkel
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Klosterbrauerei Andechs Andechs Weissbier Dunkel
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:This dark Weissbier retains its aromatic character thanks to the select choice of Hallertau aroma hops and highest quality Bavarian wheat and dark barley malts.Its characteristic, distinctive maroon colour is a feast for the eyes. Then there’s the opalescence and fine structure of the yeast turbidity. The perfect complement is provided by the very creamy, fine pored head. This dark Weissbier from the Holy Mountain will delight connoisseurs with a harmonious interplay of fruity odours, above all ripe bananas and pineapple, with undertones of caramel and cocoa.Andechser Weissbier Dunkel teases the tongue with a delicate tanginess carried by a round, soft body. A light caramel sweetness harmonises well with the fine hoppy bitterness. It concludes on a soft and refreshing note.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Michelob Dunkel Weisse
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Anheuser-Busch Michelob DunkelWeisse

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Tucher Dunkles Hefe Weizen
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brauerei Tucher Brau Tucher Dunkles Hefe Weizen

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Kapuziner Schwarz-Weizen
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Kulmbacher Brauerei AG Kapuziner Schwarz-Weizen

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Winged Nut
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Urban Chestnut Brewing Company Winged Nut
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:We affectionately refer to the first beer in our Revolution series of modern, American craft beer, as our unusual little bird. It’s a little on the flighty side @ 5.4% ABV, and it’s a little on the wacky side because we brew it with finely milled chestnuts (genus castanea …for you nut freaks), Willamette hops, and we ferment it with a Bavarian Weissbier yeast strain. All of these nuances contribute to its ‘nutty’ personality.22 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Hofbrau Hefe Weisse Dunkel
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Hofbräuhaus München Hofbrau Hefe Weisse Dunkel

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: 10 Degrees Below
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Scuttlebutt Brewing Company 10 Degrees Below

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Moosbacher Schwarze Weisse
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Private Landbrauerei Scheuerer Moosbacher Schwarze Weisse

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Leavenworth Boulder Bend Dunkelweizen
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Fish Brewing Company / Fishbowl Brewpub Leavenworth Boulder Bend Dunkelweizen

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Dragon's Breath
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Bayern Brewing, Inc. Bayern Dragon's Breath
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Dragon's Breath is a Dark Wheat Hefeweizen, otherwise known as a Dunkelweizen. It is mild in taste, unfiltered, and moderately hopped with Hallertauer Perle hops, cold fermented eliminating any harsh aftertaste. This award winning Bavarian classic was brought to America by our German Brewmaster Jurgen.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Weisse Dunkel
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brauerei Gebrüder Maisel GmbH & Co. Maisel's Weisse Dunkel

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Shiner Dunkelweizen
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Spoetzl Brewery Shiner Dunkelweizen
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Also known as Shiner Dark Hefeweizen\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: König Ludwig Weissbier Dunkel
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Brewery: Kaltenberg International / König Ludwig International GmbH & Co.KG
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Kaltenberg International / König Ludwig International GmbH & Co.KG König Ludwig Weissbier Dunkel

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Ramstein Classic
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: High Point Brewing Company Ramstein Classic

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Weltenburger Hefe-Weissbier Dunkel
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Klosterbrauerei Weltenburg Weltenburger Hefe-Weissbier Dunkel

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Hopf Dunkle Weisse
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Weissbierbrauerei Hopf Hopf Dunkle Weisse

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Schöfferhofer Dunkles Hefeweizen
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Binding-Brauerei AG Schöfferhofer Dunkles Hefeweizen

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Dunkelweizen
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Gordon Biersch Brewery Restaurant Gordon Biersch Dunkelweizen
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Dunkelweizen translates from German to mean dark wheat. Gordon Biersch Dunkelweizen highlights the undertones of dark-roasted malted wheat and the unique flavors produced by our special Hefeweizen yeast strain. Our Dunkelweizen adheres to all of the traditions of the Reinheitsgebot (German Purity Law of 1516) and is naturally carbonated.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Dark 'n Curvy
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Piece Brewery & Pizzeria Dark 'n Curvy

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Texels Skuumkoppe
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Texelse Bierbrouwerij Texels Skuumkoppe

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Benediktiner Weissbier Dunkel
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Klosterbrauerei Ettal / Ettaler Klosterbetriebe GmbH Ettaler Weißbier Dunkel

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Unertl Weissbier
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Unertl Weissbier GmbH Unertl Weissbier

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Dunkle Weizen
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Sprecher Brewing Company Dunkel Weizen

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Portsmouth Winter Weizen
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Portsmouth Brewery Portsmouth Winter Weizen
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:This hefeweizen is brewed with a bit more wheat malt & hops to create a well balanced, robust winter ale.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Fürstenberg Weizen Hefe Dunkel
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Fürstlich Fürstenbergische Brauerei KG Fürstenberg Weizen Hefe Dunkel

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Dunkler Hirsch Allgäuer Weizen
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Der HirschBrau/Privatbrauerei Höss Dunkler Hirsch Allgäuer Weizen

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Vùdù
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Birrificio Italiano Vùdù

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Steingadener Weisse Dunkel
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Aktien-Brauerei Kaufbeuren AG Steingadener Weisse Dunkel

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Portsmouth Dunkelweizen
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Portsmouth Brewery Portsmouth Dunkelweizen
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:This dark wheat ale has a touch of roastiness & a crisp refreshing character with a medium body.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Hefeweissbier
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Bayerische Staatsbrauerei Weihenstephan Weihenstephaner Hefeweissbier
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Our golden-yellow wheat beer, with its fine-poured white foam, smells of cloves and impresses consumers with its refreshing banana flavour. It is full bodied and with a smooth yeast taste. To be enjoyed at any time,goes excellently with fish and seafood, with spicy cheese and especially with the traditional Bavarian veal sausage. Brewed according to our centuries-old brewing tradition on the Weihenstephan hill.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Franziskaner Hefe-Weisse
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Spaten-Franziskaner-Bräu Franziskaner Hefe-Weisse
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Also known as Franziskaner Weissbier and Franziskaner Hefe-Weisse Hell.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Hefe-Weissbier Naturtrüb
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Paulaner Brauerei GmbH & Co. KG Paulaner Hefe-Weissbier Naturtrüb
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Marketed as "Weissbier" internationally.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Widmer Hefeweizen
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Widmer Brothers Brewing Company Widmer Hefeweizen
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:availability: year-roundbitterness: 30 IBUalcohol by volume: 4.9%original gravity: 11.75° PLATOmalts:Pale, Munich, Wheat, Caramel 40Lhops:Bittering: AlchemyAroma: Willamette, Cascade\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Erdinger Weissbier (Hefe-Weizen)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Erdinger Weissbräu Erdinger Weissbier
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Every sip leaves you wanting more – our ERDINGER Weissbier with fine yeast is the crowning glory of traditional Bavarian brewing skills.The strength of this classic wheat beer lies in the harmonious balance it achieves between the various aromas. Gently spicy wheat and yeast aromas blend with mildly bitter hops. The invigorating carbon dioxide ensures its typical liveliness. A premium beer whose full-bodied yet elegant character leaves a lasting impression of ultimate Bavarian enjoyment. A truly unique wheat beer!ERDINGER Weissbräu allows its top-fermenting specialty to mature in the bottle in the traditional manner, just like champagne. This wheat beer from Erding offers more than just sparkling refreshment – it gives a true taste of Bavaria.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: DreamWeaver Wheat
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Tröegs Brewing Company DreamWeaver Wheat
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:The dream begins with open top fermentation. At high krausen a foamy, rocky yeast head crests the sides of the fermenter releasing notes of black pepper and spicy clove. Unfiltered and cloudy with yeast, it's slightly tart & downright refreshing.15 IBU55% WheatHops: German Northern Brewer\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Schneider Weisse Tap 7 Unser Original
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Brewery: Weisses Bräuhaus G. Schneider & Sohn GmbH
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Weisses Bräuhaus G. Schneider & Sohn GmbH Schneider Weisse Original
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Formerly Schneider Weisse Original.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Hacker-Pschorr Hefe Weisse Naturtrüb
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Hacker-Pschorr Bräu GmbH Hacker-Pschorr Hefe Weisse Natürtrub
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Our unfiltered Hacker-Pschorr Weissbier is naturally cloudy, full-flavoured and uniquely refreshing. Georg Pschorr – in his day owner of the Pschorr brewery and a man of true foresight - spread word of this exquisite and enjoyable Hefe-Weissbier and made it popular beyond the borders of Bavaria.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: HefeWeizen
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Live Oak Brewing Company Live Oak HefeWeizen
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Modeled after the classic wheat beers of Bavaria, Hefeweizen is cloudy and straw-colored with a meringue-like head that lingers to the bottom of the glass. Brewed with an ample volume of wheat malt and few hops, this beer features a unique yeast strain that produces harmonious notes of clove, banana, and vanilla throughout this effervescent brew. A traditional interpretation of a classic style, this idiosyncratic Bavarian beer is perfectly at home here in Texas.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Hefeweizen
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Flying Dog Brewery Imperial Hefeweizen
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Formerly In-Heat Wheat\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Dancing Man
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: New Glarus Brewing Company Dancing Man Wheat
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:If you dream of wheat this brew will get your toes tapping. Since 1995 we have brewed Bavarian style wheat beers exclusively for the same great state that grows and malts our own Wisconsin wheat. In a world full of posers this is a true hefe-weizen naturally 100% bottle fermented and hazy.Expect this beer to cascade effervescent into your glass. The rich spicy clove and cinnamon notes will greet your nose while sweet fruit and wheat kisses your lips.Lick the foam from your mouth and admit sometimes you just gotta get up and dance.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Hofbräu Münchner Weisse
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Hofbräuhaus München Hofbräu Münchner Weisse
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:The origin of Hofbrau Hefe Weizen dates back to 1589 and since then the "Weisse" has a distinctive place in the history of Hofbrau Munchen. The beer is characterized by its sparkling, by its rich foam and naturally by its unforgettable refreshing taste.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Schneider Weisse Tap 4 Wiesen Edel-Weisse
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Brewery: Weisses Bräuhaus G. Schneider & Sohn GmbH
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Weisses Bräuhaus G. Schneider & Sohn GmbH Schneider Wiesen Edel-Weisse Mein Grunes
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Also known as Tap 4 - Mein Grünes and Tap 4 - Meine Festweisse\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Shiner Hefeweizen
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Spoetzl Brewery Shiner Hefeweizen

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: König Ludwig Weiss
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Brewery: Kaltenberg International / König Ludwig International GmbH & Co.KG
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Kaltenberg International / König Ludwig International GmbH & Co.KG Konig Ludwig Hell
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Why are the Bavarian Royal Family and King Ludwig so important to brewing history? The Bavarian Royal family had sole rights to brewing of Hefe-Weizen in Bavaria for 200 years. No wonder they are leading experts on wheat brews.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Schofferhofer Hefeweizen Grapefruit Bier
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Binding-Brauerei AG Schofferhofer Grapefruit Hefeweizen
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:As you might’ve guessed we’re from Germany, but what might surprise you is that we’re the world’s first Hefeweizen (wheat beer) grapefruit beer. Best served cold, it’s the perfect casual brew to cool you off during the summer, but it can be enjoyed all year round any time of the day. It’s a true 50/50 blend of total refreshment made from 50% Schofferhofer Hefeweizen blended with 50% carbonated juice of 100% natural ingredients.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Pyramid Hefeweizen
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Pyramid Breweries, Inc. Haywire Hefeweizen

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Samuel Adams HefeweizenBoston Beer Company (Samuel Adams)
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Boston Beer Company (Samuel Adams) Samuel Adams Hefeweizen
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Hazy golden and filled with smooth wheat character, our Hefeweizen is our take on the classic German beer. Notes of clove and banana, signatures of this traditional style, accent the aroma and flavor, and are complemented by a subtle bready malt character. Clean and crisp, this beer pairs best with a sunny summer day.HOP VARIETIESHallertau Mittelfrueh and Spalt-Spalter Noble hopsMALT VARIETIESSamuel Adams two-row pale malt blend, White Wheat14 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Ebel's Weiss Beer
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Two Brothers Brewing Company Ebel's Weiss Beer
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Ebel's Weiss beer is a very traditional German Hefeweizen that is naturally unfiltered. It has wonderful malt sweetness and a soft aroma of clove, vanilla, and banana. This deep golden colored weiss will make you think you are in Bavaria.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Julius Echter Hefe-Weissbier Hell
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Würzburger Hofbräu AG Julius Echter Hefe-Weissbier Hell

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Oktoberfest Weissbier
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Erdinger Weissbräu Erdinger Oktoberfest Weissbier

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Tucher Helles Hefe Weizen
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brauerei Tucher Brau Tucher Helles Hefe Weizen

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Kapuziner Weissbier
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Kulmbacher Brauerei AG Kapuziner Weissbier

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Schöfferhofer Hefeweizen
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Binding-Brauerei AG Schöfferhofer Hefeweizen

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Shotgun Betty Hefeweizen Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Lonerider Brewing Shotgun Betty
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Shotgun Betty is a sexy, tough cowgirl who is always armed and dangerous. Don’t be fooled by her good looks, she will have you for an appetizer! That’s why we picked her to represent our Hefeweizen. Shotgun Betty is a wheat beer with rich, banana-clove nose and refreshing dry finish. Sound good? Try one. But beware, once Betty gets a hold of you there is no escape.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Weisse Original
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brauerei Gebrüder Maisel GmbH & Co. Maisel's Weisse Original

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Hefeweizen
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Yazoo Brewing Company Hefeweizen
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:An authentic example of a Bavarian Hefeweizen. “Hefe” means cloudy or yeasty and “weizen” means wheat. This beer is made with mostly wheat and uses a true Hefeweizen yeast that gives it a fruity, banana aroma with just a hint of cloves. The tart finish makes this the perfect summer beer.13 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: The Love Wheat Beer
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Starr Hill Brewery The Love
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:A German-style hefeweizen with a fruity aroma and spicy finish.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Weisse Versa Wheat
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Karbach Brewing Co. Weisse Versa Wheat
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:German Hefeweizen / Belgian Witbier hybrid, brewed with coriander and citrus peel.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Mad King's Weiss
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Victory Brewing Company Mad King's Weiss
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Bavaria’s fabled Ludwig was said to be ‘mad’. The same might be said of us for approaching this German beer style with fistfuls of hops beyond the norm for this style and yeast from Belgium!CompositionMalt: Imported two-row German malts, including wheatHops: Whole flower German hopsABV: 6.2%FlavorHigh-powered with all German malts and the subtle, spicy complexity of our special yeast, Mad King's Weiss offers a quenching quality that can't be beat.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Trader Joe's Bavarian Style Hefeweizen
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Trader Joe's Brewing Company Trader Joe's Bavarian Style Hefeweizen

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Pinkus Weizen
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brauerei Pinkus Mueller Organic Hefe-Weizen

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Waterkeeper Hefeweizen
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: SweetWater Brewing Company Sweetwater Waterkeeper Hefeweizen

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Hefeweizen
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Gordon Biersch Brewery Restaurant Gordon Biersch Hefeweizen
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Hundreds of years ago in Germany, wheat beers were considered 'breakfast' or 'after church' beers, a testament to their light refreshing flavor and a tradition of drinking them on weekend occasions. We invite you to enjoy our Hefeweizen (hay-fa-VEIT-sen) any day of the week.12 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Heinnieweisse Weissebier
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Butternuts Beer & Ale Heinnieweisse Weissebier

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Brooklyner Weisse
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brooklyn Brewery Brooklyner Weisse

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Penn Weizen
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Pennsylvania Brewing Company Penn Weizen
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Authentic wheat beer, brewed in the Southern German tradition, won the Silver Medal in 1997 and the Gold Medal at the 2000 in Denver, Colorado. Penn Weizen is top-fermented, cask-conditioned, and very effervescent with a slight hint of tangy clove flavor.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Drunk Monk Hefeweizen
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Three Floyds Brewing Co. & Brewpub Drunk Monk Hefeweizen

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Benediktiner Weissbier
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Klosterbrauerei Ettal / Ettaler Klosterbetriebe GmbH Ettaler Benediktiner Weizen
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:The top-fermented wheat beer is specially brewed to obtain a tasty but also pungent wheat beer. This special type of brewing allows a particularly full and also very tasty wheat beer. The amber color comes through special malt, which also brings a caramel-like character and other taste facets in the beer.The cloudiness receives this Benedictine wheat beer by the fine yeast , which means an important flavor carrier for this beer type. This top-fermented yeast gives the wheat beer a very fruity note that is even reminiscent of bananas. A special taste experience is the sweetness, which is to enter into a synergy with the fine dry aroma of the hop.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Baltika #8 Wheat
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Baltika Breweries Baltika #8 Wheat

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Schneider Weisse Tap 1 Mein Blondes
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Brewery: Weisses Bräuhaus G. Schneider & Sohn GmbH
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Weisses Bräuhaus G. Schneider & Sohn GmbH Schneider Weisse Mein Blondes
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Also known as Schneider Weisse Tap 1 Meine Helle WeisseFormerly Schneider Weisse Weizen Hell.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Royal Weisse
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Sly Fox Brewing Company Royal Weisse

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Kristallweissbier
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Bayerische Staatsbrauerei Weihenstephan Weihenstephaner Kristallweissbier
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:In our golden-yellow crystal-clear wheat beer the fresh citrus flavour harmonises very well with spicy banana notes. The fine sparkling gives it a tangy and animated appearance. Throughout summer and winter, it’s a prickling experience. It goes well with fish, seafood, white meat or it can be enjoyed as an aperitif. Brewed according to our centuries-old brewing tradition on the Weihenstephan hill.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Honey Weiss
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Jacob Leinenkugel Brewing Company Leinenkugel's Honey Weiss
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Featuring a touch of real Wisconsin honey, Leinenkugel's Honey Weiss is a golden-hued traditional American weiss beer inspired by a classic German style. It's traditionally garnished with a lemon wedge for added citrus aroma that perfectly complements the sweet, subtle flavors of the beer.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Laughing Fox
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: New Glarus Brewing Company Laughing Fox
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:In playful pursuit of butterflies a Red Fox danced across the brewery hill. His joy so pure it bubbled through our hearts and into this beer. Laughing Fox is a sparkling Kristal Weizen brewed in the Bavarian tradition with 50% Wisconsin wheat in our open top fermenters. Tickle your nose notes of spicy clove and cinnamon abound. Dan’s inspired Weizen interpretation reflects the deep bittersweet color of our Fox’s red coat. Expect this beer to pour a lively effervescent glass thick with creamy foam and bursting with luscious fruity notes on your pallet. This is easy drinking beer perfect for a friendly Wisconsin evening. Relax, this is God’s Country, here we have the strength to reach for the stars and change the world.PAIRING:Foods: Pork Roast, Bratwurst Cheeses: Gruyere, Aged Cheddar Dessert: Carrot Cake\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Erdinger Weissbier Kristallklar
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Erdinger Weissbräu Erdinger Weissbier Kristallklar
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:US import name "Erdinger Weissbier Crystal Clear"Crystal-clear with an inviting frothy head: this lively wheat beer specialty features fruity-fresh aromas.With its extra portion of sparkling and energizing carbonic acid, ERDINGER Kristall is especially refreshing! Strong malted wheat notes combine with an elegant hop bouquet to round off the finish.It gets its shining, crystal-clear appearance from intensive filtration. Those who feel traditional Bavarian wheat beer is a little too cloudy will love the clarity of this top-quality ERDINGER beer."\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Tucher Kristall Weizen
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brauerei Tucher Brau Tucher Kristall Weizen

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Old Chico Crystal Wheat
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Sierra Nevada Brewing Co. Old Chico Crystal Wheat

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Franziskaner Weissbier Kristallklar
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Spaten-Franziskaner-Bräu Franziskaner Club-Weisse Kristalklar
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Formerly Franziskaner Club-Weisse Kristalklar\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Weissbier Kristallklar
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Paulaner Brauerei GmbH & Co. KG Paulaner Weissbier Kristallklar

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Schöfferhofer Kristallweizen
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Binding-Brauerei AG Schöfferhofer Kristallweizen

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Schneider Weisse Tap 2 Mein Kristall
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Brewery: Weisses Bräuhaus G. Schneider & Sohn GmbH
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Weisses Bräuhaus G. Schneider & Sohn GmbH Schneider Weisse Kristall
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Formerly Schneider Weisse Kristall.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Weisse Kristall
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Brauerei Gebrüder Maisel GmbH & Co. Maisel's Weisse Kristall

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Dancing Trout Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Bayern Brewing, Inc. Bayern Dancing Trout Ale
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Dancing Trout Ale is a filtered Bavarian Hefeweizen also referred to as a Kristall Weizen. Brewed with Wheat and Pilsener malt, and Cascade hops. Crafted with a cause, Dancing Trout Ale is the flagship beer of Montana Trout Unlimited.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Bohemia Weizen
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Brewery: Cervecería Cuauhtémoc Moctezuma, S.A. de C.V.
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Cervecería Cuauhtémoc Moctezuma, S.A. de C.V. Bohemia Weizen
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Pretty clear yellow pour with white head. Aroma is light bananas, wheat, and a touch of floral. Flavor mirrors aroma with a flat wheat and a touch of sweet. Medium bodied with good carbonation. 11 IBU\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Hacker-Pschorr Kristall Weisse
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Hacker-Pschorr Bräu GmbH Hacker-Pschorr Kristall Weisse

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Sunthief Kristallweizen
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Black Raven Brewing Co. Sunthief Kristallweizen

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Franconia Kristal-weizen
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Franconia Brewing Company Franconia Kristal-weizen

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Cascade Blonde
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Cascade Brewery Company Ltd. Cascade Blonde

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Sanwald Kristall Weizen
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Dinkelacker-Schwabenbraeu AG Sanwald Kristall Weizen

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Falkensteiner Weizen
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Privatbrauerei Bischoff Falkensteiner Weizen

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Krystal Weizen
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Portneuf Valley Brewing Krystal Weizen
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Description: Notes:Cousin to the hefeweizen, we've cleared it up for a smooth and light wheat beer. Light and crisp with low hop character.\t

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Zitronenweizen
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Triumph Brewing Company Zitronenweizen

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Kapuziner Kristall-Weizen
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Kulmbacher Brauerei AG Kapuziner Kristall-Weizen

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Julius Echter Kristall Weizen
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Würzburger Hofbräu AG Julius Echter Kristall Weizen

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Rieser Kristall-Weizen
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Ankerbräu Nördlingen Rieser Kristall-Weizen

dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Name: Kristall Weizen
dbo.beer_profile_and_ratings.Beer_Name_Full: Propeller Brewery Propeller Kristall Weizen
